class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵阎秀才汉臣食兔</a><span class='authorDate'>（1078年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196313")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196313'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196313'>兔诚中山族，中古稍分裂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196313'>唐虞用大牲，虽有目未瞥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196313'>䨲孙能飞仙，飘忽天汉决。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196313'>不逢易牙试，厥胄几泯灭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196313'>羿弧殒阳乌，曾不弋在穴。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196313'>王良马慢忌，扑握几奔掣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196313'>初遭赳赳子，鼎饪饫毛血。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196313'>中逢宋鹊窘，饥吻啄原雪。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196313'>叔世削格多，星迸失行列。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196313'>蹄穷不得逸，如鼠限高闑。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196313'>应怜蚌潜水，暴腹想江月。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196313'>唇亡欲谁语，竟死犹结舌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196313'>肩尻弱易解，狼藉腥尺铁。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196313'>抽毫置筠管，复苦蠹鱼齧。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196313'>论功在册府，微物推尔杰。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196313'>剡藤光夺缣，抄记良琐屑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196313'>北邻阎夫子，尚忍资杯啜。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196313'>得诸韩卢口，实以彊暴劣。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196313'>作诗誇芳美，此誉宁所悦。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196313'>不如狐膏臊，质贱甘弃绝。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196313'>冢妖老通数，藤索夜空设。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196313'>尔曾不及彼，就获徒内热。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196313'>聆声无耸耳，当学缩颈鳖。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196313'>吾君阜万物，沛若泽未竭。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196313'>谁能复古初，此味傥可缺。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_196348'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196348'>峄阳之孤桐，踣自霹雳斧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196348_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196348'>龙伏之灵林复古，断文横截丝百缕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196348_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196348'>下垂七轸如牛乳，上有明星稀可数。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196348_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196348'>当轩拂拭待君鼓，君心有在君未语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196348_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196348'>仲尼昔时从师襄，颀然一人犹望羊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196348_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196348'>我独怀之千古长，杖策不省颐之忘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196348_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196348'>去年河决疮未补，今年赤地无禾黍，像龙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_196348", 196348, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>焚尪</span>亦何取。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196348_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196348'>堂上平戎不敢听，且激南风召时雨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_196489'>君不见鲁中群儿歌<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_196489", 196489, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>跋遮</span>，<span class='link' "Clauses/1/Comments/1")'>跋遮</span>何语耶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196489'>吴歈越吟初不省，恐自塞北传胡笳，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_196489", 196489, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>跋遮</span>胡为乐中华。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196489'>试歌河涨水渐<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：尖。）</span>车，河中耕泥春种麻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196489'>麻生三岁不开花，腰菱两角黑如鸦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196489'>渔父笑且语，谁能<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_196489", 196489, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>跋遮</span>舞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196489'>君不见前年大旱河草黄，草中鱼子化飞蝗。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196489'>又不见往年大雨雨决渠，渠中朽瓜生老鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196489'>蝗飞食场谷，击鼓烦趁扑。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196489'>我家家具如笋束，今年梁山挠浊淤，儿无锄麻姑来渔。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196489'>荷锄往卖锄，买网空市无。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196489'>丁丁斲船斲屋栌，艇子如星唤施罛。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196489_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196489'>夜唱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_196489", 196489, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>跋遮</span>曲，群鸣起白凫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_196489_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196476' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196476' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196476?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_196476'>阎夫子，通古今，家徒四壁犹一琴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196476'>今年二月雨霖霪，喜君垄麦如人深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196476'>屋间幽默咸池音，高山流水我非听，听我说君辛苦吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196476'>薛老村西十里地，旱日燎原无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_196476", 196476, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>柳林</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196476'>芒鞋曳杖逐镰笼，当午未食饥烧心。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196476'>芸芸麦田翻黄波，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_196476", 196476, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>蝻虫</span>盘穗如<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_196476", 196476, "Clauses/13/Comments/1")'>蜗螺</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196476'>麦未收打催种豆，屋下迹少田间多。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196476'>阎夫子，时我过，我与夫子良同科。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196476'>四体虽勤口餔众，煮豆然萁穷奈何。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196476_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196476'>人谓君琴语辛苦，此曲无乃伤天和，君不见夫子宋围不糁犹弦歌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196476_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195960' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195960' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，43岁</div><div id='2dc3fdb67cbd46f88c266dcdfdd2ac03' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年2月8日</a>　晁补之坐修《神宗实录》失实，于正月十日敕降通判应天府，三月二日抵达任所。作品：《罢齐州先茔焚黄告祭文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六0。）</span><div id='poem_1207727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207727?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罢齐州先茔焚黄告祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年2月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207727")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207727'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207727'>绍圣二年二月八日，男左承议郎、充秘阁校理、新就差通判应天府南京留守司畿内劝农事、武骑尉补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敬祭告于先君著作晁公之墓曰：补之不肖，始葬先君之三日，还官于魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207727_comment'></div>其后忝命入馆，登朝为州，逮兹谪官，凡十一年，而后始获拜奠墓下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207727_comment'></div>楸柏尽拱，而不肖子补之尚宦游四方，不能反田里，奉洒扫，怵惕陨心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207727_comment'></div>今天子以元祐壬申十一月甲子冬至，郊见天地，凡在庭之士，皆得追荣其先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207727_comment'></div>初以左奉议郎告于第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207727_comment'></div>恭承光命，既惭以哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207727_comment'></div>惟是先君之潜德隐行，天其或者尚将大之，在他子孙，非不肖子补之独能致此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207727_comment'></div>谨撰日以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207727_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207727_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b5803ded8d8b4ba49a8797b8ca5ab558_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b5803ded8d8b4ba49a8797b8ca5ab558");'><span id='b5803ded8d8b4ba49a8797b8ca5ab558_link' -----title
富阳（新城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a6780c1490624075bd7d7d685791fdee_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a6780c1490624075bd7d7d685791fdee");'><span id='a6780c1490624075bd7d7d685791fdee_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1071')">1069-1071年</a>，17-19岁</div><div id='a6780c1490624075bd7d7d685791fdee' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1071')">1069-1071年</a>　晁补之侍父新城任所。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='88bf727c6fec41c9a5b21c11ff866f33_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("88bf727c6fec41c9a5b21c11ff866f33");'><span id='88bf727c6fec41c9a5b21c11ff866f33_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1072')">1071-1072年</a>，19-20岁</div><div id='88bf727c6fec41c9a5b21c11ff866f33' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　晁补之为从兄作字序。作品：《从兄字伯顺序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三五。）</span><div id='poem_1207319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>从兄字伯顺序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207319")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207319'>名者，所以制义出礼，而字者，相期于实，以不虚其名者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207319_comment'></div>盖余从兄名隆之，而字不足以称其实，余为之说曰：物未尝有必隆者，亦未尝有必不隆者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207319_comment'></div>封土以为台，巍巍者先圮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207319_comment'></div>架木以为宇，翘翘者先桡焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207319_comment'></div>泰山之隆百仞，而跛牂履其蹊，以绝其岭，势附于下也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207319_comment'></div>吴牛之力百钧，而童子拊其角、坐其背，知役于人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207319_comment'></div>故曰物未尝有必隆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207319_comment'></div>有人焉，力不能胜一匹雏，而天下不敢为之先，彼其所以能隆者，亦必有道矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207319_comment'></div>《易》曰：「地中生木，升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207319_comment'></div>君子以顺德，积小以高大」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207319_comment'></div>夫顺德不躐等，君子之所以积小也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207319_comment'></div>如此，而后可以基高大，此为隆之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207319_comment'></div>故余请字曰「伯顺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207319_comment'></div>熙宁四年八月，从弟补之序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207319_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　晁补之上书杭州学官吕穆仲。作品：《上杭州教官吕穆仲书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五二。）</span><div id='poem_1207161' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207161' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207161?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上杭州教官吕穆仲书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207161")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207161_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207161'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207161'>补之闻三代之前，天下无可治之事，而贤者无急仕之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207161_comment'></div>天子与其二三大臣，终日接膝，都俞唱和于其上，而海内之民相与动心向风，欢欣鼓舞于其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207161_comment'></div>方是时也，政教平而赋敛轻，礼义行而刑罚止，天下已治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207161_comment'></div>士虽有尊主庇民之业，而无所用之，则往往引手而去，括囊晦迹以尽其生，笑歌优游以乐其时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207161_comment'></div>山巅水涯，布衣韦带，樵渔衰老之人，负檐行路之夫，与之语，有可惊之言，而施于政，有可见之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207161_comment'></div>若此者，不知其几何人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207161_comment'></div>三代已降，世既多事，贤者不忍拱手以视天下之纷纭，而思有以治之，则争相奋厉，发于畎亩之间，挟奇策以干时君，曳长裾而游王门，以身任职，以职任事，各务有立于世，而士始有好功名之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207161_comment'></div>其不获知于斯时而退伏于山林者，则皆当日之无能人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207161_comment'></div>故人不知隐居之可尚，而皆以有用为贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207161_comment'></div>然而天下亦以治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207161_comment'></div>其后，晋之士大夫不知为此者，将以趋时弊，而窃有慕乎隐者之名，于是乎弃礼法，遗冠冕，以求为养高之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207161_comment'></div>而晋天下之事，亦靡靡不振，无与治者，甚可叹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207161_comment'></div>陵夷至于唐，而终南、嵩少至号为仕途捷径，则其失隐者之风为益远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207161_comment'></div>夫君子非固为隐，亦非固为不隐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207161_comment'></div>三代之前，无可治之事，则隐而不失为高；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207161_comment'></div>三代而降世事多矣，思有以治之，则不隐不失为贤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207161_comment'></div>若夫居不可隐而固隐焉，则又何矫情拂道之甚也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207161_comment'></div>晋、唐之士，其失以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207161_comment'></div>国家承平百年，政令日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207161_comment'></div>主上慨然思有以追两汉之馀，而复三代之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207161_comment'></div>焦心以问治，降意以下贤，而士之怀瑾握瑜者，纷纷籍籍，云翔蜂起，奔走自效，不待招来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207161_comment'></div>盖补之尝游于齐、楚之郊，见夫带经而耕者，莫非求仕也，而后知今日之无隐者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207161_comment'></div>设有之，亦皆今日之无能人尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207161_comment'></div>夫进不能少补于世，退以受无能之名，则与夫孟子之所谓自弃者，何以异哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207161_comment'></div>补之济北鄙人也，生十年而学，学九年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207161_comment'></div>尝自谓幸出于有为之世，而耻矫晋、唐之风，故尝历四方，以观郡邑之政治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207161_comment'></div>游上庠，以服天子之教化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207161_comment'></div>从士大夫论议，以知当日之施为措置；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207161_comment'></div>而稍稍自饬，以求去鄙野之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207161_comment'></div>窃闻执事以经术文章取上科，以开敏明辩入幕府，而有职乎庠序，见师于学者，故补之愿伏于门下而受教焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207161_comment'></div>继之以所为歌诗杂文一编，投献于左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207161_comment'></div>凡此，非求果有用于今也，要以为不自弃而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207161_comment'></div>不识阁下以为何如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207161_comment'></div>夫没世而无闻者，君子之所疾，则夫士之区区以自言者，其亦无罪焉可也。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1207161'></div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1207161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　晁补之上书苏轼。作品：《上苏公书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1207159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上苏公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207159")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207159'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207159'>古先哲王之世，士无贵贱而道同，国无远近而俗均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207159_comment'></div>王公大人服冠剑而坐庙堂，握图印而临海县，所以宰制万物、役使群动者有道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207159_comment'></div>而穷岩深林、长啸远引之人，所以为藏迹而不耀，闭口而不传者，亦是道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207159_comment'></div>邹、鲁之郊，洙、泗之间，老幼叙于席，男女别于涂，乡饮时祭，执笾献豆之容不阙于堂，而家塾党庠，鸣琴击磬之声不乏于耳，流风善政，相渐成俗，以波及夫宋、卫、燕、晋、秦、楚者，亦是俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207159_comment'></div>世衰道微，诸侯错立，而国自为治，家自为法矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207159_comment'></div>德礼之所全，刑政之所厚，山川之所产，风气之所习，故其民思虑不纯而趣舍异向，不幸而小道异术群起而乘之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207159_comment'></div>驾徜徉之文，张诡怪之事，而使人动目骇耳，而为列御寇、庄周；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207159_comment'></div>诋前言往行以自大，尊礼法刑名以为贤，而为荀卿、韩非；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207159_comment'></div>峨冠博带，高谈乎九州之外，闳大而不经，文具而难施，而为邹衍、邹奭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207159_comment'></div>微辞隐语，滑稽不穷，其混迹若高，其蒙恶若卑，而为淳于髡、稷下学者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207159_comment'></div>伏车结驷，东奔西驰，而使楚兵不得合临菑，秦甲不得下函谷，而为苏秦、张仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207159_comment'></div>左手把人之袖，右手揕人之胸，义不返顾，计不旋踵，以快一时之忿，而为荆轲、聂政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207159_comment'></div>盖先王之道披猖磔裂，此其极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207159_comment'></div>而秦汉已降，则又有山东出相，山西出将之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207159_comment'></div>鲁多平原广野，土厚而水深，故民朴而少文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207159_comment'></div>齐北有渤海，南有琅琊，鱼盐货利之与俱，故其民险而多诈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207159_comment'></div>晋介齐秦之面，搏燕、楚之胁，其道四平，舟车之所交会，甲兵之所驰突，故其民危而好乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207159_comment'></div>燕土确，北迫匈奴，马羊水草之所聚，故其民健而少虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207159_comment'></div>秦倚华山，阻函谷，膺击韩、魏，垂头中国，一夫当关，百夫莫前，故其民勇而轻斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207159_comment'></div>楚接吴、越之封，杂荆、舒之地，故其民剽而难恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207159_comment'></div>其馀穷邦小国，不可殚数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207159_comment'></div>要之，天下荡然，无复先王之民矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207159_comment'></div>由汉历唐，虽贤君相望，异人间出，慨然太息，有忧天下之心，而卒之道不同、俗不均者，其来有渐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207159_comment'></div>某不佞，尝切叹此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207159_comment'></div>夫有盖天下之名，而后可以服天下之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207159_comment'></div>有服天下之实，然后可以望天下之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207159_comment'></div>阁下布衣单车，崎岖出蜀，一日而声振四方，四方之士拱手而来降，向风而交驰，可谓有盖天下之名矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207159_comment'></div>横身当职，不肯碌碌，出辞吐气，无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1207159", 1207159, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>阿避</span>，可谓有服天下之实矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207159_comment'></div>然则天下之所为望而化者，非阁下何以哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207159_comment'></div>昔者文翁一入蜀，而蜀之民虽县邑小吏，皆知文雅之可好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207159_comment'></div>常衮一治闽，而闽之人感厉读书，颖脱而出者相望于途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207159_comment'></div>夫大江之南，五湖之间，其人便捷而多能，轻清而好奇，阁下亦既知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207159_comment'></div>阁下之入吴也，吴人固已有随舳舻于末流，望冠盖于后尘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207159_comment'></div>使阁下少借之以貌，薄诱之以言，彼孰不油然喜、翕然变哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207159_comment'></div>故补之将首为吴人庆，而次为天下有望于阁下而化者庆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207159_comment'></div>某济北之鄙人，生二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207159_comment'></div>其才力学术不足以自致于阁下之前，独幸阁下官于吴，而某亦侍亲从宦于吴也，故愿随吴人拜堂庑而望精光焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207159_comment'></div>盖闻君子尊贤而容众，嘉善而矜不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207159_comment'></div>某非能贤且善也，而方其盘辟俯偻，从众人之后，以幸君子之知而不自慊，补之虽不能，亦阁下所宜容而矜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207159_comment'></div>《传》曰：「苟以是心至，斯受之而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207159_comment'></div>辄敢进其说，以累执事者，伏惟幸恕而少进之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1207159_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　晁补之再次上书苏轼。作品：《再上苏公书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1207159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上苏公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207159")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207159'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207159'>古先哲王之世，士无贵贱而道同，国无远近而俗均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207159_comment'></div>王公大人服冠剑而坐庙堂，握图印而临海县，所以宰制万物、役使群动者有道；<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207159_comment'></div>盖先王之道披猖磔裂，此其极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207159_comment'></div>而秦汉已降，则又有山东出相，山西出将之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207159_comment'></div>晋介齐秦之面，搏燕、楚之胁，其道四平，舟车之所交会，甲兵之所驰突，故其民危而好乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207159_comment'></div>燕土确，北迫匈奴，马羊水草之所聚，故其民健而少虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207159_comment'></div>秦倚华山，阻函谷，膺击韩、魏，垂头中国，一夫当关，百夫莫前，故其民勇而轻斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207159_comment'></div>楚接吴、越之封，杂荆、舒之地，故其民剽而难恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207159_comment'></div>其馀穷邦小国，不可殚数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207159_comment'></div>要之，天下荡然，无复先王之民矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207159_comment'></div>由汉历唐，虽贤君相望，异人间出，慨然太息，有忧天下之心，而卒之道不同、俗不均者，其来有渐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207159_comment'></div>某不佞，尝切叹此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207159_comment'></div>夫有盖天下之名，而后可以服天下之心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207159_comment'></div>有服天下之实，然后可以望天下之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207159_comment'></div>阁下布衣单车，崎岖出蜀，一日而声振四方，四方之士拱手而来降，向风而交驰，可谓有盖天下之名矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207159_comment'></div>横身当职，不肯碌碌，出辞吐气，无所<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1207159", 1207159, "Clauses/119/Comments/0")'>阿避</span>，可谓有服天下之实矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207159_comment'></div>然则天下之所为望而化者，非阁下何以哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207159_comment'></div>昔者文翁一入蜀，而蜀之民虽县邑小吏，皆知文雅之可好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207159_comment'></div>常衮一治闽，而闽之人感厉读书，颖脱而出者相望于途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207159_comment'></div>夫大江之南，五湖之间，其人便捷而多能，轻清而好奇，阁下亦既知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207159_comment'></div>阁下之入吴也，吴人固已有随舳舻于末流，望冠盖于后尘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207159_comment'></div>使阁下少借之以貌，薄诱之以言，彼孰不油然喜、翕然变哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207159_comment'></div>故补之将首为吴人庆，而次为天下有望于阁下而化者庆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207159_comment'></div>某济北之鄙人，生二十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207159_comment'></div>其才力学术不足以自致于阁下之前，独幸阁下官于吴，而某亦侍亲从宦于吴也，故愿随吴人拜堂庑而望精光焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207159_comment'></div>盖闻君子尊贤而容众，嘉善而矜不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207159_comment'></div>某非能贤且善也，而方其盘辟俯偻，从众人之后，以幸君子之知而不自慊，补之虽不能，亦阁下所宜容而矜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207159_comment'></div>《传》曰：「苟以是心至，斯受之而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207159_comment'></div>辄敢进其说，以累执事者，伏惟幸恕而少进之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1207159_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='8aacd1791ff448eb928d7550afcab247_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8aacd1791ff448eb928d7550afcab247");'><span id='8aacd1791ff448eb928d7550afcab247_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>，21岁</div><div id='8aacd1791ff448eb928d7550afcab247' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之侍父新城任所，与苏轼唱和。作品：《次韵苏公和南新道中二首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_196303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196032_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196032'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196032'>临安城郭半池台，曾是香尘扑面来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196032'>不见当时翠軿女，今年陌上又花开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196032'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196032_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196031?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196031'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196031'>云母蛮笺作信来，佳人陌上看花回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196031'>妾行不似东风急，为报花须缓缓开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196031_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196031'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196031_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196030?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196030'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196030'>陌上偷来为看花，饶声鹦鹉莫夭斜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196030'>犊车缓缓随芳草，不去桃源阿母家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196030'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196030_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207623' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207623' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207623?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新城游北山记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207623")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207623_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207623'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207623'>去新城之北三十里，山渐深，草木泉石渐幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207623_comment'></div>初犹骑行石齿间，旁皆大松，曲者如盖，直者如幢，立者如人，卧者如虬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207623_comment'></div>松下草间，有泉沮洳，伏见堕石井，锵然而鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207623_comment'></div>松间藤数十尺，蜿蜒如大蚖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207623_comment'></div>其上有鸟，黑如鸲鹆，赤冠长喙，俛而啄，磔然有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207623_comment'></div>稍西，一峰高绝，有蹊介然，仅可步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207623_comment'></div>系马石觜，相扶携而上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207623_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1207623", 1207623, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>篁筱</span>仰不见日，如四五里，乃闻鸡声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207623_comment'></div>有僧布袍蹑履来迎，与之语，𥈭而顾，如麋鹿不可接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207623_comment'></div>顶有屋数十间，曲折依崖壁为栏楯，如蜗鼠缭绕，乃得出，门牖相值。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207623_comment'></div>既坐，山风飒然而至，堂殿铃铎皆鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207623_comment'></div>二三子相顾而惊，不知身之在何境也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207623_comment'></div>且暮，皆宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207623_comment'></div>于时九月，天高露清，山空月明，仰视星斗皆光大，如适在人上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207623_comment'></div>窗间竹数十竿，相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1207623", 1207623, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>摩戛</span>声切切不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207623_comment'></div>竹间海棕，森然如鬼魅离立突鬓之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207623_comment'></div>二三子又相顾魄动而不得寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207623_comment'></div>迟明，皆去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207623_comment'></div>既还家，数日，犹恍惚若有遇，因追记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207623_comment'></div>后不复到，然往往想见其事也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207623_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送段康侯序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207258")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207258'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207258'>故人什邡段君康侯得官桐庐，当具舟，补之曰：「顷至新城，与桐庐相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207258_comment'></div>七里濑、严陵钓矶，佳处也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207258_comment'></div>康侯曰：「然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207258_comment'></div>陵与光武卧，以足加腹，报司徒霸书才二十四字，使者嫌少，而诮以买菜求益，不与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207258_comment'></div>亦高矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207258_comment'></div>补之曰：「士无穷达，论归洁其身，惟伯夷、伊尹、柳下惠可信，馀子或远或近，皆累于名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207258_comment'></div>陵如道足乎己，无求于世，招之不至，可也，至而不仕，亦可也，何必明人以天子三公皆旧故，而恃放骜以自尊？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207258_comment'></div>陵操诚高，亦近名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207258_comment'></div>庄子曰：『枯槁之士宿名』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207258_comment'></div>枯槁自命，宿道可也，宿名非也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207258_comment'></div>康侯曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207258_comment'></div>补之曰：「古惟两士近不类于名者，其一士犹恨其自言也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207258_comment'></div>康侯曰：「何耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207258_comment'></div>补之曰：「晋文公赏从亡者，介之推不言禄，禄亦不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207258_comment'></div>将入绵上山中，其母曰：『亦使知之』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207258_comment'></div>之推曰：『言，身之文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207258_comment'></div>身将隐矣，何以文为』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207258_comment'></div>若之推，可谓不累于名矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207258_comment'></div>汉韩康卖药长安，市不二价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207258_comment'></div>有女子从康买药，康守价不移，女子曰：『君是韩伯休耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207258_comment'></div>乃不二价』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207258_comment'></div>康曰：『我本避名，今女子皆知有我，何用药为』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207258_comment'></div>乃入霸陵山中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207258_comment'></div>康避名诚是也，恐人识之，默去焉可也，何必晓疑者以吾果韩康？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207258_comment'></div>故曰『犹恨其自言』也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207258_comment'></div>然此两士皆胜陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207258_comment'></div>陵夸世主，是显也，非隐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207258_comment'></div>夫陵何足高？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207258_comment'></div>光武以万乘不忘旧故，下匹夫，乃足高」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207258_comment'></div>康侯曰：「然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207258_comment'></div>补之因复曰：今康侯儿童勤苦学问，数以文词与计偕，有司不识，卒遗之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207258_comment'></div>守经知古，廉洁不阿，白首栖栖，以其妻孥跋山浮江数千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207258_comment'></div>康侯不以人不知愠，见人呼我愚则我亦愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207258_comment'></div>以方前两士者，不累于名，不更近乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207258_comment'></div>岂其必若严陵夸乃足高？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207258_comment'></div>虽然，士生一世，取不愧怍，高与卑，或势所遇，不足道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207258_comment'></div>桐庐佳山水，多秀民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207258_comment'></div>康侯官馀暇，与其邑子田野逸士言，而时察之，得无物色有如陵枯槁自喜者，犹持竿其濑中？</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1207258_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
杭州（钱塘）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9a0add25c591471bb29ed5e6e84aafc2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9a0add25c591471bb29ed5e6e84aafc2");'><span id='9a0add25c591471bb29ed5e6e84aafc2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>，19岁</div><div id='9a0add25c591471bb29ed5e6e84aafc2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年11月</a>　晁补之谒苏轼，撰文献之。作品：《七述》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1207080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>七述</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207080")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207080'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207080'>予尝获侍于苏公，苏公为予道杭之山川人物雄秀奇丽，夸靡饶阜，名不能殚者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207080_comment'></div>且称枚乘、曹植《七发》、《七启》之文，以谓「引物连类，能究情状」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207080_comment'></div>退而深思，仿其事为《七述》，意者述公之言，而非作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207080_comment'></div>眉山先生怀道含光，陆沉于俗，日与嵇、阮赋诗饮酒，谈笑自足，泊然若将终身焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207080_comment'></div>于是，颍川孺子闻而往从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207080_comment'></div>蹑屐担簦，破衣踵门，及阶而止，望帷而称曰：「不敏闻先生之谊，敢待于下风」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207080_comment'></div>先生矍然惊曰：「孺子来，吾恶夫世人之保我也久矣，而不能使人之无我保，则户外之屐满焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207080_comment'></div>将命欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207080_comment'></div>吾无所逃此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207080_comment'></div>虽然，孺子何为者也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「幼而多治，长而屡穷，遭先生乎龃龉之涂，陪先生乎寂寥之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207080_comment'></div>乐先生之所为乐者，以白吾首，其已乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207080_comment'></div>先生哑然笑曰：「孺子上，吾以乐而未尝无以乐者顺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207080_comment'></div>羁旅于吾有时矣，亦尝闻杭之山川人物雄秀奇丽，夸靡饶阜，可乐者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「先生不以不敏为难与言，得闻咳唾之音，不敏以为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207080_comment'></div>先生将何以教之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1207080'>先生曰：「杭之故封：左浙江，右具区，北大海，南天目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207080_comment'></div>万川之所交会，万山之所重复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207080_comment'></div>或濑或湍，或湾或渊，或岐或孤，或袤或连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207080_comment'></div>滔滔汤汤，浑浑洋洋，累累硠硠，隆隆卬卬，若金城天府之彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207080_comment'></div>其民既庶而有馀，既姣而多娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207080_comment'></div>可导可疏，可舠可桴，可跋可踰，可檋可车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207080_comment'></div>若九洲三山，接乎人世之庐，连延迤逦，环二千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207080_comment'></div>邑居牧聚，蚁合蜂起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207080_comment'></div>高城附之，如带绕指，隐以为脊，折以为尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207080_comment'></div>因河堑华，不足方比，方城汉水，胡敢竞美？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207080_comment'></div>当昔夫差之盛时，内姑苏以为心腹，而外城此以为身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207080_comment'></div>革车千乘，甲士万人，粟支十年，帛散千屯，洒汗成雨，连衽成云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207080_comment'></div>乃有大夫伯嚭、行人伍员之徒通其谋，将军孙武、公子夫概之徒用其众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207080_comment'></div>尝以国政之閒，发徒截江，命习战事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207080_comment'></div>于是张翠羽之盖，靡鱼须之斿，扬鹅足之楫，曳龙尾之舟，凌鳣鼋之车，戏贲获之俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207080_comment'></div>飘鼓吹乎下风，隘戈矛乎上游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207080_comment'></div>乍往乍还，乍后乍先，若乱而若联；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207080_comment'></div>乍止乍驰，乍合乍离，迭唱而迭随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207080_comment'></div>惊鲛人，立冯夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207080_comment'></div>清江忽兮怒涛，飙风为之扬歧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207080_comment'></div>怠而即次，食具乐作，三军皆贺，响震山壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207080_comment'></div>其彊如此，故姑苏恃以为南蔽，而能驱唐、蔡，蹂齐、鲁，侵寻乎百粤，隳突乎三楚，栖勾践乎穷山，鞭平王乎颓墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207080_comment'></div>此亦天下之形胜也，孺子欲闻乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「西河中流，卫客之所能谏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207080_comment'></div>秦险百二，亭长之所能入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207080_comment'></div>愿先生废此而语他」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1207080'>先生曰：「吴越之有东南也，实国于杭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207080_comment'></div>而杭，吴越之大都也，宫室之丽犹有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207080_comment'></div>其始也，削山填谷、叩石垦陆，蹶林诛樾、擢筱夷竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207080_comment'></div>旋缘阿丘，凭附隈隩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207080_comment'></div>千夫运畚，万役供筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207080_comment'></div>增增硁硁、坎坎碌碌，前呼后和、远近相属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207080_comment'></div>卑者起之以有馀，高者损之以不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207080_comment'></div>开旷朗乎蒙密，发瑰奇于潜伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207080_comment'></div>然后工人之材、陶人之瓦，水输陆运，属柁连輠，纵横错落，山积其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207080_comment'></div>其成也，翼翼鳞鳞，勃郁轮囷，若化若神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207080_comment'></div>上据百尺之巅，下俯亿寻之津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207080_comment'></div>双阙高张，夐临康庄，门开房达，乍阴乍阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207080_comment'></div>中则复殿重楼，砂版金钩，卑高仰俯，下上明幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207080_comment'></div>峥嵘截嶭，鼎峙林列，吐吞云雾，亏见日月，宏规伟度，古旷今绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207080_comment'></div>旁则曲台深闺，碧槛朱扉，鳞差阈限，奕布榱题，栱盘白凤，壁戏青猊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207080_comment'></div>温风徐而吹座，寒雨沐以沾帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207080_comment'></div>列屋而侍者，则妖嫱艳姝，螓首冰肤，清矑素齿，既娴而都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207080_comment'></div>乃服轻袿，被华裳，缀珠履，榆鸣珰，饰铅英，含若芳，倩巧笑兮婉清扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207080_comment'></div>缥缈兮如雏鸾之欲舞，逍遥乎如飞云之欲举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207080_comment'></div>连姗姽婳，婉娈媚妩，流荣发色，不可程度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207080_comment'></div>羽觞荐朱颜，酡悲激楚妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207080_comment'></div>阳阿词曰：『陌上花开游女归，园南池北黄鹂飞，曲房清阁夜更衣』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207080_comment'></div>于是闻者恍然，神扬意驰，纷纷扰扰，惑乱不怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207080_comment'></div>此亦天下之雄观殊乐也，孺子欲闻乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「宫居闺处者，寒燠之媒而疾疠之梯也，且馆娃成而麋鹿游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207080_comment'></div>愿先生废此而语他」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_1207080'>先生曰：「杭故王都，俗上工巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207080_comment'></div>家夸人斗，穷丽殚好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207080_comment'></div>纷挐错纠，晃荡精皛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207080_comment'></div>若八方之民车凑舟会，角富而衍宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207080_comment'></div>木则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_72_1207080", 1207080, "Clauses/238/Comments/1")'>花梨</span>美枞、棁柏香檀，阳平阴秘，外泽中坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207080_comment'></div>以斩以刊，以剞以剜，以漆以胶，以墨以丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207080_comment'></div>为床为匦，为椟为几，为槃为豆，为盂为簋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207080_comment'></div>严庄之佛，惨烈之神，诙怪之鬼，颀姣之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207080_comment'></div>涂以铅英，镂以金文，依山灵山，乘以飞云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207080_comment'></div>霞烟雾霭，焕烂五采，渠输陆运，投钱竞买。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207080_comment'></div>曾不若母猴木鸢，三月而齐，一日而败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207080_comment'></div>衣则纨绫绮绨，罗绣縠絺，轻明柔纤，如玉如肌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207080_comment'></div>竹窗轧轧，寒丝手拨，春风一夜，百花尽发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207080_comment'></div>其制而服也，或袍或鞶，或绅或纶，或缘或表，或缝或襕，或紫或纁，或绀或殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207080_comment'></div>严以奉祠，亵以养安，薄以却暑，厚以御寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207080_comment'></div>以锡三军，以赉四国，以供耳目之玩，以备土木之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207080_comment'></div>曾不若穷边绝漠，不纺不络，衣狐而袖貉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207080_comment'></div>宝则璆琳珊瑚、码碯珷玞，药化之玉，火化之珠，琉璃之碗，水精之盂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207080_comment'></div>红黄白绿，磊落满椟，北商东贾，百金不鬻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207080_comment'></div>沙河雨晴，月照灯明，席张案设，左右煌荧，远而望之，夺人目精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207080_comment'></div>遗英弃屑，箩贮箱列，曾不若宋人之拙，三年而一叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207080_comment'></div>于是彫床易席地之野，文衣后弋绨之俭，玉杯鄙土铏之啜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207080_comment'></div>此亦天下之妙工绝巧也，孺子欲闻乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「《书》云『玩物丧志』，纣为象箸而箕子叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207080_comment'></div>愿先生废此而语他」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_93_1207080'>先生曰：「杭之为州，负海带山，盖东南美味之所聚焉，水羞陆品，不待贾而足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207080_comment'></div>肉则封豲腯豕，罝兔畋麂，山狸白额，竹犬青尾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1207080_comment'></div>鸧鹅鹳鹜，鶪秃鸿鹍，园鸡池鸭、陇雉田鹑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1207080_comment'></div>陵收水截，头骈尾列，磔肩裂趾，飞毛洒血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1207080_comment'></div>鱼则鲻鲂鳣鱮，鲈鳜鳊鲤，黄颡黑脊，丹腮白齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1207080_comment'></div>江鲟之醯，石首之羹，或腊而枯，或脍而生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1207080_comment'></div>白鳗青鲞，黄鼋黑蟹，鮔鱼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_99_1207080", 1207080, "Clauses/345/Comments/0")'>花蛤</span>，车蛾淡菜，蛙白肖鸡，螺辛类芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1207080_comment'></div>鼎调瓯饾，牛呞貉嘬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1207080_comment'></div>果则枇杷杨桃，橘柚柤梨，青梅黄柿，紫栗乌椑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1207080_comment'></div>溪菱江蔍，田菰湖藕，壤肥水美，天下无有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1207080_comment'></div>冒以黄蜜，渍以白醝，芳香脆洁，析酲解痾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1207080_comment'></div>菜则茼蒿茵陈，紫蕨青莼，韭畦芋区，茭首芹根；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1207080_comment'></div>藤花羞盘、菊叶荐莒，姜辛薤淡，荠甘笋苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1207080_comment'></div>饭以姑苏之粳，荐以乌程之醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1207080_comment'></div>于以和五气，于以资百体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1207080_comment'></div>此亦天下食饮之珍也，孺子欲闻乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「扬雄有云：『弃常珍而嗜异馔，乌睹其识味也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1207080_comment'></div>且养身而尚乎味味，则愚以圣人为不如易牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1207080_comment'></div>愿先生废此而语他」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1207080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_112_1207080'>先生曰：「地不满东南，故八纮之水归焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1207080_comment'></div>水之为物，润下作咸，溟渤荡波，海门莫缄，骎骎脉布，溢于江潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1207080_comment'></div>老濞席赉，爨山煮海，豫章为船，万斛更载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1207080_comment'></div>一船所受，车数十量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1207080_comment'></div>黄头多钱，富不可仿，士之顽钝不耻者，皆饵其无厌之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1207080_comment'></div>譬如山深而兽至，木茂而鸟往，故能收亡命、借厮养，连应高之交，合周丘之党，以北与中国争长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1207080_comment'></div>则盐之利也，夫盐者，食肴之将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1207080_comment'></div>五均赊贷，斡在县官，仅法议笼，不罅以完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1207080_comment'></div>大农给费，入助国计，官与牢盆，世擅其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1207080_comment'></div>民有盗鬻，则釱左趾，没入其器，此为前古之所制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1207080_comment'></div>尝试观乎江之濆，葭苇不根，浅草芸芸，斥卤无垠，白花藓文，百里如云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1207080_comment'></div>盐官千家，匪柘匪麻，匪漆匪茶，规利乎泥沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1207080_comment'></div>蚁封蚓垤，积土如截，削剥刬刮，不漏毛发，挟携担揭，十步一蹶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1207080_comment'></div>偷趋窃走，遗筐弃缶，涂关塞牖，鼎釜雷吼，皓然纷葩，丰不盈斗，姑以渍螺蛤而适口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1207080_comment'></div>曾不比夫县官冶铁如山，析竹为盘，炽火以燔，渊壑为乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1207080_comment'></div>峥嵘崷崒，戍削律兀，扶舒萧勃，烟气滃出，若灭若没，若亡若失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1207080_comment'></div>乍疑盐阳之神翳乎，与群虫朝飞而蔽天日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1207080_comment'></div>立呼起诺，百夫齐作，纷纭挥霍，千灶就涸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1207080_comment'></div>光芒闪烁，璀璨磊落，小星迸跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1207080_comment'></div>鳞鳞新仓，歛贮堆藏，如帛如粮，国以是彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1207080_comment'></div>神变鬼化，刀贝齐价，独不美夫算菱芰、鱼蝤之殚细及下者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1207080_comment'></div>谚曰『千金之子，不死于市』，又曰『人富而仁义附焉』，此先生所以教民知荣辱之时也，孺子欲闻乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「猗氏之治，智贤白圭而不监于道，愿先生废此而语他」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1207080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_135_1207080'>先生曰：「江源所起，滥觞之墟，泓泓汪汪，不漏不虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1207080_comment'></div>放而行之，冒于川渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1207080_comment'></div>缭绕萦行，左挟越，右截吴，以散以敷，然后淫为大江，以东合乎尾闾，而潮生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1207080_comment'></div>古今所论潮者，日月伏见之所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1207080_comment'></div>尝读浑天之说曰，地浮水中，天在水外，水之消息，坱圠无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1207080_comment'></div>一阖一辟，若开天地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1207080_comment'></div>一呼一吸，若出元气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1207080_comment'></div>其始来也，若毛若线，若带若练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1207080_comment'></div>堂堂沓沓，合聚离散，须臾之间，千化万变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1207080_comment'></div>其少进也，敲磕铿𥐪，石号木鸣，越岸包陵，在谷满谷，在坑满坑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1207080_comment'></div>其为气也，或喣或呀，或噫或哕，㳽茫湠漫，澎濞沸渭，澒洞滉漾，渤潏滂沛，涵澹淋渗，潗濈淫泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1207080_comment'></div>跳珠涌沬，百里纷会，沃焦荡胸，汩母陵背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1207080_comment'></div>纵横络驿，飘忽争逝，徐则按行，缓则就队。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1207080_comment'></div>连氛累祲，阳景朝昧，周天而旋，踰八万里，不知其所憩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1207080_comment'></div>于时玄冥收威，海若振吼，千溪崒立，万浦却走，绝维推轴，神母不守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1207080_comment'></div>左驱天吴，右拂九首，渊客拒扉，水夷潜牖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1207080_comment'></div>江神海豨，绝脰伤肘，阳侯马衔，颠蹶前后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1207080_comment'></div>其为象也，则纷纭参差，万顷一迹，禹不能知，契不能识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1207080_comment'></div>承光露怪，不复潜匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1207080_comment'></div>或駃而蹄，或森而戟，或美而旃，或张而翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1207080_comment'></div>汹涌而奔，以沃海门，若土囊风，怒驱屯云，辟易而征，以击西陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1207080_comment'></div>如并陉战酣出奇兵，宛兮改容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1207080_comment'></div>若蓐收素服驾白龙，忽兮当前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1207080_comment'></div>如归墟泛溢浮五山，一北一追，一偾一起，突然而逝，馀勇未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1207080_comment'></div>于时吴儿獠工，引樯挂席，铙鸣鼓动，去若飞鹢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1207080_comment'></div>风止雨息，江清海碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1207080_comment'></div>此潮之大凡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1207080_comment'></div>传曰『上善若水』，又曰『水几于道』，故古之人见大水必观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1207080_comment'></div>善利万物似仁，不畏彊似勇，能方能圆似智，万折必东似信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1207080_comment'></div>若是者，孺子欲闻乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1207080_comment'></div>孺子曰：「几矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1207080_comment'></div>先生之所陈，五事之上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1207080_comment'></div>姑欲闻其深于此者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1207080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_168_1207080'>先生曰：「西湖之深，北山之幽，可舫可舟，可巢可楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1207080_comment'></div>与鸥鸟居，与鹿豕游，渔蓑山屐，烟雨悠悠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1207080_comment'></div>寂寥长往，可以忘忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1207080_comment'></div>风衫尘袂，京洛何求？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1207080_comment'></div>不如西湖濒，不如北山阿，白蘋绿芰，紫柏青萝，反裘坐钓，散发行歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1207080_comment'></div>人生安乐，孰知其他？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1207080_comment'></div>茫洋以为柳溪，盘旋以为李谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1207080_comment'></div>卷轲辩乎三尺之喙，扩夷隘乎十围之腹，此古君子所以藏器于身、待时而动也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1207080_comment'></div>传曰『不怨天，不尤人』，盖『优哉游哉，聊以卒岁』，若是何如」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1207080_comment'></div>孺子竦然离席而立曰：「盖闻达人不忘身而先利，志士不贪时而后义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1207080_comment'></div>隐之所尚，得全于天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1207080_comment'></div>孺子不敏，乃今得闻出处之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1207080_comment'></div>敬再拜受教」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_180_1207080_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='8654a200e67d46628c0b485a90cdd0fe_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8654a200e67d46628c0b485a90cdd0fe");'><span id='8654a200e67d46628c0b485a90cdd0fe_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>，22岁</div><div id='8654a200e67d46628c0b485a90cdd0fe' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　晁补之逢陈安性，作诗。作品：《汤村逢陈安性》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span><div id='poem_196328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汤村逢陈安性</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196328")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196328'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196328'>束装清晓来江浦，瘦马羸童犯山雨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196328'>解鞍入寺闻钟声，堂上僧斋日初午。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196328'>故人聆我足音喜，纱帽相逢坐东庑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196328'>别来几日颔生须，相见惊疑更问语。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196328'>念昨与君俱随书，贫贱不为人比数。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196328'>侍郎门馆乏容悦，举子文章惭莽卤。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196328'>瞽言强献亦何有，君去东州我之楚。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196328'>可怜今日江头路，草草逢君具鸡黍。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196328'>我贫无策未容饱，君禄虽微不犹愈。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196328'>如今未可计得失，且作新诗致醇醑。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196328'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_196328_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_1_196517'>公马未驾阴漫漫，公归湿幕濡旌幡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196517'>霜刀不染鹅颈殷，涂龙安享雩舞闲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196517'>隰桑有沃柔可攀，小麦青青大麦攒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196526' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196526?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠送澶州监酒税刘铨殿直</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span
