class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196526_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196526'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196526'>顿丘淇水雄朔方，官收榷算资公藏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196526'>晨朝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_196526", 196526, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>百贩</span>罗庭堂，望门逆鼻闻椒浆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196526'>惜哉刘子气方刚，峨冠凛凛颀而扬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196526'>丈夫有志固难量，短袖不足供倡佯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196526'>黄河七月鸣浮梁，风埃瘦马景山长。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196526'>刘子何之魏北乡。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196526'>悲歌弹铗邀孟尝，冯驩一语惊齐王。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196526'>况如刘子足自强，读书满腹钳尔吭。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196526'>酆城埋宝夜则光，士惟不用久乃彰。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196526_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196526'>不见将军家平阳，遭时有用名焜煌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196526_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196454?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送赵燮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196454")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196454'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196454'>赵侯慷慨诸公客，少日论兵今发白。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196454'>自言颇似鞲上鹰，老得一州聊铩翮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196454'>送行谁复双眼青，断肠红颊倾渌醽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196454'>停歌自解水苍佩，醉骑紫燕黄河冰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196454_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196454'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196454_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207620' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207620' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>澶州学生登科记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207620")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207620'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207620'>周公封于鲁，礼乐传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207620_comment'></div>孔子生于鲁，六经出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207620_comment'></div>学之为圣人事，其求莫近于鲁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207620_comment'></div>孔子曰：「鲁、卫之政，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1207620", 1207620, "Clauses/8/Comments/1")'>兄弟</span>也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207620_comment'></div>鲁、卫固<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1207620", 1207620, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>兄弟</span>，而政岂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1207620", 1207620, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>兄弟</span>也耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207620_comment'></div>虽然，周公教康叔以求商之遗民、贤人、君子、长者，康叔能修之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207620_comment'></div>武公、文公有文章道化，盖美哉渊乎，忧而不困者，于诗具在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207620_comment'></div>孔子取之，适卫而言曰：「庶矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207620_comment'></div>如有用我者，三年有成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207620_comment'></div>圣人之于卫，亦不可无泽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207620_comment'></div>秦并天下，立州郡，至于今不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207620_comment'></div>而君角之亡地，澶即其墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207620_comment'></div>始余自南州求济，中流而叹，知卫之美也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207620_comment'></div>登南北城而望，则山川迤靡，图记可指，盖楚公顿丘泉源、淇水须漕之地仿佛而在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207620_comment'></div>其诗曰：「如切如磋，如琢如磨」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207620_comment'></div>「彼姝者子，何以告之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207620_comment'></div>则原其国俗，好学而乐善，本于馀习者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207620_comment'></div>自季札见夫五人者，以谓「卫多君子，其国无故」，则其所从来者旧矣，非特孔子时为然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207620_comment'></div>而秦汉以降，士或忘其故习，不醇乎文学之绪，有夏育尚气任侠之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207620_comment'></div>述往事者，不善子羔脱身于孔氏之难，而喜道仲由结缨于台下之勇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207620_comment'></div>盖莫盛于汉，质直如汲黯，旷时而不一人，而倜傥喜战斗如后魏李崇辈，比者迄于五代，往往而出相望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207620_comment'></div>反而思之，然后知治天下病学校之不设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207620_comment'></div>太祖、太宗，神武不杀，四夷屈降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207620_comment'></div>真宗北巡，叛虏夺气，而澶之人始开门相往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207620_comment'></div>人人知本农桑、劝学校，以不忘其故家遗俗之盛，士亦稍稍能自有闻于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207620_comment'></div>繇学生而取科第者，自兴国逮元丰，可考而记者若干人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207620_comment'></div>其一时行事，皆有可道，而不幸穷夭且世无人者，又不可胜访，斯已盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207620_comment'></div>今天子以儒术治天下，而汲郡韩公之守澶也，能推天子所以乐儒术之意行之其邦，始命其参军晁补之率邦人诸生而与之游，且告补之曰：「无所待而兴者，豪杰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207620_comment'></div>降是，则君子不能无劝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207620_comment'></div>士而知读书为儒，取科第，列士大夫以归，荣其亲、荣其邦人焉，亦可尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207620_comment'></div>子无乃为次叙其名氏而记之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207620_comment'></div>予闻而益喜，曰：不可一日而不治者，三亩之宅犹如此，目前之事犹如此，况人伦所以本乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207620_comment'></div>跨浮梁而望大河之奔浑，为马图，为荣光，神气之发也，独人异哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207620_comment'></div>将必有君子如季札之所道，其理然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207620_comment'></div>因历考其古之所以盛、所以衰，与夫风声气俗之变，而载若干人者于其后，使邦人诸生一过而知焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207620_comment'></div>后之大车驷马，洋洋乎四方，人指以为劝者，亦知夫所以致此，自公之教而始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207620_comment'></div>公名璹，官右谏议大夫云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207620_comment'></div>元丰三年十二月某日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1207620_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207207' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207207?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授澶州司户答韩谏议璹请充教授启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1080年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207207")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207207_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207207'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207207'>窃以贵贱位殊，义非均则有所不答；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207207_comment'></div>贤愚术异，势既绝则无以相求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207207_comment'></div>盖明公在上之达尊，而不肖众人之晚遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207207_comment'></div>解褐一命，从军大邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207207_comment'></div>以未尝知名而过听独收，故不待望履而陈书犯分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207207_comment'></div>罪实出于不韪，诛宜获于非常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207207_comment'></div>敢谓伏蒙某官宽裕有容，威严曲霁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207207_comment'></div>猥以世间之盛礼，施于麾下之鲰生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207207_comment'></div>屈记室以裁笺，赐家童而返报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207207_comment'></div>往来嫌于敌体，进退越于常伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207207_comment'></div>愧汗莫堪，骇情无措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207207_comment'></div>炳若文章之眩目，跫然藜藋之惊心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207207_comment'></div>上烦开府之知，下无国士之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207207_comment'></div>至于假资助乏，辍乘代徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207207_comment'></div>自惟平生，得此固寡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207207_comment'></div>三复敢置，累息弗宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207207_comment'></div>盖补之才实窳疏，学尤拙陋，幼虽有志，壮益无闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207207_comment'></div>幸遘明昌，预沾教养，庶几同小子之有造，未敢与先生而并行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207207_comment'></div>正使米盐效勤，犹病弗称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207207_comment'></div>若复庠序肄业，尤非素长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207207_comment'></div>伏况门下德谊之最隆，府中衣冠之甚美，邹、枚毫牍之侍，应、刘樽俎之陪，足以议论古今，酬酢左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207207_comment'></div>岂宜下陈无似之贱吏，乃辱大人当路之末光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207207_comment'></div>拜教至荣，拊心益忝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207207_comment'></div>请自隗始，私不忘筑台之初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207207_comment'></div>即以遂行，尚或有奉盘之顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207207_comment'></div>敛板就列，计日有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207207_comment'></div>托庇门阑，终身悃愊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207207_comment'></div>惶惧激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207207_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
盱眙
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6852420f78f4480bb05d1ae8b435d22d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6852420f78f4480bb05d1ae8b435d22d");'><span id='6852420f78f4480bb05d1ae8b435d22d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>，22岁</div><div id='6852420f78f4480bb05d1ae8b435d22d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　晁补之侍父北上，途中遇胡戟于盱眙，晤言欢甚。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='74fd572bac1d4a2794fcbef962db9882_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("74fd572bac1d4a2794fcbef962db9882");'><span id='74fd572bac1d4a2794fcbef962db9882_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>，40岁</div><div id='74fd572bac1d4a2794fcbef962db9882' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　晁补之通判扬州。作品：《泗州王谏议明叟留饮》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一六。通判扬州两年间难以确指先后年月者。）</span><div id='poem_196191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泗州王谏议明叟留饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196191")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196191'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196191'>云水东游蚤岁怀，半生尘土却教回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196191_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196191'>两行堤柳关心在，一点淮山入眼来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196191_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196191'>北省主人誇酒好，南风稚子喜帆开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196191_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196191'>扬州底事牵行色，端为琼花芍药催。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196191_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196191'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196191_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='211014a68ad242d5a9a257f093c7e038_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("211014a68ad242d5a9a257f093c7e038");'><span id='211014a68ad242d5a9a257f093c7e038_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>，58岁</div><div id='211014a68ad242d5a9a257f093c7e038' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　晁补之自画山水大屏并题诗于上。作品：《自画山水留春堂大屏题其上》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二二。此条地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_195987' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195987' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195987?labeling=true' target='_blank'>自画山水留春堂大屏题其上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_195987")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195987_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195987'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195987'>胸中正可吞云梦，盏里何妨对圣贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195987'>有意清秋<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作扶筇）</span>入衡霍，为君<span class='inlineComment2'>（原校：一作毛锥）</span>无尽写江天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195987_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195987'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195987_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='40941062a15946f889e09505ea1565d1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("40941062a15946f889e09505ea1565d1");'><span id='40941062a15946f889e09505ea1565d1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>，58岁</div><div id='40941062a15946f889e09505ea1565d1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年7月14日</a>　晁补之以出党籍故，诣吏部候调，得起知达州，寻改泗州。作品：《近智斋记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三0。此条地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207622' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207622' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207622?labeling=true' target='_blank'>近智斋记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年7月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207622")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207622_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207622'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207622'>传曰：「计人之所知，不若其所不知」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207622_comment'></div>宇宙至广，万物至夥，千古至远，众理至幽，而欲以七尺之躯、方寸之地，尽揽而悉储之，譬以芥纳山，人知其不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207622_comment'></div>故神智大矣，德配蓍卦，而昔人犹或以谓智有所困，神有所不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207622_comment'></div>虽然，圣人盖常通而不困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207622_comment'></div>夫常通而不困，岂特其生而知之、皆备于我者能若是，亦必曰「好古敏以求之」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207622_comment'></div>而天下之不知者乃始曰：「圣人必其生而知之，故不穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207622_comment'></div>其曰『好古敏以求之』者，孔子之所以自贬，圣而不居之意也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207622_comment'></div>是不然，祖述尧舜，宪章文武，律天时，袭水土，删诗定书，雅言执礼，至于韦编三绝，曰：「我于《易》则彬彬矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207622_comment'></div>是固孔子所以学也，岂曰「我生而知之」，学皆可已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207622_comment'></div>虽然，自其常通而不困语之，神不可知，而智则学者可以俱至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207622_comment'></div>舜称智，臧武仲亦称智，而臧武仲去舜远，虽才异，亦学不造其极也，学造其极，则无不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207622_comment'></div>故智之为言，惟好学为能近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207622_comment'></div>平居无事，反观而内融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207622_comment'></div>上思千载，若存若亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207622_comment'></div>中揽四海，若隐若显；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207622_comment'></div>下索将来，若绝若续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207622_comment'></div>譬空中雨，欲数其滴，有不胜知者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207622_comment'></div>欲知之奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207622_comment'></div>惟学而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207622_comment'></div>学则圣人之智可近而不远，故物量无穷，而圣人之智亦无穷，用无穷逐无穷亦穷，则凡理之不可胜知者，有不能外吾之所察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207622_comment'></div>《易》曰「通乎昼夜之道而知」，此古人所以事至而辨、物来而名也，可谓不智乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207622_comment'></div>事物之过吾前，如日月更代而无止，而吾知所以应之，如井泉愈汲而愈不竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207622_comment'></div>盖学之效如此，不可谓不智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207622_comment'></div>顷余术不与时，偶废官，休其廛八年，而巷之草没屐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207622_comment'></div>或谚之，辄自语曰：「足固未尝刖，而士相与戒而远之，曰，是其术也不利人，昵且招悔」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207622_comment'></div>而袁君耕道独往来从余者亦八年，其意不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207622_comment'></div>或谢不见，或乍见而不留，卒不怼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207622_comment'></div>或旦暮见，或易与言如家人，卒不侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207622_comment'></div>余叹曰：「甚矣，耕道可谓好学也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207622_comment'></div>抑人所戒远利近悔奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207622_comment'></div>耕道犹笑自如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207622_comment'></div>而余记诵益落，文字益疏，顾无以应耕道求，又不敢以其不知而作者语之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207622_comment'></div>虽语之，而知也无涯，使耕道何自入？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207622_comment'></div>故第诵《中庸》语曰「好学近乎智」以勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207622_comment'></div>好学云者，非孔子、颜渊不得以私相与，然各从其志，独颜渊得好学而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207622_comment'></div>时习之为说，譬冰，水为之而寒于水，苟不已，则所不知当益知，故求智者莫近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207622_comment'></div>反而言之，则好官爵，好货财，至塞其心如蹊间之茅者，皆愚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207622_comment'></div>人之所以无知若草木，自愚其心者，耕道可不反戒而远之，惟恐其似若彼之相与戒而远我哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207622_comment'></div>因为之名其所居斋曰「近智」，耕道勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207622_comment'></div>乃栋牖花竹、起居之佚、视听之适，则不足道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207622_comment'></div>大观四年七月十四日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1207622_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1285f350296e4300b24d85bdfa6dcda1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1285f350296e4300b24d85bdfa6dcda1");'><span id='1285f350296e4300b24d85bdfa6dcda1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>，58岁</div><div id='1285f350296e4300b24d85bdfa6dcda1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　晁补之以出党籍故，诣吏部候调，得起知达州，寻改泗州，秋，抵达任所。作品：《泗州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五五。）</span>《泗州谢执政启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五七。）</span>《泗州谢监司启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五七。）</span>《谢泗州倅曾承议启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五七。）</span>《谢泗州教授启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五七。）</span>《谒文宣王庙文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《万年欢•寄韵次膺叔》（十里环溪）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页一七七。）</span>《洞仙歌•泗州中秋作》（青烟冥处）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页一七八。）</span><div id='poem_1207142' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207142' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207142?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泗州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207142")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207142_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207142'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207142'>久此投閒，初叨远郡，偶缘乏使，亟窃名邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207142_comment'></div>被中旨以促装，不遑启处；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207142_comment'></div>荷上恩之起废，秪剧涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207142_comment'></div>已见吏民，恪宣惠泽<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207142_comment'></div>伏念臣幼知勤苦，中幸采收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207142_comment'></div>门户积衰，年龄浸晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207142_comment'></div>圣主履至尊之位，下材起远谴之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207142_comment'></div>诚于曩时，愿效毫末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207142_comment'></div>汗青载笔，尝寓直于琐闱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207142_comment'></div>鸡舌含香，曾对扬于文陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207142_comment'></div>而臣自近疑悔，初非弃捐，览辉绝望于赤霄，食野愈思于丰草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207142_comment'></div>四门方辟，多士具来，臣实何人，首烦申令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207142_comment'></div>斯盖皇帝陛下尽循古道，独运乾刚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207142_comment'></div>服万物不以威刑，驱一世跻之仁寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207142_comment'></div>咨询欲当，则左右前后皆正人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207142_comment'></div>播告必昭，则风雨霜露无非教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207142_comment'></div>所以小有轸虑，未累砥平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207142_comment'></div>振古德心，回昊穹之有赫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207142_comment'></div>普天和气，荡灾祲以无馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207142_comment'></div>方当大酌民言，益新邦命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207142_comment'></div>伏况濒淮置郡，除吏须材，岂宜沦废之馀，遽误选求之及！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207142_comment'></div>今岁事将入，而川流渐平，臣当更谨故防，博稽长利，不敢饰厨传将迎以希誉，庶几审诏条施设以首公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207142_comment'></div>誓报更生之恩，终捐九死之命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207142_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207142'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五五。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二四。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207142_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泗州谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207189")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207189_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207189'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207189'>久此投閒，初蒙起废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207189_comment'></div>已膺近使，更窃名邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207189_comment'></div>荷天地之曲成，玷钧衡之平施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207189_comment'></div>迂疏内揆，感涕徒挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207189_comment'></div>伏念某家世久衰，人材甚冗，早预诸生之选，与从三馆之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207189_comment'></div>群飞刺天，同时遇合者自其能尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207189_comment'></div>决起控地，无庸不足者安所尤哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207189_comment'></div>幸未忽于省循，终获逢于湔洗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207189_comment'></div>退无仇怨，宁论三岁之不兴？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207189_comment'></div>进有盛明，未废十年之乃字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207189_comment'></div>里闾浸鄙，文法逾疏，顾虽怀遭时有用之心，实亦负陈力不能之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207189_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇某官忠诚尊主，贤业济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207189_comment'></div>蓍龟治忽之所昭，柱石安危之攸恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207189_comment'></div>岂惟丙魏有声于汉，盖非尧舜不陈于王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207189_comment'></div>邦之荣怀，必归其美于上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207189_comment'></div>上有大泽，必行而致之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207189_comment'></div>灾祲聿消，欢谣允塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207189_comment'></div>恭惟挈国，尤慎官人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207189_comment'></div>敢图赦过之馀，乃在选能之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207189_comment'></div>泗虽支郡，地实控淮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207189_comment'></div>舳舻上下以相衔，冠盖往来而旁午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207189_comment'></div>今秋潦收涸，而川流底平，稼已兆于丰登，吏苟逃于旷失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207189_comment'></div>顾承人乏，适在此时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207189_comment'></div>逢岁有馀，乃幸乞浆而得酒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207189_comment'></div>于生无爱，尚欲舍鱼而食熊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207189_comment'></div>誓以肖翘，仰酬造物。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1207189_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泗州谢监司启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207191")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207191'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207191'>久幸投閒，初蒙起废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207191_comment'></div>拜明恩而跼蹐，奉中旨以驰驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207191_comment'></div>偶莅属城，遂依大庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207191_comment'></div>州素称于繁会，力尤病于拙艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207191_comment'></div>视事云初，抚躬以愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207191_comment'></div>伏念某材能甚薄，学问又非，越自诸生，蚤升三馆，再更郎选，四领藩麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207191_comment'></div>惟被谴之独轻，故涤瑕之前逮，付以要郡，俾其赴功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207191_comment'></div>野鹿情疏，念蒿苹而常在；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207191_comment'></div>疲驽气索，见车盖以内惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207191_comment'></div>伏遇某官宽厚爱人，公忠莅事，提封一路，检察百城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207191_comment'></div>仰惟揽辔之邈然，孰不望风而惕若？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207191_comment'></div>更愿小宽检策，稍假岁时，必有毫氂，自图报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207191_comment'></div>官守所拘，不获趋候门墙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207191_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207192?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢泗州倅曾承议启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207192")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207192'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207192'>恩俞守郡，幸会同僚，平居想望之深，今此从游之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207192_comment'></div>伏以某官贤猷开济，雅趣靖良，事业蔼其家传，声名藉于众口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207192_comment'></div>方纡佐郡，良屈远猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207192_comment'></div>然而素履允修，撝谦更笃，宜入预清华之选，宁久从关决之劳？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207192_comment'></div>惟此拙艰，剧于延跂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207192_comment'></div>歌襦裤之慕，深愧非才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207192_comment'></div>咏海沂之康，终烦敏手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207192_comment'></div>方图驰问，遽辱惠音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207192_comment'></div>黼绣之辞，蔚然累幅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207192_comment'></div>衰颓之质，焕若增辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207192_comment'></div>展晤非遥，欣愉可既。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207192_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207193' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207193' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207193?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢泗州教授启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207193")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207193'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207193'>比蒙恩检，改莅便州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207193_comment'></div>怅驰问之未遑，辱流音之先及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207193_comment'></div>眷言披玩，但极感铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207193_comment'></div>伏以某官早擅俊声，躐登科第，伟该通之经术，烨藻丽之文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207193_comment'></div>暂屈讨论，亟跻要近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207193_comment'></div>某衰迟假守，邂逅为僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207193_comment'></div>敢辞奔走之勤，行有晤承之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207193_comment'></div>方兹残溽，更厚自持。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207193_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谒文宣王庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207762")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207762'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207762'>补之学经从仕，踰三十年，盖更守四郡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207762_comment'></div>才出中下，不足与语任重而道远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207762_comment'></div>以趋米盐期会且不给，盥洗登降，有腼其颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207762_comment'></div>《语》不云乎：「有人民焉，有社稷焉，何必读书然后为学」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207762_comment'></div>则鸡鸣而起，坐堂对吏，旦旦设施，皆尝所闻于先君子之言也，安敢堕哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207762_comment'></div>故因视事，撰日以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207762_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207762_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196545' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196545' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196545?labeling=true' target='_blank'>万年欢 寄韵次膺叔</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196545'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196545'>十里环溪，记当年并游，依旧风景。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196545'>䌽舫红妆，重泛九秋清镜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196545'>莫叹歌台蔓草，喜相逢、欢情犹胜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196545'>蘋洲畔、横玉惊鸾，半天云正愁凝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196545_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196545'>中秋醉魂未醒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196545'>又佳辰授衣，良会堪更。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196545'>早岁功名，豪气尚凌汝颍。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196545'>能致黄金一井，也莫负、鸱夷高兴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196545_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196545'>别有个、潇洒田园，醉乡天地同永。</div><div target='_blank'>洞仙歌 泗州中秋作，此绝笔之词也</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196634'>青烟幂处，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_196634", 196634, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>碧海</span>飞金镜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196634'>永夜闲阶卧桂影。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196634'>露凉时、零乱多少寒螀，神京远，惟有蓝桥路近。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196634_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196634'>水晶帘不下，云母屏开，冷浸佳人淡脂粉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196634'>待都将许多明，付与金尊，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_196634", 196634, id='poem_sentence_5_196634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_196634'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(196634)'>评注</a><span 马鞍山（当涂）

-----title
开封
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='494b7f5347ed4b7486811ecc83dc28c1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("494b7f5347ed4b7486811ecc83dc28c1");'><span id='494b7f5347ed4b7486811ecc83dc28c1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>，23岁</div><div id='494b7f5347ed4b7486811ecc83dc28c1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　晁补之父亡，家贫不能葬。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='fdc346e204314731bd8128632b17edc1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("fdc346e204314731bd8128632b17edc1");'><span id='fdc346e204314731bd8128632b17edc1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>，27岁</div><div id='fdc346e204314731bd8128632b17edc1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　春，晁补之举进士，试开封及礼部别院皆第一，时孔毅父为考官，首送之，神宗阅补之文，称赏，遂及第。作品：《策问一十九首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三七。）</span>《策问十七首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三八。）</span>《策问十九首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三九。）</span><div id='poem_1207382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>策问三<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十九 </span>儒</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207382")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207382'>问：荀子曰：「如用真儒，无敌于天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207382_comment'></div>又曰：「仲尼之门人，五尺之童子言，羞称乎五霸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207382_comment'></div>所贵乎儒者，道术无所不包，非呻吟诗书、俛焉白首之为贤，其举先王之事，而力无不可为之为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207382_comment'></div>然而管仲，伯者佐也，九合诸侯，不以兵车，仲尼称焉，曰「如其仁」，其功之在天下岂少耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207382_comment'></div>世之言儒者，曰孔氏之儒，受业身通如由与求，仲尼论其能，乃不过于为宰而治赋，尚且以自许「使民有勇」而见嗤，为人聚歛附益而得咎，至或见比于具臣，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207382_comment'></div>以谓真儒必周、孔而后可，则后世之赖于儒者何其寡？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207382_comment'></div>曰不然欤，则以由与求而尚不足，盖才之难若是，乌在其为「童子羞称五伯」也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207382_comment'></div>汉之名臣如贾谊、董仲舒，推明六经，尊师而重道，则仲舒为纯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207382_comment'></div>博古达今，计利害于始萌，探安危于未形，则谊为当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207382_comment'></div>然而刘向谓仲舒「伊、吕无以加，而管、晏殆不及也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207382_comment'></div>至论谊，则曰「伊、管未能远过」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207382_comment'></div>其才之长短等级，固若是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207382_comment'></div>将向自离而言之，未始为轻重也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207382_comment'></div>抑谊之好学，俊杰特出，董生何以先之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207382_comment'></div>江都之治，乃牵于《春秋》灾异，而五饵三表，亦不免见笑于术疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207382_comment'></div>岂二子者终未可与大有为耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207382_comment'></div>将汉未尝举国而听之也？</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1207382_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　晁补之及第后致书苏轼。作品：《及第谢苏公书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五二。）</span>《及第再谢苏公书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五二。）</span><div id='poem_1207162' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207162' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207162?labeling=true' target='_blank'>及第谢苏公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207162")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207162_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207162'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207162'>祗荷宠光，出于己分，既愧且惧，不敢为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207162_comment'></div>昔齐主父学《易》、《春秋》、百家言，游齐诸生间，莫能厚遇，相与排摈，不容于齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207162_comment'></div>西入关，资用乏，诸公宾客颇或厌之，乃上书阙下，一岁四迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207162_comment'></div>主父因言削诸侯、徙豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207162_comment'></div>或意其太横，主父曰：「臣结发游学，阨日久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207162_comment'></div>吾日暮途远，故倒行而逆施之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207162_comment'></div>补之读《史记》至此，以谓士穷不见遇，发愤感激，自食可也，而倒行逆施，则为非计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207162_comment'></div>私自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1207162", 1207162, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>记刻</span>，虽穷不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207162_comment'></div>盖补之始拜门下，年甫冠，先人方彊仕，家固自如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207162_comment'></div>在门下二年，所闻于左右，不曾为今日名第计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207162_comment'></div>自吴归鲁，先人谢世，家四壁立，偏亲需养，婚媷日逼，少业慵惰，不能作业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207162_comment'></div>念无以奉朝夕，束书薄游，为苟且之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207162_comment'></div>分外得之，粗饱为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207162_comment'></div>夫画虎类狗，既非本心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207162_comment'></div>而转衣为裳，则所不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207162_comment'></div>昔望之不肯碌碌而反抱关者，夫岂得已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207162_comment'></div>补之敢不益自检束，期终教育之赐！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207162_comment'></div>拳拳之心，言不能数，惟阁下裁择。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207162_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　晁补之与李昭玘、廖正一、黄庭坚交往。作品：《复用前韵遣怀呈鲁直唐公成季明略》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。李昭玘和廖正一系晁补之同榜进士。）</span>《用寄成季韵呈鲁直》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《复用前韵呈明略》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《复答唐公并呈鲁直成季明略》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《复用前韵答唐公唐公有一日纸贵传都城之句且讼其不知我也并呈鲁直成季明略》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《复用前韵答鲁直明略且道见招不能往》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《复用前韵答鲁直并呈明略》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《复用前韵答明略并呈鲁直》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《八音歌二首答黄鲁直》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷四。）</span>《建除体二首答黄鲁直教授》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_196426' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196426' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196426?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复用前韵遣怀呈鲁直唐公成季明略</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196426")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196426_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196426'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196426'>泾水为渠食万口，一石论功泥数斗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196426'>嗟泾独不似渭闲，安流赴海又西还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196426'>天下楩楠尽隆栋，何如栎社不材间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196426'>无能饱食犹天上，巧智忧劳缘利赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196426'>我无懋功突厥名，横身为国作长城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196426'>又非石堡将军勍，带刀夺取紫袍荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196426'>世上此身愚莫比，雾縠翻惭汉童子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196426'>壮心虽欲强自挽，凫足元悭续非喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196426'>君不见西京对策济时难，羞死王嫱马上弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196426'>时平鸟雀须食尔，鸿羽可用高难攀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196426'>从今识路窘捷径，求我莫傍终南山。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196426_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196426'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_196426_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196267' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196267' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196267?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_196267'>怀英名高长史口，独以一人当北斗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196267'>黄公崛起与之班，奄有斯名唐以还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196267'>文章<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_196267", 196267, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>破觚</span>赖圣世，笔墨未逃蹊径间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196267'>湖州太守诸儒长，可独进贤无上赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196267'>曾语黄公四坐惊，竞吟佳句汶阳城<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196267'>饮茶未胜薄酒倾，若人所辱伊人荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196267'>君不见富贵及时行乐难，虽无赵女有秦弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196267_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196421_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196421'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196421'>茅焦逆讦磨虎口，何似淳于饮一斗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196421'>终军乘传惊汉关，何似富春投组还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196421'>天下同心乖出处，岂徒黄白马毛间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196421'>鄙夫纷纷烦觖望，负日可堪希国赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196421'>竹林居士亦何营，江花无限老江城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196421'>那知桥上驷马宠，能作山间蕙帐荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196421'>兴国寺中四月尾，海棠雪落生红子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196421'>呼门日午醉不应，昨夜君恩赐闻喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196421'>君不见卒然佳会高欢难，幸值野王聊一弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196421'>人生歧路易南北，明发云散何由攀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196421'>知君未试餐玉法，我亦欲返焦城山。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196421_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196428'>商歌白石不胜寒，非为荆州三往还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196428'>天下无人知我意，得君相合一言间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196428'>三书丞相何烦上，再见客卿宁用赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196428'>愿闻关中季布名，何得此声梁楚城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196428'>论心四子谁许我，百金一诺兹为荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196428'>唐公才非今世士，不见圣人见君子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196428'>我今正似逃虚空，闻人跫然已心喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196428'>君不见玉川月蚀诗律难，不独虾蟆遭骂弹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196424'>明光侯印悬天上，下有死夫缘重赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196424'>书生懦志安足惊，饥死索米长安城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196424'>献君赐帛等优笑，覆酱未知传纸荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196424'>泮宫先生诚国士，可是同年予二子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196424'>杂吟未减听匏竹，能使穷愁发孤喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196424'>君不见新声欲至旧声难，十指劳君千万弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196424'>平生不遇感知己，过此身外谁能攀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196424'>它年常侍幸见访，不因豆落悲南山。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196424_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196424'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_196419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196419'>我初不解世中语，淡面那久王侯间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196419'>二人不来草木长，带铗陆离谁与荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196419_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196419'>君不见大贤远抱与俗难，何须酒盘柔指鸣哀弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196419_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_0_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196425'>文章屈宋中阻艰，子欲一身追使还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196425'>离骚憭慄悲草木，幽音细出芒丝间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196425'>阳春绝句自云上，折杨何烦嗑然赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196425'>横经高辩一室惊，乍似远人迷广城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196425'>隔河相和独许我，枯蘖亦有条之荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196425'>廖君不但西南美，谁见今人如是子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196425'>多髯府掾正可谑，蛮语参军宁素喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196425_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196423'>轩然齃鼻颐隐肩，日日醉市驱驴还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196423'>我初目病视彷佛，望君有异大人间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196423'>新丰两行惜不上，竹林风来虚自赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196423_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_196400'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196400'>建策移汉都，奉春缘衣布。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196400'>除地愿见公，及以舍人故。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196400'>满船载明月，且复酌清酤。<div
