id='poem_sentence_4_196400'>定境要两言，出处非并趣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196400'>执臂欣逢迎，秋兰在堂下。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196400'>破甑雨生衣，蹇不改兹度。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196400'>危莫如人心，难莫如行路。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196400'>成事安得悔，来者其可悟。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196400'>收拾不须陈，千言一弃屦。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196400'>开门见井市，终岁纷遑遽。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196400'>闭门面墙壁，少日丰暇豫。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196400_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196400'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_196400_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196401' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196401' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196401?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196401_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196401'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196401'>建鼓求亡子，初昧学所之。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196401'>除去日月多，及此岁未迟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196401'>满国和巴人，若士谁与知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196401'>平陆不推舟，客行当来兹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196401'>定居厌屋庐，风雨劳所思。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196401'>执鞭慕昔人，孰与并此时。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196401'>破裘不御冬，要假完腋裨。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196401'>危言则来诟，慎密又逢讥。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196401'>成德尚如是，薄志安能期。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196401'>收声复藏热，雷火忽然微。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196401'>开口且复欢，是事置勿推。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196401'>闭眼可内视，独复不自为。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196401'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_196401_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1079&endYear=1079')">1079年</a>　晁补之进士及第。作品：《复用前韵答十五叔父任城相会见和诗任城有李白旧游处录于诗中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span>《及第后将谒告先归留赠成甫》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二二。）</span>《跋董氏唐诰》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span>《广象戏图序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三五。）</span>《下水船·廖明略妓田氏》（上客骊驹系）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页三。）</span>《上吴相公书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_196422' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196422' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196422?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复用前韵答十五叔父任城相会见和诗任城有李白旧游处录于诗中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196422")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196422_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196422'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196422'>太华玉莲甘适口，我欲求之青壁斗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196422'>昆崙不睹睹大宛，何异学射中涂还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196422'>平生傲世予南阮，臧否未容留齿间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196422'>七贤远迹冥鸿上，咸也复幸青云赏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196422'>归来浊酒厌独倾，疲马却走诸任城。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196422'>红桃白李晚寂莫，黄菊独暴秋阳荣。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196422'>谪仙酒楼馀旧址，明月年年飘桂子。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196422'>不见山东故小吏，斗酒双鱼谁共喜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196422'>恸哭穷涂自古难，不应更待雍门弹。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196422'>瓜田今岁初自垦，柴车后日复谁攀。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196422'>东阿下望有归意，且为子建留鱼山。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196422_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196422'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_196422_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195932?labeling=true' target='_blank'>及第后将谒告先归留赠成甫</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_195932")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195932_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195932'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195932'>还家消息约蔷薇，眼看蔷薇日日稀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195932'>不踏龙头游碧落，君恩许伴晚莺归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195932_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195932'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195932_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207292' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207292' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207292?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋董氏唐诰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年12月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207292")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207292_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207292'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207292'>京东将供备使董侯，尝夜过余曰：「我之先有仕于唐，显者曰京兆尹讳叔经，不知于我几世祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207292_comment'></div>我家历五代至仕本朝，子孙世谨厚，故传其诰犹在」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207292_comment'></div>因就予求烛，出三卷书，其一则京兆君为顺宗山陵副使、秘书监兼御史大夫，元和六年闰六月六日告也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207292_comment'></div>誉京兆君良美，首尾无漫缺，虽甚细，字皆可识，盖卢景亮为中书舍人所行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207292_comment'></div>予起，喜曰：「宪宗，唐中兴贤主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207292_comment'></div>初年，顺宗未葬，刘辟反西川，正月，高崇文出讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207292_comment'></div>七月，葬顺宗丰陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207292_comment'></div>时京兆号多事，而尹以此时进，才选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207292_comment'></div>卢景亮称善属文，以直谏知名元和间，誉京兆君良美，其辞当不诬，可为董侯庆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207292_comment'></div>然独怪京兆君为宪宗用若此，宜有政事闻于时，而其施设不少概见，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207292_comment'></div>间以其年月日考之《旧史》则不谬，而闰六月之六日为戊辰，凡氏讳与官及平章事以下名于告者，举合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207292_comment'></div>自闰六月之戊辰始命，至八月之癸未以卒，其莅京兆之日七十六而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207292_comment'></div>前此为尹者，兵部侍郎韦武；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207292_comment'></div>后此为尹者，尚书右丞李鄘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207292_comment'></div>而《新史》尹不书，故逸董氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207292_comment'></div>馀考之，又合其名于告者，曰中书侍郎为郑絪，自中书舍人迁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207292_comment'></div>曰门下侍郎为杜黄裳，自太常卿迁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207292_comment'></div>曰给事中为归登，自兵部员外郎迁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207292_comment'></div>曰吏部侍郎为赵宗儒，自右庶子迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207292_comment'></div>絪、黄裳号贤相，登、宗儒谠直不回，皆元和初日一时才选也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207292_comment'></div>最后郎中兼者卑不显，乃不得质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207292_comment'></div>予尝读韩愈《顺宗实录》，见李实以不任职贬，知唐重京兆尹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207292_comment'></div>自李实接韦武，中间二年，宪宗始即位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207292_comment'></div>二相贤，新用，且京兆号多事，择人固宜重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207292_comment'></div>时百司官多改置，韩愈亦自外入为博士，皆以是年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207292_comment'></div>愈后寖用，乃至京兆尹，其选亦难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207292_comment'></div>董氏虽施设无所见，余能语其贤者，以一时事知之当如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207292_comment'></div>后二告皆董浙，一曲沃簿，一猗氏丞，长庆、大中时告也，漫缺不若前可识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207292_comment'></div>独曲沃告有蝇头字，考即京兆君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207292_comment'></div>祖为圭，曾祖为端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207292_comment'></div>里为京兆府万年县洪固乡贵胄里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207292_comment'></div>而端以下及浙，凡四世粗见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207292_comment'></div>乃次序归董侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207292_comment'></div>董侯中武举，为将，知方略，慕古人也，必有功名，以不愧其先世云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207292_comment'></div>元丰二年十二月二十日，晁补之题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1207292_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207269' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207269' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207269?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广象戏图序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207269")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207269_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207269'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207269'>象戏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1207269", 1207269, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>戏兵</span>也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207269_comment'></div>黄帝之战，驱猛兽以为阵，象，兽之雄也，故<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1207269", 1207269, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>戏兵</span>而以象戏名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207269_comment'></div>余为儿时，无他弄，见设局布棋为此戏者，纵横出奇，愕然莫测，以为小道可喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207269_comment'></div>稍长，观诸家阵法，虽画地而守，规矩有截，而变化舒卷，出入无倪，其说益可喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207269_comment'></div>暇时因求所谓象戏者，欲按之，以消永日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207269_comment'></div>盖局纵横路十一，棋三十四，为两军耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207269_comment'></div>意苦其狭也，常试以局纵横路十九，棋九十八广之，意少放焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207269_comment'></div>然按图置物，计步而使，终亦胶柱而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207269_comment'></div>而智者用之，则十九者之间，尽彊弱之形，九十八者之间，尽死生之势，而十九、九十八之外，死生彊弱，可循环于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207269_comment'></div>饱食终日，得吾说而为之，则涿鹿之纵观犹目前矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207269_comment'></div>元丰二年六月，晁补之序<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207269_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1207269'>三十四：《文献通考》作「三十二」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207269_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207269'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207269_0'>⑴ 《鸡肋集》卷三五。又见《文献通考·经籍考》卷五六。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1207269_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_196548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>下水船</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196548")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196548'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196548'>上客骊驹系。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196548'>惊唤银屏睡起。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196548'>困倚妆台，盈盈正解罗髻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196548'>凤钗坠，缭绕金盘玉指。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196548'>巫山一段云委。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196548_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196548'>半窥镜、向我横秋水。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196548'>斜颔花枝交镜里。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196548'>淡拂铅华，匆匆自整罗绮。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196548'>敛眉翠。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196548'>虽有愔愔密意，空作江边解佩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196548_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上吴相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1079年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207158")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207158'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207158'>天下之士，见相公而言利害者几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207158_comment'></div>言而当者几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207158_comment'></div>言而不当者几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207158_comment'></div>若是者，某举不能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207158_comment'></div>徒见相公之用人，内举不避亲，外举不避雠，近取不避贵，远取不问贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207158_comment'></div>天人之学，儒墨之英，大有所必用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207158_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1207158", 1207158, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>牛角之歌</span>，堂下之言，小有所不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207158_comment'></div>以是知相公所持者甚重，所期者甚远，而昔者或未之识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207158_comment'></div>昔太祖皇帝不驰一马、不折一矢而有天下，天下稽颡而称臣，五国委命而下吏，可谓聪明睿智，神武不杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207158_comment'></div>夫太宗修文<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1207158", 1207158, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>训武</span>，以培其基；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207158_comment'></div>真宗隆政讲事，以润其色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207158_comment'></div>仁宗陶之以仁，表之以孝，四十二年天下乂安，无狗吠之警；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207158_comment'></div>逮乎英宗，礼乐宜备矣，而谦逊未遑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207158_comment'></div>今天子慨然发愤，追惟祖宗之馀烈，想见三代之盛事，于是举国政而属之相公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207158_comment'></div>相公以天子之意甚信而不疑也，故敢以一身而独任天下之责，思天下之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207158_comment'></div>有不与知天子之意者，若己之涂其耳使不得闻，闭其目使不得见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207158_comment'></div>故夜以继日，坐以待旦，以急天下之务；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207158_comment'></div>一沐三握发，一饭三吐餔，以待天下之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207158_comment'></div>非尧、舜、禹、汤、文、武、周公之所常行，不以告吾君，化吾民，使一日为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207158_comment'></div>虽然，二帝三王之道不行于世久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207158_comment'></div>仪、秦以口舌事天下，而忠厚之俗离；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207158_comment'></div>孙、吴以兵法驱齐民，而攘夺之衅起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207158_comment'></div>井田坏于鞅，而天下方困于兼并；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207158_comment'></div>肉刑变于文，而彊梁始轻于犯法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207158_comment'></div>寻经补传，得不偿亡，而两京之学衰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207158_comment'></div>更为虚无，不贵实效，而东晋之治失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207158_comment'></div>陵夷以至宋、齐、梁、隋，文教既衰，武德不耀，而天下瓜分矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207158_comment'></div>神尧以英略一天下，而太宗、明皇继之，宜若小治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207158_comment'></div>然犹府卫之兵废而为彍骑，世业之田坏而为兼并，租庸调之法变而为两税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207158_comment'></div>而唐之民卒不获礼之盛者，岂天未欲平治天下耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207158_comment'></div>下逮五季，王政不纲，民德日薄，固无可议者，盖又百年有馀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207158_comment'></div>天下之民引颈启踵，刻月计日，以求见太平之成法者，固在于斯时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207158_comment'></div>相公谓不大有为，以创其意，则天下不治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207158_comment'></div>故先之以号令，以齐其心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207158_comment'></div>次之以农桑，以赡其力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207158_comment'></div>次之以刑罚，以督其经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207158_comment'></div>犹以为未也，则建学官以养其材，崇科举以变其习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207158_comment'></div>昔之所缺，今或有之，非以为独也，凡以使天下不敢议，不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207158_comment'></div>不敢议，则治无不至，化无不神矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207158_comment'></div>此相公所以上不负天子，下不负万民之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207158_comment'></div>天子亦以是深信而无疑，万民亦以此有望于乐成也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207158_comment'></div>自昔帝王之臣，非有极高明、致广大之学，其谁敢自任天下之重如此者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207158_comment'></div>孔子之治鲁，诛少正卯而齐人以为忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207158_comment'></div>孟子之相齐，言必称尧舜而淳于髡以为惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207158_comment'></div>然则非常之事，固常情之所惧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207158_comment'></div>南冥之鹏，海击于千里，而斥鴳从后而笑之，多见其不知量也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207158_comment'></div>某东方之鄙人，学不足以立本，才不足以趣时，独以谓相公之用人，虽朴樕樲棘，莫不各当其分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207158_comment'></div>相公之待物，虽鸟兽虫鱼，莫不使之各尽其欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207158_comment'></div>凡天之所生，凡地之所养，无一物不得自遂者，是以敢用缪悠之说进焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207158_comment'></div>虽然，岂敢为囊中之颖耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207158_comment'></div>亦相公至仁乐育，使不至于无用失性而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207158_comment'></div>孔子曰：「邦有道，贫且贱焉，耻也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207158_comment'></div>孟子曰：「人不可无耻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207158_comment'></div>某之怀耻有道之世久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207158_comment'></div>而相公之治，常以一物不得自遂为忧，则某之耻有望乎已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207158_comment'></div>伏惟相公神明亮焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207158_comment'></div>身贱迹外，辄敢自纳于不测之诛，不胜战慄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1207158_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e8aec6c15b544389ade38926aa6ee36a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e8aec6c15b544389ade38926aa6ee36a");'><span id='e8aec6c15b544389ade38926aa6ee36a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>，31岁</div><div id='e8aec6c15b544389ade38926aa6ee36a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　夏，晁补之因吴雍荐，赴京师，未获改官而返。作品：《之京师展墓》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷六。）</span>《同毕公叔饮城东》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_515699' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515699' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515699?labeling=true' target='_blank'>之京师展墓</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_515699")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_515699_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515699'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515699'>短辔驭羸马，驰驱曹济间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515699'>商飙折劲木，萧瑟道里寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515699'>况复慕所天，恻怆摧心肝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515699'>游子叹时迈，慈母怜衣单。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515699'>来时凭窗哭，五妹垂修鬟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_515699'>季弟主菽粟，孺妻爨茅菅。<div id='poem_sentence_5_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_515699'>悼我无令人，莫奉堂上欢。<div id='poem_sentence_6_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_515699'>岂无萱草诗，终日倚门阑。<div id='poem_sentence_7_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_515699'>念昔常独立，所闻诗礼难。<div id='poem_sentence_8_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_515699'>我尚未成人，遭罹此忧患。<div id='poem_sentence_9_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_515699'>岁晏念坟墓，仳离百哀攒。<div id='poem_sentence_10_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_515699'>何时奉灵车，辛苦向此还。<div id='poem_sentence_11_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_515699'>亲寡气力微，傍人祝加餐。<div id='poem_sentence_12_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_515699'>愿言薄志节，苟生无形颜。<div id='poem_sentence_13_515699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_515699'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_515699_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_515700' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515700' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515700?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同毕公叔饮城东</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_515700")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_515700_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515700'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515700'>西城昔相值，桃初两三红。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515700'>翩翩骛长陌，春风摇马鬃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515700'>后君归几日，游絮已濛濛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515700'>解鞍不待憩，相命古原东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515700'>芍药虽俗花，狂姿幸时供。<div id='poem_sentence_4_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_515700'>平生于知己，千过不一逢。<div id='poem_sentence_5_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_515700'>感君欲开口，清洟出沾胸。<div id='poem_sentence_6_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_515700'>君如陶渊明，不为五斗恭。<div id='poem_sentence_7_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_515700'>胡为青纶上，朱墨纷外蒙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_515700'>弃官能从我，短后追田翁。<div id='poem_sentence_9_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_515700'>铜斗酿秫麦，竹枝弋凫鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_10_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_515700'>何必悲无衣，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_515700", 515700, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>缊黂</span>聊御冬。<div id='poem_sentence_11_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_515700'>九辩太高洁，五噫苦羁穷。<div id='poem_sentence_12_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_515700'>置此无滑和，天情反其中。<div id='poem_sentence_13_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_515700'>市药非市名，名闻药何庸。<div id='poem_sentence_14_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_515700'>十浆馈五浆，犹畏闻者从。<div id='poem_sentence_15_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_515700'>如何酆城畔，夜夜生长虹。<div id='poem_sentence_16_515700_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_515700'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_515700_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f6b79e57946640f69313d1bf5eca0c02_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f6b79e57946640f69313d1bf5eca0c02");'><span id='f6b79e57946640f69313d1bf5eca0c02_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1090')">1085-1090年</a>，33-38岁</div><div id='f6b79e57946640f69313d1bf5eca0c02' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1085&endYear=1085')">1085年</a>　秋，晁补之赴京师，召试除太学正。作品：《复用前韵呈刑部杜君章》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一二。）</span>《复用前韵赠祠部陈元舆》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一二。）</span>《再用前韵复呈博士黄冕仲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一二。）</span>《次韵太学黄博士冕仲同考试作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一二。）</span>《次韵太学舒博士尧文示同志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_196420' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196420' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196420?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复用前韵呈刑部杜丈君章</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196420")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196420_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196420'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196420'>杜侯洒墨春云暮，纷纷满纸栖鸦聚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196420'>文章不犯世故锋，牛鬼荒虚瓦棺古。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196420'>平生傀磊宁独此，跻俗唐虞要遭主。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196420'>先君诸父尽金兰，申以婚姻况覶缕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196420'>劳心吏卷官有程，得意朋尊美无度。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196420'>尚忆花妍春仲时，休沐黄昏来叩户。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196420'>苦怜蟾桂将十分，欲赠海棠无一句。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196420'>巷南巷北相遇稀，而此从公慰怀慕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196420'>安石榴红傥可期，公不来过我当去<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：二花两家皆有，且素约矣。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196420_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196420'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196420_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196427' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196427' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196427?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复用前韵赠祠部陈元舆</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196427")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196427_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196427'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196427'>行乐曾闻戒迟暮，人生波上飞凫聚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196427'>兰亭往事如过雨，山阴脩竹空千古。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196427'>陈侯挥翰少年时，三赋声名动人主。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196427'>可是高才弃绳矩，自然采绣非针缕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196427'>五十天南把一麾，犹得无襦歌叔度。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196427'>邂逅西城筑冶墟，王官继日车连户。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196427'>自言春晚洞庭归，日落江南得佳句。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196427'>倾盖何妨许如故，执鞭况是平生慕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196427'>但忧笔陈困攻坚，傥许寻盟解围去。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196427_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196427'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196427_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196418' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196418' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196418?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复用前韵再呈博士黄冕仲</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196418")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196418_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196418'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196418'>龙津之北双溪骛，逶迤势入龙津聚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196418'>龙归何处牛斗闲，剑不可求江海古。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196418'>惨澹犹思八百年，变化岂无神物主。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196418'>何当旋柁入奫沦，傥可然犀照毛缕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196418'>登楼那有北客同，把酒但看南雁度。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196418'>更邀桃叶远临水，正值荔枝红照户。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196418'>入梁一曳邹阳裾，思越屡吟庄舄句。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196418'>竹林觞咏当日情，岘山名姓它时慕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196418'>一闻说尽青鞋游，令我乘风欲仙去。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196418_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196418'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196418_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196291' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196291' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196291?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵太学黄博士冕仲同考试作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196291")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196291_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196291'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196291'>日边传诏天街暮，草草西城车马聚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196291'>官曹一见故情亲，宴语识君心志古。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196291'>成安长孺澶渊守，昔君羁游所为主。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196291'>我穷亦号成安客，文采初无君一缕<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196291'>胸中万顷复谁同，正有君家贤叔度。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196291'>官事留人何鞅掌，广文杨柳花飞户。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196291'>好书老未置铅椠，学经晚始羞章句。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196291'>乘槎况自风格有，病颦那可形容慕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196291'>成诗莫惮继日传，青骢御史呼归去。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196291'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196291_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196291'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_196291_0'>⑴ 自注：予与冕仲俱为韩澶州璹之客。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_196291_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_515693' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515693' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515693?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵太学舒博士尧文示同志</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_515693")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_515693_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515693'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515693'>北门望瀛关，一苇初莫渡<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：顷官大名，尧文在高阳。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515693'>儒宫连案几，会合岂非数。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515693'>蝉鸣几何时，庭菊下白露。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515693'>念当慰佳节，觞酌美无度。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515693'>不然坐岁晚，流景急飞兔。<div id='poem_sentence_4_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_515693'>区区人一马，官舍勤早暮。<div id='poem_sentence_5_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_515693'>经时枉见赠，弥月不能赋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_515693'>竹斋行茗粥，寂莫当屡赴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_515693'>此君安可得，霜雪不改故。<div id='poem_sentence_8_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_515693'>诗如战交地，高处要先据。<div id='poem_sentence_9_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_515693'>牛羹君放饭，轑鼎吾亦饫。<div id='poem_sentence_10_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_515693'>顾惭咏伐檀，无补餐已素。<div id='poem_sentence_11_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_515693'>还家便却埽，况乃无户屦。<div id='poem_sentence_12_515693_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_515693'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_515693_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　晁补之在京师任太学正。作品：《求志赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷一。）</span>《次韵王宗正定国语苏翰林先生黄校书鲁直唱和》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1207069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207069?labeling=true' target='_blank'>求志赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207069")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207069_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207069'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207069'>幼余不自知惷兮，愿求古人而与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207069_comment'></div>高平邑于大野兮，鲁东鄙而北邹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207069_comment'></div>固余心其悃款兮，求前圣又不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207069_comment'></div>岂无邻莫可与谋兮，冶邴氏而俗泮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207069_comment'></div>幽离房诚不忍兮，弃此而莫能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207069_comment'></div>岁执徐之青阳兮，余先子乎东征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207069_comment'></div>横武林之大江兮，暀始宁之南邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207069_comment'></div>路会稽以周流兮，求历山之所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207069_comment'></div>昔封嵎之世守兮，以后夫而致刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207069_comment'></div>越惩耻于夫椒兮，进樵女而抑心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207069_comment'></div>懿二臣以国霸兮，卒焉异夫出处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207069_comment'></div>行束薪而自言兮，妻不忍而求去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207069_comment'></div>助申威于司马兮，卒陨声以淮南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207069_comment'></div>盱诉死于婆娑兮，悲绰约之亦歼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207069_comment'></div>彼章陈之诡啸兮，既愕眙于甲夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207069_comment'></div>何仲御之清激兮，而亦云骇夫观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207069_comment'></div>纷回穴其莫识兮，泮千载而迹陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207069_comment'></div>思苗山犹若兹兮，又何悲乎曲水？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207069_comment'></div>惟郑公之志约兮，逢神人焉靡求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207069_comment'></div>山岪峍而谷纡兮，风浏浏乎旦暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207069_comment'></div>耿吾何不可留此土兮，窃悲越人之禨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207069_comment'></div>岂其食鲑而化音兮，无所用吾之緌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207069_comment'></div>冬曚曚其多雨兮，夏瘅热以生蠚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207069_comment'></div>溪水之浅深兮，舟上下而击石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207069_comment'></div>吾遵夏盖之山兮，聊以观乎远海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207069_comment'></div>吾先子之初服兮，羌董道而不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207069_comment'></div>小人之有心兮，犹不假器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207069_comment'></div>末余从于东安兮，依哲人而闻谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207069_comment'></div>蜀苏子之有廛兮，汉遗化而多儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207069_comment'></div>往者其不可及兮，曷不从子之庐？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207069_comment'></div>朝余食乎山中，夕余宿乎江上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207069_comment'></div>悲世俗之近市兮，余安能忍而与之皆往！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207069_comment'></div>余令楼季为右兮，使王阳前余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207069_comment'></div>世解辔而驰石兮，缅余得此坦涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207069_comment'></div>良吾辀使环灂兮，密吾牙使朴属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207069_comment'></div>揽九州而顾怀兮，夫安知余力之不足？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207069_comment'></div>遘余生之罹闵兮，归将母乎故都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207069_comment'></div>伏里门而畏邻兮，幽独守此四隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207069_comment'></div>时命大谬兮，吾迋迋欲何之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207069_comment'></div>慨永夏之宜养兮，霜薆然其萃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207069_comment'></div>增歔欷以啜泣兮，杀身其安可！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207069_comment'></div>宇摧荣而藩穴兮，雀鼠去而不舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207069_comment'></div>憯四序之不淹兮，春蔼蔼其既菲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207069_comment'></div>揽卉木犹若兹兮，吾独不聊此时！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207069_comment'></div>悲予仲之婉娈兮，饶其心以诗礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207069_comment'></div>吾不能操赢而坐闾兮，耘东山而自食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207069_comment'></div>岁旱暵而不雨兮，螟又生余之场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207069_comment'></div>属岁秋之有谷兮，河出坟而汤汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207069_comment'></div>于陵子之终褊兮，井上李其犹饱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207069_comment'></div>服芬芳而洁腹兮，夫岂不足以忘老！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207069_comment'></div>众虒豸而好朝兮，咸得时而的皪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207069_comment'></div>持衣裘而鬻暑兮，余固知余贾之不售。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207069_comment'></div>思遐举而莫从兮，心纡轸而衋伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207069_comment'></div>讯黄石以吉凶兮，棋十二而星罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207069_comment'></div>曰由小基大兮，何有颠沛？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207069_comment'></div>既非初志之敢期兮，曾何以知其所系？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207069_comment'></div>颒清济以去垢兮，芝九茎而为华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207069_comment'></div>宵倚楹而悲诧兮，畴独忧余之无家！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207069_comment'></div>萧苑候之慷慨兮，孰云非食之故？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207069_comment'></div>济澶渊之灵津兮，横中流而飙怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207069_comment'></div>思城阙之挑达兮，勉踵夫昔之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207069_comment'></div>羿之志于彀兮，亦反求夫余身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207069_comment'></div>小人不知学礼兮，畏罪罟之所寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207069_comment'></div>宋七世之炳灵兮，皇纯佑此下土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207069_comment'></div>举贤而授能兮，哀茕独此黎庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207069_comment'></div>牧羊而肥兮，式亦用夫有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207069_comment'></div>辟雍之洋洋兮，宇干日而纠纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207069_comment'></div>连衽以成云兮，汗而为雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207069_comment'></div>岂余不足于同门兮，独惆怅而延伫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207069_comment'></div>先事而后得兮，惟其食者之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207069_comment'></div>举九鼎于鲵渊兮，亦人假夫一臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207069_comment'></div>余张子之好脩兮，蹇博大而无朋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207069_comment'></div>雪霏霏而宇冻兮，松柏不改其青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207069_comment'></div>固黄子尝语余兮，曰此是为明月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207069_comment'></div>虽工师不以佩兮，保厥美亦未艾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207069_comment'></div>彼喔咿为已甚兮，羌浮石而沉木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207069_comment'></div>子云之好思兮，亦众谇其寂寞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207069_comment'></div>虞氏之为政兮，举五臣而与言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207069_comment'></div>彼霢霂之射谷兮，何足以容江潭之鳣？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207069_comment'></div>众不察余之情兮，求余初犹未沬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207069_comment'></div>超孤举而远寻兮，唯夫不足而论世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207069_comment'></div>良恫韩而成汉兮，皓保惠而悟高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207069_comment'></div>成功则去兮，曾何足以介其一毛？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207069_comment'></div>融躬行既卒骄兮，禹服义亦太靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207069_comment'></div>陈辎车与乘马兮，桓荣亦酋乎富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207069_comment'></div>蕃居室其不理兮，滂之志以四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207069_comment'></div>允膺之激烈兮，羌不以生而昧义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207069_comment'></div>意岂弟神所嘏兮，固何以罹此之不祥？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207069_comment'></div>岂其莫忍邻之捽兮，纷救斗而得伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207069_comment'></div>嘉林宗之善裁兮，要成败以不失宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207069_comment'></div>遵不知时之可为兮，行渔濑以毕世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207069_comment'></div>喟嵇康之蹈尽兮，愧孙子其安补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207069_comment'></div>阮清舌而咎目兮，潜固自识而远去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207069_comment'></div>谓道不可为兮，为者败之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207069_comment'></div>众窢然咸不留兮，惟至人焉在之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1207069_comment'></div>泮千祀而语邻兮，孰与至人之服意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1207069_comment'></div>神龙之乘云兮，吾欲从焉以足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1207069_comment'></div>士生各有遇兮，吾何为侘傺乎此时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1207069_comment'></div>曾藿菽不足以化兮，求余身其庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1207069_comment'></div>滋兰以旨蓄兮，菊以为糗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1207069_comment'></div>修忠信以抑躁兮，夫安知余时之后？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1207069_comment'></div>图前圣吾永赖兮，揽百子与并舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1207069_comment'></div>时翱翔于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_102_1207069", 1207069, "Clauses/204/Comments/0")'>道奥</span>兮，历年岁以为娱。<div class='inline' class='inlineComment2'>（自注：数物，伯时试院所作。）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196325_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196411' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196411' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196411'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196411'>秋风吹空雁旁午，长天无云月呈露。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196411_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196413'>鸣珂咸俊彦，索米独尘埃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196413'>未叹官曹隔，多惭赏鉴陪。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196413'>成川须畎浍，崇厦要条枚。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196413'>豚鱼聊可辨，皮弁不应恢<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：左选试经义，右选试兵策。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196413'>绿暗惊庭叶，朱明换律灰。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196413'>得枭夸艾捷，闻鹤悼坚摧。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196413'>茧绪谈飞麈，渑波酒挹罍。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196229'>五更脱叶惊书几，一夜寒砧满禁城。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196229_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196229'>诗似凉风来有思<sup class='reference 《同文馆唱和诗》、《坡门酬唱集》作看</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_196229_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_196228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_196228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196228'>解榻暂如龟遇木，闭帘还似雉婴罗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196228'>倦依书册工催睡，闷倚诗篇足当歌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196228'>可待纷纷厌朱墨，昼闲唯有饮无何。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196192'>神交千古圣贤中，尚想铜山应洛钟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196192'>倾盖十年唯子旧，知音一世更谁逢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196192'>天如蚁磨骎骎旦，谈似缲车亹亹从。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196192'>邻榻邓侯那不共，拥衾百首兴方浓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196192'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196192_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和文潜试院道旧</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196005")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196005'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196005'>璧月照歌淮上舫，姚花引醉福昌城。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196005'>何如阊阖门西北，卧听秋风枕畔声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196005_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196005'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196005_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　晁补之在京师任太学正。作品：《复和定国惠竹皮枕谑句》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二0。）</span>《捕鱼图序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三四。）</span>《太学博士正录荐布衣陈师道状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_196040' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196040' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196040?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复和定国惠竹皮枕谑句</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196040")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196040_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196040'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196040'>老来山水兴弥深，不在长安侠少林。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196040_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196040'>它日只为林下计，不将锦被作呻吟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196040_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196040'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196040_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207268?labeling=true' target='_blank'>捕鱼图序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年4月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207268")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207268_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207268'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207268'>古画《捕鱼》一卷，或曰王右丞草也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207268_comment'></div>纸广不充幅，长丈许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207268_comment'></div>水波渺㳽，洲渚隐隐见其背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207268_comment'></div>岸木葭菼向摇落，草萋然始黄，天惨惨，云而风，人物衣裘有寒意，盖画江南初冬欲雪时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207268_comment'></div>两人挽舟循厓，一人篙而下之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207268_comment'></div>三人巾帽袍带而骑，或马或驴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207268_comment'></div>寒，峙肩拥袖者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207268_comment'></div>前扬鞭顾后，揽辔语，袂翩然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207268_comment'></div>僮负囊尾马，背而荷，若拥鼻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207268_comment'></div>三人屈竹为屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207268_comment'></div>三童子踞而起大网，一童从旁出者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207268_comment'></div>缚竹跨水上，一人立旁维舟，其下有笱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207268_comment'></div>方舟而下，四人篙而前其舟，坐若立者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207268_comment'></div>两童子曳方罟行水间者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207268_comment'></div>缚竹跨水上，一人巾而依蘧蒢坐，沉大网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207268_comment'></div>旁笱屈竹为屋，缚竹跨水上，童子跪而起大网者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207268_comment'></div>一人屈竹为屋，前有瓶盂可见者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207268_comment'></div>篙者、桨者、俛下罩者，三人皆笠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207268_comment'></div>方舟载大网，行且渔，两儿两盖，依蘧蒢坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207268_comment'></div>有巾而髯，出网中得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207268_comment'></div>𦩘操楫一人，缚竹跨水上，顾而语前有杯盂者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207268_comment'></div>方舟载大网，出网中得者，缚竹跨水上，两儿沉大网，旁维艓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207268_comment'></div>两人篙其舟甚力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207268_comment'></div>有帷幕，坐而济，若妇人可见者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207268_comment'></div>方舟依渚，一人篙，一人小而髯，三童子若饮食，若寐，前有杯盂者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207268_comment'></div>一人推苇间童子，俛而曳循厓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207268_comment'></div>人物数十许，目相望，不过五六里，若百里千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207268_comment'></div>右丞妙于诗，故画意有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207268_comment'></div>世人欲以语言粉墨追之，不似也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207268_comment'></div>常忆楚人云：「帝子降兮北渚，目渺渺兮愁予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207268_comment'></div>袅袅兮秋风，洞庭波兮木叶下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207268_comment'></div>引物连类，谓便若湖湘在目前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207268_comment'></div>思顷时岁晚，道吴江如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207268_comment'></div>渔者、男子、妇女、童稚、舟楫、梁笱、网罟、罾罩，纷然在江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207268_comment'></div>然其业廉而事佚，故无市廛争利意，此与画二大夫去国，其色无别恨，奚以异？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207268_comment'></div>元祐元年四月二十日，李希孝出之，欲模写，无善工，乃借韩退之序画人物意识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207268_comment'></div>颍川晁补之序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207268_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207093' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207093' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207093?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太学博士正录荐布衣陈师道状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207093")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207093_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207093'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207093'>窃以朝廷患庠序不本于教，而纠禁是先；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207093_comment'></div>学者不根于古，而浮剽是竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207093_comment'></div>故选置旧学，削去苛规，为之表仪，使有趣向，所以助成风化，实繄得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207093_comment'></div>伏见徐州布衣陈师道，年三十五，孝弟忠信闻于乡闾，学知圣人之意，文有作者之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207093_comment'></div>怀其所能，深耻自售；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207093_comment'></div>恬淡寡欲，不干有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207093_comment'></div>随亲京师，身给劳事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207093_comment'></div>蛙生其釜，愠不见色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207093_comment'></div>方朝廷振起滞才，风劝多士，谓如师道一介，亦当褒采不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207093_comment'></div>伏睹太学录五员，系差学生，见今有阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207093_comment'></div>师道虽不在学籍，而经行词艺，宜充此选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207093_comment'></div>某等职预考察，不敢蔽而不陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207093_comment'></div>伏乞选差师道充太学录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207093_comment'></div>傥不任职，某等同其罪罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207093_comment'></div>谨具申国子监，乞誊申礼部施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207093_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年12月</a>　晁补之在京师任太学正，以荐召试学士院，十二月除秘书省正字。作品：《谢授馆职启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1207172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢授馆职启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207172")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207172'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207172'>误缘公举，既不能引分而终辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207172_comment'></div>滥俾试言，又不获竭愚而小补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207172_comment'></div>自宜汰斥，尚玷题评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207172_comment'></div>秪有矜惭，安知荣观？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207172_comment'></div>窃以校雠之设，始于汉氏之购书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207172_comment'></div>员品之增，盛于唐室之好士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207172_comment'></div>故二代礼乐声明之为备，亦一时衣冠人物之使然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207172_comment'></div>惟麒麟延阁之华，近阊阖钩陈之邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207172_comment'></div>至谓道家群玉之府，盖象天官东壁之藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207172_comment'></div>近稽有宋之隆，专号育材之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207172_comment'></div>故招来于閒暇之日，而官使于成就之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207172_comment'></div>职非要而地严，欲知其可贵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207172_comment'></div>禄已优而责寡，使得以自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207172_comment'></div>恭惟治平之初，深有讲求之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207172_comment'></div>诏四三辅，选二十人，当时彬彬，最号得士，厥后往往奋为名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207172_comment'></div>逮神考之末年，起治官之废典，是正兰台之秩，以延虎观之儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207172_comment'></div>而龙胡莫攀，风御已远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207172_comment'></div>钦文母思齐之圣，当成王求助之初，咨谋大臣，修举故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207172_comment'></div>繄诏书所以取之之意，则欲其有行义政事，好学而能文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207172_comment'></div>至策问所以考之之方，又欲其知忠厚励精，扶衰而救溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207172_comment'></div>窃思在上详延之若是，则观异时施设之谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207172_comment'></div>宜得<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1207172", 1207172, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>誉髦</span>，以副侧席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207172_comment'></div>如补之者，系出簪绂单平之后，才非丘园耿介之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207172_comment'></div>不意姓名之无闻，乃烦丞弼之过听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207172_comment'></div>昭回地近，英俊朋来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207172_comment'></div>阅九奏于洞庭，徒知神骇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207172_comment'></div>飞双凫于渤海，更觉身微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207172_comment'></div>加以陟岵永悲，卧漳久薾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207172_comment'></div>孤将五千之卒，空有壮心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207172_comment'></div>立解十二之牛，曾无敏手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207172_comment'></div>虽欲自勉，竟不能奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207172_comment'></div>考古不究其本根，议政终成于迂阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207172_comment'></div>主父屡困，九事敢期于八收；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207172_comment'></div>公孙太疏，十策乃微于一得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207172_comment'></div>正使焦头而烂额，犹足为功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207172_comment'></div>真成毁瓦而画墁，尚容见食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207172_comment'></div>服训辞之甚厚，预刊缉以为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207172_comment'></div>非止见黄香未见之书，以资杂博；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207172_comment'></div>亦欲正刘晏不正之字，固有愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207172_comment'></div>静言所遭，良出于幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207172_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇某官几微谋国，忠荩致君，深明致治之原，要在得人之盛<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207172_comment'></div>大儒之效，吾道方兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207172_comment'></div>多士以宁，斯文永赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207172_comment'></div>顾容浅陋，亦误采收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207172_comment'></div>昔班超以秉笔得令史而不惭，阳城以爱书从院吏而自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207172_comment'></div>彼皆慷慨有志之士，敦朴可用之才，苟得以文墨而效官，则虽为卑贱而可喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207172_comment'></div>而况加以乐育，借之美名！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207172_comment'></div>方朝廷耆艾之具来，与岩穴幽奇之咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207172_comment'></div>世逢有道之会，人望太平之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207172_comment'></div>属当是时，乃在此选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207172_comment'></div>虽复中才之难彊，犹将奋发于有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207172_comment'></div>补之愿治气养心，修辞居业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207172_comment'></div>粗希前辈，岂惟文字之末流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207172_comment'></div>未负平生，傥以功名而自致。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1207172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207172'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_40_1207172_0'>⑴ 苏公即云：「传百圣道，为一世师，不待文王而兴，自任伊尹之重。」</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1207172_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1086&endYear=1086')">1086年</a>　晁补之在京师任太学正。作品：《太学答学生林自启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五0。）</span>《国子监祭司马温公文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六0。）</span>《钱唐县君叶氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六四。）</span>《阚氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六六。）</span><div id='poem_1207214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太学答学生林自启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207214")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207214'>窃审论秀辟雍，登荣造士，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207214_comment'></div>上舍先辈懿行可度，美才不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207214_comment'></div>负笈徒行，岂辞李固之千里；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207214_comment'></div>违亲忍志，未厌何蕃之五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207214_comment'></div>故能通达大成，文史足用，升诸乡而有素，告于王而可官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207214_comment'></div>以补之预在胶庠，特贻笺翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207214_comment'></div>推先非据，感服徒深。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207214_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207730' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207730?labeling=true' target='_blank'>国子监祭司马温公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1086年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207730")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207730_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207730'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207730'>维元祐元年九月日，具官某等，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故丞相司马公之灵曰：呜呼公乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207730_comment'></div>宽栗柔立，根于明诚，进礼退义，世为重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207730_comment'></div>千乘不居，古称好名，公乎不然，志合则行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207730_comment'></div>布被脱粟，他人为诈，公乎不然，则以身化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207730_comment'></div>公卧洛师，闭关却扫，深衣讲道，将以是老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207730_comment'></div>公归朝廷，路车乘马，扶携襁负，民拜于野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207730_comment'></div>圣母神孙，在宫载祗，公率其官，正人具来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207730_comment'></div>诚心行义，令出而听，国安九鼎，大势已定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207730_comment'></div>民以法治，法胜则烦，譬如鱼噞，则清其源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207730_comment'></div>卖刀缘亩，盗岂得发？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207730_comment'></div>苟无欲之，虽赏不窃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207730_comment'></div>裴公处内，如不胜衣，问其貌年，威行四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207730_comment'></div>杨公入辅，曾未几何，毁第减驺，人去其华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207730_comment'></div>忘身忧国，晚以骨立，生非其厚，所爱民力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207730_comment'></div>有来远县，废食与言，问民而没，反席未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207730_comment'></div>帝祗合宫，公薨讣闻，彻尊往临，追胙故温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207730_comment'></div>公薨季秋，甲戌暮雪，民忧岁寒，相谚未褐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207730_comment'></div>闻诸道路，信有斯言，曰公在天，胡俾我寒？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207730_comment'></div>以劳定国，人曰宜享，何以知之，家有公像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207730_comment'></div>生为民望，其没亦神，公乎何憾，悲者世人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207730_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207730_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207672' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207672' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207672?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钱唐县君叶氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐元年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207672")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207672_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207672'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207672'>元祐元年夏六月戊子，补之从父朝散郎、太仆寺丞以母夫人寿安县太君公孙氏丧去职，将以其远日归柩鱼山，祔舒州府君之兆，问吉于史，史曰：「天德在日，辰加大明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207672_comment'></div>七月乙酉，葬不触禁，无有后艰」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207672_comment'></div>先是，太仆之夫人叶氏，以元丰三年七月壬戌卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207672_comment'></div>太仆泣语补之曰：「昔我不天，先君弃诸孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207672_comment'></div>诸孤尚幼，所与朝夕事吾母，吾母安之，不知有贫贱忧者，实叶夫人予助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207672_comment'></div>将并举其丧于鱼山，诸父咸曰宜尔铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207672_comment'></div>补之尚安得辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207672_comment'></div>叶氏，江南大姓，自缙云徙钱唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207672_comment'></div>有讳暧者，举进士，得桂州司法参军以卒，赠光禄卿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207672_comment'></div>二子昌言，昌龄，同年进士，皆以朝奉大夫老于家：夫人父兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207672_comment'></div>光禄殁时，夫人未笄，事母万年县太君宋氏，能致其孝，而于二兄顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207672_comment'></div>资慧淑，纂组音乐，凡女子之事无不工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207672_comment'></div>年二十二来嫔太仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207672_comment'></div>太仆少有高材，笃学不遑暇家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207672_comment'></div>夫人躬俭菲以养，少有则以奉宗党宾客，故太仆得一意于业，遂中甲科，成令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207672_comment'></div>寿安蚤多疾，夫人侍侧，不以劳苦懈，至己有疾，不欲以忧寿安，起居笑语如平时，竟以殁，得年四十有七，追封钱唐县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207672_comment'></div>四子：损之，临之，晋之，涣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207672_comment'></div>一女未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207672_comment'></div>闻之卑不诔尊，然妇人无外事，非其家人孰信？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207672_comment'></div>故粗撰所知，以成太仆之志，而慰其子之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207672_comment'></div>太仆兄弟伯、仲、叔、季，以仁、义、礼、智四端名，皆冠以端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207672_comment'></div>太仆伯也，因使后有考云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207672_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1207672'>蕙茝可充帏，谁使有此丰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207672_comment'></div>椅梓则为器物，各求所同也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207672_comment'></div>锜釜以湘之，又甚宜其宗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207672_comment'></div>副笄其委佗，独不见此容也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207672_comment'></div>鱼山兮岑岑，属绠兮及深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207672_comment'></div>松为城兮石马，吾宫旁兮乘者下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207672_comment'></div>作好歌兮以谓来者，为可穷兮如此大野。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207672_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207690' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207690' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207690?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阚氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐元年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207690")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207690_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207690'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207690'>阚氏，开封人，年十七，入故太子洗马、赠银青光禄大夫濮阳杜侯家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207690_comment'></div>生四男四女，年七十七，以元祐元年八月丁亥卒，以其年九月癸酉，葬于濮州鄄城县青山里之原，近侯之故兆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207690_comment'></div>初，侯捐馆舍，阚氏奉其家事恪，如侯不亡，而教其男女以职，内外有法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207690_comment'></div>故季子宣德郎、删定省曹寺监条贯子民，遂以文学中进士第，有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207690_comment'></div>而女亦为士妻，宜其家，曰刘龟年、马希闵，二婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207690_comment'></div>三男及女蚤卒，而有孙七人，皆宣德君之子：缋、绾、翻、绂、缅、缉、絪，可谓盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207690_comment'></div>宣德君既仕，当涂大人称其才，而所与游又多一时知名士，族人亦咸谓洗马有子，以为荣，而宣德君曰：「吾何以得之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207690_comment'></div>惟吾母教使然也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207690_comment'></div>呜呼，是足铭也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207690_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1207690'>善教子，以有禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207690_comment'></div>生无悔，从吉卜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207690_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1087&endYear=1087')">1087年</a>　晁补之在京师任秘书省正字，弟无斁举进士。作品：《慎思闻家弟无斁捷解见贻用前韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_196231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_196231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196231'>自惭操瑟尚不斥，劝使力田终有逢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196231'>青眼故人欣捷报，白头老母喜占从。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196231_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196231'>书林傥预西城集，釂子酣酣杏正浓。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196292'>史占上日祥，知欲遍九州。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196292'>敢任肉食谋，官闲欣岁休。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196487'>白驹皎皎在空谷，黄鸟睍睆鸣青春。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196487'>子桑之居十日雨，入门不复闻人语。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196487'>形骸正是吹一吷，安用虚名齐后土。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196487_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196491'>遣试齐民蟹眼汤，扶起醉头湔腐肠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196491_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196491'>颇类它时玉川子，破鼻竹林风送香。<div ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196311")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196311_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196311'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196311'>群公爱我邀我居，平生文举情岂疏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196311'>钩陈玄武在北极，上帝之府森图书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196311'>赵韩魏降显德尾，司马蝉嫣世良史。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196311'>其人不见其言在，青草生原岁阳止。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196311'>吾君好学由生知，成汤得尹方有为。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196311'>应合它年尹躬学，书成泣像麒麟阁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196311_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196311'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_196311_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196456' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196456' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196456?labeling=true' target='_blank'>闻文潜舍人出试院约毅父考功寻春</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196456_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196456'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196456'>上界官府多文书，我臞犹比山泽儒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196456'>閒忙态异亡羊等，一月不见霜侵须。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196456'>虽无京兆白花沥，还有太官青玉壶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196456'>武安曾孙我外弟，闻君得人助君喜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196456'>可能饼果餍儿童，不有杯槃到邻里。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196456'>去年南归饮王家，把盏犹见黄梅花。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196456'>城南寻春成岁事，忍不省顾随泥沙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196456'>世事何须还刺口，轻薄论交翻覆手。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196456'>自怜只似永州氓，归喜蛇存视吾缶<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196456'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196456_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196456'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_196456_0'>⑴ 自注：柳子厚说永州氓为太医采蛇者曰：“视吾缶，而吾蛇尚存，则弛然而卧。”</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_196456_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_196403' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196403' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196403?labeling=true' target='_blank'>直庐联句</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196403")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196403_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196403'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196403'>上閤井泉甘若醴，蓬山点茶竹阴底<span class='inlineComment2'>（耒）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196403'>庚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>伏恩容午课休，宫殿初凉朝雨洗<span class='inlineComment2'>（补之）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196403'>身闲出饮官不嗔，日长睡足长精神<span class='inlineComment2'>（耒）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196403'>未惭便作蠹鱼老，拔毛济世知何人<span class='inlineComment2'>（补之）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196403'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196403_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote'
