id='poem_note_196403_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_196173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196173?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵履常见贻</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196173")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196173'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196173'>人皆爱陈子，新雨尚能来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196173'>但使门多客，何嫌室自埃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196173'>弓旌无远野，城郭有遗才。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196173'>底日常侯舍，传声四辈催。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196173'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196173_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196186' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196186?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和二叔父少监入馆见赐诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196186")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196186_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196186'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196186'>楩楠要是晚方成，雄朔遗风世共惊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196186'>屑去未惊容必去，逃名还自得高名。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196186'>歌行元白辞涛壮，书画钟王笔势精。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196186'>乘马辎车何足算，不将稽古愧桓荣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196186_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196186'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196186_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵四叔父寄贺二叔父少监入馆并见寄诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196141")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196141'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196141'>琅邪太守鲁儒英，典校还高刘更生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196141'>已似诸荀并才子，复如群窦占诗名。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196141'>尚吟河水怜孤侄，应与乡人痛伯兄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196141'>老鹤长鸣近天汉，可容丛灌和骊庚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196141'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196141_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207611' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207611' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207611?labeling=true' target='_blank'>沈丘县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年5月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207611")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207611_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207611'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207611'>民可以诚化，而不可以文治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207611_comment'></div>吏功可以岁月致，而不可以一朝成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207611_comment'></div>古者继世以立诸侯，又命之教而为学，使各以其身化于其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207611_comment'></div>然中材之君，意竭于有为，而先王之事业旷时而不一睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207611_comment'></div>况夫后世吏不得久于其官，而庠序之教已微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207611_comment'></div>吏有爱民不苟之心，不幸或不得为而去，或虽为之，名具而实亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207611_comment'></div>以其卤莽灭裂仅存之馀，而施之其久坏不安之俗，故为其事而无其功，豪杰远识之士，以谓是区区何益于为民而不为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207611_comment'></div>中材乍存乍亡，而不肖者尽弃不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207611_comment'></div>而好更张喜事者，乃始务修此，以盗名于众人不为之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207611_comment'></div>则学之存否，于吏治之损益，信未有系也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207611_comment'></div>盖如卓茂、鲁恭，其治至使民相仁爱，不犯有司，而亦不闻其朝夕与民诵诗读书、舞乐释菜，常常从事于此，而惟其诚心实事，则固有以得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207611_comment'></div>然俗吏至或一切务簿书、狱讼、财赋，无爱民之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207611_comment'></div>士亦不本乡党庠序，而游谈四方，专以干禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207611_comment'></div>于此，以为文不足为，或不得久而不为，则至于俗隳弛已甚，本又不立，孰从而维之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207611_comment'></div>谯郡张柔文刚好学而有文，为令沈丘，尝曰：「位无贵贱，皆可以行志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207611_comment'></div>民无古今，皆可以道理齐也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207611_comment'></div>则欲以其学试之沈丘，使民于衣食必以时，教民于相收养必以孝弟廉耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207611_comment'></div>三年而民有改，文刚喜曰：「吾所知信是，吾民可与言矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207611_comment'></div>乃从其邑子论古之学者所以治心修身非干禄之意，而士亦欣然相与化之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207611_comment'></div>乃建学孔子庙中，貌像、堂室、东西序之房，与祭器、廪庖皆有所，盖为屋四十楹，可以待乡先生之讲道，而来子弟之愿游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207611_comment'></div>属补之记，补之曰：世之所患，先王之事业不可为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207611_comment'></div>非先王之事业不可为，而其势不得为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207611_comment'></div>治天下有本，而徒于其末救之，则智不胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207611_comment'></div>无以为之大，而仅为之小，则力不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207611_comment'></div>虽然，导民之道唯其所欲，无不可成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207611_comment'></div>民尝见者则识之，尝为者则能之，耳目习熟于此，而中心不喻，人情无有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207611_comment'></div>文刚于是能知其本，则其所施设宜有先后，非特以备观美，人为亦为而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207611_comment'></div>武城弦歌，夫子戏之曰：「割鸡焉用牛刀」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207611_comment'></div>然亦各以教其人使知道，则子游之意卒乎为是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207611_comment'></div>以为不告朔而饩羊可遂去，则夫子之所悼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207611_comment'></div>民常病诈，而至其化，上之所为则甚信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207611_comment'></div>晋之俭，秦之好车马，郑卫之音，宛丘之婆娑，以《诗》、《书》所记行四方，察其风俗，无不近者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207611_comment'></div>当其一时上之所为，岂自知能入人如此之深耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207611_comment'></div>其渐靡使然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207611_comment'></div>朝鲜去箕子千载，至汉时，其民饮食犹以笾豆，民不相犯，耻淫僻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207611_comment'></div>其后，吏及贾人往者稍侵之，俗乃益衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207611_comment'></div>朝鲜夷貊，况中国哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207611_comment'></div>后之来者尝无忘文刚所欲为，则沈丘之民虽使世世知好学，俗纯厚易治，无不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207611_comment'></div>元祐二年五月十日晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1207611_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207618' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207618' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207618?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清美堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年12月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207618")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207618_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207618'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207618'>昔柳子厚名愚溪而居，而溪之神见梦曰：「余甚清且美，为子所喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207618_comment'></div>子幸择而居余，而辱余以无实之名以为愚耶」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207618_comment'></div>子厚与之辨，其言信激而有理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207618_comment'></div>须城王景亮以为不然，曰：「夫物之名，物之实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207618_comment'></div>且子厚固不愚，夫安能使溪愚也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207618_comment'></div>士而矜其能，不自爱，以近权利而取悔，未始病其智也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207618_comment'></div>而曰『我固愚』，余羞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207618_comment'></div>在州里则贤不肖、小大皆趋焉，行四方则人慕交之，居朝廷则附者众，若此，皆自以为吾智能得之，而余以为有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207618_comment'></div>故余进则不敢以智徼其所难，而退亦不敢以余力之所无如何而受余之愚责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207618_comment'></div>汶之阳，卢泉之上，其南大泽，其土腴，其生物夥而可悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207618_comment'></div>筑圃而居之，为堂以临卢泉而挹北山，取其所谓甚清且美者，合而名余堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207618_comment'></div>卢泉之上多杨柳茂木，可休而坐，钓鱼以忘老，杖而望北山，云气之浮游可接也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207618_comment'></div>其前冈阜陂隰，摧嗺而湠漫，青齐之往来者，歧路迤靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207618_comment'></div>牛羊麦禾，膏野极望，鸣鹳鹤而下凫雁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207618_comment'></div>余又种花其旁为锦堤，凿堂之东西为池，植柏其唐，以达于门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207618_comment'></div>为径，为台，为庵，为亭，以出眺而入息，以与宾客坐而谈笑为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207618_comment'></div>丛竹杂果，奇石异草，凡物之清且美而可悦者甚众也，独泉乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207618_comment'></div>且物之清，惟其自然，宜不以人之所处要地僻壤改其度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207618_comment'></div>然世之人出入乎官府而往来乎廛市者，朱墨伧攘之与居，米盐諠啾之与曹，虽有物境可以澄耳目，而旷心意者不暇一接，则物虽不以要地僻壤所处者改其度，而自人观之异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207618_comment'></div>而余终岁优游焉于此，则所谓清美而可悦者，非余独得之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207618_comment'></div>而所为名余堂者，亦岂非以其实耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207618_comment'></div>柳子厚以谪居远方，一旦得官，舍而去，孰与余常有此也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207618_comment'></div>于是求文颍川晁补之以记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207618_comment'></div>补之曰：嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207618_comment'></div>昔之君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207618_comment'></div>进则急于功名，不暇择当否；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207618_comment'></div>退而怼不逢，则诬溪谷草木以自解说，岂不过甚矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207618_comment'></div>若景亮，进不干时，退而处其常，斯可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207618_comment'></div>近时豫章黄庭坚鲁直有美名，其羁旅于魏，尝歌曰「卢泉之濒可忘死」，补之爱焉，然补之亦未尝至卢泉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207618_comment'></div>独尝以事出郓之东郭，见其川源土俗之富，意固乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207618_comment'></div>而补之先君又葬于济，济与郓，泽南北也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207618_comment'></div>庶几他日过景亮，临斯泉一醉，解吾缨而濯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207618_comment'></div>元祐二年十二月二十五日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1207618_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207209?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺教授陈履常启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207209")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207209'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207209'>擢领掾曹，归临乡校，与从游之良旧，私慰喜以居多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207209_comment'></div>窃惟国之求才，病取舍之胶于法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207209_comment'></div>士之涉世，患进退之失其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207209_comment'></div>设科举爵位以诱人，假诵数词章以干禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207209_comment'></div>须其出试，则乡党自好者耻夫屡献；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207209_comment'></div>不以礼际，则山林长往者岂其肯来？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207209_comment'></div>故上安于有司之区区糊名以为公，而士惑于古人之皇皇载质以为辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207209_comment'></div>莫闻览德之凤，率多食饵之鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207209_comment'></div>恭以某官行独而通，志洁而降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207209_comment'></div>不落落以如玉，矧泛泛其若凫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207209_comment'></div>穷无立锥，术可济国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207209_comment'></div>至于博览之学，绝出之文，要其平生，固曰馀事，尚不屑去，安有求闻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207209_comment'></div>声自籍于诸公，章数腾于当宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207209_comment'></div>拔起闾里，朋类之荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207209_comment'></div>收还妻孥，亲党所喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207209_comment'></div>未促公车之诏，聊从泮水之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207209_comment'></div>庶观成山，必自累土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207209_comment'></div>辞尊及富，仕何往而非安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207209_comment'></div>有为与行，志苟存而皆可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207209_comment'></div>贻笺良幸，修庆独稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207209_comment'></div>倾咏之诚，倍于侪等。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207209_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207203' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207203' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207203?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答谢华守赵子刚贺入馆启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207203")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207203_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207203'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207203'>顷者效官河外，托庇府中，违离屡易于岁华，倾想第勤于魂梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207203_comment'></div>疏慵成癖，问讯阙修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207203_comment'></div>伏惟坐镇安闲，履时休裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207203_comment'></div>补之才能甚薄，学术亦迂，比缘明诏之求，偶用辅臣之荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207203_comment'></div>道山群玉之地，滥迹莫遑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207203_comment'></div>长林丰草之思，此心固在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207203_comment'></div>斯盖某官忠信好礼，彊恕行仁，吹嘘所加，隐伏皆奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207203_comment'></div>盖尝勉裁尺牍，概叙鄙诚，置几尘生，开缄字灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207203_comment'></div>既后时而莫致，滋抚事以为惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207203_comment'></div>乃蒙眷私，特枉庆贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207203_comment'></div>辞极璆琳之美，情踰骨肉之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207203_comment'></div>顾惟感铭，尤剧衷悃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207203_comment'></div>新元肇布，介福来同。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207203_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207714' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207714' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207714?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广州推官杨府君墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207714")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207714_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207714'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207714'>元祐二年正月辛酉，广州观察推官杨府君卒，丧未还也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207714_comment'></div>其后，侄洵一日晡时，昏然如醉，歘见府君乘马从徒而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207714_comment'></div>洵遽迎拜，既坐，神色翛然如平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207714_comment'></div>问：「何之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207714_comment'></div>曰：「今为忠孝节义判官矣，所主人间忠臣孝子、义夫节妇事也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207714_comment'></div>从容竟夜，人但见洵拜，且自言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207714_comment'></div>将行，有二紫衣留语曰：「府君好范山下石台，何不即彼立祠」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207714_comment'></div>洵忽悟，谓家人曰：「适广州叔父至如此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207714_comment'></div>众悲骇，因呼工为像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207714_comment'></div>工良拙，而像惟肖，人益以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207714_comment'></div>然府君宦不显当涂，无上其事者，祠竟未立也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207714_comment'></div>众复曰：「府君生有德于此，没能震于灵响，其存不朽，不以祠立与否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207714_comment'></div>惟岁时野祭，尚足以慰吾人之思」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207714_comment'></div>乃叙府君行事，并记洵所见，来言曰：「府君里冠冕，不可使其较然著于耳目之迹久不传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207714_comment'></div>子实为文，表诸其阡上」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207714_comment'></div>补之曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207714_comment'></div>府君讳纬，字文叔，济州任城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207714_comment'></div>少愿敏，事亲孝，仪状端重，长七尺，忠信岂弟，好学而爱人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207714_comment'></div>遇乡人无少长，必以敬，而乡人亦无少长，皆敬而亲之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207714_comment'></div>未尝有官府，而民听之如官府，至就评曲直，而府君固退然君子，非预人事者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207714_comment'></div>曾大父讳超，五代末，藏匿不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207714_comment'></div>大父讳善基，初稍稍以经术教授乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207714_comment'></div>生子讳昪者，府君考也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207714_comment'></div>讳早，尚书比部郎中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207714_comment'></div>讳景，尚书驾部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207714_comment'></div>皆经明擢第，有能声，故府君大父累赠尚书刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207714_comment'></div>而府君亦以皇祐五年经明中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207714_comment'></div>尝为太原府司理参军，活县所上盗在死罪者三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207714_comment'></div>其党应死者犹感泣，语家人曰：「杨参军遇我尽，今且死，尚当为杨参军求佛追福，我死不冤矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207714_comment'></div>徙凤州梁泉县令，教民以孝弟力田为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207714_comment'></div>守史千之不知其能，尝荐其录事参军张革等数人，革呼同列诣千之，言梁泉循吏而公不荐，革等以为愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207714_comment'></div>千之踧踖曰：「吾过矣，吾过矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207714_comment'></div>因并荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207714_comment'></div>迁沂州防御判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207714_comment'></div>岁大饥，盗蜂起，守霍交属府君督捕四县盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207714_comment'></div>吏争以杀盗求赏，多至数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207714_comment'></div>府君独哀之，开喻首减，所全者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207714_comment'></div>狂人李逢聚亡命，淘金境上，有异谋，郡疑不时发，而逢败诛，府君亦坐废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207714_comment'></div>二十年优游守道，化行其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207714_comment'></div>河决曹村，灌七郡，钜野大溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207714_comment'></div>会秋谷大登，场事未毕，民有舟者争救谷，老幼多死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207714_comment'></div>府君尽弃其田中积不载，而以其二舟躬救人于津口，所活日数十百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207714_comment'></div>后民相见者皆曰：「杨府君生我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207714_comment'></div>上纂极，复为广州观察推官，叹曰：「欲老于此，故恩不及考妣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207714_comment'></div>今往，幸满岁得休官，追荣丘墓，不憾矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207714_comment'></div>无几何，卒于官，年六十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207714_comment'></div>夫人翟氏，有淑行，踰年亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207714_comment'></div>子三人：涓、涤、涣，皆进士，学问修立，后方兴未艾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207714_comment'></div>其没后数年，尝有群盗白昼行剽，辄呼相戒：「无犯杨府君家」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207714_comment'></div>过其门，犹俛而趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207714_comment'></div>盖府君不特生为善人怙，而没为小人惧者如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207714_comment'></div>然于时府君未葬也，其详犹具于铭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207714_comment'></div>补之尝窃以谓行德于幽，人不知而天知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207714_comment'></div>天之所予，不必贵富，使正直好义，所居以为民命，是谓不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207714_comment'></div>其动于怪异，亦时以劝善而警恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207714_comment'></div>抑府君生诚实不欺，没岂其欺？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207714_comment'></div>尚曰：吾父母邦庶或福之，岂利其飨哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207714_comment'></div>系曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_57_1207714'>生无职于尔土，民固听之，如其有官府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207714_comment'></div>没无封于尔土，民固神之，如其山川主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207714_comment'></div>意有道者其德全，畸于人而侔于天，莫之爵而常自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207714_comment'></div>范之山兮石如砥，木萧萧兮草靡靡，侯爱我邦兮归万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207714_comment'></div>山中人兮春复秋，日惨惨兮云幽幽，侯壮长兮所居游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207714_comment'></div>侯之来兮民喜，风飘帷兮雨沾几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207714_comment'></div>鼓渊渊兮舞侯戺，纷进拜兮侯邻里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207714_comment'></div>侯不可见兮德可思，侯行不来兮民心悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207714_comment'></div>谓侯饮食兮无去斯，福尔之土兮以慰民之思。</div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1207714_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207677' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207677' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207677?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通直郎权通判环州事钱君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐二年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207677")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207677_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207677'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207677'>钱氏临安人，自武肃王镠有吴越至归本朝，其子孙仕宦常数十百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207677_comment'></div>有讳禹卿字仲谟者，天下兵马大元帅、尚书令兼中书令、秦国忠懿王讳俶之曾孙，保静军节度观察留后、赠太尉、宣惠公讳惟济之孙，而中大夫讳暌之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207677_comment'></div>以父任为太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207677_comment'></div>调云安尉，徙令繁昌，以行法不扰，改大理丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207677_comment'></div>擢通判霸州，迁通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207677_comment'></div>年五十，元丰五年三月丁酉卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207677_comment'></div>夫人仁和县君杨氏，悲哀，无几何亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207677_comment'></div>二子誴、诩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207677_comment'></div>女嫁进士石仲坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207677_comment'></div>元祐二年十二月庚寅，葬应天府楚丘县固胡村之原，以杨夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207677_comment'></div>其弟山南东道节度推官唐卿来曰：「吾母，君之从祖姑，而吾兄，君所知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207677_comment'></div>愿以数言藏其墓」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207677_comment'></div>补之曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207677_comment'></div>君举进士，博达彊力，所居官可道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207677_comment'></div>在霸州有告榷场火者，众相传虏至，守陴警备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207677_comment'></div>君曰：「何至是」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207677_comment'></div>遣捕之，果小偷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207677_comment'></div>在环州，属灵武用兵，守辟君提举粮草，虏纵抄，输者不继，而君崎岖独全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207677_comment'></div>霸、环，西北要害郡，朝廷方以此观君而用之，而君死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207677_comment'></div>补之既悲君不遇而志之，且申其事以为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207677_comment'></div>曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1207677'>杭钱姓，武肃显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207677_comment'></div>遭乱离，匿负贩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207677_comment'></div>鉴山石，衮龙俨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207677_comment'></div>奋八都，五王远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207677_comment'></div>世阻江，不绝献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207677_comment'></div>宋龙兴，致其版。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207677_comment'></div>爱生人，流斯善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207677_comment'></div>将及相，卿士衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207677_comment'></div>自忠懿，胙秦墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207677_comment'></div>子保静，有旐旟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207677_comment'></div>粤其孙，中大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207677_comment'></div>世不乏，发仲谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207677_comment'></div>令繁昌，发迹初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207677_comment'></div>佐两邦，政有誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207677_comment'></div>火边市，人惊郛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207677_comment'></div>馈灵武，行者瘏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207677_comment'></div>克掩捕，莫告劬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207677_comment'></div>秩通直，五十殂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207677_comment'></div>夫人杨，殒戚吁，子誴、诩，儒冠裾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207677_comment'></div>女一人，石氏夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207677_comment'></div>岁丁卯，月极涂，十二日，归其居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207677_comment'></div>何以识？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207677_comment'></div>原固胡。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1207677_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196628' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196628' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196628?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洞仙歌 菊</a><span class='authorDate'>（1087年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196628")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196628_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196628'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196628'>今春闰好。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196628'>怪重阳菊早。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196628'>满槛煌煌看霜晓。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196628'>唤金钱翠羽，不称标容，潇洒意、陶令诗中能道。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196628_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196628'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_196628", 196628, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>不应</span>誇绝艳，曾妒春华，因甚东君意不到。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196628'>又似锁，三千汉女，偏教明妃、怨西风边草。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196628'>也何必、牛山苦沾衣，算只好龙山，醉狂吹帽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_196628_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196305' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196305?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵苏翰林厩马好头赤</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196305")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196305_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196305'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196305'>君不见昆崙龙种非凡肉，不但蹄高耳批竹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196305_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196305'>区区吴蜀有二骏，跳过断桥飞出谷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196305_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196305'>万蹄纵牧原野赤，汧陇收驹日复日。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196305_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196305'>未须天厩惊好头，冀北未空聊一历。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196305_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196305'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196305_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196441?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送外舅杜侍御使陕西自徐州移<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作自徐州移使陕西）</span>作<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作赵善括诗）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196441")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196441_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196441'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196441'>建隆以来论人物，得士与古相低昂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196441'>人才历数仁祖世，后生嵬琐无复望。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196441'>老成寂莫典刑在，杜公玉立映班行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196441'>少时学问圣贤说，松柏岁寒观老节。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196441'>得官乌府不须臾，正色空闻动帷闼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196441'>铄金众口未必然，天与名城慰萧屑。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196441'>王师顷缚山西酋，朝廷却怀西顾忧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196441'>凉州旄钺何足恃，岐陇须公勤传邮。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196441'>平生经国有雅意，乘流得坎惟所值。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196441'>作官施设要近民，金马严徐等儿戏。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196441'>诏书宽大人乐生，吏安为弛威不行。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196441'>金城那可无粟守，尧舜与民宁并耕。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196441'>茶盐资国何必古，俗儒徇名不知务。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196441'>精神折冲在本强，要以雍容在<span class='inlineComment2'>（光本、涵本作待）</span>苍遽。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196441'>知无不为公自期，岂弟君子神所私。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196441'>秦山渭水照车马，属城列县观威仪。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196441'>此行属任良不恶，金鱼新佩明光墀。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196441'>谁言直谏居内少，淮南盗铸烦抚绥。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196441'>时平王度日金玉，岁晚汲公还见思。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196441'></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_196441_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195981' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195981' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195981?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵两苏公讲筵唱和四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_195981")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195981_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195981'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195981'>白发归联侍从荣，未应江海叹飘零。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195981_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195981'>禽鱼不与钧天观，想见群龙舞洞庭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195981_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195981'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195981_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195980?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195980'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195980'>李公素誉压朝端，曾溯龙门鬣未乾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195980'>虽愧彭宣惟赐食，未惭贡禹亦弹冠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195980'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195980_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195979' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195979' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195979?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195979_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195979'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195979'>缵服忧勤未有言，诸儒经术侍彤轩。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195979'>九畴咸叙今天锡，三画何人昔梦吞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195979_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195979'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195979_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195978' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195978' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195978?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195978_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195978'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195978'>金玉谁人咏德音，太平无象属人心。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195978'>日高初散露门讲，天上五云宫殿深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195978_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195978'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195978_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207614' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207614' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207614?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庆州新修帅府记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年9月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207614")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207614_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207614'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207614'>上即位之元年，忧劳远人，欲与之休息，诏边臣按兵自守，毋生事疆埸，有不如诏旨务利者，罢斥之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207614_comment'></div>先是，文正范公与今右丞相父子帅庆，皆有恩德在庆人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207614_comment'></div>上方招延老成，而丞相以给事中召自庆，且大用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207614_comment'></div>朝廷既难其代，而谋庆人之所安者，于是朝散郎、直龙图阁范公自京东转运使擢环庆路经略使、知庆州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207614_comment'></div>诏曰：「尔尚无忘尔父兄之功」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207614_comment'></div>公拜稽首，就道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207614_comment'></div>且公尝使陕西摄帅事，庆人父老闻公来，咸贺，未至而其心已安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207614_comment'></div>虽其宿将悍士，以公家世、声名、惠泽与其所施设，素信于心，皆拱手待令，爱行而威不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207614_comment'></div>于时朝廷方宽征役，民复田亩，岁屡登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207614_comment'></div>虏刍牧相望，公戒边吏姑谨备，得谍者劳遣之，使语其酋曰：「尔无犯我，我不侵尔毫发」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207614_comment'></div>虏不敢动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207614_comment'></div>民既不见公有所为，而寇入稀，愈益安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207614_comment'></div>公政成而无事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207614_comment'></div>先是，庆州官府庳陋，朝廷间遣使劳边，冠盖旁午，及岁时燕犒蕃酋，将佐皆在，坐于堂者肩相摩，立于庭者足相重，庖厨吏舍，马羊之所养，檐属垣比，殆不足称连帅之居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207614_comment'></div>自文正公固欲辟大之，至丞相增葺殆半而未备，独韩康公尝建鼓门为闳壮，馀或倾侧朽腐矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207614_comment'></div>公曰：「居室苟美，谓施诸家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207614_comment'></div>至官府，所以临人听治、布礼而出威者，虽一邑必饬，况连帅治哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207614_comment'></div>乃度荒閒地，徙饎爨栏厩而远之，踰月而公堂成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207614_comment'></div>明年春，仪门成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207614_comment'></div>夏，视事之堂成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207614_comment'></div>周廊广除，博大而沉深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207614_comment'></div>蕃酋将佐若兵民之来执事听命者，知连帅之尊，礼行而威申，不待闻其号令、见其指麾，而其精神气象已足以折冲而御侮矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207614_comment'></div>又明年春，乃以其馀力筑东北隅，作堂以燕休，而属补之记其营造之意，名堂而榜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207614_comment'></div>补之尝论，公之父子兄弟，其谟谋才业固足以相望于前后矣，而其一时措置，务以便事，岂能必同？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207614_comment'></div>而庆人皆安之，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207614_comment'></div>窃以谓文正公当康定初，元昊叛扰边，中国应敌无宁岁，既城大顺、胡卢而役使其大族明珠、灭臧等，储畜益充，士可用，故文正公欲遂弱贼，更有远略之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207614_comment'></div>丞相当熙宁、元丰中，洮岷用师诸边，屡深入斥地矣，重虚内事外，则力不堪，故丞相务镇静，意不在远略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207614_comment'></div>上既专以德怀四夷，为长久虑，如前诏书约束，顾边备不可彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207614_comment'></div>得帅如龙图公，平居第劝课抚循，举其废事，和辑其内外吏民，若在守不在战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207614_comment'></div>然敌至亦不敢侮，樽俎谈笑，宾醉而乐彻，人或不见其有所遣，已而成功如此，然后可以待机会、制仓卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207614_comment'></div>是公父子兄弟所以措置，虽各因时有缓急，不能无异，而庆人享其利则同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207614_comment'></div>其皆安之，岂不以此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207614_comment'></div>昔苏绰尝有所施设，以便一时，曰：「此犹张弓也，后之君子，谁能弛之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207614_comment'></div>至子威，因罢绰所为，而后世善其能成父之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207614_comment'></div>若赵括，非不能读书，而至于临事不知合变，则奢虽不能难，亦终不能善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207614_comment'></div>至于居处土木之美陋，虽非事之所损益，而势有所不得俭，前人岂皆以为可忽而不为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207614_comment'></div>顾不暇耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207614_comment'></div>由是以观公之规模固甚远，当其閒暇充足，独彊本治内，至于府库仓廪无不饬，以威属城而视远人，盖有深意，岂易量哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207614_comment'></div>匹夫而自为谋，养其力以有为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207614_comment'></div>一家而自为计，爱其财以有用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207614_comment'></div>如李牧之为赵守，优游閒暇，市租以入幕府，为士卒费，日椎牛酾酒，欲战不许，敌至则入收保，固为勇，不为怯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207614_comment'></div>昔《江汉》之诗，言宣王以文武之命召公者命其孙虎，而虎能似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207614_comment'></div>其诗曰：「王命召虎，来甸来宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207614_comment'></div>文武受命，召公维翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207614_comment'></div>虎拜稽首，对扬王休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207614_comment'></div>作召公考，天子万寿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207614_comment'></div>古之人君，能用其功臣之世以有为，而其臣能不愧其先人之功、报上之意者如此，故《江汉》之诗美焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207614_comment'></div>尝试以江汉名堂，叙公为政本末而刻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207614_comment'></div>元祐三年九月二十三日，宣德郎、秘书省正字钜野晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1207614_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207305' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207305' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207305?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书邢敦夫遗稿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1088年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207305")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207305_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207305'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207305'>邢河阳既哭其子惇夫，以书抵山阳李端叔，云：「吾儿垂绝时，问所欲，言曰：『愿得豫章黄鲁直状其行，以累高邮孙公铭之，而遗稿以属补之为序』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207305_comment'></div>端叔为补之言，补之曰：昔杜牧不敢序李贺，矧吾惇夫年未二十，文章便欲追逐古人，充其志，非特为贺者而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207305_comment'></div>然吾岂可以负惇夫将死托邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207305_comment'></div>他日见河阳公，当把臂痛哭，尽出敦夫书次第之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207305_comment'></div>元祐三年十二月五日，颍川晁补之无咎题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207305_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207667' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207667' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207667?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫致仕陈君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐三年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207667")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207667_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207667'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207667'>君陈氏，讳知和，字德时，按其谱，博州人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207667_comment'></div>六世祖翔，唐末从事成都府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207667_comment'></div>王建有异志，翔屡沮之，废，居阆州之西水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207667_comment'></div>孟昶以蜀归，曾祖讳省华，始来自蜀，为祥符人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207667_comment'></div>仕本朝为左谏议大夫，有能声，赠太师、尚书令兼中书令、秦国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207667_comment'></div>秦公生三子，皆以儒学擢高第，位将相，有勋劳于国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207667_comment'></div>枢密使、尚书右仆射、同中书门下平章事、赠太师、尚书令兼中书令、英国公谥文忠讳尧叟，君祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207667_comment'></div>英公生尚书都官郎中、赠金紫光禄大夫讳师古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207667_comment'></div>光禄生君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207667_comment'></div>光禄前夫人贾氏，永年县君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207667_comment'></div>后夫人潘氏，安福县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207667_comment'></div>而君，宁国县太君贺氏出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207667_comment'></div>光禄当任子以与其族人，而君从祖太尉康肃公方观察宿州，任君右班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207667_comment'></div>及长知书，叹曰：「吾家世如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207667_comment'></div>吾父教我以学何如，而吾可用此进耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207667_comment'></div>乃上书，愿易所得官，从左选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207667_comment'></div>仁宗嘉其意，且以其文忠后，从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207667_comment'></div>初调河阳节度推官，事四守：梁适、李淑、张观、苏绅，皆当时显人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207667_comment'></div>其趣操不必同，而君介然若一，四人者皆贤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207667_comment'></div>再调宁国军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207667_comment'></div>窜卒诱耕民剽里中，卒杀人，民从旁止之，伤而免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207667_comment'></div>守欲并论民死，君争之力，守怒而入，君立庑下不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207667_comment'></div>守悟，为谳诸朝，民果不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207667_comment'></div>遭安福忧，免丧，擢卫尉丞、知硖石县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207667_comment'></div>县当陕冲，卒苦于役，作伪印帖隐民间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207667_comment'></div>前令比获以要赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207667_comment'></div>君一日执六人，且尝度关，法应死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207667_comment'></div>既不忍以要赏，见其尪然诚苦于役者，为移文所从来无他过，取伪印帖焚之，还其役戍兵道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207667_comment'></div>县中群博犯法，逻者执于庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207667_comment'></div>数百人噪县门且夺之，吏趣闭门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207667_comment'></div>君徐出坐堂上，命开门，众莫敢入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207667_comment'></div>因阳叱逻者，解纵之，既行，密疏其名河南府，皆正其罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207667_comment'></div>改签书彰德军节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207667_comment'></div>事未行，遭宁国忧，免丧，迁大理丞、知缑氏县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207667_comment'></div>英宗即位，迁右赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207667_comment'></div>昭陵采石，聚兵缑氏城中万人，仓无储粟，而输者未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207667_comment'></div>君度不可俟报，乃下令借富人停粟，约与之息，匿者没官，令出而办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207667_comment'></div>比输者至，则兵仰食县者十五日矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207667_comment'></div>事已，旁县吏皆迁，而君不自言，赏亦不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207667_comment'></div>迁殿中丞，又迁国子博士、通判果州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207667_comment'></div>神宗即位，迁尚书虞部员外郎，赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207667_comment'></div>还朝，用荐监左藏库，不就，通判赵州事，迁比部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207667_comment'></div>曾孝宽察访河北，奏君偕行，朝廷方议省郡县、宽力役，吏希旨争言可省，而乾宁、保定、顺安三军在议中，俾君往视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207667_comment'></div>还，言沿边城犬牙相制，以利守御而便转输，此祖宗深意，不可改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207667_comment'></div>朝廷然之，为不废三军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207667_comment'></div>中人程昉建言徙漳河，洺州使者以君权知洺州，董其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207667_comment'></div>漳河役大，昉欺朝廷以易集，务减人徒，人徒以故怨之，百馀人烧民庐为暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207667_comment'></div>君尽捕得，诛其始谋者八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207667_comment'></div>事且毕，会新守至，君还赵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207667_comment'></div>昉以君为暴其短，乃归功新守，而君亦不辩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207667_comment'></div>丞相王公安石雅知君可用，使人谕君：歙故难治，而朝廷方行法，欲以倚君，君不得辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207667_comment'></div>擢知歙州事，迁驾部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207667_comment'></div>自以不能当执政意，至则求闲局，差管勾嵩山崇福宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207667_comment'></div>民上书愿留者以千数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207667_comment'></div>房州地僻，守屡以赃败，又擢知房州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207667_comment'></div>郡阻山，城西有溪，所从来高，望之汹汹在城上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207667_comment'></div>旧有堤圮，不治馀三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207667_comment'></div>君议增筑，不欲调民，乃以术招窜卒廪之，益以州兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207667_comment'></div>凡用工万，高其旧丈二尺，而广如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207667_comment'></div>人初以为烦，会明年，溪大涨，得堤而定，人乃服君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207667_comment'></div>奏课京西第一，迁虞部郎中、擢知泗州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207667_comment'></div>郡当水冲，属霖潦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207667_comment'></div>君度淮、汳、洙、泗满必大下，因预为守城备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207667_comment'></div>水至，浸城且坏，吏仓猝不知所为，而君规画素定，语吏如此如此，城既无虞，而民赖以活万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207667_comment'></div>玺诏奖谕，擢提点广南东路刑狱事，改朝奉大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207667_comment'></div>番禺，南粤都会，守俸月七万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207667_comment'></div>守方对诏狱，君摄州事竟八月，当得钱六十万，君不取，曰：「我岂缘人不幸而自裕耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207667_comment'></div>宴宾客为彻乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207667_comment'></div>其忠厚如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207667_comment'></div>迁朝散大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207667_comment'></div>盗起梅州，去治所更四郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207667_comment'></div>君以为道驿而往恐后，乃自南雄州绝山倍道，崎岖茆竹间，蒙雾得疾，几殆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207667_comment'></div>后良愈，因求上印绂，时方六十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207667_comment'></div>上即位，迁朝请大夫，赐三品服，勋上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207667_comment'></div>为人清慎退约，不干权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207667_comment'></div>善与人交，自以无怨恶于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207667_comment'></div>明白立断，所至民爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207667_comment'></div>善楷、隶，喜为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207667_comment'></div>既谢事，作「燕誉堂」于第之西北隅，盖以训辞名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207667_comment'></div>日从宾客饮酒，谈笑其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207667_comment'></div>以疾卒，寿六十四，元祐二年五月丁巳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207667_comment'></div>夫人郑氏，安居县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207667_comment'></div>男曰适，宁乡县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207667_comment'></div>逾，郑州司户；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207667_comment'></div>适，临河主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207667_comment'></div>女长适朝散郎潘行，次适通直郎王镇，次适道州录事楚冲，次适宣德郎周昕，幼在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207667_comment'></div>孙男女七人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207667_comment'></div>诸孤以君卒之明年七月壬申，葬于河南府密县义台乡之武泰冈，来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207667_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_88_1207667'>仕可以藉其世，而公不赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207667_comment'></div>进可以遇合，而公不竞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207667_comment'></div>时未可以去也，而公去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207667_comment'></div>事取其先，得取其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207667_comment'></div>名处其薄，功处其厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207667_comment'></div>造物者报其天，不报其人，其人不亡，在其后子孙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_93_1207667_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207689' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207689' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207689?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罗氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐三年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207689")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207689_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207689'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207689'>夫人罗氏，其先尝居蜀，后徙居开封，盖邺王绍威之族，而国子博士易直之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207689_comment'></div>幼端静不烦，及长，以女德称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207689_comment'></div>国博君曰：「吾女不可以妄与人也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207689_comment'></div>久之，乃归大理评事、开封李君宁，年已二十六矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207689_comment'></div>归四年，产一子而李君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207689_comment'></div>居丧以礼，纲纪其家，事无所阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207689_comment'></div>其母怜之，欲使再行，夫人陈义甚高，卒不可夺而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207689_comment'></div>及见其次子士贤登朝，封寿安县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207689_comment'></div>诸子皆宦学有立，女有归矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207689_comment'></div>而士贤侍夫人官大名，以孙珫殇悼成疾，年五十三以卒，元祐三年十月十日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207689_comment'></div>初，李君前配苗氏有男女八人，李君没，尚幼，夫人躬鞠养甚于其存，非家人不知其有异母出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207689_comment'></div>其生于富足，而所与通家者多戚里豪侈，而性庄静有常度，不为其所迁怵，亦可贤矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207689_comment'></div>男士雄，右侍禁，卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207689_comment'></div>士贤，奉议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207689_comment'></div>士弘，宣德郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207689_comment'></div>士彦、士伟、士衡，皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207689_comment'></div>而士衡，夫人出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207689_comment'></div>士贤等护其丧，以其年十二月十八日，祔于开封府开封县吹台乡评事君之茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207689_comment'></div>补之顷教授北京，夫人诸子皆从补之游，而士宏又尝为僚，故来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207689_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1207689'>妇人无外事，故名不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207689_comment'></div>惟诗书所载，岂无妇人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207689_comment'></div>人出如己出，惟其平均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207689_comment'></div>以慈教之孝，而家用成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207689_comment'></div>吾何以知之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207689_comment'></div>其子有闻<span class='inlineComment2'>（《鸡肋集》卷六六。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207689_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1207689'>珫：光本、涵本作「琉」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1207689_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207691' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207691' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207691?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐氏墓碣</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐三年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207691")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207691_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207691'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207691'>齐氏，会稽萧山人，初嫁为同邑民妻，已而入故单州司户参军阎侯德基家，为乳其第二儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207691_comment'></div>儿死，阎侯有长女，贤而爱之，嫁今朝奉郎、知徐州杜侯纯，齐氏随焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207691_comment'></div>又为杜氏抚养其稚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207691_comment'></div>侯家居，行己可师，齐氏又妇家人，待之甚礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207691_comment'></div>阎夫人没，男女幼，赖齐氏调护，男娶女嫁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207691_comment'></div>杜侯由侍御史得相州，而齐氏年已六十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207691_comment'></div>元祐三年三月二十四日，忽欷歔如自知将尽者，遂卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207691_comment'></div>杜侯伤之，遣送其丧，以四月二十四日还葬于祥符义堂村杜氏墓侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207691_comment'></div>而杜侯次女，补之之妻也，谓补之曰：「齐氏诚信厚，且我赖以长立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207691_comment'></div>我君命我兄弟皆拜之，不忍其泯灭也，子为铭可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207691_comment'></div>乃为铭，埋之其隧中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207691_comment'></div>曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1207691'>生而恂，其死也不沦，吾闻诸四方之人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207691_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　晁补之在京师任秘书省正字，与李格非相过从，志趣甚投合。作品：《礼部移竹次韵李员外文叔》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷七。）</span>《与李文叔夜谈》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_196271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196271?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_196271'>东南之美者，见伐以直干。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196271'>岂如此君疏，犹作此郎玩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196271'>此郎乃在此，无乃材亦散。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196271'>平生吉甫颂，意鄙枚叔乱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196271'>坐狂得此冷，对竹头帻岸。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196271'>尚思杀青书，充宇白虎观。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196271'>恐此愧子猷，还成倚楹叹<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：文叔有志史事。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196271_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196271'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196271_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196245' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196245' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196245")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196245_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196245'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196245'>中庭老柏霜雪里，北风烈烈偏激耳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196245_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196245'>诵诗夜半舌入喉，饮我樽中渌醽美。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196245_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196245'>升堂辞翰愧非有，何异还家数其齿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196245_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196245'>文章万古犹一鱼，乙丙谁能辨肠尾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196245_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196245'>更惭颇似会稽康，欲语常遭士瑶柅。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196245_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196245'>广陵八月未足言，曾使酲醲涊然起，安得谭如子枚子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_196245_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1089&endYear=1089')">1089年</a>　晁补之仍在京师任秘书省正字。作品：《胡戟秀才效欧阳公集古作琬琰堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷九。）</span>《送直阁杜君章守齐》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷十三。）</span>《次韵校理盛居中上元》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一六。）</span>《饮校理盛居中家次韵二首》<span "晁补之", "poem_title_196434")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196434_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196434'><div "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>逸字</span>往往出。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196434'>故都易姓几兵火，量臀鼎腹细<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_196434", 196434, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>诘诎</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196434'>道人岣嵝空有闻，丘陵仙鬼事恍惚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196434'>共和十鼓记亡一，峄山肉在无复骨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196434'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_196434", 196434, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>云阳</span>八体又瓜剖，至使汉童讹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_196434", 196434, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>尉律</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196434'>世儒诡正何足臧，公家安取千轴藏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196434'>仲尼犹及史之阙，有马借人吾敢忘。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196434_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196434'><span class='link' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196453?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送直阁杜君章守齐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196453'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196453'>杜公文史不读律，平反世称徐有功。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196453_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196453_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196167?labeling=true'
