id='poem_sentence_4_196167_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>饮校理盛居中家次韵二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196184")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196184'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196184'>骑鸾玉府尽仙真，短羽愁攀天汉滨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196184'>诗懒便应推老手，饮豪独未后诸宾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196184'>宫壶银箭刚知夜，笼烛金华已报春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196184'>倒载微吟笑儿稚，时清宁是习池人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196184'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196184_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196185' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196185' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196185?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196185_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196185'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196185'>一倒南斋玉宇醇，绝胜不醉楚江滨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196185'>骊驹且莫催归御，鸲鹆何妨属坐宾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196185'>我尚少年新白发，君须痛饮敌青春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196185'>未愁驱使无诗句，怕遣壶空花笑人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196185'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196185_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207617' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207617' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207617?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有竹堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年5月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207617")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207617_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207617'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207617'>济南李文叔为太学正，得屋于经衢之西，输直于官而居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207617_comment'></div>治其南轩地，植竹砌傍，而名其堂曰「有竹」，榜诸栋间，又为之记于壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207617_comment'></div>率午归自太学，则坐堂中，扫地置笔研，呻吟策牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207617_comment'></div>为文章，日数十篇不休，如茧抽绪，如山云蒸，如泉出地流，如春至草木发，须臾盈卷轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207617_comment'></div>门窗几案、婢仆犬马，目前之物有一可指，无不论说形容，彊嘲而故评之，以致其欣悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207617_comment'></div>而于竹，尤数数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207617_comment'></div>顾其地，狭而卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207617_comment'></div>天雨，榛秽蜘蛛之织，河柳兔葵之所，交横而蒙翳，人不知其竹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207617_comment'></div>有过者，文叔必顾堂下而语之读壁间记，仰栋而指其榜曰：「吾固诏客矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207617_comment'></div>客辴然而笑曰：「今夫渭川之千亩，淇园之林，与南山之造天而蔽日者，其大若杯、若盂，若桐梓之躯，其胶缭𡶑岩之上而临百仞之渊，不特出屋檐而摩墙堵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207617_comment'></div>暮春者，春雷隐山，万笴奋角，如犀兕作，箨解而出碧，一日百尺，弥望不可以极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207617_comment'></div>于时刀斧之取材者，度径围而得之，大小齐一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207617_comment'></div>西转巴笮，南引江汉，浮渭而乱河，囷束󱑥属而下者，为筒、为干、为屋椽，揵菑千丈之笮，遍国之藩篱是赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207617_comment'></div>与窍而比夫律吕，以悲哀娱耳者，昔声满天地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207617_comment'></div>是其旁之人，室庐，竹也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207617_comment'></div>用器，竹也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207617_comment'></div>樵而薪者，竹也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207617_comment'></div>以贸米盐而出之其邻境者，竹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207617_comment'></div>夫此人岂知竹之爱，翛然而喜，谆谆然语人而以夸之，曰『吾居有竹也』哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207617_comment'></div>文叔亦辴然而笑曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207617_comment'></div>夫物安知其贵贱之所常在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207617_comment'></div>玉之美，而蓝田以抵鹊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207617_comment'></div>沉为美木，而交趾以为槃食彘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207617_comment'></div>白鹇、锦雉，山中以醢腊，而贵人以百金致；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207617_comment'></div>茗以为粥，而胡人以为佩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207617_comment'></div>夫物固有以多为贱而以少为贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207617_comment'></div>今夫王城之广大，九涂四达，三门十二百坊之棋置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207617_comment'></div>上自王侯，至于百姓庶民，宫接而垣比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207617_comment'></div>车马之所腾藉，人气之所蒸渍，嚣尘百里，欲求尺寸之地以休佚而莫之致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207617_comment'></div>而贫者置圊无所，况于其他哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207617_comment'></div>然则环堵不容丈，而有竹如吾堂者，不知能几人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207617_comment'></div>则余所以揭之于栋而名之，书诸壁而记之，翛然而喜、谆谆然语客而以夸之，不亦可哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207617_comment'></div>且竹之美，昔人以比德松柏，在冬夏青青，君子之所独也，以夫少犹贵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207617_comment'></div>使余得见夫渭川、淇园与南山之荟蔚者而游其间，虽多，固不可贱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207617_comment'></div>夫多犹不可贱，而又况其少哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207617_comment'></div>客曰：「唯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207617_comment'></div>虽然，吾闻昔王子猷好竹，尝曰：『安可一日无此君』！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207617_comment'></div>闻吴中士大夫有佳竹，欲观之，径出，坐舆造竹下，讽啸良久，主人欲留而不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207617_comment'></div>将出，主人闭之，因尽欢而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207617_comment'></div>今文叔居有竹，文叔姑亦洒扫储具，借不邀客，客将造门，坐堂上不去，曰：『竹固招我』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207617_comment'></div>元祐四年五月二十八日，颍川晁补之无咎记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1207617_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207731' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207731' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207731?labeling=true' target='_blank'>馆阁祭吕申公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207731")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207731_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207731'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207731'>维元祐四年月日，具官某等，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故平章司空吕公之灵曰：呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207731_comment'></div>大人之德，如山如川，作镇九州，经营幅员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207731_comment'></div>国有大人，君尊而荣，地有山川，气杰以灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207731_comment'></div>岂惟宝藏，百货所养，惟其高深，物则固往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207731_comment'></div>善观国者，庶其在兹，无象太平，望而知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207731_comment'></div>季札观乐，兴衰以喻，见蘧伯玉，知卫无故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207731_comment'></div>秦使入楚，楚宝为陈，昭奚恤在，知楚有人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207731_comment'></div>楚卫区区，何足与谋？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207731_comment'></div>有是二臣，以雄诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207731_comment'></div>如虎在林，如龙在渊，何必风云，其威自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207731_comment'></div>小才近用，则不若此，方圆殊施，文武异事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207731_comment'></div>一官得人，则一事行，比事得失，非国重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207731_comment'></div>呜呼公乎，敦大中和，代天之工，道固逶陀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207731_comment'></div>处厚持满，彊者莫先，清心守默，辩者莫前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207731_comment'></div>是惟元宰，三公之德，岂如浅智，物我异职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207731_comment'></div>魏公典筹，初不自务，既执弓矢，人服其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207731_comment'></div>徐公行义，亦既有常，世自奢俭，吾无低昂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207731_comment'></div>巍巍两朝，盛德高名，内则国干，外则长城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207731_comment'></div>沈几入告，成败先定，家人不知，矧复百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207731_comment'></div>群言并进，不尸其德，使公议安，人享其泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207731_comment'></div>二圣统临，公秉政机，垂绅搢笏，百辟是仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207731_comment'></div>征繇不兴，盗贼先改，商贾阜通，九河输海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207731_comment'></div>谓法未具，滋章已除，谓财未充，民气已舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207731_comment'></div>谓人未用，忠贤既立，谓远未宾，羌戎贡入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207731_comment'></div>太平之功，可指日冀，人之无禄，天不憖遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207731_comment'></div>两宫震悼，庶民嗟咨，哀荣典册，礼盛一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207731_comment'></div>某等在廷，辱公品职，陶冶之功，无所归德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207731_comment'></div>旂斿箫鼓，送公国门，摅词陨涕，侑此酒尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207731_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207731_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207767' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207767' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207767?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代尚书侍郎两制祭枢密赵公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207767")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207767_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207767'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207767'>维元祐四年月日，某官某等谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故枢密赵公之灵曰：天之于人，若绝而通；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207767_comment'></div>人之戚休，天实与同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207767_comment'></div>国之方兴，视所生贤，天将启之，推往引还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207767_comment'></div>有炜其初，以厚其名，中劳苦之，后使大兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207767_comment'></div>呜呼公乎，令德嘉言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207767_comment'></div>何以知之，治平之元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207767_comment'></div>堂堂数公，如凤如麟，秉义正辞，引君于仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207767_comment'></div>匪忠则难，视功何如，俾群疑安，为万世图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207767_comment'></div>方冬冱阴，公对延和，帝指公言，天意儆予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207767_comment'></div>尧言民诵，民闻子来，使民戴尧，功孰与偕？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207767_comment'></div>中和信诚，有政在民，留安去怀，黄霸、寇恂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207767_comment'></div>萧公在外，雅意王室，匪身诎信，惟道枉直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207767_comment'></div>心广体胖，不泰而康，公不为名，耆老益光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207767_comment'></div>二圣当天，问于遗训，凡公数人，皆起辅政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207767_comment'></div>用公西府，柔远弭兵，夷蕃在庭，耕旅不惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207767_comment'></div>河安北流，群议东之，民汹汹忧，裹粮坐堤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207767_comment'></div>公持不回，如治平时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207767_comment'></div>人言踵闻，诏休役屯，此岂人力，皇爱下民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207767_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207767_comment'></div>帝虚相席，俟忠与勋，谓公帝图，公讣奄闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207767_comment'></div>两宫悼惊，悲逮庶氓，况于某等，位皆近臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207767_comment'></div>承颜接语，周旋昔时，咨嗟涕洟，则匪我私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207767_comment'></div>百夫引輀，送公还里，寿贵有闻，公于何悔？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207767_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207767_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207676' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207676' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207676?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进士李公裕墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207676")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207676_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207676'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207676'>进士李君公裕，字好问，济州金乡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207676_comment'></div>尚书工部郎中、直史馆定之孙，而奉议郎、通判潞州事众之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207676_comment'></div>幼自立，事亲孝，学问文词蚤成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207676_comment'></div>其意以为富贵功名可以力挽取，非命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207676_comment'></div>再举礼部不中，退而发愤，益治其业，穷日夜不懈，家事无鄙辱，必身任之，曰：「不以累吾亲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207676_comment'></div>其自勤苦如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207676_comment'></div>其谆谆以教诸弟，不以人言间，亦如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207676_comment'></div>已而得疾欧血，几危者数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207676_comment'></div>其妻晁氏，先君之第六女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207676_comment'></div>少淑慎，敏于女工，吾母尤钟念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207676_comment'></div>嫁七年，年三十，生二子而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207676_comment'></div>无几何，其幼子又夭，而好问已疾病，年三十二亦夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207676_comment'></div>于时，吾妹未祥也，其亲哭之，为三日不食，其存儿伶俜，慕不绝声，邻里过者，为堕泪伤心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207676_comment'></div>吾母闻之哀甚，语补之曰：「汝妹不幸，其夫又不及禄以夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207676_comment'></div>吾怜其用力无所就，其心可悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207676_comment'></div>汝为作铭，岂惟而甥是慰，尚以纾吾悲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207676_comment'></div>补之曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207676_comment'></div>既而奉议君书来，如吾母言，乃叙好问之志，为之词，极其悲，使纳诸圹中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207676_comment'></div>好问卒以元祐四年七月四日，葬以某年某月日，地则其县之某乡，从其祖史馆君之兆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207676_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1207676'>此邦之砠兮，云气族而凭天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207676_comment'></div>此邦之濋兮，潴为野之澜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207676_comment'></div>谓此邦之人兮，胡不变化而嬗？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207676_comment'></div>幼里儿兮长邑，士生于此兮死于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207676_comment'></div>羽成而飞兮，忽堕地其不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207676_comment'></div>无妇以哭夫兮，况欲恤而子！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207676_comment'></div>四方莫可告语兮，非而亲戚，孰怜尔骐骥也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207676_comment'></div>而不以绁絺绣也，襞而幽之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207676_comment'></div>视其藏不为碧兮，为楸柏之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207676_comment'></div>霜萃兮木萎，春风至兮岂无时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207676_comment'></div>谓人往兮无返期，我不敢恸兮畏而子闻之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1207676_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉郎致仕陈君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1089年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207698")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207698_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207698'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207698'>陈，妫姓，舜后，满始封陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207698_comment'></div>至完有齐，其裔徙泉州仙游者，曰郁，有文学，事王审知，为谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207698_comment'></div>郁生荣绪，以勇名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207698_comment'></div>福州归于钱氏，而儇为东府安抚使，治福州，奏荣绪司马，复徙明州象山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207698_comment'></div>世乱，子孙因不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207698_comment'></div>而其四世孙曰大雅，工为诗，而甚好义，尝舍逆旅，遇之远官病垂死者，倒囊济之，留阅月，病者去，乃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207698_comment'></div>尤为清宪赵公抃所知，而年八十有八，竟不用，用钟其庆于君，以君登朝，累迁通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207698_comment'></div>配丁氏，封仙源县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207698_comment'></div>继刘氏，封仁寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207698_comment'></div>而仙源实生君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207698_comment'></div>君讳辅，字安国，四岁丧仙源，哀慕如成人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207698_comment'></div>七岁诵书百卷，能为人言其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207698_comment'></div>中嘉祐二年进士第，授校书郎、司理滨州，部使者、郡守争欲出己门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207698_comment'></div>迁义乌令，尉王锡轻且专，一日，无罪鞭其隶十辈，皆不服，哗然欲起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207698_comment'></div>君闻，往候锡，徐数隶罪，收去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207698_comment'></div>锡曰：「微君，殆不济」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207698_comment'></div>双林傅大士道场，岁输供至二百万缗，提点刑狱元积中欲尽以助公，君持不可，犹取七十万，然双林赖是不为墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207698_comment'></div>民有以财雄其里中、私货禁物者，君忽出令曰：「往某民室，取某物几何」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207698_comment'></div>民不得逃，物若合契，咸以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207698_comment'></div>秦固监兵润州，其子勉，君妹之婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207698_comment'></div>勉死，家常有怪扰人，会君道润，止固家，三日阒然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207698_comment'></div>君适登舟，怪已复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207698_comment'></div>迁忠武军推官、知武当县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207698_comment'></div>县濒汉，数溃堤，君教民以大竹络石为岸，高五丈，方冬下之，明年水至，无患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207698_comment'></div>武当山有诸葛孔明庙，俗以清明数百人为社祠神，以侈相夸，或格斗死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207698_comment'></div>君因其俗，加约束，争为衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207698_comment'></div>改著作佐郎、知安吉县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207698_comment'></div>岁饥，籍富家出粟食流民，所活以千计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207698_comment'></div>将代，民诣郡及使者言：「古之循吏，所去见思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207698_comment'></div>我曹于陈君，不待去而思，思其将去而不乐也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207698_comment'></div>使者知其才，命摄华亭，且俾求前令张若济罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207698_comment'></div>君不愿，使者怒，徙摄寿昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207698_comment'></div>日与其僚饮酒，寻山水，作诗百篇，率以「县小为官乐」冠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207698_comment'></div>时王介守湖，请使者曰：「安吉不可以无陈君也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207698_comment'></div>乃得归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207698_comment'></div>道闻其系囚众，以旦至邑，遽阅牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207698_comment'></div>有竞渡殴人死，至系百人者，且情得矣，即械应法者于州，馀悉遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207698_comment'></div>至暮，庭为虚，人欢舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207698_comment'></div>天目山水溉一邑，其附山六乡为防专利，而下二十一乡请决堤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207698_comment'></div>主簿刘璹视之，千馀人拥璹斗堤下，璹走还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207698_comment'></div>君徐以他事至旁佛舍，召六乡老人谕散之，与约决堤三日，慰二十一乡民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207698_comment'></div>老人唯争趋令，而溪悍猛，既决，则三日不能复，下乡用穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207698_comment'></div>朝廷初以七十五等定家业，均役钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207698_comment'></div>使者属君立浙西法，而翰林沈公括方察访二浙，遽言于朝，挽与俱，遂推其法浙东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207698_comment'></div>部使者交荐，监杭州市易务兼市舶司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207698_comment'></div>以劳迁秘书丞、太常博士，服五品，差通判信州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207698_comment'></div>未行，丞相苏公颂方尹开封，引以知左军巡判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207698_comment'></div>又差通判扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207698_comment'></div>或欲穿渠龟山，南径洪泽，以避淮波者，疑下有石，不可凿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207698_comment'></div>使者复属君，君言可凿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207698_comment'></div>渠成，民便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207698_comment'></div>迁屯田员外郎，改朝奉郎、管勾京东排岸司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207698_comment'></div>时拓西疆，又擢通判秦州，未行，权度支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207698_comment'></div>且用矣，会有以君扬州释寄杖事为言者，由是罢去，拘催两浙市易贷钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207698_comment'></div>继丁仁寿、通直忧，服除，管勾成都府转运司文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207698_comment'></div>有飞语井研令申宗道取井户金，会宗道在府，使者遽遣搜橐，得金，盛怒，欲自掠讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207698_comment'></div>君言：「匿名书勿治，而金何必井户物？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207698_comment'></div>苟未白，以属吏可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207698_comment'></div>后所司言，金有从来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207698_comment'></div>王子文、霍唐臣、张尧士、赵衮以治郡亡状得罪，诏大中大夫以上，以岁举堪知州一员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207698_comment'></div>今门下侍郎许公将首以君应，诏差知邛州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207698_comment'></div>丞相吕公大防、范公纯仁，亦寖知君，复欲用矣，会君以疾致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207698_comment'></div>元祐四年十一月庚午卒，以某年月日葬于某县某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207698_comment'></div>娶张氏，德安县君，有淑德，先君二年卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207698_comment'></div>二子：琦，瀛州推官、知临江军录事参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207698_comment'></div>珌，举进士，志艺甚修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207698_comment'></div>而琦问学有才智，干其蛊者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207698_comment'></div>三女：嫁朝请郎曹易、西头供奉官曹暟、左侍禁曹习，而习妻蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207698_comment'></div>孙男伯群、仲寔，女一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207698_comment'></div>君为人岂弟敏彊，会亲族，喜宾客，轻财重义，胸中洞然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207698_comment'></div>少贫贱，刻意于学，夜不<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1207698", 1207698, "Clauses/236/Comments/0")'>寝床</span>，置足水中以警寐，故蚤以文辞，有场屋声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207698_comment'></div>东明刘温奇之，使其子槩等师焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207698_comment'></div>槩后试礼部第一，知名云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207698_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_73_1207698'>以此其志，则无不可成也，命不与期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207698_comment'></div>以此其才，则无不可能也，位不得为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207698_comment'></div>何以信此于时耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207698_comment'></div>曰：有大君子者数人焉皆知之，君尚何悲！</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1207698_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　秋，晁补之迁校书郎，然以官俸微薄，家贫亲老，不足赡养，乃乞补外官。作品：《次韵文潜病中作时方求补外》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷五。）</span>《再次韵文潜病起》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷五。）</span>《送舅氏杨通直令阳谷》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷六。）</span>《呈文潜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二0。）</span><div id='poem_196295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵文潜病中作时方求补外</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196295")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196295'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196295'>贫炉初著灰，浊酒寒不温。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196295'>邻张病未来，独负南窗暄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196295'>昨日往过之，欢喜能两餐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196295'>酲醲淟然解，愧无枚乘言。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196295'>祝君抱虚一，邪气袭无门。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196295'>今晨有起色，迎笑眉宇轩。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196295'>扶掖两男儿，总丱佳弟昆。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196295'>遣诵寄我诗，妙可白玉刊。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196295'>平生俱豪气，见酒渴骥奔。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196295'>赐休常苦稀，晨谒良不闲。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196295'>约君向南邦，勿厌敲扑諠。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196295'>公馀未忘饮，何必釂十分。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196295'>时平但行乐，卧治安足论。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196295'>琵琶五十面，雷雨出鹍弦。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196295_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196295'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_196295_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再次韵文潜病起</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196276")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196276'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196276'>淮浦见之子，春风初策名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196276'>颇讶谪仙人，有籍白玉京。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196276'>晚遇广文直，老交心愈倾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196276'>同升芸香府，偶坐华发生。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196276'>斯人自<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_196276", 196276, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>龙性</span>，意变难章程。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196276'>耆酒不疵吝，身如秋叶轻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196276'>自言士处世，何必冰雪清。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196276'>交游满台省，毁誉半王城。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196276'>不肯效俯仰，畏高侮鳏茕。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196276'>常思老伊颍，紫蟹羞吴粳。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196276'>我辄抵掌和，音同磬随笙。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196276'>小人奉慈亲，皆尝小人羹。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196276'>寒衣妇补绽，学绩女娉婷。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196276'>日欲江海去，心期杨柳青。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196276'>众木构大厦，豫章倚孤撑。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196276'>如子足医国，可容移疾行。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196276'>丹书紫皇告，玉篆五岳形。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196276'>何必陶隐居，吞霞养纯精。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196276'>访道自素约，谐心期暮龄。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196276'>但恐牵俗缘，志大功不成。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196276'>息交屏妻子，此语不须惊<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《鸡肋集》卷五）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196276'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_196276_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_515697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送舅氏杨通直令阳谷</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_515697")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_515697_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515697'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515697'>人言慎县宰，颇似太丘君。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515697'>客户有训遣，司官无讼闻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515697'>外家久寂莫，舅氏少辛勤。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515697'>一邑何足道，高名谁与群。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515697'>西来马特特，冬晚雪纷纷。<div id='poem_sentence_4_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_515697'>公朝道由砥，孤士迹如云。<div id='poem_sentence_5_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_515697'>过门苦地僻，下直迫日曛。<div id='poem_sentence_6_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_515697'>深泥枉穷巷，寒垆对残煴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_515697'>感慨说宣子，飘零缀遗文。<div id='poem_sentence_8_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_515697'>麟阁窘铅椠，鱼山失耕芸。<div id='poem_sentence_9_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_515697'>远情等匏系，归梦剧丝棼。<div id='poem_sentence_10_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_515697'>山东接畿甸，阳谷近榆枌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_515697'>吏昔猛豺虎，民如窜麖麇。<div id='poem_sentence_12_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_515697'>幸逢宽大时，庶几仁惠薰。<div id='poem_sentence_13_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_515697'>自笑下士策，不殊野人芹。<div id='poem_sentence_14_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_515697'>爱民宜百禄，本茂实当蕡。<div id='poem_sentence_15_515697_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_515697'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_515697_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195994' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195994' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195994?labeling=true' target='_blank'>呈文潜</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_195994")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195994_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195994'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195994'>无计河西寻杜家，海棠空咏去年花。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195994'>烦君为谢郭少尹，欲买缠头迎犊车<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：郭明远妓尤知名。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195994'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195994_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1090&endYear=1090')">1090年</a>　岁末，晁补之得以秘阁校理通判扬州。作品：《与谢宝文启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1207200' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207200' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207200?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与谢宝文启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207200")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207200_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207200'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207200'>窃审再膺宸检，还镇淮邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207200_comment'></div>副朝廷因任之求，慰民吏去思之意，伏惟欢庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207200_comment'></div>恭以某官忠荩耆德，文词宿儒，蚤记渊衷，遍跻法从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207200_comment'></div>长人京邑，岂徒前有之赵、张；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207200_comment'></div>控虏藩垣，真是禁中之颇、牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207200_comment'></div>惟江阳气俗之旧，有棠阴惠化之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207200_comment'></div>农绝带牛，尚未忘于劝课；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207200_comment'></div>儿骑竹马，愿复见于行春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207200_comment'></div>惟暂屈于统绥，固不劳于经理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207200_comment'></div>而补之倦游文馆，得请佐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207200_comment'></div>曾未造于门墙，将获依于麾棨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207200_comment'></div>自惟幸会，尤剧欣愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207200_comment'></div>方冬冱凝，取道辽远。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207200_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_196288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196288'>戚联帝室未要论，烜赫功高羊叔子。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196479'>都城经春雪蔽地，百花不放须君至。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196479'>得君岂但官局同，卜邻况近南城下。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196479_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196452_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196452'>呻吟裘氏日已多，恩流三族功比河。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196452_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196452'>告行风雨春物空，催花作果黍芃芃。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196452_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196452'>亦从梁汴即清颍，湛湛已见江头枫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196294'>不如公子拥樽酒，诗材春乱词涛翻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196294'>想见杨家美人出，玉面朱唇映琴瑟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196294'>冰船著炬光照淮，雪乱风筵饮方逸。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196294'>只今愁坐私自怜，寒书冻砚尘满前。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196294'>人生何者非昨梦，还如归去散花天。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196294'>老人已复形槁木，真幻那知然不然。<div target='_blank'>跋翰林东坡公画</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207294")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207294'>翰林东坡公画蟹，兰陵胡世将得于开封夏大韶，以示补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207294_comment'></div>补之曰：本朝初以辞律谋议参取人，东坡公之始中礼部第一也，其启事有「博观策论，精取诗赋」之言，言有所纵者，有所拘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207294_comment'></div>其谢主司而誉其能如此，曰：「奇文高论，大或出于绳检；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207294_comment'></div>比声协句，小亦合于方圆」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207294_comment'></div>盖公平居，胸中闳放，所谓吞若云梦，曾不芥蒂者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207294_comment'></div>而此画水虫琐屑，毛介曲隈，芒缕具备，殊不类其胸中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207294_comment'></div>岂公之才固若是，大或出于绳检、小亦合于方圆耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207294_comment'></div>抑孔子之教人「退者进之，兼人者退之」，君之治气养心，亦固若是耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207294_comment'></div>尝试折衷于孟子之言曰：「观水有术，必观其澜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207294_comment'></div>日月有明，容光必照焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207294_comment'></div>归墟荡沃，不见水端，此观其大者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207294_comment'></div>墙隙散射，无非大明，此观其小者也，而后可以言成全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207294_comment'></div>或曰，夜光之剑，切玉如泥，以之挑菜，不如两钱之锥，此不善用大者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207294_comment'></div>余于公知之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207294_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196631' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196631' class='poemTitle class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515696?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂浆</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515696'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515696'>暑卧午呀呷，蠲烦何所投。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515696'>岩桂割辛芳，石蜜滋甘柔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515696'>沃以火鼎沸，閟之冰井幽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515696'>三日出深幂，明琼盎黄流。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515696'>冰火离坎类，意比秫麦缪。<div id='poem_sentence_4_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_515696'>辛甘既两适，不湎亦销忧。<div id='poem_sentence_5_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_515696'>中年苦内热，岁愿西风秋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_515696'>寒凉犯所畏，发散资尔谋。<div id='poem_sentence_7_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_515696'>时时以觞客，三献不一酬。<div id='poem_sentence_8_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_515696'>缅思湘累语，啜醨终所羞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_515696'>北斗酌此浆，违世聊远游。<div id='poem_sentence_10_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_515696'>恐复迷吾往，仆悲道阻脩。<div id='poem_sentence_11_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_515696'>淮南归来些，憭慄令人愁。<div id='poem_sentence_12_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_515696'>百壶无此饯，夙志慕林丘。<div id='poem_sentence_13_515696_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_515696'>宁怀小山感，不为桂枝留。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196522'>君今鸣橹下长淮，眼明清晓三楚开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196522_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196385'>沛然有馀不矜饰，我亦谓子诚可人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196385_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196330'>弊裘羸马愧我寒，唤饮东斋散肤粟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196330_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196528'>长啸春风大泽西，却望麻田山万里。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196528'>弃家内愧非此流，此身天地一虚舟。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196528_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196528'>未应齿豁尘埃里，乞与青精救白头。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196510'>乃知醉人不是酒，真是情多非酒多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196510'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196510_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196509' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196509' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196509?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196509_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196509'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196509'>不是生情薄桃李，广陵一株名最高。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196509'>俱飞蛱蝶莫猜忌，端为蜻蜓避伯劳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196509'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196509_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207669' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207669' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207669?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常少卿分司西京石君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐八年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207669")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207669_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207669'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207669'>君石氏，讳辂，字君乘，濮州范县人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207669_comment'></div>曾祖讳温，祖讳文举，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207669_comment'></div>考讳崧，益州司理参军，赠工部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207669_comment'></div>工部以明经入官而好文，自君幼学，则谆谆语之曰：「汝当以文显」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207669_comment'></div>即大感发，昼夜诵读，贫无烛，至梯屋就月视书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207669_comment'></div>无几何，则以词艺中进士乙科，调青州推官，改知莱阳县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207669_comment'></div>县负海，民习为奸利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207669_comment'></div>君治明恕，贼民多改，或遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207669_comment'></div>康定中，夏英公经略西边，奏掌永兴书记，管勾机宜文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207669_comment'></div>方元昊叛，君时献策画，多见听用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207669_comment'></div>再从辟泾州、渭州，用特敕荐改著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207669_comment'></div>贼围镇戎急，后骑日益，诸将以谓利疾战，且深入牵其势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207669_comment'></div>君起席末，言曰：「贼锋锐，未可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207669_comment'></div>大将葛怀敏怒曰：「兵因敌而制胜，石君安能逆知」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207669_comment'></div>往先驰之，军尽没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207669_comment'></div>或走入塞者，犹道怀敏临死而悔曰：「坐以书生待石君至此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207669_comment'></div>君既从军，母老，与诸子安土，不肯行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207669_comment'></div>欲解官归，帅惜其才，使部尉氏还戍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207669_comment'></div>因督送军衣京东间，从范县过，问母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207669_comment'></div>或欲以事疵帅者，擿其违法，坐责监长葛酒税，稍徙知昆山县事，签书陈州判官，通判绵州、邛州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207669_comment'></div>会嘉祐间，朝廷以诸路计不入，诏三司荐可任吏，君在书中，擢广济河辇运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207669_comment'></div>广济输尤不计，数十年或置或罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207669_comment'></div>君究知其弊，奏更法数事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207669_comment'></div>军大将有罪不敢决，三司得专治，自君始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207669_comment'></div>明年，东州之粟至京师者百万石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207669_comment'></div>擢知真州，又改虔州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207669_comment'></div>韩魏公闻其名，召至中书，与议盐事，以便宜措置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207669_comment'></div>虔十邑，绵地千里，民狡善讼，文案如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207669_comment'></div>守堇堇不能省，君治不烦而威甚行，三狱为空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207669_comment'></div>以疾求北归，知光化军，复领辇运，移梓州路运判，改提点两浙路刑狱事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207669_comment'></div>疾病，分司西京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207669_comment'></div>熙宁二年七月十八日卒，年六十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207669_comment'></div>自佐著作九迁为太常少卿，阶朝奉郎，勋轻车都尉，爵河东县开国男，食邑三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207669_comment'></div>娶孟氏，长寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207669_comment'></div>四男子：伯宗古，内黄尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207669_comment'></div>仲宗彝，通直郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207669_comment'></div>季宗彭，皆前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207669_comment'></div>而叔宗寿，扬州录事参军，廉平而文，能裕其蛊者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207669_comment'></div>君少孤，事兄悌，遇族人恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207669_comment'></div>尝请于朝，愿纳两官授兄一致仕官，不行，乃以任子恩任兄之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207669_comment'></div>宗寿卜以元祐八年十月十七日，葬君河南府渑池县大坞乡凤皇山之原，属补之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207669_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1207669'>亲教以学，虽浅以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207669_comment'></div>推此而往，可与事亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207669_comment'></div>君任以事，虽轻以成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207669_comment'></div>推此而往，可与事君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207669_comment'></div>小试必立，岂大不能？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207669_comment'></div>寿贵不称，短穷亦福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207669_comment'></div>宁此有馀，而彼不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207669_comment'></div>惟此有馀，小人无知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207669_comment'></div>惟彼不足，圣贤有之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1207669_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207674' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207674' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207674?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晁夫人墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐八年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207674")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207674_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207674'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207674'>前达州司理参军叶君助，将葬其夫人晁氏于苏州吴县之灵岩乡宝华山北，元祐八年某月甲子吉，以书属夫人之弟补之为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207674_comment'></div>补之泣曰：「姊为女与妇，以德称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207674_comment'></div>以我铭姊，惧不信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207674_comment'></div>以人铭姊，惧不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207674_comment'></div>虽然，为可信者而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207674_comment'></div>乃序之曰：夫人世家开封，后徙钜野，尚书刑部郎中、赠特进吏部尚书讳某之曾孙，尚书库部员外郎讳某之孙，而先君之第二女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207674_comment'></div>先君讳某，秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207674_comment'></div>晁系出于周景王之子朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207674_comment'></div>朝之字或为晁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207674_comment'></div>朝死，葬南阳西鄂县，故西鄂之晁氏皆自谓子朝后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207674_comment'></div>事见裴骃《史记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207674_comment'></div>而汉御史大夫错以忠见杀，其后因不显，盖千有一百馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207674_comment'></div>至宋，而后文元公、文庄公父子复以文学政事位朝廷，晁氏始大，宗党至数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207674_comment'></div>而夫人端丰婉慝，自少不妄语言，作止有常度，而中洞彻，事至能办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207674_comment'></div>先君曰：「是女姿静甚，名之曰静」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207674_comment'></div>姊若妹则皆以静字之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207674_comment'></div>族人喜，咸曰：「嫁静必众为议对也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207674_comment'></div>而司理君，吴名家子，举进士，知名，乃归之，时年十有九矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207674_comment'></div>叶大族，有家法，而夫人沉详庄俭，宜其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207674_comment'></div>鸡鸣而起，治其妇事，无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207674_comment'></div>处其长少亲疏间，恩称而礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207674_comment'></div>得竭其力，以助孤嫠，而分不足，退而享其薄，以为安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207674_comment'></div>司理君豪迈不苟合，数举，有司见抑，有不遇叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207674_comment'></div>夫人辄酌酒饮之，陈义甚高，则矍然起曰：「能如是乎，吾可不愧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207674_comment'></div>故穷居十年，终不以不合于有司，变其业以求合，夫人助之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207674_comment'></div>元丰四年，从其舅大夫君提举两浙常平仓事，八月二十六日暴得疾以卒，年三十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207674_comment'></div>男曰蕴，举进士，好文自立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207674_comment'></div>曰蘩，卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207674_comment'></div>女长适左奉议郎、通判达州事李騊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207674_comment'></div>次卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207674_comment'></div>次幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207674_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_1207674'>叶宗有祉，姊不逢其祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207674_comment'></div>姊贤若是，我言不可悔，以昌其子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1207674_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207710?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右通直郎杨君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1093年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207710")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207710_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207710'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207710'>元祐八年二月戊辰，右通直郎、新通判河中府事杨君卒于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207710_comment'></div>其孤若，状君行，以抵其外兄晁补之而哭曰：「若不夭，我君志义宜承吾祖后，光大我家，以垂裕我不肖孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207710_comment'></div>而位与年止此，若念此痛于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207710_comment'></div>我君尝言：吾所与游众，而吾甥知吾志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207710_comment'></div>然则非外兄谁铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207710_comment'></div>尚慰我不肖孤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207710_comment'></div>补之哭曰：「自我为儿时，从寿光夫人于外氏，舅爱我厚，导我于学，甚恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207710_comment'></div>窃不自少，谓舅才业可任重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207710_comment'></div>而迄不偶，其敢嫌于戚，以没舅美」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207710_comment'></div>谨按杨氏系出弘农华阴，汉兴有喜，为郎，骑追项羽，初封赤泉侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207710_comment'></div>喜后有宝，王莽时不应聘，盖救黄雀山中，而夜有童子致白环四，云后当出三公如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207710_comment'></div>宝生震，震有令德，亦致三鳣之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207710_comment'></div>震生秉，秉生赐，赐生彪，皆忠孝，竟四世为三公，如童子言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207710_comment'></div>虽其后分裂，犹世多大人显士，非他姓比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207710_comment'></div>而君讳某，字节之，世家单州成武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207710_comment'></div>自曾祖讳超以上，遭五代之乱，遁逃不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207710_comment'></div>祖讳善基，始徙济州任城，以学术行义教授其乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207710_comment'></div>生二子，为郎，累赠尚书刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207710_comment'></div>而尚书比部郎中、赠右朝议大夫讳早，君考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207710_comment'></div>幼彊学，事亲孝，慷慨有大志，声闻山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207710_comment'></div>既冠，以经明起家历畿令、州守，数决大事疑狱，不侮鳏寡，不畏彊御，有古循吏风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207710_comment'></div>顾喜言兵，挽弓至一石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207710_comment'></div>平居论议，慕班超之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207710_comment'></div>近臣亦屡以此言，不果试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207710_comment'></div>前夫人郑氏，先没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207710_comment'></div>继夫人向氏，封福昌县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207710_comment'></div>而君向出也，故以其外祖父龙图阁直学士传式恩，任郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207710_comment'></div>生警悟异甚，年十六，举进士，以高等荐，即知名，尤为吴申、江渊诸生进名士所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207710_comment'></div>文采赡逸，造端立语则破的惊人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207710_comment'></div>初调密州诸城主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207710_comment'></div>再举进士，又首荐不第，遂尽屏其少所学，益治经考古，去华而居实矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207710_comment'></div>诸城剧邑，令以病不胜事，去，君承令乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207710_comment'></div>吏少君，君为晦圭角，调聏不遽，吏稍纵，因微得其宿奸状，尽置诸理，一邑大骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207710_comment'></div>时清献赵公抃方安抚青州，亟言君才于朝，又以吏事称，再调开封府襄邑县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207710_comment'></div>初，教保甲，君行法不扰而办，岁终以其伍见庭下，旌旗弓矢甚整，坐作甚习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207710_comment'></div>神宗喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207710_comment'></div>又尝有获盗功，应并赏，即擢大理评事，喻执政与畿内大邑，以观其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207710_comment'></div>而用他事忤当涂，得知真州六合县，又左迁监荆南府酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207710_comment'></div>转运使赵鼎、提点刑狱事周尹争荐辟，各欲为己办事者，移监鄂州都作院，改承事郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207710_comment'></div>守朱寿昌数移疾，辄以郡政属君，而幕府熟君名，亦不以为嫌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207710_comment'></div>丁福昌忧，免丧，知庐州慎县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207710_comment'></div>江南俗喜讼，而慎多豪右，率以财陵其里人而屈之，少忤，则使其党殴藉，或擿其阴事于官，无不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207710_comment'></div>君发其尤无良者一人以徇，讫其去，无复以此至庭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207710_comment'></div>有吏犯赇，觉而当法轻，君绳之急，吏反贿民，往诬君以事于户部，君为不知者，而民词穷自归，君谕以诚，释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207710_comment'></div>巡检王轸嬖其亲卒，而御其下惨，众汹汹欲为乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207710_comment'></div>轸惧，求解其官去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207710_comment'></div>君曰：「我在，君无恐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207710_comment'></div>即召轸所嬖，惩之，而喻安其众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207710_comment'></div>众不敢动，轸用以全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207710_comment'></div>父老以谓：「自皇祐逮元丰，四十年才两令，前李处厚，后君也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207710_comment'></div>再知郓州阳谷县，政如慎而滋有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207710_comment'></div>民以小忿，夜与奴杀田客，狱未竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207710_comment'></div>会君暂出，其人赂吏求去奴绝口，因以奴病闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207710_comment'></div>君已知之，卫奴甚谨，计不得逞，卒伏辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207710_comment'></div>有杀其邻之子者，尉视之，类刀伤，而得斧尸旁，不可诘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207710_comment'></div>君独阴使人探其箦，得刀而藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207710_comment'></div>因语囚：「悉上汝家刀」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207710_comment'></div>囚数其状悉，而讳箦中者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207710_comment'></div>君出刀示之曰：「此谁物也而不数」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207710_comment'></div>即叩头请死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207710_comment'></div>转运使范锷每行部至境，辄反其旆，曰：「此故慎县才令，必刃有馀地也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207710_comment'></div>京东多盗，而阳谷接河朔，君劝民以衣食之本，盗为衰，囹圄屡空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207710_comment'></div>吏无所措其手，民相与谣曰：「吾邑有难遇事十，今令自为令一也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207710_comment'></div>盖历数其能，皆闻见所无者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207710_comment'></div>吏虽初不便，君既束君法，人人幸无过，久反自庆，以谓「令保我至此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207710_comment'></div>擢通判河中府，未行，一日会其昆弟族人，饮甚欢，将休，忽坐帷后，瞑不语，家人就呼之，逝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207710_comment'></div>享年五十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207710_comment'></div>历官宣义郎、宣德郎、右通直郎，勋武骑尉，服五品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207710_comment'></div>娶钱氏，丞相文僖公惟演之孙，而殿中丞晔之女，封乐寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207710_comment'></div>有淑德，善于舅姑，宜其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207710_comment'></div>二子：若，乡贡进士，彊记而文，能干其蛊者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207710_comment'></div>革，少卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207710_comment'></div>一女未娉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207710_comment'></div>将以某年月日，葬于任城县千秋乡千秋里，从朝议公之兆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207710_comment'></div>君忠信和裕，孝于亲，生事死葬无愧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207710_comment'></div>敬伯兄犹父，而鞠其嫠妹恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207710_comment'></div>为人风仪修整，书画妍楷，谈议翛然，晋王夷甫、卫叔宝之流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207710_comment'></div>至其居官有守，遇事刚果，所至人受其惠，则又人不可及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207710_comment'></div>好书，多所观览，而尤善《易》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207710_comment'></div>于文喜韩愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207710_comment'></div>尝道黄州，以所为诗赋贽眉山苏公，公叹息，为文美之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207710_comment'></div>上即位之初，上书言时事，大概欲久监司守令之任，考百司课，均坊市易，捐牧地租，略已施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207710_comment'></div>初，补之先君以文词德义、宽厚爱人有美名，州闾人慕学之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207710_comment'></div>舅以童稚从先君，先君固言舅少成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207710_comment'></div>矧补之壮长，闻见如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207710_comment'></div>惧不肖，述事不能白，矧曰敢以其昵私舅！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207710_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「言念君子，温其如玉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207710_comment'></div>桃李，人且犹蹊其下，如舅，玉也，不缫藉以奠诸庙而毁于椟中，是可以为求者惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207710_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_88_1207710'>天固不爱物，不然何以钟其美而与之，不为用以屈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207710_comment'></div>物固不自爱，不然何以轻吾宝而丧之，易所徇于外？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207710_comment'></div>爰有至理，是不自期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207710_comment'></div>繄厥所遭，孰知妍媸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207710_comment'></div>彼玉而美，而未始以为美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207710_comment'></div>珷玞佩尔，而玉亦不自谓其如桃李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207710_comment'></div>呜呼舅氏！</div><div id='poem_sentence_94_1207710_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　晁补之居官京师。作品：《题李称推官颐斋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_196513' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196513' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题李称推官颐斋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196513")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196513_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196513'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196513'>无舍灵龟观朵颐，自求口实君<span class='inlineComment2'>（涵本作心）</span>自知。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196513'>谁为此者君名之，其说不烦求我诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196513'>君家严君业夔伊，虎视眈眈雄四夷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196513'>四方是维天子毗，汶阳一室大泽陂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196513'>我往受业拜门垂，闻公一语洗然奇，我归瞠若安可追。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196513'>君才固是麒麟儿，幼读父书壮思施。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196513'>不卑小官乃吾师，况有内乐潜天倪。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196513'>荒城无人谁过之，面城筑室兹逶迤。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196513'>去年秋雨河股移，百草不生苔拥基。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196513'>蚁子缘础蚓粪泥，夜眠不稳忧为池。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196513'>今年闰早春气迟，墙根隙地稍可埤，初植防风种黄耆。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196513'>莱州石鼎青琉璃，地垆宿火风鸣枝，对君长语清未疲。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196513'>外轻内顺生理宜，问从何得聊我治<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：平。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196513'>眉州夫子言可规，麻田处士术安期，今之崇丘历九疑。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196513'>见人不语下臂驰，遁逃乎阴食蛤梨。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196513'>君何伧囊不往随，与访汗漫还无时。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196513_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196513'>还无时，我何适，北山之南南山北。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_196513_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='0626b5ec12794e35979bfbb4c8973375_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0626b5ec12794e35979bfbb4c8973375");'><span id='0626b5ec12794e35979bfbb4c8973375_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>，42岁</div><div id='0626b5ec12794e35979bfbb4c8973375' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之居官京师。作品：《和石明叔喜雪》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一八。此条活动地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《流民》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二0。此条活动地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_196188' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196188' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196188?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和石明叔喜雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1090年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196188")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196188'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196188'>解冻南风故未薰，六英先岁舞车尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196188'>尽消日观千岩雪，初破江梅一萼春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196188'>立召金闺通籍客，更呼花艳大堤人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196188'>使君日饮无功业，同乐何妨亦为民。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196188_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196188'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196188_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196058' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196058' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196058?labeling=true' target='_blank'>流民</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196058")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196058_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196058'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196058'>生涯不复旧桑田，瓦釜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_196058", 196058, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>荆篮</span>止道边。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196058'>日暮榆园拾青荚，可怜无数沈郎钱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196058_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196058'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196058_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='de2eeefe828f49f28ab5e9dbb394d525_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("de2eeefe828f49f28ab5e9dbb394d525");'><span id='de2eeefe828f49f28ab5e9dbb394d525_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，48岁</div><div id='de2eeefe828f49f28ab5e9dbb394d525' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　徽宗即位，向太后听政，晁补之得遇赦，以著作佐郎召还京师，七月启程北归，十月抵开封府界。作品：《玉溪归逢甥李相如汴中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_196262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196262' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196262?labeling=true' target='_blank'>玉溪归逢甥李相如汴中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196262")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196262_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196262'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196262'>蛮乡俟天形，畏蠚复惮暑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196262'>梦甥来万里，竹响风动宇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196262'>如今真似梦，相对别恨吐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196262'>平生窘执辔，白面力如虎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196262'>谁令斗指日，江使堕渔罟。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196262'>桃僵李为仆，遗佩满江渚。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196262'>常忧抱石死，无复脚踏土。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196262'>那知徼时愿，起废遇明主。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196262'>旷调已远迹，未用矜杜举。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196262'>但忧世议隘，亡弓不亡楚。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196262'>吾甥学孔子，况乃父母鲁。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196262'>如闻四门辟，未信溯洄沮。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196262'>上书闵魃旱，膏以神灵雨。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196262'>北海自有人，高丘岂无女。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196262'>尔壮观尔能，吾归固吾所。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196262'>期甥二儿上，馀子不足数。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196262'>何以喻吾心，酌此湘吴醑。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196262_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196262'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_196262_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='526ba31671054587994d86f6779b88ed_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("526ba31671054587994d86f6779b88ed");'><span id='526ba31671054587994d86f6779b88ed_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，48岁</div><div id='526ba31671054587994d86f6779b88ed' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　徽宗即位，晁补之以著作佐郎召还京师，十月，抵开封界。作品：《省曹梦游山示无斁》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_196046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>省曹梦游山示无斁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196046")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196046'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196046'>万里归来兄弟乐，百年多病井庐思。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196046'>如何骑马穿靴地，只梦登山著屐时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196046_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196046'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196046_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='8242de1c8f124a669e762e1409814cc5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8242de1c8f124a669e762e1409814cc5");'><span id='8242de1c8f124a669e762e1409814cc5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，48岁</div><div id='8242de1c8f124a669e762e1409814cc5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年10月</a>　十月，晁补之抵开封府界，上表辞官，诏不许。作品：《辞免著作佐郎状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_1207086' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207086' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207086?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免著作佐郎状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207086")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207086_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207086'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207086'>臣十月二十二日至开封府界，准都进奏院送到敕一道，伏蒙圣恩，特授臣依前朝奉郎，行秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207086_comment'></div>承命非据，踧踖以惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207086_comment'></div>恭惟陛下膺图之初，上奉天心，中考古道，旁询国论，下酌民言，其本在于正朝廷以正百官，而其极盖欲四方远近莫敢不一于正者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207086_comment'></div>大明至公，示以好恶，故陟降始序，畏慕立行，则越百工庶位，一事之虚，苟非其人，安得在此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207086_comment'></div>而臣才薄名晦，方时起废，皆国之良，顾臣何人，流落之馀，亦误收录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207086_comment'></div>碎首糜躯，无以报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207086_comment'></div>伏念臣顷当先朝初政之际，已预诸生三馆之游，今所除官，亦臣旧职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207086_comment'></div>况千载一时，人思自效，虽臣器小用近，犹知欣喜激昂，不应僭渎，妄有辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207086_comment'></div>第昨坐谴斥，无他指名，祇缘非才，窃处清贯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207086_comment'></div>加以素寡学问，忧虞积年，凌杂米盐，益加荒陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207086_comment'></div>岂可复尔滥迹书林，不怀梁鹈濡翼之羞，以重泽麋蒙皮之诮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207086_comment'></div>又臣飘零寒窭，私计百为，实难黾勉遽处京局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207086_comment'></div>伏望圣慈俯察蝼蚁悃款之情，特寝成命，且令臣赴河南府新任，或赐别除京东沿流一合入差遣，誓殚驽蹇，仰答生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207086_comment'></div>见迤逦赴阙，听候指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207086_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣无任惶惧陨越之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207086_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4978df7a5808461388b9a55fb27cff30_label'><a href='javascript:
