class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五二。此条时间不详。）</span><div id='poem_1207265' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207265' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207265?labeling=true' target='_blank'>续岁时杂咏序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207265")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207265_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207265'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207265'>宋氏自宣献公益大，德行文章语世族者，必先之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207265_comment'></div>家故藏书，其多与四库等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207265_comment'></div>而宣献公之子、常山公次道，能世宣献公之学，好书滋不倦，博闻彊志，为时显人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207265_comment'></div>与客语，亹亹下上数千载间，在其齿牙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207265_comment'></div>补之为儿时，诸老先生为补之道宋氏如此，而补之生世晚，去宣献公远，重以不及拜常山公，私自记欲尽得宋氏之书而观之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207265_comment'></div>元丰六年六月，遇毕公叔于京师，公叔言宋氏藏诗曰《岁时杂咏》者，盖宣献公所集唐以前诗人之作，髣髴具在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207265_comment'></div>公叔曰：「夫天地变化，其情至微，有不可道以辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207265_comment'></div>四时之间，气候物色，俯仰辄异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207265_comment'></div>使一人言之，虽其巧如簧，恐不得与造物者争功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207265_comment'></div>于是杂众言而观之，不亦可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207265_comment'></div>宋氏故多贤，而宣献公之孙曰刚叔，尤笃志于学，不愧其先人，又尝集宋诗人之所为，为《续岁时杂咏》，以成其祖之意，盖若干篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207265_comment'></div>且诗之作，患言不能称物者，以得之偏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207265_comment'></div>尝试丹青众言，凭几肆目于方尺之间，而四时气候物色惨舒荣槁，所以过乎吾前者，每观每异，其致亦足乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207265_comment'></div>因以其集属补之为序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207265_comment'></div>补之复于公叔曰：「诗之亡久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207265_comment'></div>豳诗《七月》，其记日月星辰、风雨霜露、草木鸟兽之事盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207265_comment'></div>屈原、宋玉为《离骚》，最近于诗，而所以托物引类，其感在四时，可以慷慨而太息，想见其忠洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207265_comment'></div>刚叔于宋诗所取若此，其亦有得于昔人之意乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207265_comment'></div>宋有天下百年，而诗之作中间尤盛，盖刚叔之所取小大咸备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207265_comment'></div>今观其录，一时显人用是名世，其尤宏杰者，虽以旁礴天地、呼吸阴阳，而成岁功可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207265_comment'></div>其下者亦因所长而传，犹之一气候至生者皆作，灼然而华，嘤然而鸣，以谓天地之巧尽此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207265_comment'></div>补之方求为太原官，闻其俗俭陋，无登览燕语之乐，将因公叔，尽传刚叔之所藏者以行，而忘吾忧也，故喜为刚叔序之<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207265_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1207265'>四库：光本、涵本作「西库」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207265_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207265'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207265_0'>⑴ 《鸡肋集》卷三四。又见《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷一六一，《四续古文奇赏》卷二二，《八代四六文钞》第三一册，《宋元学案补遗》卷六。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1207265_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207165?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答常瑰秀才书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207165")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207165'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207165'>补之顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207165_comment'></div>补之虽未获与足下游，前者辱书，俾撰次先公行事，见足下文词志意与今学校举子所趋绝异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207165_comment'></div>又爱足下诚孝，恻怛于其亲，凡可以尽力者无不勉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207165_comment'></div>知足下学问根本从古人中来，非黄而泽以欺暗取售者必也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207165_comment'></div>因念涉世已来，粗守所知，虽困不改，故相得于形骸之外者寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207165_comment'></div>幸而获一人焉，其贤未必足下比，然已如旷数十百年而逢不可致之宝，其自喜悦难喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207165_comment'></div>故不度量其力之所不堪，而迎受足下至重之托，然足下不妄以托人，而补之妄受之，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207165_comment'></div>再蒙惠书，足下胸中所怀，自为泾渭，而未尝以语人者，不俟相际而辄以语之，又以知足下与人交久必信，引物连类，深而明，远而当，以意逆志，不合者盖鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207165_comment'></div>足下识高妙，所择于道者，正为门庭甚严，然气和而语温，盖思而不贰，近小雅之流也，甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207165_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「未见君子，忧心惙惙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207165_comment'></div>亦既见止，亦既觏止，我心则悦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207165_comment'></div>何当一俉，无任乡往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207165_comment'></div>补之再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　春，晁补之授尚书礼部员外郎、哲宗实录院检讨官，晁补之辞谢。作品：《辞免实录检讨官状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_1207087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免实录检讨官状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207087")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207087'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207087'>臣今月十八日准閤门告报，奉敕除臣尚书礼部员外郎，充哲宗皇帝实录检讨官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207087_comment'></div>闻命踧踖，不知所裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207087_comment'></div>恭以先朝大典，千载之传，岂臣浅陋，可备纂述？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207087_comment'></div>伏望圣慈特锡寝罢，所有敕命，臣未敢祗受。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年3月</a>　三月，晁补之求外任，仍不许。作品：《足疾乞外任状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_1207088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>足疾乞外任状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207088")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207088'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207088'>右，臣被蒙器使，两更郎曹，未有秋毫可图报称，而臣旧苦脚气，春夏加剧，深惧职事或致旷阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207088_comment'></div>伏望圣慈察臣诚恳，特赐除一外任合入差遣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1207088_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年4月</a>　四月，晁补之复改神宗国史编修官，晁补之再三辞谢。作品：《辞免国史编修官状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五三。）</span>《再辞国史编修官状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五三。）</span>《再辞免国史编修官状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_1207089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免国史编修官状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207089")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207089'>右，臣四月四日准閤门告报，奉敕除臣神宗皇帝国史编修官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207089_comment'></div>选抡误及，跼蹐难胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207089_comment'></div>恭惟神宗皇帝盛德大业，光映百王，将欲发挥润色，传诸千载，必得名儒硕学，参备讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207089_comment'></div>而臣才识卑冗，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1207089", 1207089, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>词技</span>浅薄，使预笔削，诚非所宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207089_comment'></div>兼臣先以疾病，奏乞外任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207089_comment'></div>伏望圣慈特赐寝罢成命，除臣一外任差遣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207089_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207090?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再辞国史编修官状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207090")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207090_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207090'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207090'>右，臣昨奏，乞寝罢国史编修官，除一外任差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207090_comment'></div>寻准尚书省劄子，奉圣旨不许辞免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207090_comment'></div>臣以位卑人微，不敢于浃日之间，屡渎天听，黾勉就职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207090_comment'></div>载惟神宗皇帝稽古制作，跨唐轶汉，形容钜美，史臣司之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207090_comment'></div>如臣自视，恐殚竭不足以塞责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207090_comment'></div>昔倪宽有言，使群臣得人自尽，终莫能成，惟天子建中和之极，金声而玉振之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207090_comment'></div>况今陛下并建群才，可试者众，臣诚何人，敢独昧冒！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207090_comment'></div>伏望圣慈特赐指挥，检会前奏施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207090_comment'></div>臣无任惶惧陨越待罪之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207090_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207091' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207091' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207091?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再辞免国史编修官状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207091")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207091_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207091'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207091'>右，臣先于三月中以疾奏乞外任，继蒙圣恩，自实录检讨官除国史编修官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207091_comment'></div>臣闻命跼蹐，不遑宁处，既具奏，乞赐寝罢成命，检会前奏施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207091_comment'></div>寻准尚书省劄子，奉圣旨不许辞免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207091_comment'></div>臣惧久稽敕命，黾勉就职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207091_comment'></div>然夙夜恐惧，终不敢安，遂再曾具奏，亦是乞赐检会前奏，除一外任差遣，未蒙指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207091_comment'></div>恭以神宗皇帝国史䌷绎岁久，未奏成书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207091_comment'></div>圣谟王制，天高海阔，方兹分命诸儒，参稽全美，岂可以臣浅知猥预其间？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207091_comment'></div>加有负薪之忧，犬马力殚，踌躇难彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207091_comment'></div>若臣不揣分量，苟贪荣选，芜累信史，辜奉明恩，则异时虽填委沟壑，何以塞责？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207091_comment'></div>伏望圣慈矜闵臣下才无堪，早赐检会累奏，除一外任差遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207091_comment'></div>臣不胜陨越待命激切之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207091_comment'></div>谨录奏闻，伏候敕旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207091_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　春，晁补之授尚书礼部员外郎、哲宗实录院检讨官。作品：《哲宗实录开院谢赐银绢表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span>《哲宗实录开院谢赐笔砚纸墨表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span>《代范祖禹等实录开院谢赐物表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span><div id='poem_1207123' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207123' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207123?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哲宗实录开院谢赐银绢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207123")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207123_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207123'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207123'>臣等伏蒙圣慈，特降中使，赐臣等银绢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207123_comment'></div>属辞比事，将为千载之传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207123_comment'></div>抱椠怀铅，未有一毫之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207123_comment'></div>宠先临于使指，恩已逮于匪颁<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207123_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下受禄于天，修身以道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207123_comment'></div>因心笃庆，本王季之事兄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207123_comment'></div>弥性似先，乃成王之为子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207123_comment'></div>稽哲宗之政理，亶神考之规摹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207123_comment'></div>云汉在天，丹青莫像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207123_comment'></div>是用饰兹典领，共俾讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207123_comment'></div>曾微草创之勤，遽忝币馀之锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207123_comment'></div>简编充宇，蠡测海以安能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207123_comment'></div>岁月累功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207123_comment'></div>蒉成山而傥可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207123_comment'></div>誓殚绵力，仰赞成书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207123_comment'></div>臣等无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207123_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207123'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五四。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷三九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207123_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哲宗实录开院谢赐笔砚纸墨表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207124")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207124_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207124'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207124'>臣等伏蒙圣慈，特降中使，赐臣等笔砚纸墨者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207124_comment'></div>䌷绎信书，辟官曹而伊始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207124_comment'></div>询谋故事，给笔札以为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207124_comment'></div>枉异数之曲加，抚寸长而安有<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207124_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下挺生圣质，丕变人文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207124_comment'></div>维先朝迪哲之光，有继序遹求之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207124_comment'></div>森然断简，岂徒副在有司；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207124_comment'></div>灿若列星，乃可传诸无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207124_comment'></div>而臣等职司典领，参备纂修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207124_comment'></div>甫窥东观之藏，遽忝上方之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207124_comment'></div>精毫良楮，坚石黳煤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207124_comment'></div>食浮已愧于事先，器利尤惭于匠拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207124_comment'></div>迁、固特称乎良史，盖以覈详；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207124_comment'></div>荀、袁但谨于编年，庶无疏抵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207124_comment'></div>誓当殚竭，以荅宠私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207124_comment'></div>臣等无任。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207124_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　七月，苏轼卒于常州，晁补之悲恸至深，为文悼之。作品：《祭端明苏公文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span><div id='poem_1207742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭端明苏公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207742")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207742'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207742'>维年月日，门人具位晁补之谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故端明尚书苏公先生之灵曰：孔子在位，狱讼文词，可与人同，不独有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207742_comment'></div>至所罕言，所不可闻，曰天道性，与利命仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207742_comment'></div>莫大匪天，莫难匪利，若性命仁，皆深远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207742_comment'></div>夫惟道大，则知者希，有所卓尔，回犹病之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207742_comment'></div>天下纷纷，皆以利往，吾岂难之，利不可长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207742_comment'></div>凡是五者，皆微不传，譬彼为国，鱼不脱渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207742_comment'></div>虽微不传，然见其绪，千载一人，尚如旦暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207742_comment'></div>秦汉而还，轻失此学，徒既其文，谓为广博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207742_comment'></div>圣言所罕，与不可闻，初莫之闻，矧寻厥根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207742_comment'></div>匪根之出，其华易悴，易悴之华，惟文士愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207742_comment'></div>马迁韩愈，好古而奇，六家《原道》，顾未知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207742_comment'></div>今其所作，匪道惟词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207742_comment'></div>后生如簧，谈天与利，饰性命仁，以之贾世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207742_comment'></div>笃生苏公，干橹圣门，跆韩躏马，匪以其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207742_comment'></div>知孔子圣，文莫犹人，若大且难，以藏厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207742_comment'></div>世无孔子，孰明其至？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207742_comment'></div>更百斯年，曰此文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207742_comment'></div>岂不炳蔚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207742_comment'></div>铿轰似之，至反说约，窢然过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207742_comment'></div>何以实斯，粤有自来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207742_comment'></div>驰骋千古，经营九垓，破百家往，躐阜踰堆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207742_comment'></div>朅其山立，送者自崖，曰此勤矣，乃人之开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207742_comment'></div>反而湛思，道不在远，罕言不闻，一以是贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207742_comment'></div>宅道之奥，𦕈其独存，有不得已，文乃其藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207742_comment'></div>固尝自谓，吾言如水，行所可行，止其当止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207742_comment'></div>此但言语，聊以为嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207742_comment'></div>惟昔人贤，事业若斯，遭时有用，从本出之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207742_comment'></div>诚身有道，忠乃孝移，如麟如凤，胡可伪为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207742_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207742_comment'></div>既曰仁贤，宜贵宜寿，亦贵寿矣，于德不究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207742_comment'></div>间关岭海，九死来归，何嗟及矣，梁木其摧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207742_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207742_comment'></div>补之童冠，拜公钱塘，见谓可教，剔垢求光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207742_comment'></div>顾惟冥顽，汔未闻道，愧负公语，以无成老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207742_comment'></div>穷秋讣至，沉痛刳肠，扁舟东泛，道哭公丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207742_comment'></div>作此鄙词，惟公所喜，伸哀一恸，绝弦自此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207742_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207742_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a8f6025c3bf740be8099250c85e295e1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a8f6025c3bf740be8099250c85e295e1");'><span id='a8f6025c3bf740be8099250c85e295e1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，49岁</div><div id='a8f6025c3bf740be8099250c85e295e1' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之居官京师。作品：《绿头鸭•韩师朴相公会上》（新秋近）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页九三。）</span>《上林春•韩相生日》（天惜中秋）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页九六。）</span>《行香子•赠轻盈》（柳态纤柔）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页九八。）</span>《紫玉箫•过尧民金部四叔位见韩相家姬轻盈所留题》（罗绮丛中）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页九八。）</span>《江城子•赠次膺叔家娉婷》（娉婷闻道似轻盈）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页一0五。）</span><div id='poem_196666' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196666' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196666?labeling=true' target='_blank'>绿头鸭/多丽 韩师朴相公会上观佳妓轻盈弹琵琶</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196666")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196666_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196666'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196666'>新秋近，晋公别馆开筵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196666'>喜清时、衔杯乐圣，未饶绿野堂边。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196666'>绣屏深、丽人乍出，坐中雷雨起鹍弦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196666'>花暖间关，冰凝幽咽，宝钗摇动坠金钿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196666'>未弹了、昭君遗怨，四坐已凄然。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196666'>西风里、香街驻马，嬉笑微传。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196666'>算从来、司空惯，断肠初对<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_196666", 196666, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>云鬟</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196666'>夜将阑、井梧下叶，砌蛩收响悄林蝉。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196666'>赖得多愁，浔阳司马，当时不在绮筵前。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196666'>竞叹赏、檀槽倚困，沈醉到觥船。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196666'>芳春调、红英翠萼，重变新妍。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_196666_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196547' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196547' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196547?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上林春/一络索 韩相生日</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_196547'>天惜中秋，三夜淡云，占得今宵明月。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196547'>孟陬岁好，金风气爽，清时挺生贤哲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196547'>相门出相，算钟庆、自应累叶。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196547'>乍归来，暂燕处，共仰赤松高辙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196547'>想人生、会须自悦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196547'>浮云事，笑里尊前休说。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196547'>旧有衮衣，公归未晚，千岁盛明时节。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196547'>命圭相印，看重赏、晋公勋业。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196547_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196547'>济生灵，共富寿，海山天阔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_196547_comment'></div></div></div><div class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196596")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196596_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196596'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196596'>柳态纤柔，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_196596", 196596, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>雪艳</span>疏明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196596'>比潇洒处，犹难称，此嘉名。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196596_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196596'>花前烛下，微嚬浅笑，要题诗、盏畔低声。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196596'>司空自惯，狂眼须惊。<div id='poem_474689' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_474689' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/474689?labeling=true' target='_blank'>紫玉箫 过尧民金部四叔位见韩相家姬轻盈所留题</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_474689'>罗绮围中，笙歌丛里，眼狂初认轻盈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_474689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_474689'>无花解比，似一钩新月，云际初生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_474689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_474689'>算不虚得，郎占与、第一佳名。<div id='poem_sentence_2_474689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_474689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_474689'>谁教慕宋，要题诗、曾倚宝柱低声。<div id='poem_sentence_5_474689_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_474689_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196589' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196589' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196589?labeling=true' "poem_title_196589")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196589_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196589'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196674_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196674'>惜春长似，五陵狂俊，不道朱颜老。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196674_comment'></div></div><br /><div -----title
泰安（奉符）
-----detail

-----title
大名（元城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='178e31a61785448a9d2826cab9f3ea8c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("178e31a61785448a9d2826cab9f3ea8c");'><span id='178e31a61785448a9d2826cab9f3ea8c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1082')">1081-1082年</a>，29-30岁</div><div id='178e31a61785448a9d2826cab9f3ea8c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年</a>　晁补之任北京国子监教授。作品：《博山高唐县学记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷二九。）</span>《进士杜君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六八。）</span><div id='poem_1207608' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207608' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207608?labeling=true' target='_blank'>博州高唐县学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207608")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207608_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207608'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207608'>始余读《史记》，至西门大夫治邺，投巫妪三老，禁为河伯取妇，喟然叹曰：「贤哉，西门大夫」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207608_comment'></div>稍行四方，见今为县令者论罪人适榜箠耳，亦具狱乃决，佐史自旁持之，至上下顾，莫敢谁何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207608_comment'></div>于是益太息，知豹为不可能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207608_comment'></div>其后读律令，见所以绳吏者甚具，更悟曰：「法如是耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207608_comment'></div>晚得高唐令王君圣涂而异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207608_comment'></div>圣涂为高唐，非能外律令用其意也，而独规矩抢攘之中，从容以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207608_comment'></div>夫使骐骥得原野，则势便利；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207608_comment'></div>至里门曲艰，六辔不乱，而所投无差，难矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207608_comment'></div>高唐民贫，圣涂惟不夺其时，民以富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207608_comment'></div>县有孔子庙，岁久，坏弗治，学者莫至，风雨，草生之，可罗雀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207608_comment'></div>圣涂曰：「我岂得勿忧，猥自安，曰非不能或不可，姑以俟后人而已哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207608_comment'></div>举而新之，鸠材庀工，人罔告劳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207608_comment'></div>又教其邑中君子小人以学道之美，武城弦歌，达于四境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207608_comment'></div>余闻而喜曰：「非有为则难，以莫之敢为而为之则难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207608_comment'></div>古者其美是人也，嗟叹之，永歌之，亦使睦者歌吾子可也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207608_comment'></div>故为诗以遗其邑人，俾不忘王君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207608_comment'></div>曰：「高唐之学兮，王君之作兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207608_comment'></div>王君去我，谁吾与觉兮！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207608_comment'></div>谁使此微兮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207608_comment'></div>而举则希兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207608_comment'></div>王君去我，谁吾与归兮」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207608_comment'></div>元丰四年七月丙戌学成，十一月戊子颍川晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207608_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207707' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207707' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207707?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进士杜君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰四年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1081年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207707")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207707_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207707'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207707'>宽伯姓杜氏，讳钦卨，濮州鄄城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207707_comment'></div>杜氏固多贤，而宽伯之高祖某官讳某，曾祖某官讳某，祖某官讳某，皆以文学政事显于时，杜氏始大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207707_comment'></div>而今为宣德郎、详定官制所检讨官曰纯，乡人尤以为贤而师之者，实生宽伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207707_comment'></div>宽伯为人颀然而长，质直且愿，人以为称其家儿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207707_comment'></div>补之十馀岁时，先君为补之言：「宣德君，君子也，若人乃可事之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207707_comment'></div>及补之长，为补之求配，以为莫良杜氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207707_comment'></div>而补之所与奉先君祭祀者，实于宽伯为第二姊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207707_comment'></div>宽伯与补之游七年，饮食起居不见其有过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207707_comment'></div>读书能知其意，为言语皆质直，事亲竭力，不薄于其所厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207707_comment'></div>与兄弟族人处，窃窃然爱不能舍也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207707_comment'></div>元丰四年五月八日不幸感疾以夭，年十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207707_comment'></div>娶阎氏，无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207707_comment'></div>卜以十月某日葬于开封府祥符县某村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207707_comment'></div>初，宽伯疾亟，补之入视，挽补之衣泣曰：「恨不与吾姊别」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207707_comment'></div>补之悲之，宽伯孝弟人也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207707_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1207707'>生而不寿无男子，生莫毒斯，而宽伯罹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207707_comment'></div>求其所以至此极者，不知其为谁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207707_comment'></div>呜呼已而！</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207707_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1081&endYear=1081')">1081年8月</a>　八月，晁补之二姊晁静暴疾卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　晁补之任北京国子监教授。作品：《直舍即事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷七。）</span>《跋林逋荐士书后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span><div id='poem_196404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196404?labeling=true' target='_blank'>直舍即事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196404")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196404'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196404'>秋云多重阴，凌旦亦可乐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196404'>虚斋坐亭午，寒雨依高阁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196404'>王官有忧责，霖潦河未落。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196404'>孝先但欲眠，不奈弟子谑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196404'>黄花迫晚景，白露下丛薄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196404'>独当慰佳节，得酒自斟酌。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196404_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196404'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_196404_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207289' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207289' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207289?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋林逋荐士书后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207289")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207289_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207289'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207289'>余尝出钱唐门，遵湖放北山，一径趋崦，委曲深远，菱荇鱼鸟可乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207289_comment'></div>过林君居，拜墓下，尘埃榛莽，山风萧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207289_comment'></div>至竹阁，读其栋间诗，徘徊彷徨，有羡慕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207289_comment'></div>吾师疾固，见耦而耕者曰：「不可与同群」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207289_comment'></div>至点，鼓瑟希，则喟然叹曰：「吾与点」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207289_comment'></div>士亦要志之所向，仕不仕何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207289_comment'></div>林君遭太平可以仕，岂其天情自疏，莫可尸祝，不在枯槁伏藏也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207289_comment'></div>其推挽后来，欲其闻达，则反复致志，如恐不及，贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207289_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「皎皎白驹，在彼空谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207289_comment'></div>生刍一束，其人如玉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207289_comment'></div>安得林君者而从之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207289_comment'></div>元丰五年七月十四日，晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207289_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　晁补之任北京国子监教授，六月黄河决口于内黄。作品：《黄河》<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　晁补之仍任北京国子监教授。作品：《赠王推官允中》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷六。）</span>《清平县新修孔子庙记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_515698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠王推官允中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_515698")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_515698_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515698'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515698'>我生譬天星，睍睆但空誉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515698'>学经羞轮扁，常恐老窜句。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515698'>南游上会稽，弱冠肆远步。<div id='poem_sentence_2_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_515698'>便当期汗漫，如鸟铩修羽。<div id='poem_sentence_3_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_515698'>入宫又独晚，谣诼遭众嫭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_515698'>坐令平生交，室冷毡不具。<div id='poem_sentence_5_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_515698'>君公墙东客，清鉴美无度。<div id='poem_sentence_6_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_515698'>风期山水意，千载见此遇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_515698'>定疑丹青仙，方我以痴顾。<div id='poem_sentence_8_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_515698'>岂繄才自疏，阅世真异趣。<div id='poem_sentence_9_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_515698'>伐柯理无远，要以一马喻。<div id='poem_sentence_10_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_515698'>古人本不死，方寸有佳处。<div id='poem_sentence_11_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_515698'>三年禹河曲，日见车马渡。<div id='poem_sentence_12_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_515698'>何知谢剥啄，黄土衣易污。<div id='poem_sentence_13_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_515698'>无人尚有子，独载城下路。<div id='poem_sentence_14_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_515698'>功名喧口实，簪组托肺腑。<div id='poem_sentence_15_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_515698'>请看瓶罂满，取踬病不去。<div id='poem_sentence_16_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_515698'>脱黏窥本初，须子遗所寓。<div id='poem_sentence_17_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_515698'>怵迫倦东西，林间尚宽裕。<div id='poem_sentence_18_515698_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_515698'></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_515698_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207610' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207610' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207610?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清平县新修孔子庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207610")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207610_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207610'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207610'>群有司所治异事，而事之在县者十九，以其十一用心乎治之本，则力不给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207610_comment'></div>故虽有庠序教化，亦十九不举；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207610_comment'></div>一有举焉，令之才足以任事可知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207610_comment'></div>魏为天子北都，而清平为畿县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207610_comment'></div>并河水数至，自庆历逮治平，县再徙，不复立孔子祠，为屋居神，民往来犹原上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207610_comment'></div>令始至，吏导之拜屋下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207610_comment'></div>岁春秋释奠，为次草间，吏曰即次，乃即次；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207610_comment'></div>曰行事，乃行事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207610_comment'></div>曰礼毕，乃礼毕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207610_comment'></div>俛默而出，不复省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207610_comment'></div>或告曰：「此宜省」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207610_comment'></div>则嚬蹙曰：「吾有公事，不暇也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207610_comment'></div>若是者有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207610_comment'></div>至风雨屋坏不支，县之民为士者滋少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207610_comment'></div>令钱侯之来，恻然悲出涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207610_comment'></div>徘回彷徨，顾相其地，得旧材瓦甓在官者几具，始复兴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207610_comment'></div>人欢然从，不劝而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207610_comment'></div>有堂，有筵，两庑四墉，饎爨有所，若祭器咸在，而人不病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207610_comment'></div>斯已才矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207610_comment'></div>夫儒术之于成民，欲久于其道则为功缓，故急于人知者忽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207610_comment'></div>钱侯不以人之所急者为先，而急于人之所缓，则其贤又可知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207610_comment'></div>由是询诸邑人，其大者既举，其细者有不治，余不信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207610_comment'></div>钱侯名唐卿，字元辅，余王姑之子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207610_comment'></div>元丰六年二月乙丑，北京国子监教授晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207610_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　晁补之仍任北京国子监教授，吴雍荐于朝廷，作文谢之。作品：《谢龙图吴雍荐论启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五七。）</span><div id='poem_1207195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢龙图吴雍荐论启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207195")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207195'>陈编窥窃，何补诸生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207195_comment'></div>华衮褒荣，敢烦一字！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207195_comment'></div>误蒙代匮，祗剧厚颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207195_comment'></div>补之禀生既愚，闻道亦浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207195_comment'></div>少日狂狷，颇复激昂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207195_comment'></div>长年艰难，稍亦咎悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207195_comment'></div>不幸先子，蚤弃诸孤，居然为贫，初此求仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207195_comment'></div>卖刀买犊，行藏独可以自期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207195_comment'></div>观颐舍龟，失得不足以相补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207195_comment'></div>朅来泮水，三易岁华，无他时捧檄之劳，有平居肄业之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207195_comment'></div>譬彼倦鸟，聊复投林，坐令摧颓，滋用迂阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207195_comment'></div>风雨子桑之席，促轸屋穿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207195_comment'></div>蓬蒿仲蔚之园，披书案朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207195_comment'></div>间偶好事，惠然晤谈，务闲偷安，考满当去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207195_comment'></div>岂图过听，乃此误加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207195_comment'></div>谓凫足非长，而鸡肋可惜，收置门馆，论诸朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207195_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官高才得君，强恕待物，统绥一道，刺举百城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207195_comment'></div>如般之运斧斤，曾微拥肿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207195_comment'></div>若良之操辔策，安有疲驽？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207195_comment'></div>曲怜孤生，为借馀润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207195_comment'></div>昔张安世不乐私谢，而李习之尝赋感知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207195_comment'></div>趣非不同，义各有处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207195_comment'></div>更愿宽其不及，须以后来，岂无毫氂，可卜报效？</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207195_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　晁补之仍任北京国子监教授。作品：《文安郡君陈氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六四。）</span>《通直郎充德清军使兼知澶州清丰县魏君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六五。）</span><div id='poem_1207670' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207670' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207670?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文安郡君陈氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰六年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207670")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207670_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207670'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207670'>太中大夫、权判北京留司御史台韩公璹之夫人陈氏，泉州晋江县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207670_comment'></div>三司户部副使、尚书兵部员外郎、赠兵部尚书讳诂之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207670_comment'></div>夫人幼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1207670", 1207670, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>警惠</span>，尝阅白居易诗，一过能诵，其兄汝奭异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207670_comment'></div>韩公未冠，举进士，有声，尚书曰：「吾女宜归斯人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207670_comment'></div>乃妻韩公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207670_comment'></div>丞相申国吕公当朝，夫人母家隆盛，岁时集会，内外命妇十数环坐，绮纨晔然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207670_comment'></div>夫人以儒者妻，在末座，衣无缋绣，语言容止不矜慕，一座皆耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207670_comment'></div>舅苦风痹，侍疾，忧见于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207670_comment'></div>居舅丧，尽礼焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207670_comment'></div>韩公以材遇主，仕寖显，再封夫人颍川、仁寿二县君，闺门雍穆，福禄美矣，而不幸感疾卒，熙宁元年二月十八日也，享年五十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207670_comment'></div>初，夫人未笄，尝事僧伽像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207670_comment'></div>尝病剧，像见梦曰：「无苦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207670_comment'></div>既而遂瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207670_comment'></div>晚尤燕静，将没，无戚容，曰：「生必有终也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207670_comment'></div>韩公后贵为右谏议大夫，追封夫人颍川郡君，又追封文安郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207670_comment'></div>以元丰六年八月甲申，葬于卫州汲县招贤乡之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207670_comment'></div>七男子：祗祖，奉议郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207670_comment'></div>祗师，宣德郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207670_comment'></div>祗严，瀛洲推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207670_comment'></div>祗德，奉议郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207670_comment'></div>祗勤，镇东军推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207670_comment'></div>祗言、祗谏，承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207670_comment'></div>皆有才技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207670_comment'></div>诸孙男女三十七人，盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207670_comment'></div>补之少贫贱，韩公辱知之，又与夫人诸子游，属补之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207670_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1207670'>猗嗟夫人，女德少成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207670_comment'></div>十岁锵锵，见异其兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207670_comment'></div>匪惟其兄，父曰实难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207670_comment'></div>卜所宜嫔，乃从于韩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207670_comment'></div>于韩斯令，舅曰孝我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207670_comment'></div>夫曰匪予，予妻助我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207670_comment'></div>燕及其子，以惠宗人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207670_comment'></div>曰夫人慈，于我有恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207670_comment'></div>凡民有生，莫爱惟死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207670_comment'></div>死能不忧，男子之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207670_comment'></div>我为此诗，质于幽宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207670_comment'></div>恶乎大之，有昭管彤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207670_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207679' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207679' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207679?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通直郎充德清军使兼知澶州清丰县事魏君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（元丰六年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207679")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207679_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207679'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207679'>余顷为澶州司户参军，以事至德清，过军使魏君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207679_comment'></div>相与语甚欢，饮辄醉不能起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207679_comment'></div>方午，吏抱牍趋庑，闭户去，庭中虚无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207679_comment'></div>风至，叶翻然堕，有鸟集其庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207679_comment'></div>旁睨其几案，文字秩秩，私太息以为能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207679_comment'></div>后予教授北京国子监，去德清不远，书数至余，知其于余厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207679_comment'></div>居无何，君感疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207679_comment'></div>其孤深状君之行事来告曰：「将葬，无以铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207679_comment'></div>为之出涕，叙其语归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207679_comment'></div>君讳通，字择之，族魏氏，世家平原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207679_comment'></div>曾祖象，祖超，考可法，皆不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207679_comment'></div>君生五岁能诵书，日数千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207679_comment'></div>十四岁以《尚书》中第，为寿州寿春、沧州清池、石州离石尉，广安军、恩州判官，擢大理丞、知武强县，迁太子中舍，充德清军使兼知清丰县，改通直郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207679_comment'></div>盖初以阶易官也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207679_comment'></div>其佐寿春，能察盗，盗不敢肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207679_comment'></div>得盗当赏，不自列，人以为廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207679_comment'></div>其在广安，门卒杀犯关者，或当之死，独争宜不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207679_comment'></div>比闻于朝，果不死，人以为平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207679_comment'></div>于清池、离石如寿春，于恩州如广安，而滋有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207679_comment'></div>尝忤使者意，使者督过之，君不屈，乃更知君，人以为直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207679_comment'></div>其在武强、德清，号难治，独从容不迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207679_comment'></div>其治长于发奸而爱平民，故民乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207679_comment'></div>当路者以为才，数言于上，且显矣，而君卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207679_comment'></div>元丰五年十二月二日也，享年五十有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207679_comment'></div>其为人短小鸢肩，面黧黑，目视有光，眉间骨隐起，异于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207679_comment'></div>喜宾客，稍有，则以买田赒族人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207679_comment'></div>娶刘氏，平原县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207679_comment'></div>七男子：泳、洙、深，四蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207679_comment'></div>深以君卒之明年八月壬申，葬于安德县击壤乡之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207679_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1207679'>十五入官，五十而死，能乎如彼施如此，墓门有石尉其子。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1207679_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='acbc63aeaada478ea9b3dd0fc8068d1a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("acbc63aeaada478ea9b3dd0fc8068d1a");'><span id='acbc63aeaada478ea9b3dd0fc8068d1a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1084')">1083-1084年</a>，31-32岁</div><div id='acbc63aeaada478ea9b3dd0fc8068d1a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1083&endYear=1083')">1083年</a>　夏，晁补之因吴雍荐，赴京师，未获改官而返。作品：《和关彦远秋风吹我衣》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_196393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196393' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196393?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和关彦远秋风吹我衣</a><span class='authorDate'>（1083年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196393")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196393_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196393'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196393'>海中群鱼化黄雀，林乌移巢避岁恶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196393'>邺王城上秋风惊，昔时城中邺王第，只今蔓草无人行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196393'>但见黄河咆哮奔碣石，秋风吹滩起<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_196393", 196393, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>沙砾</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196393'>翩翩动衣裳，游子悲故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196393'>忽忆若耶溪头，采薪郑巨君。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196393'>南风溪头晓，北风溪头昏。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196393'>一行作吏，此事便废。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196393'>梦中叶落，觉有归意。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196393'>归欤归欤，吾党成斐然。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196393'>君今生二毛，我亦非少年。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196393'>胡为车如鸡栖邺城里，朝风吹马鬃，暮风吹马尾。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196393'>与人三岁居，如何连屋似千里。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196393'>我则不狂，曾谓吾狂。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196393'>不吾知，亦何伤，安能户三尺喙家一吭。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196393'>人亦有言，人各有志。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196393'>吞若云梦者八九，长剑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_196393", 196393, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>耿介</span>倚天外。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196393'>有如陈仲举，庭宇亦不治。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196393'>吾乃今知贵不若贱无忧，富不若贫无求。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196393'>负日之燠吾重裘，芹子之饫吾食牛。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196393'>心战故臞，得道故肥。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196393'>吾封侯，匹夫怀璧将谁尤。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196393'>归欤归欤，岂无扬雄宅一区。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196393'>舍前青山木扶疏，舍后流水有菰蒲。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196393'>今我不乐日月除，尺则不足寸有馀。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196393_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196393'>七十二钻莫能免豫且，无所可用乃有百岁樗，龚生竟夭天年非吾徒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_196393_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>　晁补之仍为北京国子监教授。作品：《送北京曹慈明秀才之京师》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷十三。）</span>《送刘景文两浙西路都监》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷十三。）</span>《和胡戢七首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二0。）</span>《冠县新修学记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷二九。）</span>《石远叔集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三四。）</span>《北京国子监奉诏封孟荀扬韩告先圣文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六十。）</span>《告六叔父寺丞文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六十。）</span>《北京措置李宣德文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六十。）</span>《除夕祭北京教授廨土地神文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六十。）</span><div id='poem_196440' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196440' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196440?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送北京学生曹慈明秀才之京师</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196440")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196440_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196440'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196440'>魏武子孙今寂莫，唐来只有画将军。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196440'>邺城初见黄须面，尚喜登堂词若云。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196440'>乃公白首图籍里，小心恐惧教其子。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196440'>文章锦心仍<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_196440", 196440, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>绣腑</span>，屠龙殚家安用许。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196440'>半年系船康海门，官忙不共持一樽。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196440'>冈头梨花吹欲尽，淮口汴流来正浑。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196440'>鄙夫日欲向吴越，官满一封飞魏阙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196440'>著书虎观未敢言，蔽身蝉叶真痴绝。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196440_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196440'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_196440_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196445?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘景文两浙西路都监<span class='inlineComment2'>（余旧与刘同官北门）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196445")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196445_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196445'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196445'>刘侯八尺力如虎，遣守黄河千里堤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196445'>闭门寒郊似深隐，虫响秋巷墙悬梨。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196445'>我官北门四换岁，访饮屡过城濠西。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196445'>雁飞不到建章阙，欲往何异车无輗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196445'>诗篇惊人众侧耳，蚤有高誉无卑栖。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196445'>诏绥兵马吴八郡，画船下汴光生蜺。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196445'>西湖灵隐天下冠，幽人释子多招提。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196445'>松林竹坞我行地，拂拭定有尘埃题。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196445'>山堂清酒小泥赤，吴歌白纻双蛾低。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196445'>少年放意入云水，只今块坐愁冠笄。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196445'>君行日夜向佳景，洞庭霜落羞鰅鮧。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196445'>莫誇能饭便鞍马，闽琛海赆通蛮溪。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196445'>时平游宦行乐耳，属有佳客须频携。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196445'>明年我亦丐一邑，扁舟江上随凫鹥。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196445_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196445'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_196445_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_515712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和胡戢七首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_515712")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_515712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_515712'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_515712'>达则经纶隐著书，昔人于此孰亲疏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515712'>王通持底答杨素，汾曲先人有敝庐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_515712'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_515712_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196014' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196014' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196014?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196014_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196014'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196014'>相逢樽酒未辞深，握手盱眙十载心。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196014'>车马凄凉人夜别，出门落月与横参。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196014_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196014'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196014_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196013?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196013'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196013'>闻说归心已浩然，苏门况有子云廛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196013'>广文不去惭官长，系马堂阶要酒钱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196013_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196013'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196013_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196012' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196012' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196012?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196012_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196012'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196012'>住近苏门有白云，闭关却埽道逾尊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196012_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196012'>相逢不语忽长啸，今日岂无人姓孙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196012_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196012'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196012_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196011' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196011?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196011'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196011'>时平未用入山深，岁晚何妨木秀林。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196011'>闻说熊罴参后乘，可容牛下有哀吟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196011_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196011'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196011_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196010?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196010_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196010'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196010'>千首清诗竞夜长，真成蝴蝶为春忙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196010'>莫教流落人间少，雷电它时下取将。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196010_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196010'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196010_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196009?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196009'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196009'>少时豪气恨沉沦，缪意诗书可庇民。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196009'>长笑壮年无一事，微吟只有故人亲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196009_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196009'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196009_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207609' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207609' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207609?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冠氏县新修学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207609")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207609_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207609'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207609'>太师潞国公留守北都，余故人郑君为其户曹掾，数持檄出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207609_comment'></div>潞公曰：「郑参军才，无俾去府中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207609_comment'></div>即奏以为其法曹掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207609_comment'></div>公还洛，郑君亦去，为冠氏令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207609_comment'></div>冠氏父兄闻郑君来，咸贺曰：「是公所奏以为其法曹掾者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207609_comment'></div>相与戒其子弟，无犯郑君法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207609_comment'></div>故时冠氏人务衣食，知学者鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207609_comment'></div>朝廷方以丁联兵，郑君从容不扰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207609_comment'></div>人安郑君，争趋令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207609_comment'></div>无几何，则习击刺驰射足任矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207609_comment'></div>郑君出野，民有歌者曰：「犀邪兕邪，袯襫者惫邪」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207609_comment'></div>郑君曰：「嘻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207609_comment'></div>有勇而无义，安可」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207609_comment'></div>乃为之布约束，无不信，骜者执之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207609_comment'></div>它日出野，民又有歌者曰：「无以吾乎彍，袯襫者方作，无乃吾郑君不乐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207609_comment'></div>郑君曰：「民庶几可教也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207609_comment'></div>归，洒扫，召其僚与赋诗饮酒，言治民之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207609_comment'></div>见诸生，问所以学，而别其秀民，民益劝，乃即孔子庙为学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207609_comment'></div>学成，又率诸生日谈经其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207609_comment'></div>诸生自他邑者，常属弦歌释菜，洋洋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207609_comment'></div>于是民以为荣，争遣其子弟往观，颇改服为士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207609_comment'></div>间以书抵余，愿有述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207609_comment'></div>余曰：「士学古入官，有人民社稷，岂其一切效俗吏如不及者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207609_comment'></div>乃郑君所谓『不忘其本』者，非耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207609_comment'></div>因采其行事本末可为邑人道者，刻石学中，俾无忘郑君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207609_comment'></div>郑君名仅，字彦能，彭门人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207609_comment'></div>尝从彭门守眉山苏公游，苏公称其良士，始知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207609_comment'></div>元丰七年八月甲午，济北晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207609_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207264' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207264' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207264?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石远叔集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年1月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207264")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207264_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207264'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207264'>文章视其一时风声气俗所为，而巧拙则存乎人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207264_comment'></div>亦其所养有薄厚，故激扬沉抑，或侈或廉，秾纤不同，各有态度，常随其人性情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207264_comment'></div>刚柔、静躁、辩讷，虽甚爱悦其致，不能以相传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207264_comment'></div>知此者，则古人已远，若与之并世而未之接，得其书读焉，如对面语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207264_comment'></div>以之逆其志，曰「此何如人也，此何如人也」，无不可言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207264_comment'></div>职方员外郎石君远叔，讳起，魏人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207264_comment'></div>魏一都会，自信陵公子以好士倾诸侯，其所至客，往往发愤立功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207264_comment'></div>而曹氏兄弟与二三子马上赋诗，至于今不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207264_comment'></div>魏人所以尚义喜文章，亦其馀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207264_comment'></div>而远叔又倜傥有美才，自童子时为辞赋则已绮丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207264_comment'></div>去举进士，一上中弟，所居官官治，而益致志于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207264_comment'></div>其所为诗文，盖多至四百篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207264_comment'></div>其言雅驯，类唐人语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207264_comment'></div>尤长于议论、酬答，思而不迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207264_comment'></div>读者知其人通达，温温君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207264_comment'></div>远叔在济时，补之数相从，间相与评古作者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207264_comment'></div>远叔语时造精微，补之尝屈然私怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207264_comment'></div>远叔颇放于酒，饮辄醉，或悲歌愀然，意其负所有不偶，寄之此耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207264_comment'></div>无几何，远叔卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207264_comment'></div>后补之官于魏，而其子采在陈，以书来，曰：「先君不幸，惟子为知其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207264_comment'></div>为采序先君诗文，采不孤矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207264_comment'></div>补之复曰：「我贫贱，远叔知我，不肯遇我以众人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207264_comment'></div>我不敢曰知远叔，顾平居所尝得而宜为人道者若此，可默哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207264_comment'></div>乃次第归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207264_comment'></div>采字仲素，好学良士，能世其先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207264_comment'></div>元丰七年正月十一日，颍川晁补之序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1207264_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207721' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207721' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207721?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京国子监奉诏封孟荀扬韩告先圣文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207721")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207721_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207721'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207721'>维元丰七年月日，河南府左军巡判官、充北京国子监教授晁补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢昭告于至圣文宣王曰：昔周失厥道，纪纲用微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207721_comment'></div>惟时夫子，杲杲出日，披其重祲，为万世明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207721_comment'></div>夫子既没，扬墨是肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207721_comment'></div>爰有孟氏，词而辟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207721_comment'></div>荼蓼既薅，嘉苗孔殖，于今其功，人以配禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207721_comment'></div>俾遇夫子，盖颜渊徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207721_comment'></div>自时百家，蜂午并作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207721_comment'></div>承孟氏后，荀况、扬雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207721_comment'></div>降秦终汉，教用不陨，俾夫子道，炳然复彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207721_comment'></div>魏晋而还，文事滋落，学不为己，其舌肆好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207721_comment'></div>猗欤韩愈，始以文显，厦屋将覆，勇于敢扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207721_comment'></div>唐三百年，斯人惟伟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207721_comment'></div>天启我宋，咸秩无文，追求四贤，崇以爵号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207721_comment'></div>从夫子后，不瑕有光，更千万年，学者咸仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207721_comment'></div>今有司承诏，封孟轲为邹国公，与兖国公同配食；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207721_comment'></div>荀况为兰陵伯，扬雄为成都伯，韩愈为昌黎伯，并从祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207721_comment'></div>谨撰吉日以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207721_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207721_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>告六叔父寺丞文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207724")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207724'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207724'>维元丰七年十月日，侄濠州团练推官、知寿州寿春县事、充北京国子监教授补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，告于六叔父寺丞之灵曰：昔我叔父，事亲竭力，夙以孝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207724_comment'></div>薰然慈仁，见谓乡党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207724_comment'></div>宜贵宜富，宜寿考多子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207724_comment'></div>位禄弗究，以不永年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207724_comment'></div>承其后者，藐然一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207724_comment'></div>补之念此，常痛于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207724_comment'></div>恶衣菲食，用克归柩于鱼山之宅，十月乙酉是堋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207724_comment'></div>前我先祖，后我先人，筮曰「宅此惟安」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207724_comment'></div>乃岁时荐享，则有先人之不肖子补之在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207724_comment'></div>乃先人之祀未坠于地，则我叔父饮食如生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207724_comment'></div>惟我先祖先人实闻斯言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207724_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207724_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京祭措置李宣德文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207725")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207725'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207725'>维元丰七年月日，具官晁补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故措置司勾当公事李君汉举宣德之灵曰：呜呼汉举！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207725_comment'></div>志如鸿鹤，可使戾空，而弊羽毛乎污泽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207725_comment'></div>才如泉阿，可用剸玉，而顿铓刃乎腥膻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207725_comment'></div>仕弗充乎其位，寿弗究乎其年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207725_comment'></div>理有是而更非，喟谁者其使然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207725_comment'></div>抑造化之范人，亡予夺之或偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207725_comment'></div>谓人心其不平，分薄厚乎愚贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207725_comment'></div>呜呼汉举！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207725_comment'></div>别几何时，黄叶在户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207725_comment'></div>而车而马，翣者称遽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207725_comment'></div>酤酸肴昲，君往不御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207725_comment'></div>惟有涕洟，东门之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207725_comment'></div>何以遣哀，归安其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207725_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207725_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除夕祭北京教授廨土地神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207726")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207726'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207726'>维元丰七年十二月晦，具官晁补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，祭于土地之神曰：闻之福莫长于无祸，故古之君子祭不欲祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207726_comment'></div>补之不才，承乏三年于兹，将代而去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207726_comment'></div>赖神壅培，弗罹于咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207726_comment'></div>祈则何敢，报可忘乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207726_comment'></div>恭荐菲词，惟神鉴此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207726_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207726_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='d4775a6e4f294838a055de155f05ed63_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d4775a6e4f294838a055de155f05ed63");'><span id='d4775a6e4f294838a055de155f05ed63_link'
