class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207078' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207078?labeling=true' target='_blank'>披榛亭赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207078")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207078_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207078'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207078'>舒陈仪甫官于魏，览观公圃废城之堞，垦其土作亭堞上，名曰「披榛」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207078_comment'></div>斩木枝为梁柱，菅蒯衣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207078_comment'></div>目踰四垣，瞩五里外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207078_comment'></div>进客而语曰：「乐哉此亭」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207078_comment'></div>客曰：「微主人言之，固愿有谒也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207078_comment'></div>今夫山居者，遗世远举，烟霞之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207078_comment'></div>厜㕒之颠，翠微之颜，穹石曲坞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207078_comment'></div>上正宛中，如堂如防，猱玃之所处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207078_comment'></div>首更奔星，高出云雾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207078_comment'></div>足蹈太虚，下见雷雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207078_comment'></div>邈乎杳冥，一揽九土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207078_comment'></div>此人以登邑门之垤，踪步龃龉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207078_comment'></div>若绊若御，若见阹橹，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1207078", 1207078, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>游意</span>无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207078_comment'></div>至于平原案衍，秫麦之土，漫漫漠漠，蔑有堆阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207078_comment'></div>下泽之车，短毂幎尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207078_comment'></div>昼日旁午，出汗沾湑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207078_comment'></div>此人适逢沙丘宿莽，广不荫路，怠而愿息，解辔弛负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207078_comment'></div>相携伛偻，忽如飞翔，延颈顾慕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207078_comment'></div>若乃平时室处，朦胧环堵，穷年不出，四壁为伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207078_comment'></div>周以阛闬，域以牖户，如彼井谷，潜逃之鲋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207078_comment'></div>衡从北南，适在跬步，仰而视之，不识天宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207078_comment'></div>此人出城而望，见桑麻绿野，犹将乐之，况乃矗乎巍巍，据城之陴，出屋之危，前无蔽亏，俯首而窥哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207078_comment'></div>夫明不求晦，处内慕外，各以其不足，所遇生贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207078_comment'></div>雍门之技，悲者惊心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207078_comment'></div>钟仪见絷，尚犹南音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207078_comment'></div>主人殆倦游穷居者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207078_comment'></div>不然何以趯然于此，而志意洋溢也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207078_comment'></div>尝与主人周览五岳，岱、嵩、衡、霍，巫、庐、九疑，白盐赤甲，青城峨嵋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207078_comment'></div>岁暮深林，攀援桂枝，结轨羡门、高溪，方驾赤须、安期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207078_comment'></div>委区中之跼蹐，游太上之无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207078_comment'></div>则主人乐此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207078_comment'></div>尝又与主人服纤离、骖騄耳，夸父前乘，鲁阳奉辔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207078_comment'></div>超人迹、驰万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207078_comment'></div>以观乎八纮九野、觚竹北户，与西王母日下之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207078_comment'></div>扶桑月窟，紫渊丹水，大章所步，卢敖所履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207078_comment'></div>殊方怪物，齐谐之志，焜煌谲诳，经目而记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207078_comment'></div>则主人乐此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207078_comment'></div>尝又与主人观乎京洛神州、宋魏两都，未央、建章，天子之居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207078_comment'></div>前殿武库，金阙玉除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207078_comment'></div>东华耀灵，西华望舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207078_comment'></div>复道氤氲，飞阁渠渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207078_comment'></div>千官锵锵，剑佩以趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207078_comment'></div>朝会而出，冠盖布途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207078_comment'></div>富贵润奴隶，衣食仁里闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207078_comment'></div>则主人乐此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207078_comment'></div>尝又与主人校术孙、吴，抗技颇、牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207078_comment'></div>左象弭，右鱼服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207078_comment'></div>韩厥中御，州绰为右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207078_comment'></div>冯轼而寓目，以观三军之斩伐击刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207078_comment'></div>琅琅磕磕，风起云会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207078_comment'></div>北登燕然，躏轹长塞，西屠石堡，饮马瀚海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207078_comment'></div>麒麟图形，赎死胄代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207078_comment'></div>则主人乐此耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207078_comment'></div>尝又与主人出咸阳、经上蔡、过邯郸，桑中大堤、石城之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207078_comment'></div>士女亟会，倡乐止客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207078_comment'></div>杯酒相索，吹竽鼓瑟，鸣筝击筑，六博蹋鞠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207078_comment'></div>宛珠之簪，傅玑之珥，罗裾从风，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1207078", 1207078, "Clauses/150/Comments/0")'>众曲</span>入耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207078_comment'></div>人生得意，亦何能已？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207078_comment'></div>则主人乐此耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207078_comment'></div>主人油然而笑曰：「人寿几何，而时易失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207078_comment'></div>细犹不果，巨安可必？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207078_comment'></div>深山大泽，实生龙蛇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207078_comment'></div>高明之家，鬼瞰其室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207078_comment'></div>吾非以狭骄广、以俭笑侈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207078_comment'></div>狭易治，俭易供，此吾所以乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207078_comment'></div>穷秋九月，狐狸出穴，宇宙隆冽，时亦登吾亭而支颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207078_comment'></div>丛棘之分披，朱实之离离，秋风鸣枝，久而不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207078_comment'></div>群窍尽奏，若歌若啸，起左作右，时亦杖藜隐几而听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207078_comment'></div>寂寥兮无为，淡乎熙熙似遗，己离物而不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207078_comment'></div>飞鸿灭没，夕阳就微，月出埤堄，乐而忘归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207078_comment'></div>则客亦乐此乎哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207078_comment'></div>于是客曰：「我以众夸主人，而主人以少夺我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207078_comment'></div>主人贤哉，非仆所及也」！</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1207078_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207076' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207076' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207076?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京官舍后梨花赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207076")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207076_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207076'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207076'>梨于经无记，而舍后梨，人所不赏，故赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207076_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1207076'>揽察草木，本原所起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207076_comment'></div>李梅纪于陨霜兮，橘柚随乎织篚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207076_comment'></div>木瓜足赠而咏《诗》，含桃可羞而记《礼》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207076_comment'></div>虽信微而有托兮，亦不委夫厥美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207076_comment'></div>惟兹梨之俊茂兮，羌独远而未扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207076_comment'></div>含温润之秀质兮，皎若和璧荣其光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207076_comment'></div>澹暗惬其无偶兮，历年岁之已长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207076_comment'></div>暮春者阳瘅愤盈、群木解肤，似夸者、似斗者、似辴者、似頩者，色非一色，同妩殊嫭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207076_comment'></div>兹梨娟然，独见其素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207076_comment'></div>繄过时兮不省，滋脉脉兮后户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207076_comment'></div>亦何必耀荣华兮朝日，顾犹私兮泫露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207076_comment'></div>然而中唐之樗，枝大扶疏，以其近人，人以絷驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207076_comment'></div>则磨则齧，则折则泄，孰与夫圬壤幽薄，厥植虽弱，履屐不蹈，根乃磅礴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207076_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_515708' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_515708' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/515708?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_2_196309'>孙子谢口语，阮生劳目睛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196309_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196309'>登亦岂必喑，籍犹未能盲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196309_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196309'>学非经世具，所贵自知明。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196309_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上河北漕吕进伯所业启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207205")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207205'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207205'>草木有荣，逢春乃耀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207205_comment'></div>鸟虫含响，待气则鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207205_comment'></div>物诚甚微，情乃如此；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207205_comment'></div>士有知识，志宜激昂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207205_comment'></div>自怜孤生，误喜末学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207205_comment'></div>执技不化，知己益消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207205_comment'></div>寅缘官曹，统莅使部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207205_comment'></div>窃以畏大人于早岁，事君子于一朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207205_comment'></div>向尘长趋，人进亦进；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207205_comment'></div>登堂危坐，众言则言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207205_comment'></div>不图高明，见假颜色，问讯所学，开扩其愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207205_comment'></div>昨成至言，所要知道，退念空语，滋不欲陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207205_comment'></div>然而殚废楮毫，弃滞箱簏，愤悱已吐，芜蔓莫删。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207205_comment'></div>犹望牛歌足观，蝇墨可缀，察鄙心于宁子，成拙绘于曹生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207205_comment'></div>则虽孔门，未废由瑟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207205_comment'></div>尚或有取，不为无庸。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207205_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196535' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196535' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196535?labeling=true' target='_blank'>滨州道中四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196535")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>六言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196535_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196535'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196535'>身随符檄塞垒，家与琴书邺都。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196535'>白酒清谈忆汝，黄花佳节愁予。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196535_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196535'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196535_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京祭留守王太尉文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207720")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207720'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207720'>维元丰八年八月某日，某官某等谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故留守彰武节度王公之灵曰：《书》载箕子为武王陈《洪范》，向用五福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207720_comment'></div>窃尝有言，天不能畀人福也，曰有向用者焉，惟君子好德，故能受福于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207720_comment'></div>昔贾谊以能诵诗书属文，起家洛阳，生十八年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207720_comment'></div>岂如公孙区区《春秋》杂说，白纷始也，如推上乎菑川！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207720_comment'></div>惟仁祖以仁覆天下，天下含餔鼓腹，不知上德之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207720_comment'></div>然其文章尔雅，同风汉氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207720_comment'></div>繄公所以润色，公不有而谁先？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207720_comment'></div>其入翰林、丞御史、尹开封、使三司而士相与贺者，公且执天下之权；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207720_comment'></div>其领十五州、守三都以使南院、班二府者，公虽不大用，而位亦益迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207720_comment'></div>粤主上稽古思道，未有命戒先耆艾者，将以乞言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207720_comment'></div>乃方叔元老，维曰壮猷，岂其驒驒，久董夫戎旃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207720_comment'></div>谓公当促舍人之装，而公方且导引辟谷，欲弃人间之陋，从赤松以翛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207720_comment'></div>奄乎不知何往，意者以形为蜩甲，其不与物尽者，固已飘乎委去而登仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207720_comment'></div>跻公堂以缩酒，犹髣髴乎平日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207720_comment'></div>而僾然帷几，莫我觌而悲填。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207720_comment'></div>若夫勤劳启沃，心存天下垂五十载者，则岂惟其僚属之所私咏，而灿然不泯，有旂常兮兹传。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207720_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207718' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207718' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207718?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河北提举司告祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207718")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207718_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207718'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207718'>因山之制，七月遄臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207718_comment'></div>同轨之期，万方咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207718_comment'></div>弓剑留鼎湖之慕，衣冠馀渭水之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207718_comment'></div>憭慄徂秋，已变风云之惨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207718_comment'></div>凄凉入夜，更增笳鼓之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207718_comment'></div>虞墙徒剧于见尧，夏服仍勤于缵禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207718_comment'></div>蓍龟告吉，陵寝即安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207718_comment'></div>删黄鸟以无从，诉苍穹而何所？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207718_comment'></div>惟神功不宰，固妙物以难知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207718_comment'></div>且圣祚有归，宜与天而俱永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207718_comment'></div>臣等孤忠徒切，行奠莫追，西望灵輴，攀号雨血。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207718_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207717?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河北转运司告祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207717")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207717_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207717'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207717'>昊穹不吊，仙驭难追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207717_comment'></div>爰诹七月之期，是届万方之轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207717_comment'></div>邈鼎湖之龙去，天上景长；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207717_comment'></div>空汾水之雁飞，人间事改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207717_comment'></div>缵服懋重熙之化，见墙昭大孝之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207717_comment'></div>矧兹臣邻，以逮黎庶，仰瞻何所，擗踊宁堪！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207717_comment'></div>法仗载严，悲笳互咽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207717_comment'></div>乘白云而安往？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207717_comment'></div>删黄鸟以无从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207717_comment'></div>惟夫神功莫大而难知，固与景命俱传而不息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207717_comment'></div>臣等各縻官守，阻望灵輴，徒有忠诚，攀号洒血。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207717_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京为神宗灵驾发引告祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207716")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207716'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207716'>薤露朝晞，叹九龄之梦阒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207716_comment'></div>宫车晏出，惊七月之期臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207716_comment'></div>崩天增杞国之思，丧考切尧人之慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207716_comment'></div>因山克就，同轨具来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207716_comment'></div>羹墙痛剧于中宸，弓剑哀缠于群辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207716_comment'></div>安知帝所逍遥广乐之观，空有人间惆怅汾河之咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207716_comment'></div>戒涂雒巩，接轸大伾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207716_comment'></div>窃守提封，是虔告享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207716_comment'></div>风云改色，羽卫无晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207716_comment'></div>背通汴之神皋，指清伊之吉壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207716_comment'></div>惟宗祧传圣，讴歌讼狱以咸归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207716_comment'></div>而功德在人，礼乐政刑之未悖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207716_comment'></div>不显亦世，无疆惟休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207716_comment'></div>臣等祗奉官箴，阻瞻墙翣，攀号莫逮，洒血摧心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207716_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207146?labeling=true' "晁补之", "poem_title_1207146")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207146'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207146'>临轩共政，方祗遹于多艰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207146_comment'></div>申命在公，咸靖恭于尔服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207146_comment'></div>钦承睿训，增激愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207146_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏以大行皇帝稽古法尧，克勤缵禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207146_comment'></div>允文允武，乃圣乃神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207146_comment'></div>功燕及于皇天，道聿怀于多福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207146_comment'></div>而方虔植壁，遽泣遗弓，爰资访落之谋，载慎凫鹥之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207146_comment'></div>恭惟太皇太后陛下慈仁世济，浚哲天开；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207146_comment'></div>叶恭默思道之诚，助焦劳求治之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207146_comment'></div>申饬小大，各安旧常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207146_comment'></div>臣某等敢不上体至怀，下坚素守！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207146_comment'></div>粗知奉法，惟夙夜之不忘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207146_comment'></div>更誓投躯，庶涓埃之自效。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207146_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207095?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺太皇太后称尊表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207095")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207095_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207095'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207095'>册严备礼，位答常尊，宫闱之奉载虔，海宇之欢普洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207095_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>恭惟太皇太后陛下挺生圣哲，夙著惠慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207095_comment'></div>昊穹眷怀，宗庙昭假。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207095_comment'></div>辅文祖勤劳之理，隆神孙保佑之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207095_comment'></div>是稽两汉之旧章，用对三朝之光命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207095_comment'></div>圣人孝治，天下风行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207095_comment'></div>臣闻成王持盈，不敢忘文武之谟烈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207095_comment'></div>周姜思媚，故能贻任姒之齐徽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207095_comment'></div>聿收前功，允属盛际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207095_comment'></div>万世永赖，百禄是遒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207095_comment'></div>臣伏限职事在外，不获躬诣阙庭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207095'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五四。又见宋刻本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207095_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207094' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207094' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207094?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺皇帝登宝位表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207094")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207094_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207094'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207094'>钦承顾命，嗣履宝图，讴歌有归，华夏均庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207094_comment'></div>臣<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>恭惟皇帝陛下挺生圣德，夙有仁心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207094_comment'></div>问寝彰纯孝之诚，主鬯著克恭之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207094_comment'></div>大明继照，至健体元，邦之荣怀，人所归往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207094_comment'></div>不显亦世，是开上帝之符；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207094_comment'></div>无疆惟休，咸曰吾君之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207094_comment'></div>天地日月，廓然泰清；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207094_comment'></div>山川鬼神，罔不顺序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207094_comment'></div>鸿基滋固，景命方绵，凡在群伦，举知庆蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207094_comment'></div>臣等恪居外部，亲觏重熙，不获恭诣阙庭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1207094_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207098' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207098' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207098?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺太皇太后进奉表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207098")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207098_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207098'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207098'>尊祖徽名，册已光于备礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207098_comment'></div>修臣常职，享莫尚于多仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207098_comment'></div>辄罄菲诚，仰干聪听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207098_comment'></div>上件物中邦羡赋，外帑宿珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207098_comment'></div>载申守部之虔，用佐充庭之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207098_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207098_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207266?labeling=true' target='_blank'>汴都赋序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207266")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207266'>宋兴百年，仁宗时天下乂安，人务衣食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207266_comment'></div>至熙宁、元丰间，积累滋久，于是天子方奋然有意修法度、齐庶官，正宗庙、宫室、井衢、城域，使各有体，以隆中兴，示天下为太平观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207266_comment'></div>而奉议郎、前知亳州谯县事关景晖初奏《汴都赋》以讽，天子嘉其才，命对便殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207266_comment'></div>景晖言：「天子盛德，焦劳天下，盖四方之政所以行，而其末归之清净」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207266_comment'></div>以谏上爱民力、固基本，如所奏赋旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207266_comment'></div>天子以语宰相，使补中都官之缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207266_comment'></div>景晖贫，不能留京师，乃官河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207266_comment'></div>而先帝弃天下，景晖亦行去河北，抱其赋而泣，以属北京国子监教授晁补之序其意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207266_comment'></div>补之曰：圣人初无意于言，六经之辞皆不得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207266_comment'></div>夫不得已故言之，致必始于详说，而后终之以说约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207266_comment'></div>听廉者语，不若听夸者语，夸易好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207266_comment'></div>听狡者语，不若听婉者语，婉易从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207266_comment'></div>故赋之类常欲人博闻而微解，见人言九州山川、城郭道路、太行吕梁、舟车万里之勤，则使人思投辖弭节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207266_comment'></div>见人言州闾大会、宾主酬酢、匏竹啾咽、晡夕厌满、酤酸肴昲，则使人思弛带而卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207266_comment'></div>故《上林》、《羽猎》言卒徒之盛、终日驰骋，则必以节俭成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207266_comment'></div>扬雄以谓犹骋郑卫之声，曲终而奏雅，后世猥以雄悔之，因弃不务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207266_comment'></div>然补之窃怪：比来进士举有司者，说五经皆喜为华叶波澜，说一至百千语不能休，曰「不如是，旨不白」，然卒不白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207266_comment'></div>至辞赋，独曰是「侈丽闳衍」，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207266_comment'></div>景晖为人盖澹泊寡嗜好，至饭脱粟茹藿，自枯槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207266_comment'></div>与补之处，或终日不道人一事，或终岁不见其喜愠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207266_comment'></div>夫固安为「侈丽闳衍」者非耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207266_comment'></div>故备论之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207266_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别关景晖二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196343")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196343'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196343'>邺王台上几追陪，台上鸦鸣古甓摧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196343'>每对灯前青玉笛，不辞花下白银杯<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：皆彦远家物。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196343'>九重幽梦骊驹近，百卉佳时鷤䳏催。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196343'>更约欢呼须继日，从教河汉卷星回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196343'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196343_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196179?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196179'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196179'>笔陈云横未易陪，雁门端见压城摧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196179'>栎中麋出君抟饭，地上蛇成我夺杯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196179'>好在田园心事懒，罢休簪组鬓毛催。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196179'>稽山为有知章否，欲泛扁舟定却回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196179'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196179_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196444' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196444?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送会稽关彦远罢官河北</a><span class='authorDate'>（1085年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196444")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196444_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196444'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196444'>君年长我二十五，偶以气同均弟昆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196444'>三岁吹沙禹河曲，一身飞艇越云门。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196444'>未缘狗监知才思，端向牛衣无涕痕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196444'>秋月圆时应待我，慧林孤磬澹朝曛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196444'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196444_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
冠县（冠氏）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1e0557b752774b258f5c7c0ef62428b7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1e0557b752774b258f5c7c0ef62428b7");'><span id='1e0557b752774b258f5c7c0ef62428b7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>，30岁</div><div id='1e0557b752774b258f5c7c0ef62428b7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1082&endYear=1082')">1082年</a>　秋初，晁补之赴棣州试进士，途径冠县、堂邑等地。作品：《北京水后往棣州试进士》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_196258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京水后往棣州试进士</a><span class='authorDate'>（1082年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196258")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196258'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196258'>晡时北京城，行李上客槎。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196258'>二更无人声，骑马黄河沙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196258'>误缘柳滩中，寻炬知田家。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196258'>道有转徙人，襁负依丘麻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196258'>鸡鸣不安枕，彷佛墟里斜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196258'>秋瓜抱子母，荞麦亦已华。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196258'>赖兹野物登，尔辈生有涯。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196258'>夜宿冠氏驿，旅衾魂梦嘉。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196258'>明发萦长坂，晚开堂邑衙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196258'>秋阳此方炽，流汗沾巾纱。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196258'>处阴甘吾愿，聊逸岂在多。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196258'>有风东北来，惨惨飞雨加。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196258'>顷时异晦明，稍瞩天表霞。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196258'>仆夫为我言，涂梗绝行车。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196258'>且还解吾褚，中林侣群鸦。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196258'>诗书维永夕，蚤作从复赊。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196258'>岂不有王事，奈此仆夫何。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196258_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196258'></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_196258_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
济宁（任城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='56e23f7686e34e24b6289867c72a4cda_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("56e23f7686e34e24b6289867c72a4cda");'><span id='56e23f7686e34e24b6289867c72a4cda_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1084&endYear=1084')">1084年</a>，32岁</div><div id='56e23f7686e34e24b6289867c72a4cda' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之回乡归葬其父于鱼山先茔，请黄庭坚撰墓志铭。作品：《与鲁直求撰先君墓志书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五二。）</span><div id='poem_1207170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与鲁直求撰先君墓志书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207170")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207170'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207170'>补之再拜：补之不孝，熙宁中，先君捐馆舍于京师，于时家在吴，贫不能以时葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207170_comment'></div>罪逆偷活，奄奄至今，惭魂愧影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207170_comment'></div>将以今年冬十月，归窆钜野之鱼山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207170_comment'></div>重惟先君怀道守志，与世龃龉，未五十而殁，不有信于今，必有信于后，故涕泣有请于左右，冀鲁直哀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207170_comment'></div>先君行事，具濮阳杜侯状，今所论录，其大概出处，补之所知而愿述者，以备遗逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207170_comment'></div>先人为人敦厚靖恭，事亲孝，兄弟无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207170_comment'></div>善与人交，外宽裕，人易以亲，而中介然不苟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207170_comment'></div>喜宾客，家居不绝酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207170_comment'></div>不乐为吏，至累岁不调，乏无担石，亦不以经意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207170_comment'></div>旷达乐山水，意所欲往，初不以事阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207170_comment'></div>方其酣咏得意，忽然忘老，视外物无与易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207170_comment'></div>尝道姑苏，乐之，留累月不得行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207170_comment'></div>小舟入震泽，遇大风，舟欲覆，指东西山，谈笑无忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207170_comment'></div>乏粮，求米山中，无所得，犹登览忘疲，补之恳求还，乃还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207170_comment'></div>又尝道吕梁，涸不通，留阅月，补之问津无虚日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207170_comment'></div>客南来者必从之曰：「吾舟下徐无难乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207170_comment'></div>一人曰「不可」，补之有愠色；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207170_comment'></div>一人曰「可」，补之愉然而喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207170_comment'></div>先君笑之曰：「夫行者之于道路，不中休、不却行而已，问则惑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207170_comment'></div>既问之，又从而喜愠之，惑已甚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207170_comment'></div>若知修身之欲速者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207170_comment'></div>亦犹是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207170_comment'></div>作《问津说》以示补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207170_comment'></div>尤耆为诗，悲欢得失，一寓于此，其辞怨而不迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207170_comment'></div>有集若干卷，眉山苏公序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207170_comment'></div>其略曰：清厚静深，如其为人，而每篇辄出新意奇语，宜为人所共爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207170_comment'></div>谓先君有其实而辞其名，以比汉中候吏李合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207170_comment'></div>比疾病卧昭德坊，犹为诗不辍，以指书空，吟哦枕间，神色翛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207170_comment'></div>补之从旁录之，逮启手足，尚得诗四十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207170_comment'></div>惟是先君平生奇蹇不遇，故事业见于世为少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207170_comment'></div>其大概出处若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207170_comment'></div>鲁直与补之诸父厚，而补之不肖，鲁直辱知之深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207170_comment'></div>补之平居，诵其言，学其人，谓足以发幽隐、慰先君于地下者，莫如鲁直也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207170_comment'></div>故忘罪逆，冒昧自致，鲁直亦矜其意，慨然许之，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207170_comment'></div>补之再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1207170_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之回乡归葬其父于鱼山先茔。作品：《先茔治事归》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二0。）</span>《筮地告先考著作文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六十。）</span><div id='poem_195962' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195962' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195962?labeling=true' target='_blank'>先茔治事归</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_195962")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195962_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195962'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195962'>先人昔慕栖山乐，贱子今怀陟岵悲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195962'>柏叶初生石墙短，况无金带买丰碑<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195962'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195962_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_195962'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_195962_0'>⑴ 自注：补之方谋葬先子，家贫未能，故及也。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_195962_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207723' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207723' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207723?labeling=true' target='_blank'>筮地告先考著作文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1084年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207723")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207723_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207723'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207723'>维元丰七年十月日，男补之、将之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，告于先考著作之灵曰：昔我先人率德，顾弗永年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207723_comment'></div>乃不肖子补之、将之，不能必成，葬不以时，乃尚宦学四方，惟岁时望祭有腼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207723_comment'></div>肆卜我先祖鱼山故兆，唯吉土，十月乙酉是堋，用大定我先人之宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207723_comment'></div>遣车既饬，惟不肖子补之、将之悽怆怵惕，殒越于地，则亦靡及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207723_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207723_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2e5aeb92ac4248eaa549db9ea4f1654d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2e5aeb92ac4248eaa549db9ea4f1654d");'><span id='2e5aeb92ac4248eaa549db9ea4f1654d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1097&endYear=1097')">1097年</a>，45岁</div><div id='2e5aeb92ac4248eaa549db9ea4f1654d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>二月，党论起，朝廷再治元祐旧臣，晁补之贬监处州酒税。南迁途中，晁补之母杨氏夫人殁于丹阳，乃奉柩还乡，葬于济州任城之吕村祖茔。作品：《追祭吕村山川神文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《开隧纳志石祭告文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span><div id='poem_1207749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>追祭吕村山川神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207749")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207749'>维年月日，孤子晁补之谨以制币清酌之奠，敢昭告于任城县之吕村山川百灵、丘墓阡陌、道路之神曰：补之不孝，获罪于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207749_comment'></div>顷自丹阳，遭罹母丧，护柩北归，踰二千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207749_comment'></div>日月既迫，不能按礼法之旧，奉不腆币牲牢时物，谢咎徼福于诸明神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207749_comment'></div>惟是畚锸窀穸之事，大惧渎犯，以重罪悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207749_comment'></div>于兹不孝躬今免丧矣，尚以诚心荐兹薄奠，惟神其贷之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207749_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207749_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>开隧纳志石祭告文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1097年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207750")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207750'>维年月日，孤子晁补之、将之，谨以清酌之奠，祭告于先妣寿光县太君杨氏之灵曰：补之等罪逆不孝，顷奉丧北归，卜日斯迫，既襄大事，且终制矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207750_comment'></div>惟孝恭慈俭之美，未遑图纪，诚无以诏后人，慰诸孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207750_comment'></div>乃故南阳守杜侯纮实惟世婚，许以撰述，用成斯志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207750_comment'></div>差是吉日，纳诸隧中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207750_comment'></div>惟补之等号慕永远，则亦靡及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207750_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207750_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
扬州（江都）

id='poem_sentence_0_196052_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196052'>淮山杨柳春千里，尚有多情忆小胜<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207173?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207173")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207173'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207173'>囊空坐笑，辄倾将母之诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207173_comment'></div>钧播无私，偶遂佐州之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207173_comment'></div>意虽甘于远外，迹终涉于干摩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207173_comment'></div>伏自思惟，良深震慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207173_comment'></div>窃以圣人在上，孰不怀利见之心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207173_comment'></div>君子处躬，盖亦有常分之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207173_comment'></div>智足以图，则当毕虑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207173_comment'></div>力可以任，则宜竭能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207173_comment'></div>固有埽曹相之门而藉以求通，客常侯之舍而因兹得召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207173_comment'></div>志义有在，夤缘不嫌其次；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207173_comment'></div>实事未闻，虚名可贵所以。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207173_comment'></div>樊英聘而汉称得众，祢衡弃而魏为失人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207173_comment'></div>虽非车舆輗軏之利行，犹曰园林鸿鹄之为观，凡是二者，必居一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207173_comment'></div>如补之者，质薄自怜，学迂寡用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207173_comment'></div>陛下纂极之日，群公入辅之初，旁搜废捐，不间疏逖，亦预诸生之选，入陪三馆之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207173_comment'></div>朝廷清明，官省閒暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207173_comment'></div>鹓鸾逸翮，竞高举于丹霄，麋鹿野心，终自怀于丰草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207173_comment'></div>仰惭教载之惠，未知补报之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207173_comment'></div>愿试米盐，且亲甘旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207173_comment'></div>魏君幞被，非见汰于盛时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207173_comment'></div>萧子抱关，亦各从其私好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207173_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官引君以道，附众以文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207173_comment'></div>养材无一介之遗，建官必群议之与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207173_comment'></div>发为久大，故能赞于乾坤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207173_comment'></div>驯致中和，盖将兴于礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207173_comment'></div>夫何小丑，首玷至公！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207173_comment'></div>江阳故都，民俗信美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207173_comment'></div>矧备倅贰，足竭疲驽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207173_comment'></div>尚假岁时，不惭刻鹄之类鹜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207173_comment'></div>庶几平昔，未忍转衣而为裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207173_comment'></div>誓殚勤劳，粗有寸尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207173_comment'></div>仰酬覆焘之德，次纳甄陶之仁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1207173_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207201' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207201' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207201?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢淮南漕彭元施启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207201")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207201_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207201'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207201'>吏能何补，公举过优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207201_comment'></div>迂疏内循，光价已倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207201_comment'></div>伏念补之无自得之学，非适时之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207201_comment'></div>间关一名，黾俛十考；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207201_comment'></div>庠校五岁，馆阁四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207201_comment'></div>不能穑而取禾，退默既惭于素饱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207201_comment'></div>未操刀而欲割，进为又惧于得伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207201_comment'></div>故尝冒请于外官，庶几自试于民事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207201_comment'></div>而托部封之未久，辱咳唾之独先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207201_comment'></div>静言思之，何以得此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207201_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇某官忠以事上，恕于取人，过誉斗筲，俾参瑚琏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207201_comment'></div>李长乐之许文举，非为通家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207201_comment'></div>暴公子之知不疑，傥缘一语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207201_comment'></div>人之幸会，势岂偶然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207201_comment'></div>誓坚许国之心，终得报恩之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207201_comment'></div>感荷激切，不知所裁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207201_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207217' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207217' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207217?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赴扬州上太守王资政正仲启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207217")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207217_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207217'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207217'>比者得请宸廷，备员州佐，蚤在陶钧之内，久辞墙屏之严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207217_comment'></div>寅缘庇依，欣喜幸会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207217_comment'></div>恭惟某官道德世范，文词儒宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207217_comment'></div>龙虎之得风云，主威益重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207217_comment'></div>山渊之有珠玉，国势增华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207217_comment'></div>加以仁厚不矜，直方有体，倦经为于机政，思宴息于藩维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207217_comment'></div>而补之册府后来，书生孤立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207217_comment'></div>惭梧鼠之五技，窘侏儒之一囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207217_comment'></div>江海之思，日萦魂梦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207217_comment'></div>麾符之荫，与有光荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207217_comment'></div>春水已生，吴艎当具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207217_comment'></div>尚曹装之未促，傥荀御之可容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207217_comment'></div>乡往之诚，倍百常品。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207217_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207218' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207218?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与交代范峒启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207218")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207218_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207218'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207218'>蒙恩外补，承乏后尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207218_comment'></div>惟慕谊之素勤，获趋风而自庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207218_comment'></div>恭以某官夙怀贤业，蔼有令名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207218_comment'></div>行己不挠而众推，居官所至而民愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207218_comment'></div>向淹器干，屈佐藩维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207218_comment'></div>补之质薄自怜，学迂寡与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207218_comment'></div>陪英髦于中秘，非所宜堪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207218_comment'></div>奉甘旨于宴闲，盖其私便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207218_comment'></div>企青云而虽奋，继白雪以良难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207218_comment'></div>行造门墙，粗窥矩范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207218_comment'></div>欣愉幸会，悃愊奚殚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207218_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207218_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207219?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与淮南提刑贾殿院启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207219")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207219_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207219'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207219'>蒙恩外补，窃禄便亲，望履幕以良勤，去门墙之未久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207219_comment'></div>敢图官守，遂在部封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207219_comment'></div>恭惟某官道业古人之期，风声列位之冠，以义出处，系时重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207219_comment'></div>虽雅意不忘于本朝，而直谏自难于居内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207219_comment'></div>久倾公议，尚屈远猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207219_comment'></div>补之质薄自怜，学迂寡用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207219_comment'></div>糜丹铅于册府，固乏毫氂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207219_comment'></div>佐条教于藩城，足殚驽蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207219_comment'></div>趋参良迩，庇赖为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207219_comment'></div>瞻咏欣愉，并深悃愊。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1207219_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207221' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207221' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207221?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答扬州教授曾旼启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207221")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207221_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207221'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207221'>比者请外便亲，蒙恩佐郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207221_comment'></div>往岁周旋之旧，弥年契阔之怀，又此从游，良为幸会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207221_comment'></div>恭以某官精智洞物，高才迈群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207221_comment'></div>倚相读书，博洽穷于世表；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207221_comment'></div>正平作赋，敏捷出于坐中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207221_comment'></div>科甲先登，名誉早立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207221_comment'></div>当居要近，宁久宴闲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207221_comment'></div>补之自以拙艰，安于疏逖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207221_comment'></div>青云魏阙，初惊日月之遥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207221_comment'></div>春水隋河，已梦江湖之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207221_comment'></div>聊复尔耳，惭为米之渊明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207221_comment'></div>于时言言，喜班荆之声子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207221_comment'></div>清和在候，导养适宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207221_comment'></div>先辱音题，尤增感刻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207221_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207222' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207222' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207222?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上扬守王正仲启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207222")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207222_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207222'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207222'>近承恩检，叨备府僚，尝贡邮笺，僭尘台几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207222_comment'></div>敢谓谦尊之盛德，曾无疏贱之遐遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207222_comment'></div>饬书记以染修，付候兵而传致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207222_comment'></div>奖收踰分，感愧并心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207222_comment'></div>伏审得请过家，方春展墓，散黄金之百镒，见白发之故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207222_comment'></div>鹢舟归济于晴江，虎节还临于治部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207222_comment'></div>即日镇抚多暇，神明用休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207222_comment'></div>补之蚤被陶甄，久辞墙屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207222_comment'></div>载勤舟楫，奉甘旨以知荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207222_comment'></div>适及郊圻，听歌谣而自慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207222_comment'></div>意行调于元鼎，难久托于后车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207222_comment'></div>用此倾驰，不忘魂寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207222_comment'></div>清和当候，拜伏可期。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207222_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207223' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207223' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207223?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与淮东提刑王司谏启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207223")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207223_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207223'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207223'>被选中宸，改临东部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207223_comment'></div>获趋风之良旧，思去德之未遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207223_comment'></div>侧聆除音，尤喜幸会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207223_comment'></div>恭以某官学术知古，才谋适时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207223_comment'></div>直节在于谏垣，能声闻于省闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207223_comment'></div>访民恫苦，姑暂屈于登车；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207223_comment'></div>副上褒延，已久虚于前席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207223_comment'></div>补之才质人后，趣操众违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207223_comment'></div>比缘将母之求，偶遂佐州之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207223_comment'></div>敢图官守，预占提封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207223_comment'></div>庶自竭于疲驽，蕲永依于庇赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207223_comment'></div>欣愉乡往，并剧下情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207223_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207223_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答扬州判官赵奉议启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207224")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207224'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207224'>辟书画可，宾幕改除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207224_comment'></div>惟跂慕之素勤，获从游而私幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207224_comment'></div>恭以某官美才自立，佳誉蔼传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207224_comment'></div>凤穴一翰，殊有超宗之质；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207224_comment'></div>龙门独上，早膺元礼之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207224_comment'></div>念契阔之未遥，辱音题而尤喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207224_comment'></div>炎歊方炽，款晤可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207224_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207224_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代王资政祭李少保文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207735")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207735_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207735'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207735'>维元祐六年月日，具官某谨遣某以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故致政少保李公之灵曰：天之生才，初罔不艰，既畀之才，其施复难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207735_comment'></div>王侯戚里，儿童绮纨，岂无其人，鸩毒宴安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207735_comment'></div>宴安不怀，于公见之，非此其贤，其才足施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207735_comment'></div>真宗之甥，冀国之子，五朝三世，恩无与比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207735_comment'></div>凤雏骥驹，其生固奇，置樊枥间，世宁识之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207735_comment'></div>仁宗恭俭，四十二年，峨冠大羽，文武并肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207735_comment'></div>知公于亲，欲任心膂，匪亲则嫌，或以嫌沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207735_comment'></div>英宗退托，未揽万机，公不自嫌，语秘莫知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207735_comment'></div>念先朝意，滋欲分政，知而不以，时则有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207735_comment'></div>何以乐之，楼观池园，退老于家，虹蜺屈蟠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207735_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207735_comment'></div>自昔和文，折节好士，人贤其贤，不荣其侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207735_comment'></div>公生又似，好善有能，富贵益恭，人以是称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207735_comment'></div>交游满国，搢绅有闻，高堂击钟，骊驹在门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207735_comment'></div>尚想孟公，投辖拒户，庶见声子，班荆道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207735_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207735_comment'></div>别几何时，人事变易，兰亭觞咏，俛仰陈迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207735_comment'></div>褒终之典，时则有加，岂惟故人，出涕咨嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207735_comment'></div>寓词千里，侑此尊俎，衣裳在筵，髣髴一举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207735_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207735_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207760' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207760' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207760?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭故推官黄君夫人安康郡太君李氏文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207760")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207760_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207760'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207760'>维元祐六年九月日，左宣德郎、充秘阁校理、通判扬州军州事晁补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故某郡太君李氏之灵曰：李望陇西，世德之延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207760_comment'></div>作嫔于黄，黄江左贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207760_comment'></div>雍雍睦睦，阃内之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207760_comment'></div>不见夫人，视其诸儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207760_comment'></div>补之顷岁，倦游北门，见夫人子，今校理君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207760_comment'></div>辅我以仁，挽之近古，定交一言，匪婚姻故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207760_comment'></div>其后校理，单车过魏，入拜吾亲，如母姒娣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207760_comment'></div>吾亲顾语：「惟愚补之，君辱与游，实彫琢之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207760_comment'></div>补之忝命，亦登文馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207760_comment'></div>联骖并室，笑语宴衎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207760_comment'></div>入拜夫人，谢卧疾久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207760_comment'></div>扁舟来南，不问安否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207760_comment'></div>如何不淑，而不永年？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207760_comment'></div>泣涕竹西，铭旌在船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207760_comment'></div>双井之里，山奔水委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207760_comment'></div>往休于宫，从其君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207760_comment'></div>恩封大郡，诏赙其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207760_comment'></div>夫人何憾，后方大昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207760_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1207760_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196590' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196590' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　二月，苏轼知扬州，三月中苏轼抵达任所，晁补之与其游宴唱和，甚为欢愉。作品：《赠戴嗣良歌时罢洪府监兵过广陵为东坡公出所获西夏剑东坡公命作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷十。）</span><div
