id='poem_sentence_0_195954'>桃欲呈红柳弄阴，麦田青已没鞋深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195954'>春堤细雨篮舆湿，婆饼焦声在竹林。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195954'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195954_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195953?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195953'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195953'>故国龙舟休水调，高城雉堞尚云间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195953'>蜀冈朝雨如轻雾，不见春江草外山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195953'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195953_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195952?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195952'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195952'>堆案文书无了毕，并堤船舫且萦回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195952'>非关董役年年事，自为春郊得得来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195952'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195952_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c36c05c6c925448a8e13edf5a66299eb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c36c05c6c925448a8e13edf5a66299eb");'><span id='c36c05c6c925448a8e13edf5a66299eb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>，40岁</div><div id='c36c05c6c925448a8e13edf5a66299eb' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　二月，苏轼知扬州，三月中苏轼抵达任所，晁补之与其游宴唱和，甚为欢愉。作品：《东坡公以种松法授都梁杜子师并为作诗子师求余同赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二二。）</span><div id='poem_196253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196253' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196253?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东坡公以种松法授都梁杜子师并为作诗子师求余同赋<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196253")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196253_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196253'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196253'>不学栽桤业种松，未惭履狶笑屠龙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196253'>许君尽得东坡术，已与先生一事同。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196253_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196253'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196253_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195941' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195941' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195941?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195941_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195941'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195941'>长锥散子岩岩遍，短竹扶条岁岁添。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195941'>待得烹茶有松叶，不应更课木奴缣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195941'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195941_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196254' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196254' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196254?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196254_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196254'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196254'>佩牛未敢邀君出，射虎何当许我从。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196254_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196254'>要看堂堂冠剑叟，苍然十万甲夫中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196254_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196254'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196254_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　八月，苏轼被召还朝，晁补之特为致书岳翁杜纯疏解二人关系。作品：《答外舅兵部杜侍郎书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五二。）</span><div id='poem_1207163' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207163' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207163?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢外舅兵部杜侍郎书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207163")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207163_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207163'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207163'>补之再拜：昨自苏公以尚书召，适与左右兵部同事，意两公平日未尝相与处，往未必合，故尝为苏公极言左右居家行己、莅官及物之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207163_comment'></div>苏公固不以补之言为过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207163_comment'></div>及辱赐书，道联职甚亲，远闻欣喜不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207163_comment'></div>补之于苏公为门下士，无所复赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207163_comment'></div>然刚洁寡欲，奉己至俭菲，而以身任官责，嫉邪爱物，知无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207163_comment'></div>尤是不忽细务，其有所不得尽，视去官职如土芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207163_comment'></div>凡规模大较，与左右近者，非一事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207163_comment'></div>来书犹怪其尚气好辩，此非补之所能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207163_comment'></div>自非圣人，各有所长，亦有所短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207163_comment'></div>然伯夷班圣人之列矣，而孟子尚以谓伯夷隘，君子不由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207163_comment'></div>夫孟子所谓君子者，必若孔子，无可无不可而后可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207163_comment'></div>不然，望望然去之，若将浼焉者，苟病其未和，则凡能虑祸忍诟、摧刚为柔，熟视出胯下者，皆可以免夫此议矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207163_comment'></div>隘者见排，而不恭者并获罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207163_comment'></div>见排且获罪矣，而不害其并列于圣人，则孟子之心盖可见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207163_comment'></div>西汉名臣，惟汲黯、郑当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207163_comment'></div>汲黯好直谏，多大体，而性倨少礼，面折不能容人之过，士亦以此不附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207163_comment'></div>而郑当时性长者，常引丞史以为贤于己，与官属言，惟恐伤之，山东翕然称郑庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207163_comment'></div>黯以倨得不附，而庄见誉长者，似庄胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207163_comment'></div>然至于淮南有邪谋，数汉庭臣，惟惮黯，而庄乃获讥趋和承意，不敢甚斥臧否，庄于此不反愧黯哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207163_comment'></div>虽然，汲黯为直不为忮，郑当时为和不为谀，故良史同称，推贤则汲黯、郑当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207163_comment'></div>此其大体皆有所长，而亦皆有所短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207163_comment'></div>故补之以谓自非孔子无可无不可，未免于见议者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207163_comment'></div>君子以同而异，若是可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207163_comment'></div>方今老成，言行足以矜式后进者，非左右乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207163_comment'></div>俗异教离，党同门，蠹道真，十室皆是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207163_comment'></div>补之以谓众贤和于朝，则幽远趣向自一，而事无不可为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207163_comment'></div>不识左右以为如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207163_comment'></div>复赐一言，幸甚幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207163_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1092&endYear=1092')">1092年</a>　晁补之通判扬州。作品：《朝奉大夫提举京东路保马兼保甲事杨公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六四。）</span>《夔州录事参军江君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六六。）</span>《跋戒公疏后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六九。）</span>《梦斋铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六九。）</span>《佛鉴大师语录序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六九。）</span>《和缙云寺关彦远浮山作》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷九。通判扬州两年间难以确指先后年月者。）</span>《招缙云寺关彦远教授曾彦和集平山堂次关韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一六。通判扬州两年间难以确指先后年月者。）</span>《陪关彦远曾彦和集龙兴寺咏隋时双鸭脚次关韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一六。通判扬州两年间难以确指先后年月者。）</span><div id='poem_1207666' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207666' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207666?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝奉大夫提举京东路保马兼保甲事杨公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐七年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207666")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207666_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207666'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207666'>公杨氏，讳景芬，字祖德，河南府洛阳人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207666_comment'></div>其系盖出汉太尉震，而坊州司马、赠尚书左丞庆者，生子偕，少知名，其学长于论议，刚直廉洁而爱人，事昭陵为翰林侍读学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207666_comment'></div>其弟任，幼而乐谊，不及仕以卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207666_comment'></div>生子恂，为奉宁节度推官，赠通议大夫，退俭不矜伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207666_comment'></div>两世宜大矣，皆以不期人知，人亦莫知之，以钟其庆于后而生公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207666_comment'></div>公端静而开警，内刚而外和，敏于从政，善与人交，薰然忠厚君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207666_comment'></div>少治《春秋》，未尝与人言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207666_comment'></div>遇事发其论议，亹亹不可穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207666_comment'></div>以侍读任为试校书郎，调定陶主簿，曹州司理，真符令，改大理丞，七迁至朝奉大夫，勋上轻车都尉，服三品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207666_comment'></div>尝知永城县事，知化州事，通判亳、定二州，擢石塘催纲、都水勾当公事，提举淮南折纳，河北东路常平，京东保马保甲，皆有能声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207666_comment'></div>化州并海，亡城郭，岁赋竹苇为藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207666_comment'></div>飓风至，飘卷为虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207666_comment'></div>居者不安，民疲于赋，且土疏不可城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207666_comment'></div>君奏乞库钱百万，陶甓城之，岁以无患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207666_comment'></div>海旁诸州，皆图去为式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207666_comment'></div>宣徽冯公京守亳，事无大小皆诿公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207666_comment'></div>公为一二裁处，而阴推其意于守，若不自己出者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207666_comment'></div>冯公心善之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207666_comment'></div>定守多重臣，尚威，通判视簿书，无可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207666_comment'></div>公曰：「州事，吾职也，岂出位者」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207666_comment'></div>有害于理、戾于法者争之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207666_comment'></div>帅宪肃韩公绛亦深知公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207666_comment'></div>其领淮南折纳，诸路皆有使，及还，争求对，冀得迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207666_comment'></div>公曰：「事隶有司，且复命矣，尚求对何为」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207666_comment'></div>独不求对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207666_comment'></div>河北前常平官庸人骛功，文檄山委，州县不能应，则被谴去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207666_comment'></div>公至，省十七八，谕州县以法如此，户部反诋其不如法，请罢公，然朝廷益知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207666_comment'></div>会得疾卒，元祐二年正月十一日也，享年六十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207666_comment'></div>以元祐七年某月某日，葬于河南府洛阳县平洛乡张封村，从通议公之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207666_comment'></div>夫人张氏，某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207666_comment'></div>子规，云安军司理、大郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207666_comment'></div>二女，长适进士孟安，幼未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207666_comment'></div>公事后母以孝闻，廪入不私，杨氏之吉凶礼事皆资焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207666_comment'></div>尤为太师文公、司空吕公所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207666_comment'></div>补之闻之孔子曰：「士任重而道远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207666_comment'></div>仁以为己任，不亦重乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207666_comment'></div>死而后已，不亦远乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207666_comment'></div>天下之求于圣人之言者过，而期于士者薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207666_comment'></div>曰仁，必伯夷，必颜渊，故后世之为仁者微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207666_comment'></div>孔子不云乎：「苟能一日用其力于仁矣乎，我未见力不足者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207666_comment'></div>夫能一日用其力于仁，而孔子与其无不足，则自斯而往，曰是可与为士矣，可与任重而道远矣，何不可哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207666_comment'></div>杨公始于事亲而亲安之，以施其族人而称慈，行己则人爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207666_comment'></div>其政之在民者，民不忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207666_comment'></div>其庶乎所谓求仁莫近者，非邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207666_comment'></div>补之先君与公善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207666_comment'></div>初，补之教授北京国子监，贫无以葬先君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207666_comment'></div>公问所乏，赒其半，乃克葬，而公未始以为德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207666_comment'></div>今公葬矣，补之不能身相事，尚忍铭公？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207666_comment'></div>然以谓其故旧铭之耶，则非公之故旧，有信之者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207666_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1207666'>德藏于中，故人不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207666_comment'></div>人不知者，天知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207666_comment'></div>天实知之，其后昌有时。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1207666_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207688' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207688?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夔州录事参军江君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐七年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207688")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207688_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207688'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207688'>江君讳朴，字文叔，世为衢州开化人，殿中丞房之曾孙，而尚书职方员外郎镃之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207688_comment'></div>少有才气，好学自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207688_comment'></div>国家取士以声律，仁宗时尤盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207688_comment'></div>有司临试，其目在礼经名数者，则浮华士以为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207688_comment'></div>会萃钞记，以应一日之用，不能者更睨左右，剽劫为资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207688_comment'></div>而君最先治经，悼礼学之缺，能言其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207688_comment'></div>盖为书二十卷，专一技者不能通也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207688_comment'></div>丞相王荆公方举有司，尤善君，尝再预礼部奏名，中皇祐五年进士第，授翁源尉，用举者徙馀干令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207688_comment'></div>鄱阳杨骥通《易》，临川吴孝宗通《春秋》，君皆以书币致之，率邑子从受业，屋少不能馆，至分处浮图舍，于今江南以为美谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207688_comment'></div>浮梁俗好讼，令王越石懦，系者满狱，诉庭下者日百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207688_comment'></div>越石惧，移病去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207688_comment'></div>州遣君摄之，锄其奸彊，而冤滞者得平反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207688_comment'></div>不旬月，狱为虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207688_comment'></div>既还馀干，而浮梁有争田再世不决者，犹请监司得属君治，卒亦明辩，人画其像祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207688_comment'></div>职方君监江州酒，得疾，君闻，遽弃官走省，逾月而后返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207688_comment'></div>守怒，且加罪，而监司以为爱亲可庇，然竟以亲丧去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207688_comment'></div>再调象山令，代还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207688_comment'></div>王荆公当国，擢士不次，以君平生旧，劳问叹息，坐客谓君旦夕用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207688_comment'></div>复见，以书论事，不合，即仰栋坐，不交一语，君亦自绝去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207688_comment'></div>荐监盐官南路盐场，与令异趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207688_comment'></div>令诬以罪于提点刑狱事卢秉，檄州劾之，逮者四百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207688_comment'></div>君无毫发私，亦卒不对吏，而坐遣白直持书越境，罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207688_comment'></div>复用举者得夔州录事，既而太息曰：「吾老矣，安能万里为五斗计也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207688_comment'></div>遂谢病去，闲居鄞江十馀年，又居无锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207688_comment'></div>元祐六年六月十三日无疾卒，年七十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207688_comment'></div>以明年二月二十九日葬于无锡县开元乡乌墩岭，以夫人何氏祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207688_comment'></div>五男子：焕、烨、炳、煜、燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207688_comment'></div>女四人，皆归士族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207688_comment'></div>补之先君与君同年进士，而炳与补之治平中俱学江南，相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207688_comment'></div>补之官广陵，炳在无锡，以书来曰：「先君生不遇，没犹当有所伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207688_comment'></div>愿以行事累矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207688_comment'></div>补之少时，见炳学问已有声名，后亦中进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207688_comment'></div>今为巴东县主簿，能干其蛊者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207688_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1207688'>以为生不逢耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207688_comment'></div>尝官而使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207688_comment'></div>以为用耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207688_comment'></div>曾几何施！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207688_comment'></div>夸者名一世犹不足，而廉者畏人知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207688_comment'></div>抑得正而死，其又何悲！</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1207688_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207306' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207306' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207306?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋戒公疏后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207306")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207306_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207306'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207306'>元祐七年，翰林东坡先生守扬，七月，石塔禅师将还山，其徒诣府请留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207306_comment'></div>公书其状后与之曰：「传语长老，三十日奉谒议去住」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207306_comment'></div>即以其日从僚属过师，出疏袖间，师去而复留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207306_comment'></div>初，师欲去甚确，众以为非东坡故不留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207306_comment'></div>师留而公去，室中尘凝，师坐晏然，如公未去时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207306_comment'></div>补之不学道，不足以知师得道之浅深，而徒识其貌，渊然而靖，不可澄挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207306_comment'></div>忘其初不为东坡而去，亦忘其终为东坡而留也，姑留而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207306_comment'></div>后九十八日，晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207306_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207645' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207645?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梦斋铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（为昙秀师作）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207645")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207645'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207645'>梦中头落以手捉，觉知梦已默自笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207645_comment'></div>我今无生妄为有，如鬼诟口是非我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207645_comment'></div>是鹿非鹿何时了，请循其本二俱灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207645_comment'></div>我今何为复梦语，门关堕地忽惊觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207645_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207645_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>佛鉴大师语录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207276")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207276'>佛以无心通达一切法，而以一音演说之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207276_comment'></div>故法法皆心，说说皆法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207276_comment'></div>半字满字，有离有解，有假名字，而无一物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207276_comment'></div>四句百句，千万亿句，乃至不可说䢷由他句，其字有尽而义无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207276_comment'></div>始自《四十二章》西来，而佛书遍中国，能言之类，无以复加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207276_comment'></div>如经所说，山河大地皆是菩提瞪发劳相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207276_comment'></div>譬菩提心为一大镜，而山河大地、一切众生、草木根牙之类，皆清净本然中所现物，故随取随用，而其取其用，皆不外吾镜中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207276_comment'></div>则其能以无心通达而一音演说，字有尽而义无穷，能言之类无以加，岂不以此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207276_comment'></div>然佛以无言言，故如刀画水，如空中鸟迹，过不可寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207276_comment'></div>而昧者欲求画于水，求迹于空，故观一藏教，如大海普雨，而欲以浅智悉数其滴，至不可得，则生迷闷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207276_comment'></div>于千万亿句，计常计断，见中见边，如步屈虫脚移后蹑前，终不得舍，而曾不知反滴为海，则千万亿句，画亡而迹失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207276_comment'></div>有大智人菩提达磨，具佛知见，悯此震旦为教所缚，而来解之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207276_comment'></div>最初一语，廓然无圣，有求心了不可得者，即以付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207276_comment'></div>故面壁不立文字，而一藏教咸露无馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207276_comment'></div>佛音人音，鸟音兽音，一切风水百物之音，是音皆说，是说皆义，乃至墙牖栋柱，无说亦说，随其根性，使各悟入，如是解脱无量之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207276_comment'></div>譬五百比丘，各有悟门，言人人殊，而佛告舍利弗以彼皆正说，无拣择也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207276_comment'></div>粤有佛国禅师白公，天衣怀公之裔孙，法云秀公之嫡子，提祖师印，为一切雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207276_comment'></div>而佛鉴大师惟仲又佛国之嫡子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207276_comment'></div>始从佛国悟庭柏义，即师子吼，尽眼色界，随类拈出，物物皆金，而佛国故不作如是言，佛鉴亦不作如是解也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207276_comment'></div>或举庭柏义问者，则曰：「莫谤我师」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207276_comment'></div>然青青满前，用亦不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207276_comment'></div>既往金山龙游道场，皇帝数遣使降香，学者云集，震于江南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207276_comment'></div>会补之至金山，师倾盖欣然语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207276_comment'></div>以家弟无极宰说之宗旨夙契，尝赴初请桃园鼓山，亦以补之于道有少分，因出门人所集《语录》，求为序引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207276_comment'></div>补之闻之，昔佛一时取恒河岸一叶，告诸比丘：「我所觉了一切诸法，如大地草木；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207276_comment'></div>为众生说者，如手中叶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207276_comment'></div>佛以为叶叶皆举，累劫不尽，故举一叶，使自趣入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207276_comment'></div>而缚于教者，始叶叶而求之，非祖师具佛知见，则安能不立一指而尽佛之蕴无有馀哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207276_comment'></div>知此，则如来祖师无异禅也，故因《佛鉴语录》而伸之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207276_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196398' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196398' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196398?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和缙云守关彦远浮山作<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196398")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196398_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_196398_0'>① 在扬州城中提点刑狱之廨，石色如铁，其高可隐，《图经》谓之浮山</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196398'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196398'>广陵形胜昔所闻，昆冈作轴江为门。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196398'>西来蜀道从万里，伏堆藏阜争崩奔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196398'>盘挐蹙踏得江住，精铁一亩岿然存。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196398'>半潜屋牖半出户，鼍龟见背熊罴蹲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196398'>我行平地是绝顶，叹息但以指爪扪。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196398'>谁言一水限南北，壅遏势极逾腾骞。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196398'>不然安得江南之山踊跃出，中流浮玉犹崷崒。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196398'>操权高视竞瓜分，岛夷索虏何烦述。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196398'>木兰水调更凄凉，延和小语尤苍猝。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196398'>周公卜雒贵坦平，亦言有德易以兴。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196398'>真人龙飞狐兔窘，御营周堑压芜城。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196398'>大明寺中老竹在，九曲池上新荷生。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196398'>君胡闻此不数往，地中顽矿烦嘲评。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196398'>自言家世西湖侧，惯闻洗土开南屏。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196398'>欲空息壤发幽秘，河曲定笑劳精诚。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196398'>君不见珊瑚玲珑石上吐，海底有山那可睹。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196398_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196398'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_196398_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196190?labeling=true' target='_blank'>招缙云守关彦远教授曾彦和集平山堂次关韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196190")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196190_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196190'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196190'>蜀冈势与蜀山通，龙虎盘挐上紫空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196190'>小语还忧惊太一，高堂元自在天中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196190'>少师杨柳无遗迹，承旨歌谣有旧风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196190'>斜日芜城易兴感，忘怀犹喜故人同。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196190_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196190'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196190_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196215' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196215' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196215?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陪关彦远曾彦和集龙兴寺咏隋时双鸭脚次关韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196344")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196344_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196344'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196344'>半刺还为权刺史，朝衙不坐坐铃斋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196344'>案头通事通何事，昨夜东园芍药开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196344'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196344_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207771' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207771' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207771?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙泉寺修五百阿罗汉洞募缘疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207771")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207771_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207771'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207771'>伏以瞬青莲目，付法藏以默传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207771_comment'></div>结白叠巾，指心源而直授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207771_comment'></div>爰有迦叶首悟，庆喜先闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207771_comment'></div>夙习大乘，已超无学；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207771_comment'></div>假修小果，欲接下根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207771_comment'></div>故十二大菩萨之所总持，与五百阿罗汉之所證入，波不离水，水即是波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207771_comment'></div>此皆为一因缘，酥乳流出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207771_comment'></div>虽复说三次第，羊鹿亦无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207771_comment'></div>知性空则法空，如我说为佛说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207771_comment'></div>诸秘文之略出，众圣号之具存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207771_comment'></div>肃恭僧仪，烜赫灵迹，或经行四世界，或宴坐一嵌岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207771_comment'></div>受请天宫，应供海殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207771_comment'></div>掷锡飞去，投杯渡来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207771_comment'></div>龙虎伏驯，仙鬼陪隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207771_comment'></div>少别万里，暂休千年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207771_comment'></div>亦有混迹和光，入廛化俗，游戏自在，变化无常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207771_comment'></div>近者淮泗，塔中袖藏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207771_comment'></div>远施天台，桥上茗结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207771_comment'></div>馀花不违本心，示常住世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207771_comment'></div>觌面不识有缘，则逢永吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207771_comment'></div>是用运广大心，募清信侣，建长檐及深庑，閟异相与奇容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207771_comment'></div>平地起山，凡境成圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207771_comment'></div>大千无有尽，我愿不可穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207771_comment'></div>亦使见闻，同生欢喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207771_comment'></div>赞佛一偈，施佛一钱，在经有云，获福无量。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1207771_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207771'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷七○。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷一一九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207771_comment'></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，晁补之得赵德麟自颍州赠酒。作品：《一丛花•赵德麟送洞庭春色》（王孙眉宇凤凰雏）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页二二。）</span><div id='poem_196538' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196538' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196538?labeling=true' target='_blank'>一丛花<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>谢济倅宗室令郯送酒</a><span class='authorDate'>（1092年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196538")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196538_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196538'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196538'>王孙眉宇凤凰雏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196538_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
宿州（符离）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='35648ef965474584ac91ec22f9ac5e5d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("35648ef965474584ac91ec22f9ac5e5d");'><span id='35648ef965474584ac91ec22f9ac5e5d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>，39岁</div><div id='35648ef965474584ac91ec22f9ac5e5d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1091&endYear=1091')">1091年</a>　春晁补之乘舟赴通判扬州任。作品：《书鲁直题高求父扬清亭诗后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span><div id='poem_1207287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书鲁直题高求父扬清亭诗后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1091年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207287")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207287'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207287'>鲁直于治心养气，能为人所不为，故用于读书、为文字，致思高远，亦似其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207287_comment'></div>陶渊明泊然物外，故其语言多物外意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207287_comment'></div>而世之学渊明者，处喧为淡，例作一种不工无味之辞，曰「吾似渊明」，其质非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207287_comment'></div>元祐辛未清明前一日，符离舟中。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207287_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

镇江（丹徒）

class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_195992")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195992_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195992'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195992'>山上有山俱巃嵷，谷中通谷更唅呀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195992'>借君筇杖穿奇崄，直至西峰小九华。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195992'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195992_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　晁补之到齐州后修葺久废的北渚亭。作品：《北渚亭赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1207074' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207074' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207074?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北渚亭赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207074")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207074_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207074'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207074'>北渚亭，熙宁五年集贤校理南丰曾侯巩守齐之所作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207074_comment'></div>盖取杜甫《宴历下亭》诗以名之，所谓「东藩驻皂盖，北渚凌清河」者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207074_comment'></div>风雨废久，州人思侯，犹能道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207074_comment'></div>后二十一年而秘阁校理南阳晁补之来承守乏，侯于补之丈人行，辱出其后，访其遗文故事，廑有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207074_comment'></div>而圃多大木，历下亭又其最高处也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207074_comment'></div>举首南望，不知其有山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207074_comment'></div>尝登所谓北渚之址，则群峰屹然列于林上，城郭井闾皆在其下，陂湖迤逦，川原极望，因太息语客：「想见侯经始之意，旷然可喜，非特登东山小鲁而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207074_comment'></div>乃撤池南苇间坏亭，徙而复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207074_comment'></div>或请记其事，补之曰：「赋可也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207074_comment'></div>作《北渚亭赋》，其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1207074'>登爽丘之故墟兮，睇岱宗之独立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207074_comment'></div>根旁礴而维坤兮，支扶疏而走隰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207074_comment'></div>跆琅邪与钜野兮，梁清济而北出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207074_comment'></div>前湠漫而将屯兮，后嶊嶉其相袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207074_comment'></div>坯者、扈者，峄者、峘者，礐者、磝者，障鲁屏齐，曰惟历山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207074_comment'></div>或肺附之箕，拱环连势；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207074_comment'></div>厓绝而脉泄兮，万源发于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207074_comment'></div>谷射沙出，浸淫潗濈，瀺灂汩泌，澎濞渤潏，忽瀵起而成川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207074_comment'></div>经营一国，其利汾浍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207074_comment'></div>防为井沼，壅为碓硙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207074_comment'></div>得平而肆，乃滉漾而滂沛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207074_comment'></div>经民闾而贯府舍兮，渚为池之千亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207074_comment'></div>惟守之居，面岩背阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207074_comment'></div>邈闉阇之遗址兮，肇嘉名乎北渚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207074_comment'></div>悲经始之几何兮，牛羊牧而宇颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207074_comment'></div>非境胜之为难兮，善择胜之为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207074_comment'></div>尝试观夫其园，千章之萩，合抱之杨，立而成阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207074_comment'></div>跻历下之岧峣，望南山之孱颜，修干大枝，出櫩造天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207074_comment'></div>藐砠岫之蔽亏，乍髣髴其云烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207074_comment'></div>思仙人之楼居，尚轻举而高翻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207074_comment'></div>盍驾言其北游，登斯渚而盘桓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207074_comment'></div>冈峦忽其翔舞，萩杨眇以如箸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207074_comment'></div>抚千里于一眒，牧城郭乎环堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207074_comment'></div>其下坡湖汗漫，葭芦无畔，菱荷荇藻，蘅荃杜茞，众物居之，浩若烟海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207074_comment'></div>岁秋八月，草木始衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207074_comment'></div>乃命罾罟，观渔其脽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207074_comment'></div>鸣桹四合，方舟顺涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207074_comment'></div>鲿鲤窘乎深塘兮，鸿雁起于中坻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207074_comment'></div>复有桂舫兰枻，浮游其中，榜歌流唱，自西徂东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207074_comment'></div>纤饵投隈，微鳞挂空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207074_comment'></div>客顾而嬉，倾盂倒钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207074_comment'></div>明月出于缺岭，夕阳眇其微红。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207074_comment'></div>天耿耿而益高，夜寥寥其方中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207074_comment'></div>骇河汉之冲波，披海岱之泠风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207074_comment'></div>恐此乐之难留兮，愿乘槎乎星渚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207074_comment'></div>期韩终与偓佺兮，采芝英乎瑶圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207074_comment'></div>庶忘老而遗死兮，路漫漫其修阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207074_comment'></div>于是酒含太息，中座语客曰：「自昔太公，奄有此丘，是征五侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207074_comment'></div>桓公用之，攘狄尊周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207074_comment'></div>方其盛时，山河十二，号称东秦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207074_comment'></div>临菑遨乐，中具五民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207074_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1207074", 1207074, "Clauses/135/Comments/0")'>秋田</span>青丘，实囿海滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207074_comment'></div>而薛又其小邑也，区区之赋，食三千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207074_comment'></div>其彊孰与比哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207074_comment'></div>观华不注，朅其孤巘，虎牙桀立，芙蓉菡萏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207074_comment'></div>尚想三周，追奔执韅，下车取饮，仅以身免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207074_comment'></div>困责质于萧同，尚何私乎纪甗？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207074_comment'></div>而齐自是亦不竞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207074_comment'></div>夸夺势穷，虽彊安在！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207074_comment'></div>事以日迁，而山不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207074_comment'></div>则物之可乐，固不可得而留也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207074_comment'></div>认而有之，来不可持；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207074_comment'></div>所玩无故，去何必悲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207074_comment'></div>此齐侯之所雪涕，而晏子之所窃嗤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207074_comment'></div>今我与客，论古人则知迷，属有感而歔欷，岂不重惑也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207074_comment'></div>仕如行贾，孰非逆旅？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207074_comment'></div>托生理于四方，固朝秦而暮楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207074_comment'></div>曾无必于一笑，尚何知乎千古」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207074_comment'></div>于是客辴然喜，再拜举觞而前曰：「凡主人言，理实易求，而我旷然，已忘昔忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207074_comment'></div>使客常满，使酒不空，请寿主人，如汉孔公」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207074_comment'></div>主人亦辴然喜，受饮反觞，执客之手而言曰：「诗固有之，『未见君子，忧心忡忡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207074_comment'></div>既见君子，云乎不乐』」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207074_comment'></div>再拜，洗觞而酬客，舍然大笑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1207074_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　晁补之知齐州。作品：《睡乡阁记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三一。）</span><div id='poem_1207624' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207624' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207624?labeling=true' target='_blank'>睡乡阁记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207624")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207624_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207624'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207624'>睡乡之境，盖与齐州接，而齐州之民无知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207624_comment'></div>其政甚淳，其俗甚均，其土平夷广大，无东西南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207624_comment'></div>其人安恬舒适，无疾痛札厉，昏然不生七情，茫然不交万事，荡然不知天地日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207624_comment'></div>不丝不谷，佚卧而自足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207624_comment'></div>不舟不车，极意而远游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207624_comment'></div>冬而絺，夏而纩，不知其反寒暑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207624_comment'></div>得而悲，失而喜，不知其反利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207624_comment'></div>以谓凡其所自见者皆妄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207624_comment'></div>昔黄帝闻而乐之，閒居齐，心服形，三月弗获其治，疲而睡，盖至乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207624_comment'></div>既寝，厌其国之多事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207624_comment'></div>召二臣而告之，凡二十有八年而天下大治，如睡乡焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207624_comment'></div>降及尧舜无为，世以为睡乡之俗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207624_comment'></div>禹汤股无胈，胫无毛，剪爪为牲，以救天灾，不暇与睡乡往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207624_comment'></div>武王始克商还周，自夜不寝曰：「吾未定大业」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207624_comment'></div>周公夜以继日，坐以待旦，为王作礼乐，伐鼓叩钟，鸡人号于右，则睡乡之边徼屡警矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207624_comment'></div>其孙穆王，慕黄帝之事，因西方化人而神游焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207624_comment'></div>腾虚空，乘云雾，卒莫睹所谓睡乡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207624_comment'></div>至孔子时，有宰予者，亦奇，其学而游焉，不得其涂，大迷缪而返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207624_comment'></div>战国、秦、汉之君，悲秋伤生，内穷于长夜之饮，外累于攻战之具，于是睡乡始丘墟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207624_comment'></div>而蒙漆园吏庄周者，知过之，化为蝴蝶，翩翩其间，蒙人弗觉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207624_comment'></div>其后山人处士之慕道者，犹往往而至，至则嚣然乐而亡归，或以为之徒云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207624_comment'></div>嗟夫，余也幼而行勤，长而竞时，卒不能革，岂不迂哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207624_comment'></div>将因斯人之问津也，故记之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207624_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　四月，晁补之出知齐州，六月，抵任所。作品：《齐州谢到任表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五五。）</span>《齐州谢执政启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1207134' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207134' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207134?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207134")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207134_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207134'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207134'>臣补之言：伏奉敕命，差臣权知齐州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207134_comment'></div>臣已于六月十六日到任交割讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207134_comment'></div>从臣之欲，获奉亲舆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207134_comment'></div>便臣之私，使近乡邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207134_comment'></div>愚衷自择其所处，素望亦何以复加？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207134_comment'></div>惟寄重而才微，且人轻而恩渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207134_comment'></div>循涯深腼，陨涕难收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207134_comment'></div>臣补之诚惶诚惧，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207134_comment'></div>伏念臣五世簪缨，一介韦布，涵濡礼义，砥砺矿顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207134_comment'></div>先帝起经术之残，偶叨赐第；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207134_comment'></div>陛下修馆阁之旧，首玷具员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207134_comment'></div>傅毛羽而使翔，弛辔衔而要至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207134_comment'></div>独行偏上，不知所学之何施；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207134_comment'></div>少与数奇，秖有此心之自信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207134_comment'></div>丐广陵之贰政，在元祐之五年，从簿书中，以著作召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207134_comment'></div>虽此职名存而实废，然常情内重而外轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207134_comment'></div>再陪英俊之游，亦幸采收之及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207134_comment'></div>而臣拙艰滋尔，贫窭仍之，历尘<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1207134", 1207134, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>中秘</span>之五资，坐守集仙之四库，未尝任毫末事，安得有肤寸劳？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207134_comment'></div>于法既当为州，还朝又已踰岁，用复倾于肝鬲，至两渎于冕旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207134_comment'></div>敢图包荒，重此得请，假济南之印绂，近大野之坟庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207134_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下发天纵之多能，为日新之盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207134_comment'></div>谓未有廪而不试，盖必将试而后知，故兹愚疏，亦在器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207134_comment'></div>再念臣所领郡，耕织甚饶，人之爱生，法令易扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207134_comment'></div>虽阔达多智，不无从昔之土风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207134_comment'></div>而平易近民，亦有当时之政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207134_comment'></div>臣愿布宣上德，利养下氓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207134_comment'></div>傥小假于岁时，必粗殚于驽蹇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207134_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷圣、激切屏营之至，谨奉表称谢以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207134_comment'></div>臣补之诚惶诚惧，顿首顿首，谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207134_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207134'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五五。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207134_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207174")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207174'>擢跻中秘，九换岁华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207174_comment'></div>丐补外官，两从私便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207174_comment'></div>惟愚疏之何有，实幸会之已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207174_comment'></div>弛负云初，拊躬以惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207174_comment'></div>伏念补之总角之岁，粗习义方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207174_comment'></div>始冠之年，即婴家难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207174_comment'></div>奋饥寒而自立，信诗礼以无师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207174_comment'></div>偶尘科名，遂列学校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207174_comment'></div>至预雠书之选，悉缘试艺而升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207174_comment'></div>蓬蒿仲蔚之园，风雨子桑之屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207174_comment'></div>技无庸而常佚，老将至而自惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207174_comment'></div>是以陪群俊而蹲循，思古人而缅邈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207174_comment'></div>自请试事，庶几食功还朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207174_comment'></div>适已踰年，于法又当为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207174_comment'></div>遂上烦于听察，因俯徇于悃悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207174_comment'></div>假以名城，荣其将母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207174_comment'></div>既无烹鲜制锦可采之誉，滋有羸瓶脱辐不胜之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207174_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇某官以道事君，有功及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207174_comment'></div>推明先朝典章文物之具，崇养在位靖恭正直之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207174_comment'></div>盖欲群工，助成累盛，故兹优寄，猥逮非宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207174_comment'></div>忘朽木之难雕，责驽马以勿舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207174_comment'></div>人安其分，事可以兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207174_comment'></div>况复此邦，素称难治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207174_comment'></div>某自顾无术，但知用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207174_comment'></div>岂惟乡饮盥洗，才薄不足以化民；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207174_comment'></div>亦恐柱后惠文，威克未可以济务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207174_comment'></div>尚稍宽于辔策，得小假于岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207174_comment'></div>倘有秋毫，上酬钧造。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1094&endYear=1094')">1094年</a>　晁补之知齐州。作品：《与京东漕黄朝散启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五八。黄朝散疑为黄实。）</span>《与京东漕张道顺启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五九。）</span>《与京东提刑赵景仁启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五九。）</span>《答滋守启》<span showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207202?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与京东漕黄朝散启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207202")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207202_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207202'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207202'>伏审祗膺眷擢，荣总漕将，已择刚辰，初临治部，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207202_comment'></div>恭以某官才高当世，声发妙龄，行谊规于古人，文章固其馀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207202_comment'></div>鸿干以序，美既载于两朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207202_comment'></div>玉立而温，威自宣于百郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207202_comment'></div>属河朔流移之始复，而山东罢瘵之未苏，庶几小丰，有望卒岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207202_comment'></div>故暂假问民之寄，岂久迂揽辔之行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207202_comment'></div>补之顷滥麾符，方兹谴谪，何意周旋之旧，乃依刺举之严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207202_comment'></div>舍曰苏孺文之天，迂疏敢有；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207202_comment'></div>或者李将军之地，宽大所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207202_comment'></div>非辄病于至公，实少伸于知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207202_comment'></div>永言幸会，莫罄叙陈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207202_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207226?labeling=true' "poem_title_1207226")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207226'><div id='poem_sentence_1_1207226_comment'></div>恭以某官博学知古，通才适时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207226_comment'></div>扬历省闱，名独高于群彦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207226_comment'></div>从容使指，威自詟于属城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207226_comment'></div>方圣政之又新，岂贤猷之久屈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207226_comment'></div>补之内惭窃禄，自乞试州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207226_comment'></div>岁比不登，民逃未复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207226_comment'></div>抚循有道，在躬守于诏条；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207226_comment'></div>施舍不烦，可面承于教约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207226_comment'></div>炎歊方炽，参奉有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207226_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207226_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207227' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207227' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207227?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与京东提刑赵景仁启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207227")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207227_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207227'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207227'>光膺帝制，出领使权；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207227_comment'></div>已次封圻，初交印节，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207227_comment'></div>以某官高才敏达，雅操靖嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207227_comment'></div>玉立班行，固朝廷之妙选；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207227_comment'></div>风生群听，蔼台省之休声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207227_comment'></div>尚屈远猷，俯临一道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207227_comment'></div>行著澄清之绩，亟归侍从之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207227_comment'></div>而补之请外便亲，得官属郡，窃伺张旃之迩，将申守土之恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207227_comment'></div>欣抃之诚，倍百常品。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207227_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207229' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207229' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207229?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与淄倅启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207229")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207229_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207229'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207229'>著述寡功，迂疏畏罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207229_comment'></div>辄自陈于将母，偶得请于为州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207229_comment'></div>敢图弛负之初，乃辱驰书之贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207229_comment'></div>感铭殊厚，倾咏益勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207229_comment'></div>恭惟某官懿行温良，公才敏邵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207229_comment'></div>题舆以俟，伟仲举之高名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207229_comment'></div>投传而归，小巨卿之独操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207229_comment'></div>宜入联于省寺，宁久困于簿书！<div class='inline' "poem_title_1207230")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207230_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207230'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207230'>顷寓都城，偶连墙仞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207230_comment'></div>自惟疏拙，方力请于郡章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207230_comment'></div>亦值高明，将出宣于使指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207230_comment'></div>幸趋风之颇数，复去德之未遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207230_comment'></div>间关行路之勤，倥偬交符之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207230_comment'></div>仰依大庇，内激愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207230_comment'></div>伏念补之素不逮人，犹知信己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207230_comment'></div>少时薄技，诚何取于屠龙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207230_comment'></div>长岁虚名，固无堪于挹酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207230_comment'></div>窘中涂之疐跋，赖十手之挽推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207230_comment'></div>矧在仁贤，最为知旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207230_comment'></div>当法令再行之际，属疲驽承乏之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207230_comment'></div>庶几平均，未废询采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207230_comment'></div>恭惟某官忠以事上，惠于抚民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207230_comment'></div>尝力学夫古人，知为政之大体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207230_comment'></div>清河恃孺文之故，敢有是心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207230_comment'></div>渤海遇胜之之贤，傥缘今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207230_comment'></div>官曹冗甚，书牍阙然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207230_comment'></div>尚阻参承，重增延跂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207230_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207230_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207231' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207231' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207231?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与京东漕吕直父启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207231")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207231'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207231'>被旨中宸，改临东部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207231_comment'></div>凡居庥庇，举集欣愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207231_comment'></div>恭以某官业履忠纯，才谋敏达，当先朝之慎柬，在群俊之上游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207231_comment'></div>使指屡将，守麾荐拥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207231_comment'></div>居有显效，去常见思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207231_comment'></div>方圣政之又新，岂贤猷之尚屈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207231_comment'></div>而补之自惟疏拙，顷辱交承；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207231_comment'></div>复幸提封，犹依刺举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207231_comment'></div>惠留多裤，民借寇以无由；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207231_comment'></div>威畅连城，盗奔秦而先改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207231_comment'></div>趋参甫迩，颂咏尤深。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207231_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207243' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207243' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207243?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答通判朝奉启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207243")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207243_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207243'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207243'>得请宸庭，出分郡寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207243_comment'></div>惟倾风之素切，偶联事以为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207243_comment'></div>恭惟某官德谊致修，声猷自奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207243_comment'></div>扬历闺台之旧，回翔藩阃之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207243_comment'></div>固愿无何，如淮阳之高卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207243_comment'></div>参承良迩，欣幸尤深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207243_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207243_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207240' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207240' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207240?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答交代中散启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207240")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207240_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207240'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207240'>拜恩中禁，假守濒河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207240_comment'></div>念仳别之尚新，获交承而自幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207240_comment'></div>恭以某官德谊粹美，材猷敏彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207240_comment'></div>久柬在于班联，暂屈临于刺举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207240_comment'></div>将闻显用，诸大夫皆曰贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207240_comment'></div>固有规摹，旧令尹必以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207240_comment'></div>未遑修问，先辱流音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207240_comment'></div>参晤可期，欣愉良剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207240_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207240_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207242' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207242' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207242?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢吕大夫启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207242")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207242_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207242'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207242'>请外便私，蒙恩补郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207242_comment'></div>去阙庭之伊迩，弛负担之云初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207242_comment'></div>问俗何先，闻风增慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207242_comment'></div>补之世家单系，册府后来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207242_comment'></div>文无取于将明，武不足以捍卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207242_comment'></div>每内惭于索米，姑求试于长民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207242_comment'></div>伏遇某官脱略轩裳，燕居里第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207242_comment'></div>顾何功于报国，窃自喜于亲仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207242_comment'></div>未暇染修，先承荣问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207242_comment'></div>感铭良剧，敷述奚弹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207242_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207242_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州祭社稷祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207761")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207761'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207761'>吏慢不德无政事，无以奉社稷而临民人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207761_comment'></div>夏潦为灾，此邦之失业未复者，户十一二，且他邦之转徙廪食者寓焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207761_comment'></div>今冬又不雪，至春不雨，将大饥疫，吏何以为吏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207761_comment'></div>民何以为民？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207761_comment'></div>神食于其土，吏可罚，民不可穷也，何为使至于此极哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207761_comment'></div>顾吏无辞以谒于神，而诚可哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207761_comment'></div>庶几润泽，沛然一洒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207761_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207761_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207673' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207673' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207673?labeling=true' target='_blank'>驾部员外郎李君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207673")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207673_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207673'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207673'>君李氏，讳太，字用之，冀州信都人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207673_comment'></div>沉厚尚气节，既冠，以通礼中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207673_comment'></div>调郓州司法参军、开封县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207673_comment'></div>王畿赋省，民惰不力穑，急则椎埋为奸利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207673_comment'></div>君行野，必喻民本业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207673_comment'></div>知盗所舍止，发辄得，遂以知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207673_comment'></div>徙洋州录事参军，服丧，不赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207673_comment'></div>再调泽州推官，太师潞公为转运使，亟称其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207673_comment'></div>州获盗十馀人，狱具，且论死矣，君摘案，谓守曰「此为首，应死」，「此应减」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207673_comment'></div>守执之力，君以状议其不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207673_comment'></div>会潞公至，视之，惊曰：「微推官，民死无诉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207673_comment'></div>吾知人不缪也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207673_comment'></div>守亦竟从君议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207673_comment'></div>时元昊扰边，转输深入多覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207673_comment'></div>通判懦，不肯行，君请代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207673_comment'></div>绥御甚恩，人急而不离，亦不遇寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207673_comment'></div>守与使者争荐之，改大理寺丞、知冤朐县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207673_comment'></div>就差知藤州，迁太子中书，藤夷獠吏，北人不相通讼，或十年不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207673_comment'></div>君因其俗，为条理，民大悦，不欲其去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207673_comment'></div>迁国子博士、知雷泽县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207673_comment'></div>雷泽岁苦水，田不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207673_comment'></div>君教民作堤，乃屡登，民于今赖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207673_comment'></div>迁尚书虞部员外郎、通判兖州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207673_comment'></div>又签书永康军判官，迁比部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207673_comment'></div>知军悍不恤事，戍兵以粮恶噪营中，欲为乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207673_comment'></div>君闻，遽驰入，谕其长曰：「仓储恶，非知军一人罪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207673_comment'></div>速往自陈，尚可免；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207673_comment'></div>不者，当杀我而后起事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207673_comment'></div>众皆伏泣曰「某误我」，「某误我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207673_comment'></div>因得其倡者氏名，执送知军斩之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207673_comment'></div>迁驾部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207673_comment'></div>潞公当国，记其泽州时事，差催发诸道钱帛，又差监在京曲院，且用之，会疾卒，嘉祐六年六月二十有六日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207673_comment'></div>为人质厚不苟合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207673_comment'></div>既仕，尽推其田园资用，以与兄弟族人，人称其长者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207673_comment'></div>娶刘氏，封某县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207673_comment'></div>二子：希、罕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207673_comment'></div>罕举进士中第，左宣德郎、知某县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207673_comment'></div>四孙：宜，进士中第，恩州司户参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207673_comment'></div>丕、亘、至，皆学问自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207673_comment'></div>罕以君尝官于兖而乐之，兖人又思君不忘，既卜居矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207673_comment'></div>乃奉君之柩，以绍圣元年某月日，葬于仙源县大庭乡坛山之阴，而以左朝奉郎、太祝蔡君申之状来乞铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207673_comment'></div>罕、宜，补之场屋旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207673_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1207673'>仕岂不遇？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207673_comment'></div>名既以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207673_comment'></div>世岂不昌？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207673_comment'></div>视子若孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207673_comment'></div>生乐其土，死藏其原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207673_comment'></div>使过者泫然而语曰：「此故吾爱人之李君」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207673_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207673_comment'></div>虽亡不其存？</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1207673_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207772' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207772' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207772?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州斋僧祈晴疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1094年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", id='poem_sentence_1_1207772_comment'></div>幸嘉苗之极望，乃霖雨以涉旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207772_comment'></div>非民独招，系吏不德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207772_comment'></div>是用洁诚念咎，归命求哀，不违本心，来受此供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207772_comment'></div>敕天龙之休燕，赐田亩之收成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207772_comment'></div>仰冀威神，必垂拯护。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207772_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='616acf5351324d1595dc11119936654e_label'><a id='poem_sentence_4_196122_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八声甘州<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>历下立春</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_196542'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196542'>谓东风、定是海东来，海上最春先。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196542'>乍微阳破腊，梅心已省，柳意都还。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196542'>雪后南山耸翠，平野欲生烟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196542'>记得相逢日，如上林边。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196542_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196542'>莫叹春光易老，算今年春老，还有明年。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196542'>叹人生难得，常好是朱颜。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196542'>有随轩、金钗十二，为醉娇、一曲踏珠筵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196542'>功名事，算何如此，花下尊前。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196542_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='d2a3f7072ce04fcf81f723bc12f69e5e_label'><a class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196043")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196043_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196043'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196043'>来见红蕖隘渚香，归涂未变柳梢黄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196043'>殷勤趵突溪中水，相送扁舟向汶阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196043_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196043'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196043_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196044?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196044_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196044'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196044'>鸳鸯鸂鶒绕渔梁，摇漾山光与水光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196044_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196044'>不管使君征棹远，依然飞下旧池塘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196044_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　晁补之知齐州。作品：《齐州谢赐历日表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span><div id='poem_1207130' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207130' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207130?labeling=true' target='_blank'>齐州谢赐历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207130")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207130_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207130'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207130'>臣补之言：准进奏院递到宣一道，赐臣绍圣二年历日一卷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207130_comment'></div>臣闻迎日推策，在昔黄帝之御邦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207130_comment'></div>以初为常，自时周王之赋故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207130_comment'></div>臣叨守长，职在承宣，乐与吏民，同遵诏令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207130_comment'></div>臣补之诚惶诚惧，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207130_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下修身以道，求端于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207130_comment'></div>璧合珠连，焕三辰之顺晷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207130_comment'></div>云行雨施，肇万物之华心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207130_comment'></div>虽岁事之宜颁，本王功之最急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207130_comment'></div>玑衡潜运，孰知圣治之日新；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207130_comment'></div>铫耨时修，已觉丰年之气应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207130_comment'></div>臣无任戴天荷圣、激切屏营之至，谨奉表称谢以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207130_comment'></div>臣补之诚惶诚惧，顿首顿首，谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207130'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五四。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷三九，《古俪府》卷一一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207130_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end
