class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207135")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207135_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207135'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207135'>臣补之言：臣昨任知齐州，为扬州修过摘星楼事，伏蒙圣恩，特从宽典，就差通判应天府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207135_comment'></div>臣已于三月二日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207135_comment'></div>小己下僚，昧于职守；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207135_comment'></div>盛时公议，特此贷全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207135_comment'></div>未使废闲，犹叨安便；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207135_comment'></div>愧深汗溢，感极涕横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207135_comment'></div>臣补之<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣家世凋零，在朝廷者无几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207135_comment'></div>人材阘茸，所学问者又非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207135_comment'></div>猥迫寒饥，出营仕进，本自安于常调，固绝望于亨涂，庶几孤愚，不越分量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207135_comment'></div>而偶弼臣之一荐，滥文馆者十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207135_comment'></div>初无毫毛，得被驱策，徒累资任，以致麾符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207135_comment'></div>臣自揣思，久当颠沛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207135_comment'></div>加以祚薄多故，器小易盈，不能恪居于其官，遂使咎生于所忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207135_comment'></div>幸仁圣矜其如此，故迂疏尚以并容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207135_comment'></div>第解郡章，旋沾禄食，将母之幸，于臣已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207135_comment'></div>德大施隆，身微命贱，成遂莫悔，启处若惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207135_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下明目达聪，与人为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207135_comment'></div>毕修祖宗之旧政，遍揽中外之英材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207135_comment'></div>建官惟贤，宥过无大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207135_comment'></div>虽凭生之蝼蚁，亦蒙赖于乾坤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207135_comment'></div>臣敢不谨畏自新，忠诚内誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207135_comment'></div>念洗心以偿罪谴，既负负无可言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207135_comment'></div>思发愤以赴功名，又区区不足道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207135_comment'></div>报恩无所，碎首为期。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207135_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4a36f84c47504b65a52ce1bf8408bde8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4a36f84c47504b65a52ce1bf8408bde8");'><span id='4a36f84c47504b65a52ce1bf8408bde8_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，43岁</div><div id='4a36f84c47504b65a52ce1bf8408bde8' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之通判应天府。作品：《南京谢李中书启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五六。）</span>《好事近•南都寄历下人》（丝管闹南湖）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页四四。）</span>《鹧鸪天》（欲上南湖彩舫嬉）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页四五。）</span><div id='poem_1207177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207177?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南京谢李中书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207177")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207177'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207177'>不虔法守，致速人言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207177_comment'></div>尚赖原情，姑从降秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207177_comment'></div>驰驱就道，跼蹐临官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207177_comment'></div>荷天地之曲成，玷钧衡之平施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207177_comment'></div>重叨安便，几至涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207177_comment'></div>补之闻大匠取材，无不可施于绳墨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207177_comment'></div>中材见遇，悉能自附于功名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207177_comment'></div>从古以然，惟人所任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207177_comment'></div>而补之禀资朽薄，处己拙疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207177_comment'></div>被蒙国士之知，尘污文馆之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207177_comment'></div>未尝试用于一事，徒兹廪食者十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207177_comment'></div>群飞刺天，自乘时而遇合；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207177_comment'></div>决起控地，独揣分而退安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207177_comment'></div>盖当庚午之冬，即请广陵之佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207177_comment'></div>居然充数，坐及成资，以彼大邦，凡更四守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207177_comment'></div>既蠢愚之无补，又施设之不专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207177_comment'></div>乃废城闉，有故亭榭，数里而近，历年于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207177_comment'></div>至于易弊为新，增小使大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207177_comment'></div>以职事束于为贰，在人情或所不争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207177_comment'></div>而又考李宗谔祥符之图，稽皇甫湜长庆之记，盖节使游观之旧，有玉钩摘星之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207177_comment'></div>郡当水冲，人皆目睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207177_comment'></div>似闻杜牧之句，别有雷唐之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207177_comment'></div>明月扬州，谁家《水调》，此诗具在，此地可求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207177_comment'></div>惟昧周防，罔思辍止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207177_comment'></div>谓经营不急，实牵连佐守之时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207177_comment'></div>然斧斤未加，皆成就还朝之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207177_comment'></div>文检良在，岁月可推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207177_comment'></div>非门墙高谊，已深察其无他；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207177_comment'></div>则菅蒯贱生，亦安得有今日？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207177_comment'></div>仍偶去官而会赦，乃烦善贷而兼收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207177_comment'></div>第解藩麾，旋沾禄养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207177_comment'></div>仰圣时之忠厚，俯小己以惊惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207177_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇某官以道事君，推诚与下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207177_comment'></div>无私足以助元化，有容足以抚群伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207177_comment'></div>发为久大之图，驯致中和之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207177_comment'></div>故宽罪戾，未遂弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207177_comment'></div>失官与官，从近得近，使自为计，不过若斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207177_comment'></div>已幸匿瑕，敢同车马之不受？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207177_comment'></div>尚为跃冶，深惭桃李之无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207177_comment'></div>固当克谨官箴，益修士操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207177_comment'></div>信于知己，虽后世浅夫慕义感遇之词；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207177_comment'></div>亦不失人，盖自昔君子成功立名之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207177_comment'></div>补之愿不忘旧德，常在下风。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1207177_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196586' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196586' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196586?labeling=true' target='_blank'>好事近 南都寄历下人</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196586")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196586_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196586'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196586'>丝管闹南湖，湖上醉游时晚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196586'>独看小桥官柳，泪无言偷满。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196586_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196586'>坐中谁唱解愁词，红妆劝金盏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196586'>物是奈人非是，负东风心眼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196586_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196586'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196586_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196699' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196699' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196699")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196699_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_sentence_1_196699'>还思北渚与岚漪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196699'>圆荷盖水垂杨暗，鸂鶒鸳鸯总下时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196699_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196699'>持此意，遣谁知。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196699'>清波还照鬓间丝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196699_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196699'>西楼重唱池塘好，应有红妆敛翠眉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_196699_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之岳翁杜纯弟杜纮知应天府，晁补之改通判亳州，九月二十五日抵达任所。作品：《临江仙》（自古齐山重九胜）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页四六。）</span>《临江仙•用韵和韩求仁南都留别》（曾唱牡丹留客饮）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页四七。）</span>《临江仙•用韵和韩求仁南都留别》（常记河阳花县里）<span id='poem_sentence_0_196624'>自古齐山重九胜，登临梦想依依。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196624'>偶来恰值菊花时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196624'>难逢开口笑，须插满头归。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196624_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196624'>昨夜一江风色好，平明秋浦帆飞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196624'>可怜如赴使君期。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196624'>且当酬令节，不用叹斜晖。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_196624_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196618' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196618' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196618?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临江仙<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>用韵和韩求仁南都留别</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_196618'>曾唱牡丹留客饮，明年何处相逢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196618'>忽惊鹊起落梧桐。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196618'>绿荷多少恨，回首背西风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196618_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196618'>莫叹今宵身是客，一尊未晓犹同。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196618'>此身应似去来鸿。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196619' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196619?labeling=true' target='_blank'>临江仙<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>用韵和韩求仁南都留别</a><span class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196654' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196654?labeling=true' target='_blank'>减字木兰花 和求仁南郡都别</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196654")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196654_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196654'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196654'>萍蓬行路。来不多时还遣去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196654'>会有重来。还把清樽此地开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196654_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196654'>隋河杨柳。见我五年三执手。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196654_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196654'>红泪多情。待得重来走马迎。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196563?labeling=true' target='_blank'>忆秦娥 和留守赵无愧送别</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196563")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196563_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196563'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196563'>牵人意。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196563'>高堂照碧临烟水。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196563'>清秋至。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196563'>东山时伴，谢公携妓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196563_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196563'>黄菊虽残堪泛蚁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196563'>乍寒犹有重阳味。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196563'>应相记。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196563'>坐中少个，孟嘉狂醉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196563_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b1dca476274a4c248772413e41a64b5e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b1dca476274a4c248772413e41a64b5e");'><span id='b1dca476274a4c248772413e41a64b5e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，43岁</div><div id='b1dca476274a4c248772413e41a64b5e' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之通判应天府。作品：《贺知府赵待制移镇启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五九。）</span>《留台韩朝请到状启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五九。）</span><div id='poem_1207233' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207233' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207233?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺知府赵待制移镇启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207233")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207233_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207233'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207233'>光被制书，改司京钥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207233_comment'></div>凡居庥庇，举集欢愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207233_comment'></div>恭以某官中正而通，优游以法，蕴经邦之远业，在志学之妙年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207233_comment'></div>入奉清光，文采昭回之上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207233_comment'></div>出临方面，折冲燕笑之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207233_comment'></div>自当纲纪朝廷，吁谟帷幄，尚兹均佚，咸谓非宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207233_comment'></div>补之疏拙守藩，乖违得罪，敢图恩宥，乃佐留居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207233_comment'></div>仰大厦之足依，俯孤踪而自慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207233_comment'></div>妍和取道，顺履逢休。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207233_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207235' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207235' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207235?labeling=true' target='_blank'>留台韩朝请到状启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207235")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207235_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207235'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207235'>奉法不虔，蒙恩薄谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207235_comment'></div>敢图佐守，遂隶分台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207235_comment'></div>眷言离索之情，获此从游之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207235_comment'></div>恭以某官庆传累世，誉满本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207235_comment'></div>子产知然明之心，殊非今日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207235_comment'></div>文举待正平之少，固与忘年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207235_comment'></div>马伏枥而长思，萍因风而相值。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207235_comment'></div>人生投分，势岂偶然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207235_comment'></div>念布叙以未遑，辱音题之良厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207235_comment'></div>欣愉感荷，倍百鄙怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207235_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207235_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='41805446802348818f2fba69a362657f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("41805446802348818f2fba69a362657f");'><span id='41805446802348818f2fba69a362657f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，43岁</div><div id='41805446802348818f2fba69a362657f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　晁补之通判应天府。作品：《安康郡君庞氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六四。庞氏为陈师道之母。）</span><div id='poem_1207671' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207671' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207671?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安康郡君庞氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍圣二年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207671")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207671_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207671'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207671'>国子博士、彭城陈侯之夫人、安康郡君庞氏，绍圣二年三月壬戌卒，年七十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207671_comment'></div>将以其秋七月丁酉，祔于彭城白鹤之吕栅博士之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207671_comment'></div>其子江州彭泽令师道以书来，曰：「师道不幸，先君之丧也，高邮秦观尝铭矣，不克葬，今举夫人以祔，惟子实铭吾母」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207671_comment'></div>补之曰：「唯」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207671_comment'></div>庞氏，单州成武人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207671_comment'></div>故丞相、赠司空兼侍中、颍国庄敏公籍，忠厚有谋，功在王室，夫人考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207671_comment'></div>妣边氏，秀国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207671_comment'></div>初，颍公从其考魏公格宦于彭城，魏公始见夫人之舅三司盐铁副使、赠工部侍郎洎而贤之，语颍公「必与厚」，故夫人归于博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207671_comment'></div>陈氏故儒者，有家法，夫人宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207671_comment'></div>始封南安县君，徙封郡，皆颍公恩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207671_comment'></div>三子二女皆令孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207671_comment'></div>师黯，光山令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207671_comment'></div>师仲，河中府司录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207671_comment'></div>师道，其季也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207671_comment'></div>淑嫁张舜民，媛嫁章珙，皆先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207671_comment'></div>舜民今以直秘阁为陕西转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207671_comment'></div>而师道好古自修而有文，耻以其技干时，将老焉，乡人推之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207671_comment'></div>士尝与游者扳而出之，其在位有力者以其行闻于天子而官之，乃以亳州司户参军教授其州，又教授颍州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207671_comment'></div>既迎夫人还自颍，已疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207671_comment'></div>夜次东阿步，星堕其旁贾人舟上，如丹如橐，出芒下尾，无几何而夫人没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207671_comment'></div>且瞑，西向卧，讽弥陀不绝口，亦异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207671_comment'></div>为人慈俭，所知甚远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207671_comment'></div>蔡女子于不嫁，称师聚徒，传一世以为仙，自大人显族争奔向之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207671_comment'></div>夫人独不然，曰：「道贵清净，反此祸也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207671_comment'></div>后于卒败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207671_comment'></div>博士推赀以业群弟，夫人安之，不以累其夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207671_comment'></div>既从其子仕州县，御菲而甘，不以累其子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207671_comment'></div>人皆曰：「生贫贱，若是固易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207671_comment'></div>以大家子为此而泰，可哉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207671_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1207671'>尝俭而为奢，一饱已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207671_comment'></div>由丰而得约，则难以乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207671_comment'></div>居难而裕，惟庞公有女，惟陈侯有妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207671_comment'></div>士不其尔，或养以移志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207671_comment'></div>我铭夫人，以愧世之士。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1207671_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

菏泽（定陶）

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，43岁</div><div id='65c7ade43b6d4b108e0d9ef5958f9257' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　晁补之岳翁杜纯弟杜纮知应天府，晁补之改通判亳州，九月二十五日抵达任所。作品：《亳州谢到任表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1207136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207136?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207136")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207136_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207136'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207136'>臣补之言：臣昨知齐州，缘旧公坐，正月十日准敕降通判南京，碍亲回避，九月三日准敕就差通判亳州，于当月二十五日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207136_comment'></div>咎悔难追，已更寒暑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207136_comment'></div>嫌疑自列，敢惮道涂！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207136_comment'></div>再服宽恩，重增感涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207136_comment'></div>臣补之诚惶诚惧，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207136_comment'></div>伏念臣粗知学问，本乏材能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207136_comment'></div>仕岂为贫，惭居卑之亦分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207136_comment'></div>家虽积善，伤馀庆之已微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207136_comment'></div>尝念居不可以求安，福孰先于无祸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207136_comment'></div>故六年迁徙，甘常困于米盐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207136_comment'></div>而群从凋零，祗自怜其形影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207136_comment'></div>未敢当江湖飞集之数，何足挂朝廷论议之间？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207136_comment'></div>每钦宥过无大之仁，则思见危致命之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207136_comment'></div>未试以事，孰明此心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207136_comment'></div>谅与釜之已多，诚挈瓶之何有！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207136_comment'></div>但知揣己，皆是踰涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207136_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下惟时宪天，常善救物，稽先朝之美意，与治古以同兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207136_comment'></div>谓荡荡民无能名，佑启我以正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207136_comment'></div>故业业日致其孝，继序思不忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207136_comment'></div>盖欲得万国之欢心，足以敛五福而敷锡，虽甚微鄙，不终弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207136_comment'></div>重念臣顷迫养亲，久从补外，昨由公坐得谴，止以佐官连书，亦既累年，实更三赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207136_comment'></div>事虽自致，情则无他，庶省循苟免于人非，或湔洗稍容于国是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207136_comment'></div>犬马能报，况服冠裾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207136_comment'></div>樗栎无堪，犹足燔燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207136_comment'></div>终自知其死所，不敢爱于身先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207136_comment'></div>瞻望阙廷，臣无任感天荷圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1207136_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ff11ee8a032f4c469227a371e3dc2c51_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ff11ee8a032f4c469227a371e3dc2c51");'><span id='ff11ee8a032f4c469227a371e3dc2c51_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，43岁</div><div id='ff11ee8a032f4c469227a371e3dc2c51' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之通判亳州。作品：《亳州谢执政启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五六。）</span>《亳州上李中书启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五六。）</span>《答亳州赵教授启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1207178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207178")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207178'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207178'>以罪贬官，偷安为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207178_comment'></div>因嫌易地，得近已多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207178_comment'></div>每烦造物之仁，秪剧中情之愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207178_comment'></div>伏念补之本由寒鄙，偶在选抡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207178_comment'></div>舍矢尽迟，识野麋之至弱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207178_comment'></div>运斤不顾，知社栎之无堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207178_comment'></div>同时馆中，最下郡守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207178_comment'></div>窃谓追群髦则不足，营一职其庶几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207178_comment'></div>不图迂疏，尚挂咎悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207178_comment'></div>量才揣分，力如虎以安能？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207178_comment'></div>计事言功，食无鱼而敢叹？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207178_comment'></div>盖既释耒耜而在此，则欲去斗筲而何之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207178_comment'></div>赖蒙矜怜，不远移徙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207178_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇某官引君于道，附众以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207178_comment'></div>方薰陶乎大和，以积累于至治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207178_comment'></div>故记嵬琐，不终弃捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207178_comment'></div>某敢不慎跣之伤，念鞭其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207178_comment'></div>淹留抑末，时亹亹而过中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207178_comment'></div>亮直敢云，心怦怦其何极！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207178_comment'></div>犹有异日，宁忘至恩！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207178_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207178_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州上李中书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207179")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207179'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207179'>夙被采收，久知幸会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207179_comment'></div>讦俞地重，敢复恃于门墙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207179_comment'></div>奔走位卑，自宜疏于竿牍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207179_comment'></div>载寝兴而念此，终震叠而怛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207179_comment'></div>盖以十年之遇未酬，一切之仪又阙，坐恐鱼鸟池林莫还，遂令阶庭踵武长埽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207179_comment'></div>飘零自力，企慕更勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207179_comment'></div>恭惟迩来调燮燕閒，神明劳相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207179_comment'></div>伏以某官赞天化育，为士宗师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207179_comment'></div>学隘囷仓，旷山川之受纳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207179_comment'></div>文非纂绣，耿经纬之昭回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207179_comment'></div>既刚毅以有容，亦柔嘉而维则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207179_comment'></div>此老氏尝称君子之盛德，抑仲尼所谓善人之为邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207179_comment'></div>加以遵正考父之益恭，兼万石君之至慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207179_comment'></div>良法美政，世但见于持循；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207179_comment'></div>密议远图，中已殚于裨补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207179_comment'></div>要使礼刑达而内叙，兵食足而外宾，副上主求旧之心，终先朝用儒之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207179_comment'></div>此大雅意，宁众人知！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207179_comment'></div>而补之幸逢休明，偶脱泥滓，亦欲愤发，自见毫毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207179_comment'></div>孤植难伸，良辰不与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207179_comment'></div>平生狂狷之尚，中年期待之私，一事莫谐，三叹何补！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207179_comment'></div>独窃比汉臣之自诵，忘本则难；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207179_comment'></div>岂徒如魏虏之感恩，必报而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207179_comment'></div>第以赋分薄而造物不能厚，禀资拙而匠石无由工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207179_comment'></div>开笼鹄失而始惊，捩手羹空而自笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207179_comment'></div>迷涂未返，壮日已赊，惟激烈之素怀，则萧条而长在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207179_comment'></div>每羞王密谒杨震之意，犹鄙谷永谢王凤之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207179_comment'></div>使愚无似，有宣光不比之称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207179_comment'></div>则贤我公，乃献子可贺之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207179_comment'></div>然而志阔事迕，才疏效迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207179_comment'></div>下若战国公子之市名，当时群豪之赴义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207179_comment'></div>犹可蒯缑弹铗，预三千客而有鱼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207179_comment'></div>或能左手捧槃，招十九人而俱歃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207179_comment'></div>此自不果，他复何言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207179_comment'></div>第依庇存，姑逭疵悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207179_comment'></div>念虚死不如立节，而止谤莫若自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207179_comment'></div>鹤鸣远而终闻，兰生幽而亦佩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207179_comment'></div>诚足动金石，则有不诚无不动；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207179_comment'></div>信可行蛮貊，则有不信无不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207179_comment'></div>奔踶可驯千里，要烦于良驭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207179_comment'></div>铅刀且弊一割，更繄于善操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207179_comment'></div>重惟左右以主张吾道之公，有识拔后辈之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207179_comment'></div>取人以恕，得士多贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207179_comment'></div>汇茹而升，簪履皆在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207179_comment'></div>医门容疾，富绩仁邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207179_comment'></div>宁其中弃之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207179_comment'></div>既已辱收之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207179_comment'></div>用此自信，独无介然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207179_comment'></div>若唐两生，奏记当路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207179_comment'></div>至愿为燎供席，蒸芝效祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207179_comment'></div>顾有义焉，何至是也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207179_comment'></div>更望日崇令问，益被眷图，早正台衡，大庇伦品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207179_comment'></div>不惟一士，独荷至私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207179_comment'></div>方届寒凉，尚赊侍省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207179_comment'></div>伏乞为上自寿，副人所瞻，下情无任乡往倾颂恳切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1207179_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答亳州赵教授启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207213")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207213'>兹缘罪谴，复避亲嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207213_comment'></div>跂才誉之素勤，联官曹而深幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207213_comment'></div>恭以教授推官端良可度，超荦不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207213_comment'></div>蚤收科第之荣，方莅胶庠之佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207213_comment'></div>粹精古学，本自得于下帷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207213_comment'></div>敏捷高辞，咸相传于倚马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207213_comment'></div>操惟幽而不改，声乃大而远闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207213_comment'></div>倦飞聊比于一枝，筑室尚容于三径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207213_comment'></div>先烦庆问，尤认眷私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207213_comment'></div>感服忻愉，并增诚悃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207213_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207213_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2605d8ecf4e2481bb418b31c5dfb6fc5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2605d8ecf4e2481bb418b31c5dfb6fc5");'><span id='2605d8ecf4e2481bb418b31c5dfb6fc5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>，43岁</div><div id='2605d8ecf4e2481bb418b31c5dfb6fc5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1095')">1095年</a>　晁补之通判亳州。作品：《祭陕州二叔父文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六0。）</span>《祭外舅兵部杜侍郎文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六0。）</span>《朝散郎充集贤殿修撰提举西京嵩山崇福宫杜公行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六二。）</span><div id='poem_1207736' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207736' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207736?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭陕州二叔父文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年10月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207736")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207736_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207736'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207736'>绍圣二年十月四日，从侄承议郎、充秘阁校理、通判亳州军州管内劝农事、武骑尉补之，谨遣人以清酌庶羞之奠，敬致祭于二叔父故知陕州、秘监学士之灵曰：我宗之牒，鼻祖澶渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207736_comment'></div>起国之初，大于文元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207736_comment'></div>务德不华，中微以艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207736_comment'></div>自我先君，诸仲叔季，蝉联世科，将陨而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207736_comment'></div>先君尝谓，叔父温文，舍叔父贤，孰知先君！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207736_comment'></div>施及不肖，如亲父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207736_comment'></div>匪瓞之私，自为知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207736_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207736_comment'></div>天祸我家，先君早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207736_comment'></div>孰怜其孤，亦叔父志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207736_comment'></div>教之誉之，人莫间之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207736_comment'></div>误意先君，鸣阴必和，不知其子，弱不克荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207736_comment'></div>乃尔代匮，丞中秘书，叔父为监，联骖并裾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207736_comment'></div>贫得守齐，亦既陛遣，病休不省，卧忧展转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207736_comment'></div>愚触罪悔，佐守宋京，书来九返，劳抚于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207736_comment'></div>仕何足云，匪姑息故，爱缘其私，则以尊祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207736_comment'></div>今年在宋，闻疾请州，问安六辈，信无报邮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207736_comment'></div>谓昔不然，知惫莫勉，如何不淑，陨命候馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207736_comment'></div>痛我家世，善人日微，非此其承，其来益衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207736_comment'></div>念此如焚，血溢为泣，怛然寐哭，寤追靡及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207736_comment'></div>一官所撄，奠不抚筵，孰知此哀，彼苍者天！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207736_comment'></div>尚曰幸哉，其子如此，不鄙为兄，犹同父弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207736_comment'></div>誓当与约，弥远益亲，如我叔父，与先君存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207736_comment'></div>往不其亡，此舌不吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207736_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1207736_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207737' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207737' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207737?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭外舅兵部杜侍郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年11月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207737")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207737_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207737'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207737'>绍圣二年十一月二十八日，第五女婿承议郎、充秘阁校理、通判亳州军州兼管内劝农事、武骑尉晁补之，谨遣外孙女晁氏十五姐湘，以清酌庶羞之奠，敬致祭于故修撰、侍郎丈人杜公之灵曰：补之少日，愚无师闻，闻诗与礼，于我先君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207737_comment'></div>先君为言，公孝而贤，汝长而师，则公莫先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207737_comment'></div>从先君南，年十有五，方舟兰陵，遇公于旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207737_comment'></div>会先君出，出拜侍公，笼凫于阶，翛然异容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207737_comment'></div>曰此何为，玩物丧志，若斯其年，一日千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207737_comment'></div>念先君语，竦然起惊，公严而和，导我以情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207737_comment'></div>却后五年，初随乡举，过公濮阳，与坐笑语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207737_comment'></div>谓为可教，而不瑕疵，申以婚姻，眷言自兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207737_comment'></div>归宜其家，惟公淑女，使寡悔尤，亦公女助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207737_comment'></div>公仕浸显，官常百秩，禄仁其宗，逮孤与疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207737_comment'></div>堂堂在廷，如皋如夔，至其胸中，百不一施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207737_comment'></div>谓公仁人，宜寿宜贵，何辜于天，而不憖遗！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207737_comment'></div>国士之丧，国士之哭，失声相骇，迨于僮仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207737_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207737_comment'></div>人谁不死，死谁则哀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207737_comment'></div>哀在哲人，匪婚姻怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207737_comment'></div>念公自养，后己先人，公疾而忧，公非爱身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207737_comment'></div>众雏堕地，则各有命，矧公贤子，而忧不竞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207737_comment'></div>生无世累，糠秕纷华，没反其真，孰为我家？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207737_comment'></div>谓公之知，进乎此矣，此言之闻，公悲可止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207737_comment'></div>念公之女，毁不图生，去五百里，勉之使行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207737_comment'></div>一官所撄，奠不亲伛，有娈其笄，公外孙女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207737_comment'></div>庶几平生，御此酒脯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207737_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207737_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207661' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207661' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207661?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝散郎充集贤殿修撰提举西京嵩山崇福宫杜公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207661")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207661_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207661'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207661'>公讳纯，字孝锡，杜氏，濮州鄄城县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207661_comment'></div>讳尧臣，尚书司封郎中兼侍御知杂事、赠尚书刑部侍郎，曾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207661_comment'></div>妣马氏，永安县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207661_comment'></div>继马氏，万年县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207661_comment'></div>讳曾，尚书吏部郎中、直史馆、赠吏部尚书，祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207661_comment'></div>妣刘氏，彭城县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207661_comment'></div>讳彭寿，尚书虞部郎中、赠特进，考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207661_comment'></div>妣朱氏，太宁郡太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207661_comment'></div>自侍郎立朝，有清名，尚书以文学政事显，杜氏始大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207661_comment'></div>而公生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1207661", 1207661, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>警异</span>重厚，不类常儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207661_comment'></div>方四岁，乳母抱立尚书侧，尚书指庭前物作诗句戏之，即能为俪语，尚书大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207661_comment'></div>以荫为郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207661_comment'></div>未冠，知彊学，尚义理，不妄笑言，有成人之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207661_comment'></div>族父没官东南海上，其孤弱，柩不能还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207661_comment'></div>其从兄当行迎丧，公曰：「世母依兄，兄不可以远」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207661_comment'></div>即自请往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207661_comment'></div>众犹难焉，特进嘉而遣之，及期而丧至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207661_comment'></div>时杜氏四世二十丧未葬，聚族而谋，旷年不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207661_comment'></div>公卑且幼，毅然而起，陈义甚高，众惭戚，乃定葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207661_comment'></div>举进士，两预乡书不第，即舍去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207661_comment'></div>调曹州乘氏县主簿，摄令南华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207661_comment'></div>野人有持锄剽商者，商诣县，言而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207661_comment'></div>后获二盗，伏罪，而商，太原人也，移文太原，待报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207661_comment'></div>盗以应久系，泣请公得一至家诀，公恻然许之，左右谏不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207661_comment'></div>盗感恩，皆如期还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207661_comment'></div>改泉州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207661_comment'></div>舶商岁再至，一舶连二十艘，异货禁物如山，吏私与市者，价十一二售，幸不谁何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207661_comment'></div>遍一州吏争与市，惟守关咏与公不买一毫，人亦莫知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207661_comment'></div>后事发逮狱，而公不预，咏犹以不觉察免官，且檄参对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207661_comment'></div>公愤然陈书使者，白咏无罪，而虚其廨居咏，卒得平反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207661_comment'></div>丁朱夫人忧，既除，为河中府河西县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207661_comment'></div>熙宁初，自外上书言事，宰相王荆公异之，即日召为制置三司条例司检详文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207661_comment'></div>寻为大理寺详断官，删定编敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207661_comment'></div>荆公既奇其才，数与论天下事，谓可显任，亟荐于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207661_comment'></div>擢光禄寺丞，充审刑详议官、枢密院检讨官兼管勾枢密院宣敕等库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207661_comment'></div>或议肉刑难悉复，而姑欲以刖代死刑之轻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207661_comment'></div>公言：「今盗抵死，万室岁或至五十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207661_comment'></div>以死惧民，民常不畏死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207661_comment'></div>若但刖，民知不死，犯益众，是名轻而实重也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207661_comment'></div>事乃寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207661_comment'></div>又论禁军亡，律疏敕密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207661_comment'></div>律从军征讨而亡十五日，绞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207661_comment'></div>敕上禁军逃三日，斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207661_comment'></div>若三路沿边征戍及他征戍，与化外接者，皆以敕从事，而平居亡伍稍附律，疏其期，岁可活壮夫命数千，因收其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207661_comment'></div>后敕期满七日斩，自公启之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207661_comment'></div>又论商货犯禁至黥配，非国笼利，则皆良民，一遭此，终身不复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207661_comment'></div>今加役流，本死刑，尚有岁月免复之限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207661_comment'></div>若持仗行贾而捍斗者，黥配，馀以货重入罪，止加役流，恩无涯矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207661_comment'></div>不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207661_comment'></div>时秦凤路经略使郭逵、管勾秦凤沿边安抚司公事王韶互讼不公，执政遣公往，讯韶，实违法用官钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207661_comment'></div>而朝廷方倚韶以熙河事，不欲竟其词，即授公大理寺丞、检详枢密院吏房文字，而未下也，而公遽以其欺状闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207661_comment'></div>文潞公、富韩公见其奏，叹赏而心危之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207661_comment'></div>会遭特进丧，以监察御史里行蔡确代公，而韶无罪，公免官，于是始忤当路矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207661_comment'></div>免丧，韩康公为宰相，差京西计置籴运，又为提举三司会计司检详文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207661_comment'></div>而荆公还朝，公乃自请监池州酒税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207661_comment'></div>一年，复入为删定编敕，始迁大理寺丞，改宣德郎，为详定官制所检讨，兼兵部主簿，迁通直郎、大理正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207661_comment'></div>上言：「京师聚万姓，易以宿奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207661_comment'></div>朝廷非不恶告讦而有觇事者，以发奸非扰人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207661_comment'></div>比来或徒隶于官司觖望，或民自相嫌怨，或但冒赏无端倪，泛曰『某有罪』、『某知情』，官不识所鞫之因，囚不省见逮之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207661_comment'></div>若告者许有司先取实，后不实以诬坐，则所告皆当竟之词矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207661_comment'></div>又刑寺积习，官不敢制吏，吏操事白官，官曰：『如此乎』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207661_comment'></div>则以为近嫌，必反听吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207661_comment'></div>至吏先具，曰某欲追，某欲鞫，某欲释，则随而判曰：某追，某鞫，某释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207661_comment'></div>上下猜质，严于合券。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207661_comment'></div>今许官有异见，皆自书其牍，即行，后不当，不以累吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207661_comment'></div>则官得伸，吏无以藉其口」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207661_comment'></div>皆不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207661_comment'></div>而公持此自如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207661_comment'></div>吏抱案至，无疑，则大书其尾曰「如此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207661_comment'></div>因语吏：「我有笔墨在，可免尔口语相稽也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207661_comment'></div>然其弊久，力不能独胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207661_comment'></div>隰州商尹奇贸温泉官矾，或告引外有馀矾冒禁，而奇对实官润之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207661_comment'></div>寺议械奇河东就讯，公言：「奇情应若是，不惟傅致伤事，恐民相惊，不复贸矾，则数百万之货皆为土石，且失边计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207661_comment'></div>弗已，则请没其馀而释奇」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207661_comment'></div>事粗行，会曹州民王坦避水患，以其车载人货取直至京师，都税院栏头甲绐之曰：「车无火印，匿税也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207661_comment'></div>贿我，则免」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207661_comment'></div>民遽遗钱三百，免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207661_comment'></div>其徒告之，寺议，又当甲与民因税事取与，皆黥配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207661_comment'></div>公曰：「车民当所用旧物不税，而甲以诈乞取，应杖，民无罪也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207661_comment'></div>争，累不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207661_comment'></div>长扬汲贰吕孝廉以为言，民竟不免，乃并尹奇事，坐前后异议，夺通直郎，废于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207661_comment'></div>韩康公留守洛，奏为神宗山陵司勾当公事，恩复阶，迁奉议郎，赐服银绯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207661_comment'></div>上之元年，诏举直言士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207661_comment'></div>枢密范公、门下韩公与尚书王公存、尚书孙公永，皆荐公才任谏诤，时已擢河北转运判官矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207661_comment'></div>初更役书，献议详尽，宰相司马温公至以书称之，曰：「足下在彼，朝廷无河北忧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207661_comment'></div>旧河防但隶转运司，后都水置外丞专领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207661_comment'></div>公言：「前隶本司，决溢不加多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207661_comment'></div>后置丞，决溢不加寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207661_comment'></div>虽天灾不系彼此，而大抵出财之司则常爱费而后不急，用财之官则宁过计而无不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207661_comment'></div>臣行洺州，水浸城且坏，调急夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207661_comment'></div>而漳河都大司乃有卒七百，不敢用遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207661_comment'></div>应急修捍，则称当禀外丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207661_comment'></div>暨关外丞，则执不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207661_comment'></div>此由事责各异，条禁相妨，不如使归一，《易》曰『简则易从』也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207661_comment'></div>后外丞废置不常，然卒委转运司兼领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1207661_comment'></div>澶州跨河南北为二城，北为海盐、土盐通商地，而南则解盐禁地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1207661_comment'></div>公言：「南两县亦产土盐，利之所在，刑不能禁，故两县解盐课常不登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1207661_comment'></div>前此，有司屡请并濮阳、卫南许通商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1207661_comment'></div>三司亦知其弊，以郡扼河，欲姑存之，为解盐藩篱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1207661_comment'></div>故既不许通商，而亦不立解盐岁额，所以持循经久，官与民阴便，两亦所失微也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1207661_comment'></div>自立额，殊失三司本意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1207661_comment'></div>官不免配卖，而土盐滋冒禁，可且仍旧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1207661_comment'></div>朝廷深然之，而议不决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1207661_comment'></div>先是，宗室租免女听编民通婚，皆予官，民争市婚为官户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1207661_comment'></div>公言：「入赀得承务郎以上，犹不为官户，盖嫌其逃赋役，困平民也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1207661_comment'></div>今遐僻贱人争以国姻自召，商较财币，仅同贸易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1207661_comment'></div>坐堂而拜者为舅姑，同牢而食者为夫妇，非以尊国示民范也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1207661_comment'></div>朝廷始严其法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1207661_comment'></div>召为尚书刑部员外郎，寻改大理少卿，迁承议郎，擢侍御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1207661_comment'></div>复论中外吏久而官不常，权常在吏，吏鲜知恤人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1207661_comment'></div>于是利害陈请，惟恐阻阏之不密；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1207661_comment'></div>事劳功赏，惟恐破除之不尽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1207661_comment'></div>理财予夺，惟恐敛没之不多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1207661_comment'></div>诬枉赴诉，惟恐深文之犹略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1207661_comment'></div>又使者以不按吏为忠厚，昏暴病民非赃污，皆一切容养，此为害之大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1207661_comment'></div>复论御史吕衔等欺同列，遂忤旨，而御史中丞胡宗愈不便其为僚，因排诋无不至，罢为尚书右司郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1207661_comment'></div>寻知相州，迁朝奉郎、知徐州，移陕府西路转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1207661_comment'></div>入对，赐服金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1207661_comment'></div>关陇控边，务繁，公计度不劳，阅牒诉立判，情法皆当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1207661_comment'></div>吏惊，私相视曰：「一笔尽矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1207661_comment'></div>时方患陕西币轻货重，公屡陈岁给本路诸司盐钞，实以飞钱，然西州有来商，无还货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1207661_comment'></div>又铁钱不出境，独钞无脚税，朝至国，夕为钱，既以备本路夏秋籴，而商贾非以两时至则钞归兼并家，不贵售不出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1207661_comment'></div>若钞留京师，卖钱贮之而别为公据，与本路凡入谷若钱者给之，至京师，归以钞钱，则货币平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1207661_comment'></div>不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1207661_comment'></div>摄帅平凉，两月决滞讼百馀，民欢舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1207661_comment'></div>既去，遮留不得行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1207661_comment'></div>归朝为鸿胪卿，迁朝散郎，又为光禄卿，擢权兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1207661_comment'></div>岁馀感疾，除集贤院学士、知汝州，谢不能，遂提举西京嵩山崇福宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1207661_comment'></div>会废集贤学士，乃改修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1207661_comment'></div>以绍圣二年九月甲子没于颍昌府之私第，即其年十一月甲子葬于开封府祥符县黄沟乡临黄村特进之兆，享年六十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1207661_comment'></div>前夫人阎氏先公二十六年卒，追封真宁县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1207661_comment'></div>今夫人晁氏，安平县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1207661_comment'></div>二子：开，承务郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1207661_comment'></div>钦卨，举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1207661_comment'></div>钦卨蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1207661_comment'></div>三女：长适瀛洲防御推官、知益州录事参军马希说，次适承议郎、充秘阁校理晁补之，次适进士崔延孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1207661_comment'></div>孙男女八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1207661_comment'></div>所为诗文、奏议二十卷，其词喜根原仁义，不为浮华，辨析事理，要近于可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1207661_comment'></div>尝论虞而卒哭非百日，虞而俚术百日卒哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1207661_comment'></div>内百日为凶葬不禁，外百日则更筮吉岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1207661_comment'></div>世牵其说，慢葬者众，乞下其议礼官，亦不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1207661_comment'></div>为人忠恕不欺，恬澹寡耆欲，学问以诚身为本，遇事应物，惟惧恻怛之不至，尝曰：「士常不忘在沟壑，则事无不可立」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1207661_comment'></div>故久而能著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1207661_comment'></div>尤嫉近名，类畏人知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1207661_comment'></div>莅官事主，惟义可否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1207661_comment'></div>进不慑高明彊御，退而与愚弱卑下者处，如恐伤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1207661_comment'></div>奉己过于菲薄，犹恐其泰至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1207661_comment'></div>赒给族姻已厚矣，而惭不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1207661_comment'></div>急人危殆，伸人抑枉，宁以身受困畏而不悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1207661_comment'></div>此其大节也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1207661_comment'></div>好《易》、《中庸》，能精其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1207661_comment'></div>至浮屠、老庄，皆探索微妙，曰：「与吾学同出也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1207661_comment'></div>家居昆弟无间言，见者鄙吝为消，似阳城、元德秀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1207661_comment'></div>敦大不挠，清而容物，似陆象先；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1207661_comment'></div>而至其立朝识大体，究精吏道与时之利疚，知无不言，则近左雄、黄琼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1207661_comment'></div>政事之才，非特处士独行、乡党自好者之比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1207661_comment'></div>公与补之先君厚，故补之所述公大节，多尝闻于先君之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1207661_comment'></div>若公平生施设，则有当时大人君子之所共知者编次，惧不尽，虽亲不愧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1207661_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_158_1207661_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='9d4ac4766808490d8bf829b59d4db241_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1095&endYear=1096')">1095-1096年</a>，43-44岁</div><div id='9d4ac4766808490d8bf829b59d4db241' class='detail'><a href="javascript: class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五八。）</span>《亳州祭土地神文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《右朝议大夫致仕晁公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六四。）</span>《谯国嘲提壶》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页五五。）</span>《江神子•亳社观梅呈范守秦令》（去年初见早梅芳）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页五六。）</span>《洞仙歌•梅》（年年青眼）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页五七。此词作年难以确指，乔书系于此年，姑从之。）</span>《行香子•梅》（雪里清香）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页五九。此词作年难以确指，乔书系于此年，姑从之。）</span>《万年欢•梅》（心忆春归）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页六0。此词作年难以确指，乔书系于此年，姑从之。）</span>《生查子•梅》（青帝晓来风）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页六一。此词作年难以确指，乔书系于此年，姑从之。）</span>《尉迟杯•亳社作惜花》（去年时）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页六二。）</span>《蓦山溪•谯园饮酒为守令作》（谯园幽古）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页六三。）</span>《蓦山溪》（金樽玉酒）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页65。此词作年难以确指，乔书系于此年，姑从之。）</span>《古阳关•寄无斁八弟宰宝应》（暮草蛩吟噎）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页六六。）</span>《蓦山溪•亳社寄文潜舍人》（兰台仙史）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页六七。）</span><div id='poem_1207675' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207675' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207675?labeling=true' target='_blank'>穆氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍圣二年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1095年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207675")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207675_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207675'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207675'>故丹阳进士吴君讳磐之夫人穆氏，其先洛阳人，后徙广陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207675_comment'></div>曾祖讳彦璋，以閤门祗候采访两浙，有能声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207675_comment'></div>祖讳琪，为郓州观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207675_comment'></div>父讳之武，举进士，皆有学行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207675_comment'></div>而夫人少庄靓惠和，年二十有一归于吴君，二十有八而吴君没，服丧以礼，纲纪其家事甚饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207675_comment'></div>顾其子敏修始六岁矣，藐然吊影。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207675_comment'></div>或勉以再行，夫人辄泣曰：「自吾父没，吾母惟我一女子，尚能老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207675_comment'></div>今置是儿何地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207675_comment'></div>且吾用为吾母女」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207675_comment'></div>自尔屏不与姻党接，日夜诵佛书，躬箴缕，以杜外事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207675_comment'></div>而吴氏尚饶于资，敏修之诸父求异籍，夫人愀然不能止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207675_comment'></div>既教敏修，惟诸父所与乃取，乡人异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207675_comment'></div>间览书传，至阴阳数术无不总。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207675_comment'></div>益训敏修于学，敏修遂以好文修洁称，四方之游士、豪杰至者，必见焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207675_comment'></div>夫人常躬视食饮、舍馆，以厚其子，使与客处，切磋成名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207675_comment'></div>于是乡人亦以夫人为贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207675_comment'></div>其母丁氏，寡且老，犹寓广陵，夫人怀思不忘，因叹曰：「生女不生男，昔人以为恨，顾我与子处，足自为矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207675_comment'></div>乃迎丁氏舍吴氏，旨甘定省无违，迄十有一年，恭谨如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207675_comment'></div>而丁氏以寿终，又礼葬广陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207675_comment'></div>而夫人号慕成疾，岁馀亦不起，绍圣二年四月甲子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207675_comment'></div>享年若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207675_comment'></div>敏修以其十二月甲子葬于丹徒县崇德乡官唐之原，从其夫之兆，属补之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207675_comment'></div>敏修字彦达，旧相与游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207675_comment'></div>后补之佐淮南，会翰林沈公存中来，与彦达俱，益熟其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207675_comment'></div>彦达学问不苟徇世好，为文词甚工；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207675_comment'></div>与人交，终始不失义，知夫人之后方兴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207675_comment'></div>孙六人，男曰某，曰某，女曰某，曰某，皆茂慧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207675_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1207675'>穆之嫠无子，有女如有子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207675_comment'></div>养葬祭以礼，穆氏播其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207675_comment'></div>其嫔于吴氏，吴氏复无祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207675_comment'></div>嫠亦不失义，以训子于理，吴氏且复起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207675_comment'></div>呜呼，贤矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1207675_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196438' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196438' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196438?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送八弟无斁宰宝应</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196438")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196438_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196438'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196438'>穷邦迫秋成，霖雨厚土湿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196438'>邅吾上涞水，濞汹三峡疾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196438'>邦人送之子，岸潦饮马膝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196438'>凄凄属方升，澹澹惊并集。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196438'>冲湍顺涂路，游波汇原隰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196438'>安知禾黍腐，转觉蛙黾急。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196438'>何由乾此潦，问天借九日。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196438'>萧萧荆棘晚，亹亹霜霰密。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196438'>之子向南州，铜章宰一邑。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196438'>何须念宋远，古谓跂余及。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196438'>扬舲堤柳尽，把盏淮山入。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196438'>封圻吴楚徼，郡县秦汉袭。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196438'>开门驵侩鬨，辏浦篙帆翕。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196438'>平旦书百函，交衢客三揖。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196438'>新湖容鼓铸，甲令贵绥辑。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196438'>之子搴词科，闻诗不读律。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196438'>古来学为吏，颇自吾儒出。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196438'>足民与知方，求由有政术。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196438'>鞭笞麇鹿骇，亦恐日不给。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196438'>先君卓鲁后，之子况早立。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196438'>焚香闭閤坐，啾耳从潗濈。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196438'>官忙尚偷閒，文字要嶪岌。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196438_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196438'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_196438_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196219' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196219' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196219?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄题宝应无斁凫舄堂二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196219")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196219_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196219'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196219'>宾戏令晁子，名堂无乃迂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196219'>何为仍负弩，祗合便飞凫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196219'>彭泽且市隐，太丘犹世儒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196219'>解嘲吾亦倦，系雁一相娱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196219_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196219'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196219_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196220?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196220'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196220'>弟才方浚发，兄老更疏迂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196220'>君自轩轩鹤，吾今泛泛凫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196220'>何方折腰具，能作列仙儒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196220'>钧是亡羊事，清樽稍可娱。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196220'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196220_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196468' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196468' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196468?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望涡流辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196468")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196468_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_196468'>涡之水西流，过谯郡北乃稍南，又东流入于淮。包涣二水皆经其南以东。岁旱，深不五尺；秋雨集，始大。而城之东北惟涡，曲水深黑，灌木蓊然，旧有祠，曰龙尝宅焉。作望涡流。其词曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_196468_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196468'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196468'>望涡流兮浼浼，势南折兮东还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196468'>水冲隈兮岸圮，嗟龙去兮几年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196468'>俛余进兮丛祠，俨帝服兮神冠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196468'>墙壁缋兮怪奇，泯蛇穴兮蜗盘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196468'>列缺鞭兮雷辀，卫两鳗兮骖鳣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196468'>老龟起兮雾游，跂玳瑁兮鳖鼋。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196468'>或若马兮非人，纷陪后兮导前。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196468'>木阴阴兮藻长，科斗舞兮下颠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196468'>鯈群出兮旅嬉，忽俱去兮不还。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196468'>意土国兮无龙，恐逃桷兮藏櫋。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196468'>帝有命兮时乘，亦隐隐兮填填。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196468'>世铄石兮流金，将谁职兮此愆。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196468'>包之水可揭也，涣之水可厉也。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196468'>前汝足其暨也，后汝跗其踬也。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196468'>江有鲵兮横渊，海有鲲兮翔天。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196468'>汝隘此兮往争，滔淫水兮八埏。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196468'>重曰：望其厓若有宅于隈。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196468_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196468'>不汝争于厓，汝安其隈，泽不必施也<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：包、涣二水，与涡并流。）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_196468_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207204?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与亳守向宗旦启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207204")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207204'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207204'>顷缘契援，尝奉标仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207204_comment'></div>去墙屏之已赊，托麾符而深幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207204_comment'></div>恭以某官温良植己，忠荩在公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207204_comment'></div>勋名烜赫于相门，姻戚蝉联于帝室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207204_comment'></div>不由此进，自以才称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207204_comment'></div>骞翔省寺之华，更践藩垣之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207204_comment'></div>居有善政，去尝见思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207204_comment'></div>而补之疏拙领州，乖违得谴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207204_comment'></div>未更岁律，仍避亲嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207204_comment'></div>仰宽大之足依，俯飘摇而自慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207204_comment'></div>奔驰敢后，参对可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207204_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1207204_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州祭土地神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207744")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207744'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207744'>维绍圣三年，岁次丙子，十一月戊子，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，祭于土地之神曰：闻诸圣言，聪明得道者，没乃为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207744_comment'></div>而神之所职，以土地名，譬诸人间，则有社稷，人之休戚，系焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207744_comment'></div>补之以罪来此，行将解去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207744_comment'></div>顾其疏愚，何以免咎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207744_comment'></div>惟履正蹈常，无以庇物，亦不害物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207744_comment'></div>神用临之，亦允助之，使老幼安处，而苛慝不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207744_comment'></div>用此荐诚，匪曰祈也，以为报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207744_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207744_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207665' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207665' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207665?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右朝议大夫致仕晁公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍圣三年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207665")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207665_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207665'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207665'>元祐元年三月甲戌，右朝议大夫致仕、上柱国、南阳县开国伯、食邑七百户、赐紫金鱼袋晁公卒，卜绍圣三年正月丙申吉，葬于济州任城县谏议乡吕村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207665_comment'></div>诸孤聚而言曰：「我君乐善好义而畏人知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207665_comment'></div>《诗》固有之曰：『相在尔室，尚不愧于屋漏』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207665_comment'></div>又曰：『君子无易由言，耳属于垣』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207665_comment'></div>图我君之言行，虽州闾惧莫之尽，惟垣、屋漏，其不可欺，诸孤尚识之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207665_comment'></div>乃相与诿公之婿承议郎、知开封府祥符县事王仲博，叙次世家、爵里、行事，而以告其族孙补之，使铭，曰：「凡亲者亦不可欺也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207665_comment'></div>补之涕泣言曰：「以属卑且不肖，则何敢谓宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207665_comment'></div>抑毋使公之事坠于地，则诔且称讳，亦不得辞也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207665_comment'></div>公讳仲熙，字子政，其先澶州清丰人，后徙开封祥符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207665_comment'></div>赠太师中书令讳某，曾王父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207665_comment'></div>赠太师中书令谥文元讳某，王父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207665_comment'></div>赠金紫光禄大夫讳某，父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207665_comment'></div>光禄娶赵氏，南安郡夫人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207665_comment'></div>继赵氏，南阳郡夫人，而公南安出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207665_comment'></div>文元公以儒宗耆老令德事真宗，为翰林学士，赏延其孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207665_comment'></div>初授公将作监主簿，迁太常寺太祝、监单州酒，即以才称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207665_comment'></div>故宰相王公圭为三司判官，亟荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207665_comment'></div>再监邓州酒，历评事、光禄、大理丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207665_comment'></div>撤酤区复墙，钩检出入，摘其积年奸蠹，皆不得隐，课乃大登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207665_comment'></div>应赏，不自言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207665_comment'></div>且当为县矣，而以南阳夫人随季官河间，复监瀛州仓，便养，岁得圭田粟数百斛，以分其同列之无者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207665_comment'></div>又监泗州税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207665_comment'></div>淮溢浸城，且坏，守以下皆乘城捍淮，公力居多，以劳选通判宪州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207665_comment'></div>州近塞，守武臣喜争，公独与欢，而于事未始屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207665_comment'></div>凡金谷犴狱，纤悉疑似，皆阴为辨，而守不知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207665_comment'></div>徙通判郑州、复州，皆有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207665_comment'></div>历太子右赞善大夫、国子博士，虞部、比部、驾部员外郎，监店宅务、左藏库，迁虞部、比部郎中，知均州，改朝散、朝请大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207665_comment'></div>民有伪称官者，自云给事公府，赍供武当山，饭僧所过，邀馈犒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207665_comment'></div>初谒见公，公即知其欺，语吏随至馆捕之，得伪御宝文书，以抵法，远近皆惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207665_comment'></div>判南京国子监，迁右朝议大夫、管勾鸿庆宫，监东岳、南岳庙，皆寓濉阳，凡十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207665_comment'></div>杜门萧散，幅巾燕坐，樵苏不入，而几微未尝见于色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207665_comment'></div>故人亲戚过者为公叹息，而公意不在是，怡然自得，若顾南山言爽气者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207665_comment'></div>闻之庄周称北郭顺子，使人之意也消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207665_comment'></div>补之不能名顺子何如人，而对公未语，胸中之胶扰者已定，譬诸饮冰，内热立解，顺涂而往，知古人之所以近于道者必有在也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207665_comment'></div>享年六十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207665_comment'></div>娶张氏，崇德县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207665_comment'></div>男端弼，登进士第，朝请郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207665_comment'></div>端介，宣德郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207665_comment'></div>端修，太平令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207665_comment'></div>端粹，虞城尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207665_comment'></div>端厚，假承务郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207665_comment'></div>女长适王仲博，状公行者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207665_comment'></div>次适通直郎、通判安州郑猛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207665_comment'></div>次适罗田尉高道华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207665_comment'></div>次适相州录事参军高公秉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207665_comment'></div>孙十人：曰资之，登进士第、相州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207665_comment'></div>顺之、完之、颂之、葵之、述之、疑之、颉之、蓺之、槱之，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207665_comment'></div>曾孙一人，曰公绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207665_comment'></div>公少孤，事南阳以孝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207665_comment'></div>笃爱其弟，有人所难能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207665_comment'></div>为人忠信平夷，宽裕不矜伐，趋事静以敏，自奉养俭薄，而遇人之急，至解衣赒之恐不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207665_comment'></div>其罢均州尚彊，即求散局，不以家空竭为虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207665_comment'></div>尤不喜权，其乐彼与此同，而自谓得于此者多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207665_comment'></div>昔文元公尝言：「吾自幼及老，历官临事，未尝挟情害物，倾人售进」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207665_comment'></div>其晚节著书垂训，多慎刑戒杀之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207665_comment'></div>而公性中和，敬人而爱物，盖近文元之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207665_comment'></div>自南阳殁，凡三十年，其院无期丧，康宁令终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207665_comment'></div>人以为积善之报云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207665_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1207665'>道不可知，而恬愉者常近之，不伪者几得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207665_comment'></div>其嗜欲深者，其天机浅，鸥舞不下，肺肝已见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207665_comment'></div>若此者，其生世役役，没世有馀患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207665_comment'></div>呜呼公乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207665_comment'></div>厚性近仁，诚应乎真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207665_comment'></div>生无累于明，其安者身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207665_comment'></div>没无责于幽，其安者神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207665_comment'></div>粤天所以爵人者，不惟其贵，惟其德视后之人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1207665_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196092' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196092' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196583_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196583'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196583'>青帝晓来风，偏傍梅梢紧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196583_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196583'>未放玉肌开，已觉龙香喷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196583_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196655' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196655?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尉迟杯 亳社作惜花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196655_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196655'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196655'>去年时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196655'>正愁绝，过却红杏飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196655'>沈吟杏子青时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196655'>追悔负好花枝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196655'>今年又春到，傍小阑、日日数花期。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196655'>花有信，人却无凭，故教芳意迟迟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196655_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196655'>及至待得融怡。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196655'>未攀条拈蕊，又叹春归。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196655'>怎得春如天不老，更教花与月相随。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196655'>都将命、拚与酬花，似岘山、落日客犹迷。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196655_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196655'>尽归路，拍手拦街，笑人沈醉如泥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_196655_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196685?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蓦山溪<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>谯园饮酒为守令作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1096年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", id='poem_sentence_1_196685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196685'>使君才誉，金殿握兰人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196685'>司马更堪怜，掩金觞、琵琶催泪。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196685'>愁来不醉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196685_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196685'>不醉奈愁何，汝南周，东阳沈，劝我如何醉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196685_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196687' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196687' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196687?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_196687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196687'>何须说此，只但饮陶陶，灯光底，百花春，自是仙家地。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196687_comment'></div></div><br /><div id='poem_sentence_4_196688_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196688'>古来毕竟，何处是功名，不同饮，不同吟，也劝时开口。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_196688_comment'></div></div></div><br
