-----title
永济（河东）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7d057d98a27f481fb4c544448dcd55b7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7d057d98a27f481fb4c544448dcd55b7");'><span id='7d057d98a27f481fb4c544448dcd55b7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，49岁</div><div id='7d057d98a27f481fb4c544448dcd55b7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年12月</a>　晁补之知河中府。作品：《照碧堂记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷二九。此文乔书系于绍圣二年，潘书系于此年，考文末有“建中靖国元年十二月戊戌”字样，则应系于此年，据改。）</span><div id='poem_1207615' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207615' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207615?labeling=true' target='_blank'>照碧堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207615")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207615_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207615'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207615'>去都而东，顺流千里，皆桑麻平野，无山林登览之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207615_comment'></div>然放舟通津门，不再宿，至于宋，其城郭阛闬，人民之庶，百货旁午，以视他州，则浩穰亦都也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207615_comment'></div>而道都来者则固已旷然见其为宽閒之土而乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207615_comment'></div>岂特人情倦觌于其所已餍，而欣得于其所未足，将朝夕从事于尘埃车马之间，日昃而食，夜分而息，若有驱之急，不得纵而与之偕者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207615_comment'></div>故虽平时意有所乐，而不暇思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207615_comment'></div>及其脱然去之也，亦不必山林<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1207615", 1207615, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>远绝</span>之地，要小休而暂适，则人意物境本暇而不遽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207615_comment'></div>盖向之所乐而不暇思者，不与之期，一朝而自复，其理固然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207615_comment'></div>此照碧堂之所以为胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207615_comment'></div>宋为本朝始基之地，自景德三年，诏即府为南都，而双门直别宫，故经衢之左为留守廨，面城背市，前无所达，而后与民语接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207615_comment'></div>城南有湖五里，前此，作堂城上以临之，岁久且圮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207615_comment'></div>而今龙图阁学士、南丰曾公之以待制留守也，始新而大之，盖成于元祐六年九月癸卯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207615_comment'></div>横七楹，深五丈，高可建旄，自东诸侯之宅无若此尤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207615_comment'></div>先是，南都岁赐官僚宾客费为钱七千缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207615_comment'></div>公奉己约，亦不以是侈厨传，故能有馀积以营斯堂，屹然如跳出堞上，而民不知，可以放怀高蹈，寓目而皆适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207615_comment'></div>其南汴渠，起魏迄楚，长堤迤靡，帆樯隐见，隋帝之所以流连忘返也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207615_comment'></div>其西商丘祠，陶唐氏以为火正曰阏伯者之所以有功而食其墟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207615_comment'></div>其东双庙，唐张巡、许远捍城以死，而南霁云之所以驰乞救于贺兰之涂也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207615_comment'></div>而独梁故苑，复道属之，平台三十里者，名在而迹莫寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207615_comment'></div>虽隋之彊，亦其所穿渠在耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207615_comment'></div>岂汰靡者易熄，而勋名忠义则愈远而弥存，不可诬哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207615_comment'></div>初，补之以校理佐淮南，从公宴湖上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207615_comment'></div>后谪官于宋，登堂必慨然怀公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207615_comment'></div>拊槛极目，天垂野尽，意若<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1207615", 1207615, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>遐骛</span>太空者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207615_comment'></div>花明草薰，百物媚妩，湖光㳽漫，飞射堂栋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207615_comment'></div>长夏畏日，坐见风雨自堤而来，水波纷纭，柳摇而荷靡，鸥鸟尽舞，客顾而嬉，翛然不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207615_comment'></div>盖不独道都来者以为胜，虽餍于吴楚登览之乐者，度淮而北，则不复有，至此亦踌躇相羊而喜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207615_comment'></div>夫人之感于物者同，而所以感者异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207615_comment'></div>斯须之顷为之易意，乐未已也，哀又从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207615_comment'></div>故景公美齐，而随以雪涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207615_comment'></div>《传》亦曰：「登高远望，使人心悴」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207615_comment'></div>然昔之豪杰愤悱忧世之士，或出于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207615_comment'></div>若羊祜太息岘山之巅，祜固可人，其志有在，未可但言哀乐之复也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207615_comment'></div>公与补之俱起废，而公为太史氏，补之亦备史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207615_comment'></div>间相与语斯堂，属补之记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207615_comment'></div>已而，公再守南都，补之守河中，书来及焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207615_comment'></div>补之尝论昔人所馆，有一日必葺，去之如始至者，有不扫一室者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207615_comment'></div>夫一日必葺，以为不苟于其细，则将推之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207615_comment'></div>不扫一室，以为有志于其大，则不可必卒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207615_comment'></div>其成功有命，则婼与蕃之贤，于此乎未辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207615_comment'></div>乃公之意则曰：「吾何有于是？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207615_comment'></div>从吾所好而已矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207615_comment'></div>二累之上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207615_comment'></div>公名肇，字子开，文学德行、事君行己，为后来矜式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207615_comment'></div>其出处在古人中，其欲有为在天下后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207615_comment'></div>其卷而施之一邦，不以自少，而以自得，又乐与人同者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207615_comment'></div>如此堂，不足道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207615_comment'></div>建中靖国元年十二月戊戌记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1207615_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4f45102ec6944a53b056c68d5b7dfd9b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4f45102ec6944a53b056c68d5b7dfd9b");'><span id='4f45102ec6944a53b056c68d5b7dfd9b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>，49岁</div><div id='4f45102ec6944a53b056c68d5b7dfd9b' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1101&endYear=1101')">1101年</a>　党论再起，晁补之为言官论，乃出知河中府，冬抵达任所。作品：《再用前韵答府教授之道弟》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一七。此条时间地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_196124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再用前韵答之道弟府教授</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", id='poem_title_1207652' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207652?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李夷行易初赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207652")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207652_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207652'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207652'>元丰初，补之教授北门，而易初为掾汶上，以事至魏，相与语，甚欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207652_comment'></div>建中靖国改元，补之守蒲津，而易初在幕府，始得其为人之详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207652_comment'></div>易初形貌神意无尘俗累，趣闲而技通，中介特而外猗移，辅之以学问，未见其止，古之所谓可畏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207652_comment'></div>为之赞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1207652'>颀然而长者君之状，如竹如松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207652_comment'></div>翛然而远者君之意，冥冥飞鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207652_comment'></div>退然而藏者君之行，有时女容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207652_comment'></div>介然而高者君之操，云间孤峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207652_comment'></div>蔚然而葩者君之同，草木青红。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207652_comment'></div>益然而和者君之气，触物者同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207652_comment'></div>载是六者，虚而游世，孰叶唐许，舞车彼视。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1207652_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ba98255ef38b49c58cf1fa7044cec90c_label'><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_196483'>飞楼压城城跨野，黄河逶迤避条华。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196483'>城南鸟道拱高岩，入谷车箱不容马。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196483'>解鞍初步石苔青，细泉鸣绕竹间亭。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196483'>肩舆直上十八折，维以采丝双巨縆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196483'>我行枉矢复蛇蹙，三步一呼劳我仆。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196483'>前旌已作鹤穿云，后队方如蚁缘木。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196483'>千条倒涧淙大壑，百丈层冰冻垂瀑。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196483'>无云而云苍翠横，无风而风𠿕𧇠声。<div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196483'>莲花三峰只对面，仙人玉女如相迎。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196483'>却临北岭望吾郭，万瓦一垤令人惊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196483'>孔侯翛然顾我语，高真之居隔风雨，下视人寰如此许。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196483'>此中岂但蛮触微，千古纷争几是非。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196483'>我言人处世，此见释氏义。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196483'>我今正在阿堵中，与君安得生两翅。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196483'>却忆隋文驾六龙，意比姬满朝河宗。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196483'>当时万骑留山麓，登临已卷长江东。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196483'>翠微宫里亦如此，依然古殿对乔松。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196483'>何况山中携妓裴御史，犹唱当时霜月空。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196483'>与君江南厌山水，香垆双剑俱梦中。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196483_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196194'>樽酒不空多坐客，君家馀事足陶情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196194'></div><div target='_blank'>河中府谢历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207131")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207131'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207131'>臣补之言：今月二十五日，都进奏院递到宣一道，伏蒙圣恩，赐臣崇宁元年历日一卷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207131_comment'></div>初郊上帝，肇改新元，谨尧历以迎推，因夏时而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1207131", 1207131, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>诞布</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207131_comment'></div>偶窃藩维之寄，预蒙岁首之颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207131_comment'></div>臣补之诚惶诚惧，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207131_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下动静以道而大光，先后于天而与合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207131_comment'></div>本诸修己，虽聪明睿智足以临；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207131_comment'></div>用此求端，盖风雨霜露无非教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207131_comment'></div>将以抚五辰而熙绩，和三事以叙功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207131_comment'></div>臣职在牧民，欣于奉令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207131_comment'></div>土牛将磔，犹歌二日之凿冰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207131_comment'></div>玉烛可调，愿颂丰年之多稌。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207131_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207131'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五四。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷三九，《古俪府》卷一一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207131_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207138' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207138' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207138?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河中府谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207138")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207138_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207138'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207138'>起废来还，荐更郎选；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207138_comment'></div>属餍为请，复假藩麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207138_comment'></div>初见吏民，敬宣条教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207138_comment'></div>明恩未报，感涕徒挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207138_comment'></div>伏念臣禀生拙艰，遭世隆盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207138_comment'></div>知寡尤所以干禄，非曰能之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207138_comment'></div>谓崇德在于安身，终不近也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207138_comment'></div>薰心自艾，补劓无期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207138_comment'></div>雨露不私，句萌亦奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207138_comment'></div>惟两朝之圣政，在太史之册书，首以非才，参于群俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207138_comment'></div>青天白日，道至大而难摹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207138_comment'></div>黑发丹心，力不能而知止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207138_comment'></div>卒缘累恳，因得便私，粤自剧曹，付之名阃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207138_comment'></div>差马不劳于吉日，乞浆更值于丰年，散族再收，啼饥皆饱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207138_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇皇帝陛下敛五福以敷锡，协万邦于时雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207138_comment'></div>重华如虞氏，则既以用其中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207138_comment'></div>丕承如武王，则亦不忘乎远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207138_comment'></div>固特重监司守土之任，盖尝视省官卿寺之除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207138_comment'></div>臣愿深体至怀，粗推所学，庶几一日之必葺，敢意三年而有成。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1207138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207138'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五五。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二八，《四续古文奇赏》卷九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207138_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207182' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207182' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207182?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河中府谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207182")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207182_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207182'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207182'>明恩起废，首玷剧曹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207182_comment'></div>衰疾便私，尚叨名阃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207182_comment'></div>尽出钧陶之巨赐，宁同草木之无知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207182_comment'></div>引分每踰，抚躬深愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207182_comment'></div>窃以读书非无用之具，固将图试而求行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207182_comment'></div>事君当有为之时，孰不愿知而幸遇？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207182_comment'></div>贤者奋身而任大，中材随类以效长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207182_comment'></div>寸阴尺璧之匪轻，赢粮跃马而恐后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207182_comment'></div>又如出蔀见日，去盆望天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207182_comment'></div>所宜欣对亨嘉，鲜明注目；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207182_comment'></div>安有自为连蹇，俛默向隅？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207182_comment'></div>惟能技之不同，故会逢之相邈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207182_comment'></div>如补之者，禀生至薄，涉世又疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207182_comment'></div>违道德之初心，获声名而过实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207182_comment'></div>画蛇之足，尝夺饮而固宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207182_comment'></div>蒙虎之皮，或得攻而何怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207182_comment'></div>一昨初湔谪籍，即备史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207182_comment'></div>以半生文字之中，而白首江湖之远，忽蒙此选，岂是素期？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207182_comment'></div>故始荣所得而冒居，终揣不能而知止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207182_comment'></div>属餍为请，与郡复优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207182_comment'></div>使自为谋，不过如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207182_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官柱石扶远，蓍龟见微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207182_comment'></div>直方大以正邦，周遍咸而济物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207182_comment'></div>虽良乐所过，绝足为已空；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207182_comment'></div>然和扁一经，沉痼犹皆起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207182_comment'></div>将益收群俊之助，与共厎太平之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207182_comment'></div>况补之尝履闺台，今守民社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207182_comment'></div>未负齑盐之学，敢忘卵翼之私！</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207182_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='3301fb6e2c124e0ea0ae2f3730651308_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，50岁</div><div id='3301fb6e2c124e0ea0ae2f3730651308' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　晁补之知河中府。作品：《河中府系浮桥告河文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《祭告舜庙文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《河中府谒文宣王文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《祭大资政李公文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。大资政李公为李清臣，崇宁元年正月卒。）</span><div id='poem_1207747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207747' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207747?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河中府系浮桥告河文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年1月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207747")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207747_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207747'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207747'>维崇宁元年正月八日，朝散郎、权知河中军府兼管内劝农事、兼提举解州庆成军兵马巡检公事晁补之，以清酌庶羞及羊二沉诸河，敬告祭于河伯之神曰：蒲之为邦，条华障其南，龙门隘其北，而河出龙门，勃怒箭駃，以经其郛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207747_comment'></div>于此为梁，谓之蒲津，则民之畏神威，怀神惠，旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207747_comment'></div>乃潦集梁绝，往来者病于济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207747_comment'></div>货用不通，民用恐不宁，相与愁苦，吁神而乞怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207747_comment'></div>神，依民者也，岂可以数威其所依，忘惠之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207747_comment'></div>今有司庀具告桥可复，用徼福于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207747_comment'></div>庶神许之，无摇其成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207747_comment'></div>吏免于罪，民以懋迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207747_comment'></div>康厥生神，亦饮食百世。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1207747_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207747'><span class='label'>按：</span>尚飨！《鸡肋集》卷六一。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207747_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭告舜庙文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年1月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207748")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207748'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207748'>维崇宁元年正月八日，朝散郎、权知河中军府兼管内劝农事、兼提举解州庆成军兵马巡检公事晁补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敬告祭于帝舜之神曰：禹治洪水，功施于河为多，迄今河滨济者呼禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207748_comment'></div>且蒲，帝之所尝居，而帝使禹者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207748_comment'></div>今梁绝病济，有司图复之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207748_comment'></div>帝相斯人，河受其职，俾无坏于成，则禹之功犹赖，蒲之民克永事帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207748_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207748_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207746?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河中府谒文宣王文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207746")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207746_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207746'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207746'>维年月日，具位晁补之谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢昭告于至圣文宣王曰：昔桓荣学《尚书》，仕汉得辎车乘马，矜而陈之曰：「稽古之力也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207746_comment'></div>补之耻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207746_comment'></div>夫士行其志而取偿，鲁连犹知以为商贾之事，而荣乃以是矜其门人，陋哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207746_comment'></div>补之承乏此邦，视事之初，恐材不称禄，负所闻于先君子之言，以羞当世之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207746_comment'></div>虽稽古不及荣，尚庶几乎知耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207746_comment'></div>是故择日而荐诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207746_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207746_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207740?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭大资政李公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207740")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207740'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207740'>维年月日，门生具位晁补之谨遣人以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故北京留守、大资政李公之灵曰：王迹之熄，诗亡不嗣，春秋又微，战国横肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207740_comment'></div>惟其可者，尚与圣邻，词出其口，轮囷郁纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207740_comment'></div>观左氏言，何国无士，驰其戎车，陈诗说礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207740_comment'></div>秦仪卖国，斯乃燔书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207740_comment'></div>韩非、孙武，是固非儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207740_comment'></div>至其文字，孰敢贬诸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207740_comment'></div>汉兴息民，残编出坏，经儒<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1207740", 1207740, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>词士</span>，学自此派。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207740_comment'></div>班王两马，河汉奔浑，胡不及古？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207740_comment'></div>华胜其根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207740_comment'></div>乃独扬雄，为书准《易》，《易》不可准，相如是式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207740_comment'></div>却后得唐，才一韩愈，跞魏踵汉，侵寻千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207740_comment'></div>宋以文治，百七十年，瑰儒伟士，轶古并肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207740_comment'></div>公以文鸣，起河之北，如彼神凤，云翔览德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207740_comment'></div>惟我神考，文王之文，谓公所作，经诰是群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207740_comment'></div>官名用正，礼阁其修，此公馀事，粤有大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207740_comment'></div>论秀百人，宥死四千，人车上舞，而公退然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207740_comment'></div>辅弼三朝，时异操同，几颠者数，不自为功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207740_comment'></div>上建皇极，以消群疑，敛时五福，惟公助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207740_comment'></div>爰开大公，旁作穆穆，九关昼静，累累士复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207740_comment'></div>惟古良臣，善则称君，造膝之语，家人莫闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207740_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207740_comment'></div>匪岁龙蛇，正月己卯，贤人之忧，庶氓是悼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207740_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207740_comment'></div>补之昔者，自魏徂京，公以其名，上之朝廷，羁坚附夷，千里为轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207740_comment'></div>顾惭幽介，文采安有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207740_comment'></div>无盐刻画，祇增其丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207740_comment'></div>士报知己，匪以其私，洁身有义，尚畏人知，惟不仰愧，神其听之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207740_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207740_comment'></div>天不憖遗，而丧宗工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207740_comment'></div>胡床昨梦，过雨惊风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207740_comment'></div>燕子穿阁，池台半空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207740_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207740_comment'></div>安阳之吉，远不临圹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207740_comment'></div>扁舟东下，形以神往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207740_comment'></div>寓辞千里，以侑酒尊，庶平生言，公犹我闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207740_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1207740_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
金乡
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8168e2b6dd7544a099ba3dee1b0670e4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8168e2b6dd7544a099ba3dee1b0670e4");'><span id='8168e2b6dd7544a099ba3dee1b0670e4_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1098&endYear=1098')">1098年</a>　晁补之服丧家居，以巨野地低卑贫薄，遂迁居金乡城东。作品：《元符戊寅与无斁弟卜居缗城东述情》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一八。迁居金乡具体月日不详，姑将此年活动均系于金乡。）</span>《祭南京留守刑部杜侍郎文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六0。迁居金乡具体月日不详，姑将此年活动均系于金乡。）</span>《祭郭大夫文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。迁居金乡具体月日不详，姑将此年活动均系于金乡。）</span>《右朝议大夫梁公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六五。迁居金乡具体月日不详，姑将此年活动均系于金乡。）</span>《苏门居士胡君墓志铭》<span
