id='poem_title_196118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元符戊寅与无斁弟卜居缗城东述情</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196118")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196118_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196118'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196118'>四海一居何处卜，北窗祗取见家山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196118'>要无名利来心曲，便有园林出世间。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196118'>拙宦莫兴三黜叹，老归未厌百年闲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196118'>先君馀庆期之子，吾驾如今不可还。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196118'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196118_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207738' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207738' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207738?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭南京留守刑部杜侍郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207738")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207738_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207738'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207738'>维元符元年四月日，第五侄婿孤子晁补之，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敬致祭于故南京留守、修撰、侍郎七丈人杜公之灵曰：呜呼公乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207738_comment'></div>如金如玉，如松如竹，杂于物而不变，禀诸天之所独。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207738_comment'></div>而一旦毁折，遂不可作耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207738_comment'></div>移孝于事君，移家于为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207738_comment'></div>贤劳记于先朝，名誉流于当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207738_comment'></div>而竟不大任，遂止于是耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207738_comment'></div>惠故民，爱之如父母；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207738_comment'></div>敬故士，戚之如兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207738_comment'></div>而堂堂去此，惟民与士惊心而陨涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207738_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207738_comment'></div>昔我先君，与公元昆，义均同产，人靡间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207738_comment'></div>施及诸稚，申以世婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207738_comment'></div>两宗一家，无复彼此，矧公与我，自为知己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207738_comment'></div>我始筮仕，教授北京，公为主知，而有盛名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207738_comment'></div>数言我才，于公于卿，自谓内举，退无愧情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207738_comment'></div>我后登朝，亦官京师，同衢接屋，十岁于兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207738_comment'></div>宴休戒我，游观载我，忘年比义，良朋待我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207738_comment'></div>而我少公，十有六岁，匪其志同，于公敢辈！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207738_comment'></div>公于学问，尤长礼经，至谈百家，顾尝喜兵，间同我论，挺出峥嵘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207738_comment'></div>能赋与铭，文章《尔雅》，书记翩翩，致足乐也，自为馀事，故罕知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207738_comment'></div>年垂六十，侍郎秋官，平生经纬，虹蜺屈蟠，白头不召，竟死为藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207738_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207738_comment'></div>我守济南，后公五载，问民所安，流风固在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207738_comment'></div>前有范、李，后有曾、王，粤有杜公，于前有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207738_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207738_comment'></div>惟我不孝，获罪于天，奉亲南徙，中罹祸还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207738_comment'></div>唁我吊我，五书并驰，期我自远，匪婚姻私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207738_comment'></div>如何垩室，泣血未殒，斩焉缞绖，承公凶问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207738_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207738_comment'></div>自今以往，我无知己，虽其知者，亦从风靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207738_comment'></div>倾肠倒胃，舌可扪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207738_comment'></div>尚想山立，英姿杰气，庶几神交，百世之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207738_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207738_comment'></div>公喜我文，喜同酒尊，尚举此尊，尚闻此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207738_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1207738_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207743' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207743' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207743?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭郭大夫文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207743")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207743_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207743'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207743'>维元符元年某月日，晁补之谨以清酌庶羞之奠，祭于大夫郭公之灵曰：人之相知，千载一时，千载不逢，亦不可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207743_comment'></div>公年长我，二十而八，平生出处，参辰超忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207743_comment'></div>廉平为吏，自昔所闻，达识高谈，则犹未亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207743_comment'></div>遭患来南，邅回千里，偶公倦游，亦归卧里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207743_comment'></div>斩然在疚，闭户薰心，我不往拜，公来见寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207743_comment'></div>属气收洟，为公一语，不知何为，倾盖如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207743_comment'></div>过累百士，得一人焉，以千载语，则犹并年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207743_comment'></div>为公数临，亦惠慰我，如何不淑，龟玉毁破！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207743_comment'></div>惊呼往吊，雪涕沾胸，尚想霜髯，老鹤孤松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207743_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207743_comment'></div>公守曹南，古循吏比，吾弟为僚，横经泮水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207743_comment'></div>顷于吾弟，推毂先之，晚于此逢，我又见知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207743_comment'></div>兄弟穷人，论心谁与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207743_comment'></div>公独厚之，人所莫顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207743_comment'></div>百年一恸，晤语无期，何以舒哀，斗酒只鸡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207743_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1207743_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207682' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207682' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207682?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右朝议大夫梁公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符元年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207682")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207682_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207682'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207682'>绍圣二年，西鄙进筑诸城，而潼关控陕冲，难守臣，诏曰：「右朝议大夫梁彦通可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207682_comment'></div>乃以公知华州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207682_comment'></div>属岁不登，米㪷钱五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207682_comment'></div>公至，括廪粟，得数十万斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207682_comment'></div>平贾踰半，开门坐府，躬视籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207682_comment'></div>籴者踵入，老幼癃寡皆得食，所活以万计，民颂其惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207682_comment'></div>事闻朝廷，诏使者阅实，使者奏如民言，即召对，将显用，而疾不果对，乃以知兖州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207682_comment'></div>无几何卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207682_comment'></div>其孤以补之家世旧，来请铭，乃序之曰：公梁氏，讳彦通，字贯之，郓州须城人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207682_comment'></div>天平军节度判官讳文度，赠太师、中书令兼尚书令魏国公，曾祖考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207682_comment'></div>妣某氏，韩国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207682_comment'></div>翰林学士讳颢，赠太师、中书令兼尚书令周国公，祖考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207682_comment'></div>妣阎氏，唐国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207682_comment'></div>中书门下平章事讳适，赠太师、开府仪同三司、陈国公、谥庄肃，考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207682_comment'></div>妣任氏，越国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207682_comment'></div>自翰林与其世父固有文，真宗时，举进士皆第一，而庄肃公相仁宗，称忠厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207682_comment'></div>梁氏阀阅冠于山东，而公幼警异，无绮纨，好力学博古，尤长于毛郑诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207682_comment'></div>从丞相荫为秘书省正字，迁太常寺太祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207682_comment'></div>尝举进士，五不中，益自励。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207682_comment'></div>将举方正，会罢制策，犹慨然以坠其世科为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207682_comment'></div>丞相经略秦州，奏书写机宜文字；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207682_comment'></div>逮帅雍、帅并，皆奏以自随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207682_comment'></div>迁大理评事、光禄寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207682_comment'></div>在太原时，中人苏安静为钤辖不法，颇阴厚公，公察而疏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207682_comment'></div>会丞相徙三城，而使者发安静事，尚疑公与交通，求索无秋毫，乃更知公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207682_comment'></div>丞相当国，公每入侍，未尝以一言干朝廷事，间有所论奏以属公，亦绝口不言，谨敬无过，丞相甚器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207682_comment'></div>自大理寺丞迁太子右赞善大夫，又迁殿中丞，皆以英宗、神宗登极恩，序进服五品，勋上骑都尉矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207682_comment'></div>丞相归印绂，卧汶，复丐公签书天平军节度判官，迁国子博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207682_comment'></div>丞相薨，执丧尽礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207682_comment'></div>既除，不忍去坟墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207682_comment'></div>守邵公亢怜之，再辟知须城县事，移签书昭德军节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207682_comment'></div>民吴氏异籍久，忽诣府，言求兄弟复同居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207682_comment'></div>守郭公逵难之，公曰：「民而知义，可旌已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207682_comment'></div>乃如其请，吴氏画其像祠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207682_comment'></div>涉县胥犯法，应徒，而以自首当减从杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207682_comment'></div>州僚希使者旨，议不减，守亦疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207682_comment'></div>公独争甚力，竟以减论，人服其公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207682_comment'></div>迁尚书虞部员外郎、通判澶州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207682_comment'></div>诏塞曹村决河，聚兵夫十万，务日百出，就委公剸决河上，分郡事什七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207682_comment'></div>迁比部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207682_comment'></div>初，澶、魏、定置三仓，广籴备边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207682_comment'></div>至是，朝廷又委公计置，力为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207682_comment'></div>丁越国忧，哀毁垂绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207682_comment'></div>族人索棺食具，意公从丞相久，多珠玉，发笥萧然，人服其清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207682_comment'></div>还朝，改朝散郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207682_comment'></div>熙河用师，吏相继以不才免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207682_comment'></div>选通判永兴军事，始至，大军已趋灵武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207682_comment'></div>诸郡皆督夫负粮从军，且受数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207682_comment'></div>使者阴谕指夫增负若干，人莫敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207682_comment'></div>公独曰：「计已受数，恐不满，又重之，是必壮者逃，弱者踣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207682_comment'></div>即诣中军言之，初犹不从，争久乃定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207682_comment'></div>夫赖以还者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207682_comment'></div>鄜州支使石苍舒冒取俸给，积数千百缗，使者属公治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207682_comment'></div>苍舒雅为当路信，犹簧鼓自辩解，使者反疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207682_comment'></div>公不为摇，竟坐赃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207682_comment'></div>自是寖益有声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207682_comment'></div>上即位，由朝请郎迁朝奉大夫，复以才选，为神宗山陵专勾司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207682_comment'></div>自塞决河、督军饟有功，逮此三应赏格，各减课二期，擢知沂州事，迁朝散大夫，移知洺州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207682_comment'></div>洺近漳，城庳下，前此，泛决坏城，死者相藉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207682_comment'></div>守以罪去累年矣，而水备仍不修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207682_comment'></div>岁秋霪潦，民相恐，欲溃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207682_comment'></div>公出午桥，躬饬备，谕民姑安堵，水至，守以身当之，敢惑众规利者斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207682_comment'></div>既而大涨，公登高望水，北溢则病郛郭，南激则害田畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207682_comment'></div>公曰：「当先其急者」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207682_comment'></div>即开王家湾，走水南陂，城用无患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207682_comment'></div>迁朝请大夫、加上柱国，服三品，又移知邢州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207682_comment'></div>河北荐饥，诏御史巡抚至洺州，民拥其马，言守不恤民困，愿得前守活民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207682_comment'></div>御史问：「前守为谁」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207682_comment'></div>曰：「邢州梁公也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207682_comment'></div>御史因遣洺人皆就食邢，见公犹涕泣再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207682_comment'></div>富人感公义，不闭籴，粟出日倍，流徙如归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207682_comment'></div>安抚使及使者交荐其能，考课优等，迁右朝议大夫，加封保定县开国男，食邑三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207682_comment'></div>会复行免役法，诏使者与州县议，或欲胥徒毋颁禄，公曰：「是差也，且非先朝意」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207682_comment'></div>众无以夺，卒定令如元丰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207682_comment'></div>虏使王遵义等入觐，公出郊劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207682_comment'></div>遵义意公不服金带，礼薄，公曰：「国有官仪，犹使者著蕃服不可改也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207682_comment'></div>相持踰再宿，竟不复见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207682_comment'></div>代还，上嘉谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207682_comment'></div>在华时，鄜延修城，调七州保甲，华在调中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207682_comment'></div>众耸惧，公召诸令，以意慰遣，且版示众曰：「旬浃之役，近在边隅，不与顷岁入界同也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207682_comment'></div>众乃趋命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207682_comment'></div>然政尚严，以抑彊扶弱自任，所至盗贼为衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207682_comment'></div>在兖时，叹曰：「此先丞相旧治，且桑梓近，吾能无恝然意乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207682_comment'></div>为霁威严，人益爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207682_comment'></div>绍圣五年四月十日卒于官舍，享年六十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207682_comment'></div>为人开敏深博，喜论议，恬澹不妄交游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207682_comment'></div>官居事无大小，必身任之，尤以兴庠序劝学为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207682_comment'></div>尝疏新法十事，达于利疚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207682_comment'></div>又奏乞设边备、讲马政、编役书，皆详辩，时元丰末年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207682_comment'></div>家居言必称父母，奉身俭菲，无声妓之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207682_comment'></div>遇宗党诚且爱，推丞相遗恩，己子所当得者，以与不当及之孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207682_comment'></div>著令大臣后禁毋折卖居第墓田，因刻石以警族人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207682_comment'></div>教诸子必以学问发身，诸子皆有立，而子是遂登进士科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207682_comment'></div>晚尤薄于进取，名其庄曰「平野」，名其园曰「佚老」，时往来其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207682_comment'></div>数恳求谢事，命未下而没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1207682_comment'></div>有《平野杂编》二十卷，藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1207682_comment'></div>娶张氏，清河县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1207682_comment'></div>继张氏，福清县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1207682_comment'></div>男子诲，宣义郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1207682_comment'></div>子恕，宣德郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1207682_comment'></div>子是，曹州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1207682_comment'></div>女长适董正封，承议郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1207682_comment'></div>次适巩焘，濠州定远县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1207682_comment'></div>次适王荛、瀛州防御推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1207682_comment'></div>孙曰祗祖，郊社斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1207682_comment'></div>曰行祖、循祖、几祖，未仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1207682_comment'></div>诸孤以其年七月己酉葬公于须城县登庸乡执政里，从丞相之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1207682_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_107_1207682'>梁世有人，翰林始兴，发其德幽，以基九层。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1207682_comment'></div>显允庄肃，乃暨乃成，相我仁祖，有丙魏声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1207682_comment'></div>何以似之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1207682_comment'></div>保定开国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1207682_comment'></div>又何大之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1207682_comment'></div>匪车马饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1207682_comment'></div>彼德而微，则大由小；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1207682_comment'></div>此用而微，不瑕有耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1207682_comment'></div>相尔嗣矣，士有造矣，自我率祖，维其瓞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1207682_comment'></div>有陂者泽，其水泱泱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1207682_comment'></div>有汶斯原，如其世长。</div><div id='poem_sentence_117_1207682_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207696' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207696' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207696?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苏门居士胡君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍圣五年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207696")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207696_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207696'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207696'>熙宁初，补之先子保州府君适越，天雨滞逆旅，夜闻旁舍客叩几歌唐诗甚悲者而异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207696_comment'></div>旦候焉，则颀而长，退然温恭儒者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207696_comment'></div>盖与语，终日不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207696_comment'></div>归，谓补之曰：「客胡氏，名戢，字叔文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207696_comment'></div>小子识之，非今世之士也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207696_comment'></div>已而，补之薄游淮阳，淮阳守有子学乡校中，则叔文也，因定交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207696_comment'></div>叔文好古博雅，其经术论议在汉儒中，其诗文类唐人，而其清谈闲远，不犯世故，则晋阮、向流也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207696_comment'></div>居岁馀而别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207696_comment'></div>间五年，相遇于盱眙，饮南山中数日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207696_comment'></div>时叔文方壮，浩然已有遗世深隐之意矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207696_comment'></div>后八年，补之教授北京，以书来曰：「戢不复仕，然尝为本朝将相九十二人者传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207696_comment'></div>异时观焉，知戢非白首无意于世者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207696_comment'></div>补之慨然惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207696_comment'></div>又九年，补之佐淮南，其子宪臣来曰：「宪臣不天，我君四十有七岁而殁，且瞑不乱，抚宪臣曰：『吾死不遇，命也，故人晁子，汝臣源矣』」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207696_comment'></div>则求纸为一幅书，以与补之诀，曰：「戢不孝，亲未葬而死，恐儿辈不能，弃骨原野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207696_comment'></div>尚畀从九京之游，则愿以二铭累矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207696_comment'></div>补之失声而泣，曰：「嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207696_comment'></div>吾先子知叔文，叔文辱交我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207696_comment'></div>乃哭诸先子之庙，为诗以吊之而受其托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207696_comment'></div>后补之得罪，又七年还朝，而叔文与其亲皆葬四年矣，乃铭而藏之其埏中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207696_comment'></div>叔文，共城人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207696_comment'></div>秘阁校理、司封员外郎俛之子，母寿光县君徐氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207696_comment'></div>而秘阁君博学无不窥，为时通儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207696_comment'></div>其世家行事自有铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207696_comment'></div>叔文为童儿，不戏弄，默而好思，手未尝释卷，秘阁君固已奇之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207696_comment'></div>及长，尽传秘阁君之业，于当时之文，不学而能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207696_comment'></div>然喜词赋，篆刻甚工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207696_comment'></div>尝以进士举有司，继丁徐夫人、秘阁君忧，而朝廷亦废词赋，以新经义取士，叔文曰：「此非吾所传于师而能者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207696_comment'></div>且亲殁，何以仕为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207696_comment'></div>因尽屏幼学，反共城，自号苏门居士，闭关却扫，益涵肆诗书百氏，为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207696_comment'></div>家故藏书万卷，集古今石刻又千卷，尽陈诸左右，而榜其堂曰「琬琰」，翰林学士眉山苏先生为书之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207696_comment'></div>一时名士皆为赋诗，而叔文益远绝世利，惟恐蓬荜之不深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207696_comment'></div>或劝之出，则笑曰：「此室殊无尘土气」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207696_comment'></div>然晚尤笃学，长于论议，至古今成败得失、因革废置，皆深思而默识之，近于可用，而叔文不自以为用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207696_comment'></div>哲宗即位，诏中外直言阙失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207696_comment'></div>叔文始一上书，不召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207696_comment'></div>后其事颇施行，而叔文死矣，元祐六年十一月甲子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207696_comment'></div>葬以绍圣五年二月甲子，而地则共城县之杨闾管，从秘阁君兆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207696_comment'></div>有文集十卷，《二府拜罢录》二卷，《大臣家谱》二卷，《续衣冠盛事图》一卷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207696_comment'></div>而九十二人者之传方属稿，将就宪臣写之，以备太史氏择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207696_comment'></div>夫人元氏，比部员外郎若思女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207696_comment'></div>四男子：宪臣、应臣举进士，其伯与季夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207696_comment'></div>二女子，长嫁同郡刘某，其季夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207696_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1207696'>昔庄生有言：「天之君子，人之小人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207696_comment'></div>吾尝以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207696_comment'></div>然世有聪明好德，甚艺而贤，或不偶而颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207696_comment'></div>而盗蹠脍人之肉，聚党数千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207696_comment'></div>将天眇夫腥腐之飨，而啬乎昭晰之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207696_comment'></div>尚何憾耶，尚何憾耶！</div><div id='poem_sentence_48_1207696_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207307' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207307' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207307?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题大宝箧经后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1098年4月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207307")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207307_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207307'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207307'>真觉大师志添传其远祖百花岩主之道，受持大般若波罗密多安忍精进静虑之戒，诵百千旋陀罗尼，降伏诸魔，拯拔众患，有大名称于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207307_comment'></div>补之戊辰岁拜大师于京师，已蒙教诱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207307_comment'></div>丁丑岁遭太夫人杨氏丧于丹阳，哭诣金山，修水陆供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207307_comment'></div>大师忽于众中念旧拊孤，恻然慈闵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207307_comment'></div>后数日，入船临柩，宣秘密音，如出金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207307_comment'></div>宴坐收足，忽起唱言：「汝母无苦，我佛如来有《大宝箧陀罗尼》，能为一切众生在生死者开大黑暗，灭罪增福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207307_comment'></div>作金刚幢，获不坏报，若顶若佩，若安舍宅，若冢墓中所在之处，则为有佛，乃授此经」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207307_comment'></div>补之奉行，如大师教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207307_comment'></div>戊寅岁，遇妹之婿陈琦于金乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207307_comment'></div>琦不知补之尝受此经也，蹙頞而言：「我闻人言《大宝箧经》昔在朽塔，诸佛涕泣所共宣赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207307_comment'></div>愿以荐先行，求积年，了不可得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207307_comment'></div>补之惊惬，出经帽中，为琦赞说，再拜，授琦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207307_comment'></div>琦即书写，命工刊印，普劝人子亡失父母如我苦者，恭敬供养，顶佩藏置，安像腹中，仗真正力，为升济资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207307_comment'></div>四月六日，晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207307_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='940ade5523a8432f8a634f1f007599a4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("940ade5523a8432f8a634f1f007599a4");'><span id='940ade5523a8432f8a634f1f007599a4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，47岁</div><div id='940ade5523a8432f8a634f1f007599a4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年6月</a>　晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，闰九月抵达信州任所。作品：《己卯六月赴上饶之谪醇臣以诗送行次韵留别》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_196117' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196117' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196117?labeling=true' target='_blank'>己卯<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup>六月赴上饶之谪醇臣以诗送行次韵留别</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196117")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196117_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_196117_0'>① 原作酉，考晁补之《书李正臣怪石诗后》，晁谪上饶在元符己卯</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196117'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196117'>小雅思深志不悲，反骚未与昔人违。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196117'>五车谩苦君何益，三径都荒我未归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196117'>要过香垆䨥履步，却从彭蠡一帆飞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196117'>它年笑向张公子，应带烟霞满客衣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196117_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196117'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196117_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='29798e8914af4e26b19e81011da9985a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("29798e8914af4e26b19e81011da9985a");'><span id='29798e8914af4e26b19e81011da9985a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，47岁</div><div id='29798e8914af4e26b19e81011da9985a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之服丧家居，以巨野地低卑贫薄，遂迁居金乡城东。作品：《卜居金乡祭神文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《奉议郎高君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六五。）</span><div id='poem_1207752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>卜居金乡祭神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207752")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207752'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207752'>维元符二年，岁次己卯正月丙辰，孤子晁补之谨以羊头一、猪头一、青币酒果之奠，祭告于金乡县东郭山川土地之灵曰：补之家世侨居此州，六十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207752_comment'></div>蒙先之泽，不绝如线。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207752_comment'></div>而补之不肖，不知修身服生业为齐民，乃以其空言曲学，欺取国家之名第，以出入闺省、游行四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207752_comment'></div>就食取容，无愧惭于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207752_comment'></div>忠不足于君，孝不足于亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207752_comment'></div>天用丕降祸罚于其不肖，躬大困而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207752_comment'></div>怵惕陨心，垂死未绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207752_comment'></div>念不可以不畏天，重怒而讹厥衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207752_comment'></div>故卜涞之东，尚以休老而芘其孥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207752_comment'></div>虽曰五亩广，而盗天地之利已多，惟神其假之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207752_comment'></div>若厥心神所临，不敢徼福于神，觊厥躬光大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207752_comment'></div>惟寝斯安，无恫瘝于其家，暨厥后以康，则神力能鉴助兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207752_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207752_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207681' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207681?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉议郎高君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符二年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207681")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207681_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207681'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207681'>君高氏，讳元常，字复明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207681_comment'></div>其先齐太公之后，食采于高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207681_comment'></div>其出渤海、渔阳、辽东、河南、广陵者，为望姓，而君世家符离，符离盖广陵高也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207681_comment'></div>曾祖讳士宗，尚书屯田员外郎、赠礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207681_comment'></div>祖讳觌，给事中、集贤院学士、赠金紫光禄大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207681_comment'></div>考讳秉，右朝议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207681_comment'></div>朝议前夫人晁氏，真宁县君，后夫人薛氏，仙居县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207681_comment'></div>而君真宁出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207681_comment'></div>给事公以进士通贵，而符离之高始大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207681_comment'></div>君幼开敏，用给事恩为试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207681_comment'></div>十岁能自力于学，尝病嬉戏废业，至维其带于座，食至乃起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207681_comment'></div>方时，外家晁文庄公隆盛，笃爱无不至，然幼而不骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207681_comment'></div>君年十四，遭母夫人丧，哀戚有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207681_comment'></div>初调滑州司户，用举者，改京兆府司理、监沧州都作院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207681_comment'></div>守李复圭豪举，役视其属，独以诗知君，遂见客，游乐必与俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207681_comment'></div>徙嘉兴丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207681_comment'></div>嘉兴剧县，令不任事，则求持檄出旁郡，讼牒如山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207681_comment'></div>君暂领其事，一朝剖遣立尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207681_comment'></div>先是，佃户靳输主租，讼由此多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207681_comment'></div>君揭而书之曰：「田人田，啬其入，杖且夺田」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207681_comment'></div>民竞往偿，讼于是衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207681_comment'></div>华亭户欺诈，田已穫而拨其荄，引水没之，岁比诉菑，吏不能察，除租多，上又谴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207681_comment'></div>至君，行田为十等，号参相验，欺者辄得，民不能欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207681_comment'></div>守吴安世黩货，私诿令市竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207681_comment'></div>君语令毋受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207681_comment'></div>令阿安世，饮其欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207681_comment'></div>安世后系狱，令欲告之，君曰：「前戒君毋受，而告之可愧，今狼狈卒自露」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207681_comment'></div>迁忠武节度推官、知泰州录事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207681_comment'></div>转运使陈倩与监如皋酒，侍禁方暧者仇也，入境，即以疑似逮务胥，属君讯鞫，必欲造暧事莫脱者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207681_comment'></div>君明暧无他，倩怒，欲劾君不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207681_comment'></div>改宣德郎、知郪县事，以亲老不行，求监吕梁镇酒，娱意文史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207681_comment'></div>转运使侯利建见而叹曰：「君非居此者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207681_comment'></div>转通直郎、知山阳县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207681_comment'></div>县当江淮道，吏窘将迎隳事，而君优游办治，过者亦皆满意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207681_comment'></div>旦坐堂，民肩摩入，常前其座迫庭，呼民一二开喻，或戒敕，俄顷皆去，民各自以为得尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207681_comment'></div>邑子李南夫与其兄阋，兄告欲害己，然但犯之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207681_comment'></div>君曰：「南夫诚可论，使人曰弟缘尔诉得刑，尔亦辱矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207681_comment'></div>其兄感悟，丐不问，因为薄罚，而南夫后亦自悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207681_comment'></div>人有以过笞其子妇，妇雉经死者，其兄诉杀之，验者三辈未白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207681_comment'></div>守彊君往，君即呼画史自随，人殊不能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207681_comment'></div>至则语史图俯仰左右四人状，其伤无遗，皆非所以死者，讼乃已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207681_comment'></div>支家渠可通以漕盐，转运使黄隐初献言浚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207681_comment'></div>隐爱公家费，欲姑调楚海及高邮九县夫，且促其期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207681_comment'></div>君曰：「凡土工，人日竭力为，方且深丈，不可加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207681_comment'></div>顷龟山为渠六十里，调十七县夫而足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207681_comment'></div>今以里计，支家如龟山，且涂泥甚起，夫少则为日长，是重费也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207681_comment'></div>众然其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207681_comment'></div>会隐去，吕温卿为使，因求民私出钱募夫事，欲害隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207681_comment'></div>屡语君，君不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207681_comment'></div>温卿怒，欲并中之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207681_comment'></div>已而代去，不获竟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207681_comment'></div>在山阳三年，狱为七空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207681_comment'></div>转奉议郎，服五品，勋武骑尉，又差监泗州粮料院，复以亲疾不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207681_comment'></div>元符二年三月庚辰卒于家，享年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207681_comment'></div>夫人向氏，继掌氏，皆名族女，淑慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207681_comment'></div>男浑、洞、澈、湍、汭，皆举进士，彊学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207681_comment'></div>女长适进士张知刚，次未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207681_comment'></div>君为人和厚洁廉，好书不倦，为文尚理，然所得多用以为诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207681_comment'></div>至其精于吏道，有人不能及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207681_comment'></div>性孝谨，侍朝议药，经时不解衣，既丧，过毁，因得疾不起，可哀也已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207681_comment'></div>浑等即其年六月癸巳葬君于宿州之蕲县蕲城乡世墓之次，以二夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207681_comment'></div>而湍状君之行事来，曰：「吾子，我君外党，知我君尽，敢乞铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207681_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1207681'>童子而厉己，壮所就如此，使白首可知已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207681_comment'></div>一官而尽已，居所施如此，使为大可知已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207681_comment'></div>抑云者为雨，或族而不雨，风实引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207681_comment'></div>抑复明所遇，吾不知其故，岂非命耶！</div><div id='poem_sentence_65_1207681_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年4月</a>　晁补之服丧家居。作品：《刑部侍郎杜公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六七。）</span><div id='poem_1207702' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207702' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207702?labeling=true' target='_blank'>刑部侍郎杜公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符二年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207702")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207702_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207702'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207702'>公杜氏，讳纮，字君章，京兆万年人，后徙濮州鄄城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207702_comment'></div>曾祖尚书司封郎中兼侍御史知杂事、赠刑部侍郎讳尧臣，妣永安县太君马氏，继万年县太君马氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207702_comment'></div>祖尚书吏部郎中、直史馆、赠吏部尚书讳曾，妣彭城县太君刘氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207702_comment'></div>考尚书虞部郎中、赠特进讳彭寿，妣太宁郡夫人朱氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207702_comment'></div>公少颖迈，知自彊于学问，一上中进士第，调深州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207702_comment'></div>丁朱夫人忧，服除，为永年县令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207702_comment'></div>岁饥，民将徙，公悉召父老语曰：「令不能使汝必无行，若留，能使汝无饥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207702_comment'></div>民喜曰：「如令言，尚何行」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207702_comment'></div>乃悉与印券，使贷于兼并家，约岁丰偿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207702_comment'></div>即不贷，若偿不如约，令能治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207702_comment'></div>于是民咸得食，无徙者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207702_comment'></div>会明年稔，民德公，皆先期偿，时熙宁二年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207702_comment'></div>神宗方侧席异才，即召为大理寺详断官，兼删定编敕，改大理丞，权枢密院宣旨库检用官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207702_comment'></div>未几，擢权判尚书刑部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207702_comment'></div>丁特进忧，服除，迁太子中允、检详枢密院刑房文字，兼修《武经要略》，详定将官敕，又提举晋、汾州义勇保甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207702_comment'></div>尝从容对上曰：「陛下寓兵于农，臣愚不足以知，然臣有不能默者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207702_comment'></div>因条十馀事上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207702_comment'></div>初未俞，后卒知公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207702_comment'></div>兼判尚书兵部，兼提举枢密院宣旨库，迁太常丞，复以职事对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207702_comment'></div>翊日上语宰相曰：「杜纮论事明白，朕甚嘉之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207702_comment'></div>然未果用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207702_comment'></div>乡人前贵溪丞马随来调京师，病逆旅，且死，公闻往视，即载与归，召医冀全之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207702_comment'></div>随病卒，公哭之哀，为治丧第中，或以为嫌，不恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207702_comment'></div>擢检正中书刑房公事、提举中书制敕库、兼修群牧司骐骥院敕，复权判刑部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207702_comment'></div>奏事，面赐服银绯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207702_comment'></div>每议狱，必傅经以决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207702_comment'></div>先是，民间女幼，许嫁未行，而养诸婿氏者，曰「养妇」，会有杀养妇以诬人者，吏议如婚法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207702_comment'></div>公曰：「礼，妇三月而庙见，未庙见而死，归葬于女氏之党，示未成妇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207702_comment'></div>故律谓『定婚，夫犯同凡人』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207702_comment'></div>养妇虽非礼律，其未成妇则礼律之所有也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207702_comment'></div>议乃定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207702_comment'></div>又论：「天下囚应死，吏懦不行法，辄以疑谳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207702_comment'></div>且非杀人则可，杀人而以疑谳，是纵民为杀之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207702_comment'></div>昔羊舌职曰：『善人在上，则国无幸民』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207702_comment'></div>荀卿陈王道之本，亦曰：『民无幸生』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207702_comment'></div>夫为政而下数幸，欲盗之奔秦，难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207702_comment'></div>请治妄谳者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207702_comment'></div>不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207702_comment'></div>差接送伴北朝正旦使，改奉议郎，除刑部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207702_comment'></div>乘舆幸省，迁承议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207702_comment'></div>哲宗即位，迁朝奉郎，又迁朝散郎，为夏国母梁氏祭奠使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207702_comment'></div>时戎初修贡，入其国，礼犹倨，迓者衣毛裘，邀王人以朝服觌，设王人座，蒙以黪，且不跪受诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207702_comment'></div>公持不可，戎犹自若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207702_comment'></div>公曰：「天王以国母丧，遣赴甚厚，今不可以不如礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207702_comment'></div>戎惧，悉从公言，差详定元丰敕令格式，又差按成都等路茶事，以修书不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207702_comment'></div>会夏国以汎使来请复土疆，又差公押伴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207702_comment'></div>而使者欲入见，自有所陈，公遽止之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207702_comment'></div>使者语颇不逊，公念初不之制，且生事，即谓曰：「国主奏乞，具在表章，回诏必自有旨挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207702_comment'></div>况此大事也，朝廷岂因使人口语便为可否乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207702_comment'></div>随语随折之，意小屈，毕见不复敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207702_comment'></div>擢右司郎中，俄迁大理卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207702_comment'></div>又论元祐德音：「赦文斗杀情轻减等，今寺议，一切以减等法从事，虽朝廷不以为然，吏犹守此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207702_comment'></div>古者，大司寇以狱之成告于王，王三宥之，然后制刑焉，德在上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207702_comment'></div>今使朝廷持杀，有司主德，君臣之职于是乎紊」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207702_comment'></div>疏上不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207702_comment'></div>时边臣袭鬼章青宜结，生致阙下，诏公鞫问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207702_comment'></div>公习知戎情，虽黠不能隐，故其国中诡计悉得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207702_comment'></div>上甚说，迁朝请郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207702_comment'></div>丐外官，除直秘阁、知齐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207702_comment'></div>治尚宽厚，不设钩距町畦，崇善良，别材能，人亲附之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207702_comment'></div>然遇事浚发，故小人亦严惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207702_comment'></div>凡讼者必呼使前，为一二别白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207702_comment'></div>欺者辄按牒语之曰：「汝情若是，吾知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207702_comment'></div>不愿竟者亟去，太守恕亦不汝穷也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207702_comment'></div>欺者即以手加颡，拜而走，人以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207702_comment'></div>徙知邓州，兼京西南路安抚司公事，治如齐，人尤爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207702_comment'></div>复召为大理卿，因言：「唐、邓土旷，可积谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207702_comment'></div>陕西常窘兵食，若养兵唐、邓间，以备西戎，径商于距边，略与陕西内州军道里等，平土易运，用以飞挽，利甚博」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207702_comment'></div>事下本道，议者不达，遂寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207702_comment'></div>擢权刑部侍郎，赐服金紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207702_comment'></div>复丐外官，除集贤殿修撰、充江淮荆浙等路发运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207702_comment'></div>先是，岁转东南粟给京师盖七百万石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207702_comment'></div>吏习于无事，弊日积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207702_comment'></div>公尽条上之，事颇施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207702_comment'></div>又言：「京东、河北饥，即转淮南米赈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207702_comment'></div>清河岁涸，输常后，不惟名惠实费，又并受其弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207702_comment'></div>可别为浅脚船，隶京东转运司，而俾发运司岁以诸路上供钱和籴，无问丰歉，以浅脚纲输京东沿流仓积之，并待河北缓急之须，丰则使两路偿如直」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207702_comment'></div>不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207702_comment'></div>改知郓州、兼京东西路安抚司公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207702_comment'></div>汶号难治，系囚至三百人，或岁馀未决者，公下车旬日，剖判立尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207702_comment'></div>属令趋府，持其县之疑事请，即书尾曰「如是如是」，情法皆当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207702_comment'></div>一岁中，狱常空者四五，吏伏听命，取充员而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207702_comment'></div>再召为刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207702_comment'></div>或言公守齐时，尝坐有司失入人死罪，命遽寝，复知郓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207702_comment'></div>一夕，有揭帜城隅、著妖言其上、且为变者，城中大恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207702_comment'></div>俄而草场白昼火，帜中一事也，众益汹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207702_comment'></div>或请大索。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207702_comment'></div>公笑曰：「贼计正在此，冀因吾汹乃发尔，奈何堕其计中？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207702_comment'></div>诸公第默，吾知其无能为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207702_comment'></div>久之，获盗杀防送卒者，验之，奸民马安上等为此遂伏诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207702_comment'></div>因急治境中盗，尽得其囊橐姓名榜购之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207702_comment'></div>盗不得容，皆遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207702_comment'></div>复徙知邓州，老稚扶携迎于道，相语曰：「我旧使君也，请为公立生祠」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207702_comment'></div>不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207702_comment'></div>改差知应天府，兼南京留守司公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1207702_comment'></div>感疾，卒，元符元年八月十二日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1207702_comment'></div>以二年四月二十二日葬于开封府祥符县临黄村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1207702_comment'></div>前夫人耿氏，永年县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1207702_comment'></div>后夫人朱氏，长安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1207702_comment'></div>子钦益，前襄邑县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1207702_comment'></div>钦晏尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1207702_comment'></div>女长适前澶州司理参军韩琏，次适新单州录事参军王槛，次适承事郎、知韩城县事张秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1207702_comment'></div>秩妻蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1207702_comment'></div>公性至孝，亲丧，毁瘠过礼，与伯兄修撰公俱知名，谓之二杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1207702_comment'></div>闺门主恩而严，事修撰公加于人数等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1207702_comment'></div>修撰公讣至，时在汶上，哭曰：「兄教我成我，今亡不得临，死不瞑矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1207702_comment'></div>会以贰卿召，而其孤开适奉柩归葬祥符，迎于国门，哀动路人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1207702_comment'></div>既事之明日，会复还汶，人或以为善兄弟所感云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1207702_comment'></div>开奉寡嫂寄颍昌，公悉俸钱给之，三当任子，再以与其兄之子钦舜，及兄之孙君溥，而君溥者钦舜之孤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1207702_comment'></div>或谓公自有子若孙，奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1207702_comment'></div>公曰：「君恩当以长幼为序」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1207702_comment'></div>故逮公没，而次子一孙俱未命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1207702_comment'></div>公为人清慎而中旷达，不寘纤毫，与人倾倒无不可，而至发于事，则毅然不可干以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1207702_comment'></div>好酒，不能剧饮，而客至，欣然与同醉醒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1207702_comment'></div>喜山水，为州有胜处，必造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1207702_comment'></div>行遇蟠木巨石，必下，取酒使客自酌，悠然遐想，无复轩冕意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1207702_comment'></div>好读书，虽老不倦，尤长于《礼》经，好《檀弓》文，常仿其语法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1207702_comment'></div>顾喜论兵，而未尝试也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1207702_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_118_1207702", 1207702, "Clauses/373/Comments/0")'>诗辞</span>赡丽，尚气格，至表章述事与书记，尤翩翩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1207702_comment'></div>有文集二十卷，奏议十卷，《易说》数十篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1207702_comment'></div>既屡修敕令，尝言配隶与编管太密，祥符中，其科四十有六，后稍益至三百四十有馀科，人得自新者寡，因悉裁其法，盖省四百二十有馀科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1207702_comment'></div>初，公请治谳减者，论有司主德非是，人皆以为深，至是，人更以为恕云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1207702_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_122_1207702'>于昭神考，文王之文亦不己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1207702_comment'></div>思皇熙宁，秉文之德此多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1207702_comment'></div>如川之增，则不可既遗其嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1207702_comment'></div>展也杜侯，奋熙宁初为已试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1207702_comment'></div>宜卿常伯，时周士贵惟其似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1207702_comment'></div>下犹于、张，龚、黄爱人汉循吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1207702_comment'></div>其身不竞，以笃斯祉其在世。</div><div id='poem_sentence_128_1207702_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='0f1701c6ae7843d0b034eae1075a2add_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("0f1701c6ae7843d0b034eae1075a2add");'><span id='0f1701c6ae7843d0b034eae1075a2add_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，47岁</div><div id='0f1701c6ae7843d0b034eae1075a2add' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，闰九月抵达信州任所。作品：《满庭芳•赴信日舟中别次膺十二叔》（鸥起蘋中）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页七0。）</span>《满江红•赴玉山之谪与诸父泛舟大泽分题为别》（莫话南征）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页七二。）</span><div id='poem_196683' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196683' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196683?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满庭芳 赴信日舟中别次膺十二钗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196683")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196683_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196683'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196683'>鸥起蘋中，鱼惊荷底，画船天上来时。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196683'>翠湾红渚，宛似武陵迷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196683'>更晚青山更好，孤云带、远雨丝垂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196683'>清歌里，金尊未掩，谁使动分携。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196683_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196683'>竹林、高晋阮，阿咸潇散，犹愧风期。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196683'>便弃官终隐，钓叟苔矶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196683'>纵是冥鸿云外，应念我、垂翼低飞。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196683_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196683'>新词好，他年认取，天际片帆归。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196683_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196678' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196678' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196678?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 赴玉山之谪，与诸父泛舟大泽，分题为别</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196678")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196678_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196678'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196678'>莫话南征，船头转、三千馀里。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196678'>未叹此、浮生飘荡，但伤佳会。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196678'>满眼青山芳草外，半篙碧水斜阳里。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196678'>问此中、何处芰荷深，渔人指。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196678_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196678'>清时事，羁游意。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196678'>尽付与，狂歌醉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196678'>有多才南阮，自为知己。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196678'>不似朱公江海去，未成陶令田园计。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196678'>便楚乡、风景胜吾乡，何人对。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196678'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196678_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='8293794331184f12970ac229b7f3dc37_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8293794331184f12970ac229b7f3dc37");'><span id='8293794331184f12970ac229b7f3dc37_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，50岁</div><div id='8293794331184f12970ac229b7f3dc37' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　晁补之还金乡家园闲居，管勾江州太平观。作品：《朝请大夫致仕晁公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六七。）</span><div id='poem_1207697' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207697' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207697?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请大夫致仕晁公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁元年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207697")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207697_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207697'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207697'>公讳端仁，字尧民，世家开封，后徙钜野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207697_comment'></div>赠工部侍郎讳迪之曾孙，赠吏部尚书讳宗简之孙，而赠左银青光禄大夫讳仲参之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207697_comment'></div>母公孙氏，济南郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207697_comment'></div>公儿童知学问如成人，通《易》、《春秋》，洞达世务，尤妙于词赋，晔然为山东名进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207697_comment'></div>再从乡书皆举首，声动京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207697_comment'></div>翰林学士滕甫、知制诰邵必见其试文而惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207697_comment'></div>时英宗谅阴罢临轩，遂由别试第二擢甲科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207697_comment'></div>而公文实第一，以宋涣知名太学而跻焉，场屋汹汹为不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207697_comment'></div>初调常州司理参军，听决明甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207697_comment'></div>尝以事请逮宜兴豪，守王说，长者，吏盖豪状，白：「即讯」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207697_comment'></div>公闻，走诣说，告所以逮者，吏犹白：「檄已去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207697_comment'></div>公怒叱吏曰：「檄固守出，守改檄不可耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207697_comment'></div>卒逮之，说由是知公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207697_comment'></div>前守陈襄大兴学，为东南冠，至是，公以掾兼廪食事，而士从公讲授，常数百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207697_comment'></div>丁银青忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207697_comment'></div>银青精吏道，恤民隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207697_comment'></div>初通判舒州，上书言马当山罗刹石之险，请凿秋口浦、枞阳渠以避之，报可而没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207697_comment'></div>公护丧浮江，会王荆公在金陵，遽往请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207697_comment'></div>荆公一见而知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207697_comment'></div>又荆公尝佐舒，其事盖昔所欲兴而不果者也，为作铭特详，银青因益显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207697_comment'></div>免丧，调寿光县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207697_comment'></div>帅清献赵公抃未入境，即以学官荐之，时熙宁四年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207697_comment'></div>初，遣使察访诸路，而京东以命邓润甫、吕升卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207697_comment'></div>两人素非知公，亦首辟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207697_comment'></div>既见，乃知出荆公意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207697_comment'></div>然公<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1207697", 1207697, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>详重</span>，论数不合，故已事不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207697_comment'></div>久之，以定陶丞为兵部主簿，改著作佐郎，充河北籴便司勾当公事，迁秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207697_comment'></div>初修官制，预讨论者皆一时文学士，而公在选中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207697_comment'></div>时尚书右丞黄公履为御史中丞，又以御史荐公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207697_comment'></div>既召对，而宰相王岐公以姻嫌罢之，然公资抗直喜事，人亦畏其在言责者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207697_comment'></div>会再遣使高丽，议以公为书状官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207697_comment'></div>往见岐公，未及语，岐公曰：「岂以母老惮海行乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207697_comment'></div>还朝为馆职，有故事矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207697_comment'></div>公曰：「非为是也，顾事有细而系国体者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207697_comment'></div>顷丰稷尝以此官往矣，高丽使者欲令稷庭谒，稷不肯，使者虽降揖，而竟不客之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207697_comment'></div>时稷犹选人也，今用朝臣往见其国主，固客也，而其使者欲不客之，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207697_comment'></div>愿蕝此仪，即往」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207697_comment'></div>岐公难之而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207697_comment'></div>除太仆丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207697_comment'></div>丁济南忧，免丧，充广济河辇运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207697_comment'></div>而局在钜野，日从亲旧宴语，殚其俸，为食饮费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207697_comment'></div>广济输谷羡，应赏，不自列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207697_comment'></div>改提举河北便籴粮草，计办如广济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207697_comment'></div>又改提举江淮铸钱事，以远丐罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207697_comment'></div>得知沂州，治尚安静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207697_comment'></div>前此，民或不知吾守谁何，而公治近民，至耕夫牧儿皆能言吾守晁公，或图其像藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207697_comment'></div>考课以最闻，召对便殿，哲宗迎语曰：「是尝与吕大防争河北事者耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207697_comment'></div>公徐对曰：「臣尝任河北便籴，尚书省以白劄子改钞法，此臣职事，且干边计，故尝论列而止，非与大防争也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207697_comment'></div>因复从容论时事得失，哲宗皆嘉纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207697_comment'></div>复以为提举河北常平等事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207697_comment'></div>代还，执政曰：「积粟充，然不按吏，何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207697_comment'></div>公对以「职在农役，不敢以是为先」，执政不悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207697_comment'></div>乃知寿州，又改知曹州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207697_comment'></div>考课复第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207697_comment'></div>上以彰信节度即位，吏民争言，吾军上龙潜地，皆求贡，觊非常恩，以是动公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207697_comment'></div>公曰：「吾以守臣恩任子，非常矣，公等自为之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207697_comment'></div>乃独以上在邸时谕戒吏民之语刻石上之，诏改兴仁军焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207697_comment'></div>故人子得疾京师，殆，语仆曰：「以我之曹南晁守」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207697_comment'></div>及境而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207697_comment'></div>吏白：「应视尸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207697_comment'></div>公不许，而为治丧，还其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207697_comment'></div>召为金部郎中，会常计，句隐伏，出馀赢，号称职，而论事正色，数不屈其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207697_comment'></div>适有江淮使者来，见之愕然，私谓曰：「郎中启事尚书乃尔耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207697_comment'></div>公曰：「人复有憃如我者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207697_comment'></div>即上章求去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207697_comment'></div>改主客郎中，而公又不愿留，乃知徐州，改襄州、蔡州，皆未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207697_comment'></div>偶执政有不合而罢者，宰相疑其异己，故数徙公，而公故倦游，对客时诵渊明《归去来词》，浩然无意于世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207697_comment'></div>俄乞致仕，得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207697_comment'></div>而公亦感疾，以崇宁元年七月丁亥终于家，年六十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207697_comment'></div>即其年十月辛酉葬于济州任城县之鱼山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207697_comment'></div>自佐著作，九迁为朝请大夫，勋柱国，服五品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207697_comment'></div>娶叶氏，钱唐县君，前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207697_comment'></div>五子：损之，兖州龚丘县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207697_comment'></div>泰之，单州城武县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207697_comment'></div>谦之，太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207697_comment'></div>其第二子临之、第四子涣之蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207697_comment'></div>涣之幼奇警，公痛伤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207697_comment'></div>一女，适单州单父县主簿李公济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207697_comment'></div>孙男八人：公美、公善、公序、公瑾、公仪、公琬、公惠、公琰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207697_comment'></div>孙女四人：长适曹南董䅅，次适同郡李相如，次适富春孙尚贤，幼在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207697_comment'></div>公事亲孝，岂弟，老于文学，以纠宗睦族为志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207697_comment'></div>不设机械，而喜导人于善，人亦多爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207697_comment'></div>其亡，乡党皆为之流涕焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207697_comment'></div>有《易论》十卷，文集十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207697_comment'></div>而于《易》尤致志，其说「七日来复」、「八月有凶」，义特妙，词多不载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207697_comment'></div>初公少日，与今尚书右丞范公纯礼俱学许昌，又与故门下侍郎李公清臣相从毗陵，皆厚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207697_comment'></div>范公与其善论事，李公尝谓其不愧屋漏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207697_comment'></div>两公同时秉政，而公为郎，终不倚以进，岂非贤哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207697_comment'></div>江南黄庭坚有美名，尤厚公，其诗曰：「慇勤均骨肉，四海一尧民」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207697_comment'></div>黄亦不妄与人者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207697_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_1207697'>楚人有言：「何方圆之能周？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207697_comment'></div>孰异道而相安」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207697_comment'></div>盖不齐者物之情，而齐之实难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1207697_comment'></div>士有志业，所蕲者时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1207697_comment'></div>岂无其时？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1207697_comment'></div>从古异施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1207697_comment'></div>往追吾亡，歧又有歧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1207697_comment'></div>舍旃勿从，则又后之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1207697_comment'></div>公逢世治，童冠有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1207697_comment'></div>欲任士责，以其一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1207697_comment'></div>譬彼大木，工师既求，斲而小之，则惟匠尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1207697_comment'></div>中和之行，果达之才，济以其学，文词孔偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1207697_comment'></div>召而罢之，时则有命，去彼取此，惟恬不竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1207697_comment'></div>惟恬不竞，能乐若此，不施其邦，亦施其里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1207697_comment'></div>彼污得志，惟厚尔颜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1207697_comment'></div>我忱不怍，有鱼彼山。</div><div id='poem_sentence_105_1207697_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4c335ce1a43e4cde9145d4b1e8e4ce64_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4c335ce1a43e4cde9145d4b1e8e4ce64");'><span id='4c335ce1a43e4cde9145d4b1e8e4ce64_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1107')">1103-1107年</a>，51-55岁</div><div id='4c335ce1a43e4cde9145d4b1e8e4ce64' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　晁补之还金乡家园闲居，管勾江州太平观。作品：《遐观楼辞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三。）</span>《赠刘范子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span><div id='poem_196490' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196490' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196490?labeling=true' target='_blank'>遐观楼辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196490")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196490_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196490'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196490'>窘墙堵之伏潜兮，登斯楼以遐观。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196490'>匪吾居之为隘兮，乾坤曶其盂盘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196490'>仰攀甍而拊楯兮，宇旷旷而益宽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196490'>彼何大而能舒兮，吾何眇而莫闲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196490'>霜肃垄而木枯兮，潦收窦而泽乾。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196490'>蓬鸣野而相追兮，知海冰而天寒。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196490'>左睇兮城闉，右盼兮林坰。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196490'>商贾纷其昼合兮，陶冶蓊其烟兴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196490'>之罘杳以在东，双柏近而青青。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196490'>物暇遽之不同兮，余亦不知其何情。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196490'>聊浮游以相羊兮，初怫郁而中清。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196490'>彼坱圠之无垠兮，人驹隙之暂更。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196490'>道本夷而世险兮，夸夺餍而卒平。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196490'>周垣兀其跨衍兮，逝千古于樵耕。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196490'>春与秋之不淹兮，岁忽忽其峥嵘。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196490'>招摇指于北陆兮，澹黄宫之阳生。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196490'>固天道之反覆兮，气默会而孤萌。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196490'>朝卷箔而极望兮，稍雾廓而日晶。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196490'>及旸景之方中兮，晞余发乎南荣。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196490'>浮云起而景翳兮，四暝合而睹星。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196490'>风摵摵而感轩兮，雀啾啾而赴楹。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196490'>收百为以清虑兮，施余裯而榻横。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196490'>漠汹汹而非声兮，邈冉冉而非征。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196490'>形欺魄而若存兮，神无亏而靡成。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196490'>目瞳眬而罔觌兮，坐待日之方升。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196490'>夜寥寥而未央兮，羌不寐而无营。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196490'></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_196490_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196490'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷三。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_196490_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠刘范子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年6月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207304")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207304'>缗城人喜治园圃，而余故人刘邦式，西郊达观亭为甲，高竹大柳，台可眺而池可钓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207304_comment'></div>余绍圣间始居缗，日从邦式语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207304_comment'></div>邦式不外修形貌而中玉雪，盖方今隐者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207304_comment'></div>后数年复来，亦治东皋五亩宅以老，而邦式亡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207304_comment'></div>见其子某，慨然书此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207304_comment'></div>崇宁二年六月望日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　晁补之管勾江州太平观，遂还金乡家园闲居。作品：《谢得请江州太平观表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1207141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢得请江州太平观表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207141")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207141'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207141'>起废恩优，薄从裁抑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207141_comment'></div>包荒德大，终畀便安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207141_comment'></div>以平时不敢僭求，而一旦曲从私欲，捐生莫称，洒涕自惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207141_comment'></div>臣补之诚惶诚惧，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207141_comment'></div>伏念臣家世衰微，人才嵬琐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207141_comment'></div>生五十一岁，行身未免于悔尤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207141_comment'></div>仕二十四年，责实固无于毫末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207141_comment'></div>流离困剧，秪缘梧鼠之技穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207141_comment'></div>湔洗召还，寔遇飞龙之施普。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207141_comment'></div>愚不知于适变，狂犹念于安常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207141_comment'></div>一昨罢还中铨，当守远郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207141_comment'></div>惟祠宫为之加饩廪，本先朝所以优臣工，岂图弃置之馀，亦被生成之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207141_comment'></div>虽乏可依之田亩，不违在望之松楸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207141_comment'></div>荷天至私，跼地罔措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207141_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇皇帝陛下体成王之为子，本王季之事兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207141_comment'></div>弥性似先，因心笃爱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207141_comment'></div>持循旧法，开示有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207141_comment'></div>故臣所蒙，于分犹过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207141_comment'></div>未溘先于犬马，终愿驰驱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207141_comment'></div>亦尝学于诗书，敢忘忠义！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207141_comment'></div>瞻望阙庭，臣无任感天荷圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207141'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五五。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷三五。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207141_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年4月</a>　四月，诏毁三苏，黄庭坚、张耒、晁补之、秦观等文集。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年</a>　晁补之还金乡家园闲居，管勾江州太平观。作品：《夫人阎氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六八。）</span>《摸鱼儿•东皋寓居》（买陂塘）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页一一二。乔书云“崇宁二年晁补之退居金乡，此词当作于始还家经略归来园时”，故系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207709?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夫人阎氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁二年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207709")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207709_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207709'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207709'>故大理寺丞、充刑部详覆官晁君讳端本之夫人阎氏，济州钜野人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207709_comment'></div>考单州司户参军、赠宣德郎讳德基，蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207709_comment'></div>妣孝感县太君张氏，寡而材，教其女甚修，士争与婚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207709_comment'></div>故夫人年十九归晁氏，而大理君复蚤世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207709_comment'></div>夫人恭俭守义，族姻更赒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207709_comment'></div>尝从其兄今奉议郎致仕仲约官江州，因受道家箓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207709_comment'></div>逮补之为尚书郎及守河中也，皆迎夫人以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207709_comment'></div>而补之之以太平观食而居缗也，夫人不果来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207709_comment'></div>崇宁二年六月甲戌殁，享年六十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207709_comment'></div>生七子，皆不育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207709_comment'></div>一女，嫁故集贤院学士杜公讳纯之子承奉郎开，又以产夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207709_comment'></div>夫人由是得疾，悲啼不舍榻，竟以殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207709_comment'></div>且瞑，犹纲纪其后事，不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207709_comment'></div>前此，杜氏以其外孙君渥从，始孩矣，随其柩而号，行路伤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207709_comment'></div>而大理君于补之为叔父，补之痛君之无禄也，既以岁甲子冬十月乙酉，葬君鱼山矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207709_comment'></div>故夫人之亡十八日，七月辛卯克祔于鱼山之茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207709_comment'></div>且尝誓于大理君曰：「惟岁时荐享，则先人之不肖子补之在，乃先人之祀未坠于地，则叔父饮食如生」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207709_comment'></div>今夫人之葬也，言犹在，我先祖先人尚闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207709_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1207709'>生无以养，既养矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207709_comment'></div>死无以葬，既葬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207709_comment'></div>抑富贵而多子，相去乎此其能几？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207709_comment'></div>吁嗟夫人，可宁止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207709_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196677' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196677' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196677?labeling=true' target='_blank'>摸鱼儿 东皋寓居</a><span class='authorDate'>（1103年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196677")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196677_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196677'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196677'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_196677", 196677, "Clauses/0/Comments/1")'>买陂塘</span>、旋栽杨柳，依稀淮岸江浦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196677'>东皋新雨新痕涨，沙觜鹭来鸥聚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196677'>堪爱处。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196677'>最好是、一川夜月光流渚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196677'>无人独舞。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196677'>任<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_196677", 196677, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>翠幄</span>张天，柔茵藉地，酒尽未能去。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196677_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196677'>青绫被，莫忆金闺故步。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196677'>儒冠曾把身误。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196677'>弓刀千骑成何事，荒了邵平瓜圃。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196677'>君试觑。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196677'>满青镜、星星鬓影今如许。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196677'>功名浪语。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196677'>便似得班超，封侯万里，归计恐迟暮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_196677_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_196677'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(196677)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1103&endYear=1103')">1103年9月</a>　九月，臣僚又请诏御书元祐奸党姓名颁于天下郡县，令监司长吏皆刻石，晁补之亦在党籍中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1104&endYear=1107')">1104-1107年</a>　晁补之家居金乡东皋，管勾江州太平观。作品：《梦觌赋》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷一。）</span>《题陶渊明诗后》<span
