class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页一三七。寓居东皋难以确指年代作品。）</span><div id='poem_1207071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207071' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207071?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梦觌赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207071")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207071_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207071'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207071'>岁阏逢之涒滩兮，前日至而匪思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207071_comment'></div>梦啾耳之薨薨兮，蓊青蝇其羾楣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207071_comment'></div>咸南徙而未逝兮，遗其矢如散丝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207071_comment'></div>余俛避而不污兮，一媪背之淋漓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207071_comment'></div>吻不知其可秽兮，偶并趋于西帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207071_comment'></div>媪左目之穴枯兮，蓱四五其萃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207071_comment'></div>旁两媪之无言兮，亦依帷而靡期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207071_comment'></div>朝怛寤而自诊兮，营营发诗而可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207071_comment'></div>蹇俱翔而遗矢兮，技止此其奚为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207071_comment'></div>惟一盲而两默兮，与目蓱为何禨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207071_comment'></div>岂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1207071", 1207071, "Clauses/20/Comments/0")'>眇视</span>不足与明兮？蓱非寄而终离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207071_comment'></div>羌何为而眹此兮？神无心而罔私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207071_comment'></div>拜受神祥兮，编之册词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207071_comment'></div>文女三之为奸兮，比匪人而恶之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207071_comment'></div>微夫周公之为见兮，迕若此其余衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207071_comment'></div>欲徼福则安敢兮，问故老其增疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207071_comment'></div>苟不污为已免兮，谢三媪之难知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207071_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207071_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题陶渊明诗后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207279")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207279_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207279'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207279'>诗以一字论工拙，如「身轻一鸟过」，「身轻一鸟下」，过与下，与疾，与落，每变而每不及，易较也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207279_comment'></div>如鲁直之言「犹珷玞之于美玉」，是已，然此犹在工拙精觕之间，其致思未白也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207279_comment'></div>记在广陵日，见东坡云：「陶渊明意不在诗，诗以寄其意耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207279_comment'></div>『采菊东篱下，悠然望南山』，则既采菊，又望山，意尽于此，无馀蕴矣，非渊明意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207279_comment'></div>『采菊东篱下，悠然见南山』，则本自采菊，无意望山，适举首而见之，故悠然忘情，趣闲而累远」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207279_comment'></div>此未可于文字精觕间求之，以比珷玞美玉不类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207279_comment'></div>崇宁三年十月晦日，晁补之题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207279_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207683' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207683' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207683?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瀛州防御推官阎君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁三年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207683")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207683_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207683'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207683'>君阎氏，讳师孟，字醇老，济州钜野人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207683_comment'></div>光禄少卿讳贻庆之曾孙，赠卫尉卿讳询之孙，而尚书比部郎中讳仲甫之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207683_comment'></div>母长安县君贾氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207683_comment'></div>君中元祐九年进士第，调徐州彭城县主簿，即以才称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207683_comment'></div>初摄尉下邳，民有不事作业者，其妻与前夫女谋去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207683_comment'></div>妻与民斗，而女从傍自毙其子以诬民，民莫能辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207683_comment'></div>君疑焉，未送县，以舍逆旅，而伏吏床下伺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207683_comment'></div>夜中，母女议诬状，吏遽出持之，不逮于狱而事已正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207683_comment'></div>众大惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207683_comment'></div>彭城号难治，君至，复摄令事，踰月，庭讼为衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207683_comment'></div>夏潦害稼，郡檄邑，毋多受诉，君白不可，而受如令，民用不困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207683_comment'></div>城西北，汴泗汇也，岁苦水菑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207683_comment'></div>君疏渠，以杀其怒，水至游渠中，不肆，因以卫城无患，民大利之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207683_comment'></div>当涂者益以为才，而争荐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207683_comment'></div>岁满，迁瀛州防御推官，知潞州涉县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207683_comment'></div>将行，以疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207683_comment'></div>元符三年七月六日甲子也，享年四十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207683_comment'></div>夫人晁氏，先君朝散大夫之第五女，而补之之第三妹也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207683_comment'></div>子七人：璩、琮、珌、璘、玮、璹，一未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207683_comment'></div>三女，幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207683_comment'></div>卜以崇宁三年十一月甲子葬于钜野县黄涧乡长直村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207683_comment'></div>璩来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207683_comment'></div>君为人警敏和裕，仪状秀整，赡于文词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207683_comment'></div>初丧比部公与贾夫人，尚幼，号泣自伤，志欲以学问显乡闾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207683_comment'></div>所与游，多知名长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207683_comment'></div>事其兄恪，居官临人，事事欲以诸老先生为矩范而不苟也，故始仕而得誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207683_comment'></div>众以远大望之，而君死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207683_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1207683'>裹粮以期万里，志骎骎焉，无燕越矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207683_comment'></div>而不千里百里，发轫而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207683_comment'></div>匪志则然，曰命止此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207683_comment'></div>如黼斯绣，为衣裳不就，有子七人，宁莫慰尔后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1207683_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207692' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207692' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207692?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贵溪县丞马君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁三年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207692")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207692_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207692'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207692'>君马氏，讳随，字持正，濮州鄄城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207692_comment'></div>澶州顿丘县令、赠给事中讳应图之曾孙，枢密直学士、兵部侍郎、赠太尉讳元方之孙，尚书屯田员外郎、赠尚书工部侍郎讳侨之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207692_comment'></div>幼警敏，家居与人交，重然诺，轻财乐谊，故蚤以学行称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207692_comment'></div>受《春秋》于孙复，受《易》于石介；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207692_comment'></div>尤长诗赋，闻于山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207692_comment'></div>皇祐中，春官第其文，选首，以一字触禁，罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207692_comment'></div>春官为叹息言之，后不复从举，而以其学教授乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207692_comment'></div>会诏举孝廉，众共推上之，君恳辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207692_comment'></div>既无以易君，遂虚其举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207692_comment'></div>用季父忠州团练使称任为定海主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207692_comment'></div>以政事称，当路者亟荐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207692_comment'></div>再调合淝主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207692_comment'></div>有田讼，积岁不决，以质诸父老，莫能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207692_comment'></div>君自临焉，曰：「吾得之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207692_comment'></div>命阙地，隐然有故画界处，众以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207692_comment'></div>徙贵溪县丞，摄铅山银场，课倍而不以规赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207692_comment'></div>为人诚厚不苟容，所居官务奉法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207692_comment'></div>又以其试之小也，故不大较著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207692_comment'></div>罢官，至京师卒，熙宁九年三月丙辰也，年五十有三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207692_comment'></div>君少孤，教诸弟力，后皆婚宦有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207692_comment'></div>贫，仰食君者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207692_comment'></div>再娶皆段氏，赠金吾卫大将军震之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207692_comment'></div>三子：希孟，宣德郎、太学博士，贯穿礼经，有师说，亦赡于词，神宗所尝欲用为御史，未及而亡者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207692_comment'></div>次希甫，乡贡进士；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207692_comment'></div>次希说，宣德郎、监安乐镇公事，皆修洁而文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207692_comment'></div>一女夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207692_comment'></div>六孙：承诲，铜鞮丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207692_comment'></div>承诩、承咏、承讼、承谆、承谔，皆学矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207692_comment'></div>以崇宁三年十二月甲寅，葬于鄄城县武成乡招贤里，从学士之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207692_comment'></div>而希说与补之亚也，故来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207692_comment'></div>初，君得疾逆旅，革，傍无人，故尚书刑部侍郎杜侯纮为里旧，遽载与归，舍其斋中，使家人视饮剂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207692_comment'></div>既殁，为治丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207692_comment'></div>听事中人皆谓君善人，故得此，而嘉杜侯之忘嫌赴义，非今世事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207692_comment'></div>补之尝铭杜侯，又铭君，再致志焉，以信两君子之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207692_comment'></div>然世有于所厚者薄，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207692_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1207692'>委楩楠于谷，杂然众木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207692_comment'></div>使隶视之，知其可用于夏屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207692_comment'></div>谓夫不愿为材，则于人弃，意于木得计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207692_comment'></div>以厚其子孙，识真为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207692_comment'></div>此昔人所以未能信于仕，而子说也耶？</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1207692_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207656' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207656' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207656?labeling=true' target='_blank'>猪齿臼化佛赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1104年7月27日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207656")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207656_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207656'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207656'>猪齿臼化佛者，崇宁二年三月一日，卫州获嘉县民职氏杀猪祭神，而民刘氏猎犬得其弃首骨，衔之狺狺，四日不食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207656_comment'></div>民使其子析之，其左牡齿臼中得肉如拇，色酣酣由醉玉，谛视之，如来像也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207656_comment'></div>髻有珠如粟，瞑目跏趺，瞳子隐然，庄严毕具，观者万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207656_comment'></div>补之从弟新乡令载之目睹其事，记于石，以示补之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207656_comment'></div>补之耸然曰：佛菩萨誓救苦众生，菩萨至不爱头目髓脑，度人畜鬼出无量苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207656_comment'></div>而具缚凡夫以利养，故杀害不已，俱入剧苦大火坑中，号呼恐怖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207656_comment'></div>过又不改，佛菩萨动于威神为警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207656_comment'></div>此辈因惧生信，令诸阐提隳弥戾车于沸镬汤，莲花涌出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207656_comment'></div>是佛菩萨心欲此事流布十方，诸恶众生有芥子许过去善根，皆大恐怖，戒悔杀害，普作回向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207656_comment'></div>诸佛现前，不觉心喜身跃，复作是言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207656_comment'></div>从不可说劫，民有齿牙，知相食，故无日不杀，由大地草万死万生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207656_comment'></div>而佛哀悯，故动于希奇，如优钵昙花，时一现耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207656_comment'></div>夫以不可说劫，无日不杀，万死万生之中，而佛之威神才得一现，而乃独动于职氏之猪与刘氏之犬，现已应传，而若睹若不睹，若信若不信，至千万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207656_comment'></div>夫于千万人中，而我兄弟两人者，又独得而记且赞之，则凡职氏与所祭若神，所使若屠，所杀若猪，与刘氏所衔若犬，所析若子，与记者吾弟，赞者补之，于过去世是一段事，本末轻重，皆有因缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207656_comment'></div>惟有佛眼，悉知悉见，次第显出，终始圆成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207656_comment'></div>令四天下与未来世因此希奇，与此文字，辩意不杀，决定自知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207656_comment'></div>如利宝刀断多罗木，意已断故，业不复萌，无始怨仇，俱为眷属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207656_comment'></div>由是增长深般若，因一切诸佛之所护念，岂不胜哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207656_comment'></div>岂不大哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207656_comment'></div>三年七月二十七日初夜，援笔为赞，顷刻而成，若佛力助，文不加点云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207656_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1207656'>吾观鸟兽，诸食肉形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207656_comment'></div>钩吻锯牙，惨剧罗刹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207656_comment'></div>如是一类，是彊非彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207656_comment'></div>业力所驱，啖彼养己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207656_comment'></div>是遭食者，死已能生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207656_comment'></div>反诛其偿，如汝啖我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207656_comment'></div>版筑上下，无有尽时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207656_comment'></div>此业甚深，佛所不度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207656_comment'></div>牛马草食，口方齿平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207656_comment'></div>业浅易超，无对复苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207656_comment'></div>人非牛马，齐贝瓠犀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207656_comment'></div>食谷果蔬，形善应尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207656_comment'></div>云何不若？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207656_comment'></div>牛马异生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207656_comment'></div>无凶吻牙，而作锋刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207656_comment'></div>鹰虎受报，形凶则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207656_comment'></div>人形佛形，而惨鹰虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207656_comment'></div>故死受报，甚于马牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207656_comment'></div>我诵此言，普劝横目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207656_comment'></div>血入牙故，杀生不休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207656_comment'></div>至人无心，同仁一视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207656_comment'></div>视人如我，视猪如人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207656_comment'></div>人自不知，是猪何等？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207656_comment'></div>或其前世，诸眷属因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207656_comment'></div>云何无明？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207656_comment'></div>日杀眷属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207656_comment'></div>刺心取血，血大壑流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207656_comment'></div>扬汤<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_47_1207656", 1207656, "Clauses/143/Comments/0")'>燖毛</span>，毛须弥聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207656_comment'></div>死者不舍，万猪常随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207656_comment'></div>汝莫鼓刀，谓猪贱畜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207656_comment'></div>是热血里，有丈六身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207656_comment'></div>南无佛陀，南无僧祛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207656_comment'></div>我不敢杀，诸佛现前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207656_comment'></div>一切众生，若飞若走，若潜若穴，小大妍媸，其血肉中，各具一佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207656_comment'></div>云何见佛，而欲鼓刀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207656_comment'></div>汝欲杀猪，应作是念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207656_comment'></div>罽宾国主，杀尊者时，未及舍刀，臂已墯落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207656_comment'></div>白乳涌出，六种震惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207656_comment'></div>亦如此猪，脑破佛出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207656_comment'></div>佛不在外，佛不在中，佛不在空，佛不在色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207656_comment'></div>是猪不死，彼佛俨然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207656_comment'></div>世分别心，自说人贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207656_comment'></div>谓羊豕业，本以供人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207656_comment'></div>彼以业来，我何故受？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207656_comment'></div>受则羊豕，业归我身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207656_comment'></div>往有大猪，生不啖秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207656_comment'></div>食薄荷草，度群业猪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207656_comment'></div>菩萨威神，示入异类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207656_comment'></div>汝自肉眼，何由识猪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207656_comment'></div>藏汝之刀，莫加猪首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207656_comment'></div>惊齿臼内，跏趺坐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207656_comment'></div>稽首世尊，在我齿臼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207656_comment'></div>我不敢慢，无猪无人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207656_comment'></div>惟愿现前，诸见闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207656_comment'></div>如菩萨誓，念念勿疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207656_comment'></div>以此胜因，普荐三世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207656_comment'></div>父母师长，若冤若亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207656_comment'></div>化柔软心，去毒害意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207656_comment'></div>舍热血汁，获甘露浆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207656_comment'></div>苦海悉乾，同一安隐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_79_1207656_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207297' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207297' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207297?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋董元画</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年11月26日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207297")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207297_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207297'>翰林沈存中《笔谈》云：「僧巨然画，近视之，几不成物象，远视之，则晦明向背，意趣皆得」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207297_comment'></div>余得二轴于外弟杜天达家，近存中评也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207297_comment'></div>然巨然盖师董元，此董笔也，与余二轴不类，乃知自昔学者，皆师心而不蹈迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207297_comment'></div>唐人最名善书，而笔法皆祖二王，离而视之，观欧无虞，睹颜忘柳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207297_comment'></div>若蹈迹者，则今院体书，无以复增损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207297_comment'></div>故曰寻常之内画者，谨毛而失貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207297_comment'></div>乙酉十一月二十六日，晁补之书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1207297_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李去病字仲霍序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207324")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207324_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207324'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207324'>世治则国无所用将，身安则家无所事医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207324_comment'></div>用将与医，皆不得已，而术之所不愿出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207324_comment'></div>然所贵乎人者，生则能为人御菑而捍患，使人赖其德而己食其功，虽不得已，亦不可一日而无二术之类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207324_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1207324", 1207324, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>贼奸</span>不作，则太平可千载；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207324_comment'></div>癙忧莫袭，则正气能百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207324_comment'></div>故五兵之家，五药之施，如禹之行水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207324_comment'></div>水不为败，则禹功无所试，至其败而为之，亦行其所无事则已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207324_comment'></div>自非圣人，孰能探不形而治未病？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207324_comment'></div>病则能以术去之，圣之次也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207324_comment'></div>盖昔善将如汉霍侯，其言曰：「匈奴未绝，无以家为」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207324_comment'></div>其以去病自名，或者义取诸此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207324_comment'></div>而缗城李君慕焉，则摭其名以名，余因以「仲霍」字之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207324_comment'></div>仲霍知书，且多艺，少从乡贡，顾尝好医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207324_comment'></div>以其所闻于儒者，礼乐有盈减，刚柔有损益，术斯而往，知五行六气之动，以节中而屡移，故医特胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207324_comment'></div>然霍侯用之大，仲霍用之小，事必与时并，而名必与功偕，遇不遇势异，则前后之相望，与才之长短，未可以陵节议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207324_comment'></div>而原其初，皆欲为人御菑而捍患，使人赖其德，而后己食其功，其志出于为物则同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207324_comment'></div>且秦医和以胗知国，抑有人焉，载所闻于儒者，自道出于为技而托之技，以伯仲于霍之流，未可曰若是班也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207324_comment'></div>然霍侯无学术，以材自喜，贪其功不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207324_comment'></div>太至则病，内而偕美，仲霍诚能反其道，揆生之理，无偏而不起，病去则已，可以进谷米，弗已，则亦末解而本俱弊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207324_comment'></div>是谓医纪，所闻于儒之内也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207324_comment'></div>仲霍识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207324_comment'></div>崇宁四年六月日序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207324_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207693' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207693' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207693?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁四年四月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207693")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207693_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207693'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207693'>进士王君，讳龟龄，字安仁，济州钜野人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207693_comment'></div>其得姓，在周为姬氏，在齐为田氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207693_comment'></div>其出姬者名晋，为灵王太子，或传其得道，弃家仙去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207693_comment'></div>其出田者名和，王齐二世，嬴灭之，项封之，汉兴失国，人咸谓之王家云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207693_comment'></div>其鼻祖如此，不知孰出，然其姓蕃，故多贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207693_comment'></div>君曾祖讳志，祖讳丕，官皆大理寺丞，皆以长者称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207693_comment'></div>考讳彦博，不仕，生二十二年而夭，然少奇伟惊人，迄今人言王仲远犹慕，仲远其字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207693_comment'></div>尝十七八岁时，邻人有吹笛者，仲远听之而悲，赋诗曰：「黄须战士据鞍听，白发将军抚剑叹」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207693_comment'></div>会补之先大夫与仲远善，见之愀然曰：「仲远有大志，然恐终不遇，奈何」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207693_comment'></div>无几时则仲远卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207693_comment'></div>此闻诸先大夫云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207693_comment'></div>于时君始龀也，季松龄，字子固，尚襁抱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207693_comment'></div>母鲁郡孔氏，哀号自誓，谨生业以厚其鞠子，使学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207693_comment'></div>而君亦资开爽，总角而愿，能慰其母心，故人皆曰王氏「嫠守义而孤克家」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207693_comment'></div>稍长，则益好修，日夜治其文学，以从里之贤君子才士游，如恐失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207693_comment'></div>其自刻厉，冀必有以表于世，终发扬其先人之所遭不幸，禀厚而报艰，幸因己益闻，使不遇若遇者，其志深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207693_comment'></div>而君又不幸生二十七矣亦夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207693_comment'></div>乡人之长者既厚期君父子两世宜大，而重痛其里之再失才士也，皆为文若诗以吊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207693_comment'></div>君没以熙宁九年七月丙寅，而葬以崇宁四年四月庚午。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207693_comment'></div>时子固为白马丞，而君二子彬、彤长矣，始克举其祖以下凡六丧，卜任城县之吕村原，吉而祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207693_comment'></div>岁月远矣，人尚为之流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207693_comment'></div>夫人晁氏，尚书比部员外郎讳仲渊之女，蚤寡而庄，如其闺中时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207693_comment'></div>彬、彤皆举进士，以文义称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207693_comment'></div>三女适李公权、阎璪、祝晋，皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207693_comment'></div>以补之先大夫于其祖厚，而补之又蚤与君游，求为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207693_comment'></div>君为人孝弟博闻，敏于辞章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207693_comment'></div>再举礼部不第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207693_comment'></div>然喜言世务，近可用者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207693_comment'></div>乐易善与人交，家无赢馀而轻财尚义，以好事闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207693_comment'></div>倦游无所依若急难者，必求王安仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207693_comment'></div>客醉卧其舍，或穷日夜諠呼求索无已时，而君益欢，僮仆无惰容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207693_comment'></div>孔夫人自屏窥之，喜，为致甘脆，所嗜益设，曰：「客不辱与吾儿善，吾儿不愧客矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207693_comment'></div>嗟夫，以布衣能得士，有名誉，使见遇，可量哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207693_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1207693'>谓天无意于材耶，孰生而膍之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207693_comment'></div>谓天有意于材耶，孰厚而摧之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207693_comment'></div>谓意有无，人所愠喜，匪天其然，人则意异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207693_comment'></div>抑生而淑，虽穷不寿，吾生也不苟，亦足以告尔后矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207693_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207699' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207699' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207699?labeling=true' target='_blank'>朝请郎王君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁四年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207699")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207699_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207699'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207699'>君王氏，讳元，字舜弼，其先大名莘人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207699_comment'></div>尚书兵部侍郎、赠太师、尚书令兼中书令、晋国公讳祜，曾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207699_comment'></div>尚书兵部郎中，赠太尉讳某，祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207699_comment'></div>通议大夫、赠正议大夫讳端，考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207699_comment'></div>正议前夫人李氏，文安郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207699_comment'></div>后夫人李氏，华原郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207699_comment'></div>而君文安出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207699_comment'></div>王得姓于周，大于汉，迄今多公辅显人，而大丞相、魏国文正公讳旦，道德忠义，勋在王室，为本朝第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207699_comment'></div>故家城东，民慕而不姓之，曰城东太尉，公之从祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207699_comment'></div>其子孙蝉联圭组，文学政事、直谅多闻，隐然为国名臣者，往往而出相望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207699_comment'></div>而君幼读书，业进士，以世父天章阁待制讳质任为郊社斋郎，再为主簿乘氏、醴泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207699_comment'></div>年尚幼，即以才称，故枢密副使薛公向转运陕西，首荐其能，监镇戎军折博务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207699_comment'></div>镇戎当虏要路，交易夥他郡，嘉祐末，以钞法害之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207699_comment'></div>逮君领事，入复羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207699_comment'></div>以劳擢大理评事、知唐县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207699_comment'></div>神宗即位，迁光禄丞，又迁大理丞，充德清军使，兼知清丰县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207699_comment'></div>清丰介澶、魏，戎使往来之道，故顷锡军名以为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207699_comment'></div>而部使者不察，议撤其额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207699_comment'></div>君为言朝廷本所以命此，今不可易之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207699_comment'></div>使者为沮止，而君亦不嫌忤其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207699_comment'></div>浮屠甲者，与妇人忿，夜怀甓入其室，折妇人足，而妇人仓卒不知谁何也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207699_comment'></div>君阴讯其故，物色而擒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207699_comment'></div>甲伏其罪，人以为神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207699_comment'></div>迁太子右赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207699_comment'></div>熙宁中，安南用师，为江淮荆湖六路计置点检催促军器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207699_comment'></div>时平久，东南兵备尤弛，戎器取充数而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207699_comment'></div>方事急，诏大臣择才吏以往，而君用枢密府荐云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207699_comment'></div>水浮陆转，军兴得不乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207699_comment'></div>以劳减磨勘月日，赐五品服，监在京仓，迁殿中丞，改奉议郎，为国子监主簿，迁承议郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207699_comment'></div>哲宗即位，迁朝奉郎，通判应天府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207699_comment'></div>以亲老不赴，改监左藏北库，迁朝散郎，又监元丰库。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207699_comment'></div>继遭正议、华原丧，服除，乃以朝请郎知泽州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207699_comment'></div>始至，擒衣冠子之尤无良者数辈，寘诸法，城中大耸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207699_comment'></div>父老忧其去也，数十百人诣使者，愿留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207699_comment'></div>会岁旱，躬祷于桑林，既还，即雨，而犯暑得疾，遂不起，绍圣四年七月二十七日也，年六十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207699_comment'></div>初，君之罢清丰也，当涂知其可用矣，顾正议、华原春秋高，不可去定省，即求筦库闲局，盖家居二十年，不外迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207699_comment'></div>或劳之，君曰：「吾以华发奉亲膝，乐甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207699_comment'></div>去此九迁不愿也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207699_comment'></div>其侍亲疾，昼夜不解带，其庶乎《传》所谓以爱孝者，非耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207699_comment'></div>为人敦厚疏通，不设町畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207699_comment'></div>博综技艺，有家集十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207699_comment'></div>所游多一时君子长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207699_comment'></div>娶赵氏，仙源县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207699_comment'></div>再娶晁氏，寿昌县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207699_comment'></div>仙源前君葬十一年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207699_comment'></div>初，君爱其弟大理丞忖，忖之亡，窆近仙源，卜者曰：「不利于君」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207699_comment'></div>君曰：「我且死，不可以远吾弟也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207699_comment'></div>卒不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207699_comment'></div>呜呼，难矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207699_comment'></div>男六人：曰毅，朝散郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207699_comment'></div>曰坦，将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207699_comment'></div>曰发，曰通，曰縠，曰毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207699_comment'></div>坦、通皆蚤世，而毅号能吏，累赠君左朝议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207699_comment'></div>发、縠、毂，皆举进士自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207699_comment'></div>女长适霸州判官刘唐钦，次适进士焦禧，次适率府率宗室子帆，次适下蔡丞李士袤，次适西头供奉官贾佾，次适襄州推官皇甫侁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207699_comment'></div>孙十一人，其名在晁夫人之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207699_comment'></div>将以崇宁四年十月癸酉葬于开封县大边村之原，从晋公兆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207699_comment'></div>毅以寿昌君于补之为从姑，知君详，来求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207699_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1207699'>尧舜之道，孝弟而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207699_comment'></div>人民社稷，其施如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207699_comment'></div>有贤朝议，生于大家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207699_comment'></div>积善之蕴，粤忱不华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207699_comment'></div>为亲忘宠，居二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207699_comment'></div>以弟爱故，卜违不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207699_comment'></div>是亦为政，云胡不然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207699_comment'></div>魏公之封，名则可大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207699_comment'></div>惟原大边，名亦斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207699_comment'></div>何以似之，惟馀庆吾赖。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1207699_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207700' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207700' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207700?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仙源县君赵氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁四年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年10月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207700")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207700_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207700'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207700'>朝请郎、赠左朝议大夫王公讳元之夫人赵氏，开封府开封县人，参知政事讳安仁之孙，司农少卿讳慎微之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207700_comment'></div>生十六年归王氏，以德容称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207700_comment'></div>王氏，故丞相家，姻党数百，而夫人亦名家女，以妙龄执妇道，事尊章，睦姒娣，抚幼卑，咸适，闺门爱誉无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207700_comment'></div>舅正议、姑华原君年已高，而华原又多疾，皆意安夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207700_comment'></div>华原非夫人所和药不御，食必夫人视甘酸节乃飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207700_comment'></div>或通昔候，转侧涉旬，不舍匜帨，因以得疾，而忍不言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207700_comment'></div>华原爱其季女，夫人能奉其欲，无不至，人以为难焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207700_comment'></div>嘉祐八年二月十八日以疾卒，享年三十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207700_comment'></div>时朝议官镇戎，正议、华原闻讣，哭之恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207700_comment'></div>后朝议通籍，乃追封仙源县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207700_comment'></div>男六人：毅、坦、发、通、縠、毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207700_comment'></div>毅今为朝散郎，号才吏，干其蛊者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207700_comment'></div>将以崇宁四年十月九日葬朝议于开封之大边村，以夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207700_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1207700'>十六而嫁，在《归妹》卦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207700_comment'></div>抑长非娣，亦良其袂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207700_comment'></div>三十以亡，在爻能常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207700_comment'></div>常德不凶，从一而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207700_comment'></div>居为淑女，行为令妇，亦可以无负矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207700_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207701' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207701' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207701?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿昌县君晁氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（崇宁四年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年10月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207701")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207701_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207701'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207701'>朝请郎、赠左朝议大夫王君讳元之夫人晁氏，开封府开封人，尚书祠部员外郎、秘阁校理、赠金紫光禄大夫讳仲衍之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207701_comment'></div>妣颍川郡夫人王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207701_comment'></div>朝议前夫人仙源县君赵氏，而夫人为继室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207701_comment'></div>晁氏自文元公以道德文章为世仪范，而文庄公以忠亮位丞弼，家声烨然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207701_comment'></div>夫人恭顺懿和，为晁氏贤女，王氏令妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207701_comment'></div>舅正议、姑华原君春秋高，朝议以亲养从冷局二十年，夫人躬俭，素以致甘旨温毳，舅姑安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207701_comment'></div>族人以其久而不倦为难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207701_comment'></div>累封寿昌县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207701_comment'></div>元祐八年三月二十日以疾卒，年五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207701_comment'></div>男曰毅，朝散郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207701_comment'></div>曰发，曰縠，曰毂，皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207701_comment'></div>馀蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207701_comment'></div>见于朝议、仙源之志云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207701_comment'></div>孙十二人：仿蚤卒，俣、休、伋、侁、俅、俨、普、博、冠、隆、降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207701_comment'></div>毅等将以崇宁四年十月九日葬朝议于开封之大边村，以夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207701_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1207701'>惟晁与王，家大名澶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207701_comment'></div>文正、文元，卿士蝉联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207701_comment'></div>以元宗女，嫔正裔子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207701_comment'></div>生宜其家，没有后祉，亦可以为荣矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1207701_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196646' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196646?labeling=true' target='_blank'>离亭宴 次韵吊豫章黄鲁直</a><span class='authorDate'>（1105年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196646")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196646_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196646'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196646'>丹府黄香堪笑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196646'>章台坠鞭年少。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196646'>细雨春风花落处，醉里中人传诏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196646'>却上五湖船，悲歌楚狂同调。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196646_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196646'>青草荆江波渺。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196646'>香炉紫霄簪小。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196646'>人去江山长依旧，幼妇空传辞妙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196646_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196646'>洒泪作招魂，枫林子规啼晓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196646_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋兰亭序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207302")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207302'>始予幼时读《太平广记》，见唐太宗遣萧翼购《兰亭叙》事，盖谲以出之，辄叹息曰：「《兰亭叙》若是贵耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207302_comment'></div>至使万乘之主捐信于匹夫」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207302_comment'></div>《传》称子贡诈而全鲁，弦高诞而存郑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207302_comment'></div>遗一言之细，建二国之业，犹不可以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207302_comment'></div>以太宗之贤，巍巍乎近古所无，奈何溺小耆好而轻丧其所常之宝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207302_comment'></div>异于得原失信、不围而去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207302_comment'></div>晚多閒居，颇屏世好，独于古人笔墨之遗，犹爱而不能置，顾甚于少年喜官爵、迟莫营田宅者，与前论异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207302_comment'></div>因诵白居易《七德歌》曰：「功成理定何其速，速在推心致人腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207302_comment'></div>怨女三千放出宫，死囚四百来归狱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207302_comment'></div>复叹曰：太宗以一旅取天下，惟信尔！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207302_comment'></div>夫不吝三千女而放出宫，自信也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207302_comment'></div>不约四百囚而来归狱，人信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207302_comment'></div>晋舍原何足道哉，全鲁存郑，利重于谲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207302_comment'></div>爱《兰亭叙》，事小于欺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207302_comment'></div>其老而将传，至从其子求书从葬，亦累矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207302_comment'></div>累物钧病于行，若太宗，不累者大，累者小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207302_comment'></div>则世将曰：此何足以论诸信不信之间？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207302_comment'></div>士之行己，亦若此而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207302_comment'></div>然则此书虽以石刻传，可宝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207302_comment'></div>崇宁丙戌前冬至五日，缗东皋流憩洞李季良出之，晁补之题记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207302_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满江红 次韵吊汶阳李诚之待制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1106年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196680")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196680_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196680'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196680'>华鬓春风，长歌罢、伤今感昨。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196680'>春正好、瑶墀已叹，侍臣冥寞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196680'>牙帐尘昏馀剑戟，翠帷月冷虚弦索。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196680'>记往岁、龙坂误曾登，今飘泊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196680_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196680'>贤人命，从来薄。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196680'>流水意，知谁托。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196680'>绕南枝身似，未眠飞鹊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196680'>射虎山边寻旧迹，骑鲸海上追前约。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196680'>便江湖、与世永相忘，还堪乐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196680_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196680'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196680_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207694' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207694' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207694?labeling=true' target='_blank'>彭城刘君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（大观元年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207694")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207694_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207694'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207694'>刘君讳谏，或云其先避胡，自燕徙鲁，今为金乡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207694_comment'></div>金乡旧隶兖州，后隶济州，然故鲁地也，俗醇朴，贵农桑经业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207694_comment'></div>自君高祖时，家已富盛，而其大父元康、父拯，两世谨厚好施，益倦作业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207694_comment'></div>初，谕其子孙于学，而君又性孝，识其父言，颇教子为士矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207694_comment'></div>君以熙宁八年五月二十有四日卒，时三十有四岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207694_comment'></div>后一百八十日而其父亦亡，故再世不葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207694_comment'></div>有孙六人，三人举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207694_comment'></div>长未名，次昭、理、洵皆蚤卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207694_comment'></div>今存曰时、曰旸、曰昉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207694_comment'></div>时谦畏涉书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207694_comment'></div>旸从三舍贡，文学知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207694_comment'></div>旸事时，昉事旸，如其父不没，姒娣相从惟恪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207694_comment'></div>后二十年而配孟氏亦亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207694_comment'></div>又十年，盖君殁三十年矣，而兄弟同室庐，绝甘分少，中外无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207694_comment'></div>至是家薄，时泣语诸弟曰：「父不幸夭，母不在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207694_comment'></div>自曾祖、祖与亲未葬，今益窭，恐坠大事以死，为先人羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207694_comment'></div>今殚室之有，犹及事，及事，死不恨，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207694_comment'></div>旸、昉伏听命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207694_comment'></div>时即走北山下，卜任城县之吕村原吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207694_comment'></div>重趼露宿，寒暑再易，而后克穿七圹，皆甓固之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207694_comment'></div>以大观元年十一月甲子，尽举其曾太父而下七丧以窆，棺衾惟美，道路太息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207694_comment'></div>补之闻而喜曰：「孝哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207694_comment'></div>古语有之：『生<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1207694", 1207694, "Clauses/68/Comments/1")'>相怜</span>，死相捐』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207694_comment'></div>刘氏为士者尚寡，能不以其生者忧，为其死者羞，犹有鬼神，其终忍冻饿之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207694_comment'></div>鲁风俗坏久，士或亲在而异殖，或始去亲丧，已凿垣五六户，至不相庆吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207694_comment'></div>如刘氏，难哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207694_comment'></div>时、旸欲求补之文纳圹而不敢言，补之曰：「岂可使吾里有义事而不书也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207694_comment'></div>往谕诺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207694_comment'></div>君大母赵氏，母张氏，与配孟氏，皆从其夫之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207694_comment'></div>诸孙男女凡十二人，男多就学，女多已嫁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207694_comment'></div>初孟氏寡，尝语其子曰：「欲教汝为士，自汝祖之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207694_comment'></div>恨汝父夭，不及见汝等成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207694_comment'></div>故诸子奉其言汔有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207694_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1207694'>父先祖殁，祖柩不藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207694_comment'></div>以遗其子，子良有光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207694_comment'></div>用举其先，三世七丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207694_comment'></div>欲子为士，使知士耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207694_comment'></div>耻坠父言，可谓士矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1207694_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207627' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207627' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207627?labeling=true' target='_blank'>积善堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207627")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207627_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207627'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207627'>「积善之家，必有馀庆」，孔子赞《易》之言也，而晁氏得以名其堂，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207627_comment'></div>惟宋八世，道隆而治洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207627_comment'></div>皇帝以圣孝既右烈考，亦以教民孝，诏岁丁亥为大观元年，因大赦天下，民百岁，男子官，妇人封，仕而父母年九十，官封如民百岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207627_comment'></div>于是，故漳州军事判官晁公讳仲康之母夫人黄氏，年九十一矣，其第四子仲询与其兄仲谋喜而议，以仲询走京师，状其事省中，为漳州请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207627_comment'></div>漳州虽没，赦令初不异往者，于是丞相以为可，而上之制曰：「黄氏蕴仁积善，享有耄龄，可寿光县太君」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207627_comment'></div>其子荣君之锡，而庆其亲之享斯荣也，以少牢告祢庙，且告漳州，又告其祖，如祢庙礼，又周示其族人乡党，作堂以奉夫人，而名之曰「积善」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207627_comment'></div>退，饮酒相贺，为歌诗以扬训词，以昭夫人之淑慎，以慰其心而介期颐，谓补之曰：「吾君盛德，在《书》所谓『歛时五福，用敷锡厥庶民』者，其赉及我家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207627_comment'></div>尔顷为春官，属列太史氏，此国之昭典盛事，家之馀庆，尔职书之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207627_comment'></div>补之曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207627_comment'></div>礼，祝则名君，为神厌也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207627_comment'></div>父前子名，君前臣名，为尊厌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207627_comment'></div>自夫人言之，皆子而下，若载事，法皆名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207627_comment'></div>昔晋栾书，实针之父，针为右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207627_comment'></div>书以将越载君，制曰：「书退」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207627_comment'></div>针名父不悖礼，犹在益恭之列，非车上舞之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207627_comment'></div>请以谕不知者而后书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207627_comment'></div>惟晁氏自汉大夫以忠探七国之祸本而拨之，以安刘氏，刘氏无遗祸，享国四百年，而大夫不终汉禄，以身膏东市，奉祀无闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207627_comment'></div>又千有一百馀年而文元公起家，仁义忠信，乐善不倦，盖具于天爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207627_comment'></div>实兄弟三人：伯，刑部侍郎，补之高祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207627_comment'></div>叔，吏部尚书，夫人舅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207627_comment'></div>皆中和孝弟，慈惠而爱人，用钟其庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207627_comment'></div>六世子孙，男女嫔妇至口五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207627_comment'></div>而夫人为子妇，今存属最尊，又独享是寿禄，康宁悦豫，晁氏之积善皆归焉，抑晁氏自文庄公秉政，勋业在王室，逮今六十馀年，而仕益微，似不可振，而夫人之仁善，于是独报将其子，诚孝干母之蛊，神实祐之，亦夫人少艰约，晚乃储此，如训词旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207627_comment'></div>盖六世口五百未有及者，虽来者未可知，抑鲜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207627_comment'></div>岂造物者报其人，虽如《易》语「积善必有馀庆」，而享斯报者，亦必如夫人淑慎，身所自履，有以致之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207627_comment'></div>然晁氏为善者亦多矣，或不享，又何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207627_comment'></div>不然，吾宗之馀庆，久踬且复起，将自夫人启之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207627_comment'></div>夫人既属尊，岁时集会，子孙族人螽斯雁行，官学者，冠者，提者，抱者，少长咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207627_comment'></div>而补之乃于夫人为族曾孙，年五十五矣，独素发垂领，搢笏跪起，以寿夫人于群从之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207627_comment'></div>盖世之老人见曾孙，尚多有之，如夫人见曾孙数十，其长者已白首，又自有孙，在昔良少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207627_comment'></div>于是具载本末，以为世积善者之劝云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1207627_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207713' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207713' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207713?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寂默居士晁君墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（元祐五年五月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207713")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207713'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207713'>寂默居士晁氏讳端禀，字大受，居开封之昭德坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207713_comment'></div>太子少保文元公，曾祖也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207713_comment'></div>给事中、参知政事文庄公，祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207713_comment'></div>其世家、爵里、谥讳详于国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207713_comment'></div>文庄生祠部员外郎、秘阁校理讳仲衍，校理生居士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207713_comment'></div>居士世胄蝉联，非少长山林人，且有盛名场屋间，尝为参佐州郡、令大县矣，卒不用以没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207713_comment'></div>寂默云者，盖尝以此自名，而未尝以此语人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207713_comment'></div>补之曰：道隐于小成，言隐于荣华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207713_comment'></div>道之不明也，言之不行也，以夫小成、荣华者，隐之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207713_comment'></div>寂默，而道与言显矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207713_comment'></div>无成与亏，故昭氏之不鼓琴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207713_comment'></div>居士曰：「吾琴故未尝鼓，吾何亏」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207713_comment'></div>其族人之知居士，与其交游而厚者，则皆相劝，号之以寂默，以实居士尝有志于时，不遭而为此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207713_comment'></div>居士七岁，奇警过常儿绝远，见而名，闻而识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207713_comment'></div>二十岁而尽授六经百家说，又杂取他类书小说丛脞人不胜览者，皆成诵于口，用以自娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207713_comment'></div>为文词捷敏，如水就下，騄耳行远，干将立断，无肯綮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207713_comment'></div>旁睨其同学儿，方濡墨蹙頞，如拾沈，如忆昨梦不可得，而居士已四顾满意，写纸腹背欲尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207713_comment'></div>用此，蚤有名誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207713_comment'></div>熙宁中，与补之同试开封，尝暂出谒客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207713_comment'></div>客壁间石刻合序千言，盖手诏赐史臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207713_comment'></div>居士曰：「能一再过诵乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207713_comment'></div>则俱默读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207713_comment'></div>居士曰：「诵矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207713_comment'></div>某曰：「亦诵矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207713_comment'></div>偕诵偕止，而居士尽习，补之遗二字焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207713_comment'></div>无几何，居士举词赋为开封第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207713_comment'></div>主司骇其策豪赡异，闻难字非他时举子比，展其卷堂上，自屏及陛，纸穷，顾相诧曰：「尽识此，可以为三千士先登矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207713_comment'></div>然是岁屈于礼部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207713_comment'></div>又三年，始以经术第进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207713_comment'></div>意不自得，欲从制举，曰：「此吾汉大夫之世科也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207713_comment'></div>时王湖州石父亦制举，喜根持论气豪，老师宿儒少所屈，然独厚居士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207713_comment'></div>居士数从石父道往古，石父通洽，犹自为不及居士博也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207713_comment'></div>石父因以直言举劝之，而居士故倦游，不复萌意，亦会其科废云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207713_comment'></div>为人和裕明白，不作畛域藏覆，言辩浚发，有所作，意必先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207713_comment'></div>外视之类欲速者，而中平夷，实与事阔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207713_comment'></div>又事母颍川夫人孝，重去左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207713_comment'></div>两从伯兄使淮、浙，居闲不调者十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207713_comment'></div>爱西湖、琅邪山水，曰：「是可以忘老」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207713_comment'></div>有诗数十百首，至今传杭、滁间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207713_comment'></div>善为长歌，怪处似玉川子，平处似香山居士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207713_comment'></div>至杂文数千言，叙事极古今得失之辩，则唐人独以诗名如郊、岛者，不能逮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207713_comment'></div>文庄齐安夫人，宰相王祁公之姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207713_comment'></div>初，王公之自舒来贡于礼部也犹少，出入姑氏如家，后贵为宰相，居士以布衣年少往游如平时，不怵于其贵，或饮醉其堂上，剧谭大笑，倾一座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207713_comment'></div>退而与里闾贱者游，亦倾竭无吝情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207713_comment'></div>初不见其异，人皆曰：「如居士蚤有名誉，使能稍自矫拂，逶迤以蕲合，必获」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207713_comment'></div>然居士不志于其获，而乐于不矫拂，视不合如其躬之遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207713_comment'></div>其知者，则以为气完而守全，其不知者，方且以世礼睢盱一二<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1207713", 1207713, "Clauses/151/Comments/0")'>谇诼</span>之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207713_comment'></div>呜呼，此其所以穷也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207713_comment'></div>然居士自以少孤，依颍川夫人辛苦学问，欲嗣其家声甚力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207713_comment'></div>既失夫人养己，得疾郁郁，又官不偶，抱所长莫试，滋与世阔，不复自金玉，类李将军既困，负其才能，数与虏角，忘意于无益者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207713_comment'></div>常人不知爱惜，恐一失不可得，必其诚心好士、知才为难者，方复悼其穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207713_comment'></div>晚尤自放于酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207713_comment'></div>一日过故人，饮甚乐，忽悲歌起舞，泣数行下，顾补之曰：「吾若是乎已矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207713_comment'></div>人暂见之，不知其为开封晁大受也，或窃语以为狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207713_comment'></div>居士笑曰：「琴张辈所谓狂，狂者进取，吾进取乎哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207713_comment'></div>补之辄从旁赞曰：「鲁漆室女独处，趯然不寐而悲啸，亦狂者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207713_comment'></div>邻人疑其欲嫁，邻人则浅矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207713_comment'></div>然数月而居士卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207713_comment'></div>异哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207713_comment'></div>补之尝论圣人有中道，若伯夷、柳下惠俱非中者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207713_comment'></div>故从伯夷之清，则和为不恭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207713_comment'></div>从柳下惠之和，则清为隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207713_comment'></div>然二子盖百世师，不有圣人知之，则扬雄所谓饿夫诎臣，非过言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207713_comment'></div>然人岂可以皆至于夷、惠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207713_comment'></div>如陈遵、张竦，长短不能相效，虽未足与论中不中之际，要曰外轻者差独乐，至所遭薄厚，学者不道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207713_comment'></div>居士尝主簿博野，又为保德军掾，洺州推官，知尧山县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207713_comment'></div>其为令，与邑子讲习经艺，有惠爱于人，然居士终无意于为吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207713_comment'></div>昔鲁肃论庞士元非百里才，其治不治，后人固不当求之耒阳之间，至其言克涪作乐非仁者之兵，岂惟异于鲁肃所期治中事，虽孔明犹当自恨前所以待士元者未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207713_comment'></div>故韩愈谓千里马常有，而伯乐不常遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207713_comment'></div>居士卒以元祐五年四月丙午，葬以其年五月戊寅，地则郑州新郑县之旌贤乡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207713_comment'></div>配王氏，颍川夫人之侄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207713_comment'></div>颍川夫人为晁氏妇矜式，王氏恭俭似姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207713_comment'></div>居士二子觉之、贯之，皆文学善士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207713_comment'></div>贯之已得科名，为新乡令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207713_comment'></div>后十七年，而贯之始以书来，曰：「顷先君不幸，葬日迫，太仆林旦尝铭之，痛其遗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207713_comment'></div>知先君之深者孰与兄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207713_comment'></div>愿为文表旌贤阡上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207713_comment'></div>抑先君不至要官职四十六年而没，施为者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207713_comment'></div>然孔北海志不就，士议处以豪杰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207713_comment'></div>陶渊明一县令，后仰其高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207713_comment'></div>穷达成败，信不足论，论其人物如何耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207713_comment'></div>补之曰：「孝哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207713_comment'></div>是足以大吾族父为不朽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207713_comment'></div>系曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_83_1207713'>天之高明，地之无疆，中不知岁之几何长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207713_comment'></div>人不七尺，当物之一，乃若傅说，以其事业没，而上比于列星之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207713_comment'></div>何必傅说？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207713_comment'></div>有陵客星，有白长庚，彼微者也，而动其芒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207713_comment'></div>岂皆如说富贵，有功德于商，乃如是其昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207713_comment'></div>呜呼居士，世人以为狂，自谓我非狂，既陨于霜，亦扬其芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207713_comment'></div>此如陵与白也，身虽没，其才气俊伟，犹耀而不亡也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_89_1207713_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207715' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207715?labeling=true' target='_blank'>邓先生墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207715")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207715'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207715'>孔子曰：「举逸民，而天下归心焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207715_comment'></div>孔子之所谓「逸民」者，必若夷、齐若少连七人，其行有当于圣之事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207715_comment'></div>乃素隐无述，则孔子不与沮、溺，子路能非荷蓧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207715_comment'></div>此学者之所诵而识也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207715_comment'></div>自汉聘樊英，如待神明，至竟无它异，故李固以谓处士纯盗虚名，无益于用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207715_comment'></div>然厥后益衰，士一切趋利，遂往不返，夫安得如古作者而言之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207715_comment'></div>惟夫行己有耻，恶衣恶食而不耻，而知违患之当远也，犹足以救俗坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207715_comment'></div>故范晔因固论而极之曰：「后进希之以成名，世主礼之以得众，原其无用，亦所以为用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207715_comment'></div>有味乎斯言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207715_comment'></div>而吾里邓君异于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207715_comment'></div>昔鲁黔娄先生不干世，生无以养，死覆以布衾，而其妻以谓有馀于富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207715_comment'></div>嗟夫邓君，其殆庶几先生之遗风乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207715_comment'></div>君讳御夫，字从义，济州钜野人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207715_comment'></div>幼辛苦读书，尝试太学异等，蚤为司空平章事吕公所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207715_comment'></div>而性薄荣利，方壮则褫举子服，去布裘芒屩，犯晨夜，身自力作，以供祭祀，仁邻里而退甘其菲，如食五鼎，非农圃入，不以易所无，亦难矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207715_comment'></div>平居颓然顺静，望其貌，知有道者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207715_comment'></div>与乡人言，老者以慈爱，幼者以孝悌，廛里工驵以勤俭不欺，故人慕交之，或就评曲直，皆满意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207715_comment'></div>慷慨尚义，急难必赴身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207715_comment'></div>结茅北郭水滨，牛羊凫雁之所牧集，蒲柳蓊然，下窥如坠谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207715_comment'></div>有石几，丹墨作《老子注》，寒暑易节，乃一再出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207715_comment'></div>吴人项传见之心服，书其石几云：「昔闻河上公，今见濠上翁，姓名字时异，道德经解同」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207715_comment'></div>辞虽俚，然实事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207715_comment'></div>又作《农历》一百二十卷，言耕织刍牧与凡种蓺养生备荒之事，较《齐民要术》尤密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207715_comment'></div>州守王子韶为上其书朝廷，请颁之，不报，乃弃家入庐山，学释氏说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207715_comment'></div>将老焉，会得疾，其家彊之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207715_comment'></div>有诗三百篇，皆萧散方外言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207715_comment'></div>无几何，卒，大观元年正月十六日也，享年七十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207715_comment'></div>有子二人，长曰汮，次曰洵，能守其业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207715_comment'></div>以是年二月初九日葬于钜野县宋善村龟山之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207715_comment'></div>女三人，长适乡贡进士高处约，次适右侍禁张宽，次适乡贡进士程延禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207715_comment'></div>将亡，一夕过所与游吕奂，论死生之际曰：「吾去矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207715_comment'></div>吕莫知其故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207715_comment'></div>是夕，吕复梦之，言尘累未尽，今当至蜀都，为一富家子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207715_comment'></div>吕怛寤，驰候之，殂矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207715_comment'></div>死生，圣人难言，此非补之所能知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207715_comment'></div>然观羊祜探环事，世固有于此不昧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207715_comment'></div>系曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_1207715'>孟子论君子之行不同也，而曰归洁其身而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207715_comment'></div>大哉洁乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207715_comment'></div>惟君平生洁则有馀，以是铭君，亦忱不诬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1207715_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207703' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207703' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207703?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奉议郎致仕崔君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（大观元年闰十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207703")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207703_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207703'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207703'>奉议郎致仕博陵崔君承之，元符二年十二月戊戌卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207703_comment'></div>未葬也，其孤礼来求铭曰：「我先君生十岁，我大父母下世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207703_comment'></div>自伤其提孩孤也，号泣三年，乃日夜自学问，如其亲之存，用以成人得科名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207703_comment'></div>既宦不偶，即解其印绂去，閒居读书，劝乡人为善，以寿终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207703_comment'></div>鲁人高之，咸谓其君子且知止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207703_comment'></div>其生而不遭命也，其殁而不传，则礼实不肯穫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207703_comment'></div>礼为亭殡侧，名亭曰『罔极』，春秋祭祀，哭亭上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207703_comment'></div>惟慢葬是惧，敢以是私于下执事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207703_comment'></div>补之曰：「孝哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207703_comment'></div>自补之初偕乡书，窃好与鲁诸生学士游，尝已闻崔君贤，乃叙而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207703_comment'></div>君讳贶，承之字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207703_comment'></div>齐丁公伋之裔，食采于崔者，汉以来益蕃，故有双、邯、县、金东西南祖中祖别派，而博陵、清河之崔最显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207703_comment'></div>后散处四方，自唐初修《氏族志》，犹第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207703_comment'></div>而君曾大父廷温，隐居安平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207703_comment'></div>安平盖唐志博陵裔，然不知何祖出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207703_comment'></div>避胡南徙瑕丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207703_comment'></div>廷温生继荣，赠大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207703_comment'></div>继荣生子良，赠朝奉大夫，君考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207703_comment'></div>大夫与其兄之子知侍御史杂事暨，俱进士起家大中祥符间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207703_comment'></div>至君世其科，则嘉祐二年也，而瑕丘之崔始大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207703_comment'></div>君初调沂州司理参军，再调陈州司法参军，咸以能称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207703_comment'></div>用举者，迁全椒令，又称治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207703_comment'></div>考满不迁，喟然叹曰：「『余不负丞，而丞负余』，此故吾家斯立在蓝田时语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207703_comment'></div>吾又倦游土思，安能如丞屈于不己知」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207703_comment'></div>漫不省事，即谢病去，以秘书省著作佐郎致仕，于时年六十也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207703_comment'></div>其掾沂州，使者檄校士东武，东武士豪喜构场屋讼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207703_comment'></div>异时主司毕事出，或遮道问谁何，不合，或裂榜相诟诼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207703_comment'></div>主司恐，为中夕张氏名，州遣卫，乃得去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207703_comment'></div>人语君故，君不恤，将出辟户，众汹而前，鬨堂下索榜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207703_comment'></div>君徐语吏示之，曰：「某第一，某次」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207703_comment'></div>咸相顾，若厌者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207703_comment'></div>君即命冠带骑而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207703_comment'></div>而所取第一者，后贵为宰相，则故赵公挺之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207703_comment'></div>其掾陈州，守侍读范公镇最厚君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207703_comment'></div>君议法，多附经平反，范公大儒，慎许可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207703_comment'></div>察君知书长者，欲奏使教授诸王宫，君辞寒士不足范宗室贵者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207703_comment'></div>范公叹赏，乃以治剧荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207703_comment'></div>其令全椒，以其家居谆谆语其子弟者语其民，使知孝悌力田相亲睦，故讼少盗衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207703_comment'></div>初，君常自痛禄不及亲，既告休，以恩迁奉议郎，勋飞骑尉，服五品，累赠其考秩大夫，妣任氏金华县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207703_comment'></div>因愀然语人曰：「吾无他时捧檄欢，今幸以登朝贲，往者哭告吾考妣墓，不恨矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207703_comment'></div>配马氏，仙源县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207703_comment'></div>继时氏，旌德县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207703_comment'></div>皆前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207703_comment'></div>三男子：礼、藻、禔，皆举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207703_comment'></div>藻前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207703_comment'></div>二女子，归孔燮、孔壳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207703_comment'></div>燮，赵州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207703_comment'></div>壳，进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207703_comment'></div>诸孙男女十四人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207703_comment'></div>卒后八年，大观元年闰十月壬寅，葬兖州龚丘县万岁乡之三埠村其先茔之南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207703_comment'></div>君为人敏达庄重，言行不欺，为乡闾所推许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207703_comment'></div>其学喜言经，工为诗赋，蚤有名誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207703_comment'></div>所严事徂徕石介，善姜潜、颜复，皆鲁儒知名士，与相切磋论议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207703_comment'></div>又自以其学教授子孙族人，率有名第修立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207703_comment'></div>家故饶裕，而澹泊无声伎娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207703_comment'></div>贫无食，病无医药，死不能葬者，皆从君，甚有恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207703_comment'></div>杜门萧散，忘怀得失，年八十五乃殁，故鲁人高之以此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207703_comment'></div>补之尝谓士之奔竞，始于尚科举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207703_comment'></div>唐以来，士相教语曰「速化」，俗贯习久，不复止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207703_comment'></div>童子足始践场屋，则增其年，曰可蚤入仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207703_comment'></div>稍长，则更损焉，曰休老尚可引岁月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207703_comment'></div>如君蚤弃事，家居二十五年，死而曰不恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207703_comment'></div>补之不能知天下之远何如，此吾东州所未有，何必他奇节异行然后为贤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207703_comment'></div>徒使人相谓知止，亦足以愧窘拘之士什伯矣，是宜铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207703_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_64_1207703'>道何必远？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207703_comment'></div>入孝出悌，可以为宗族师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207703_comment'></div>艺何必多？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207703_comment'></div>馀力学文，可以为一世资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207703_comment'></div>惠何必及天下？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207703_comment'></div>修之身，可以为政事施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207703_comment'></div>其大既师，其小亦施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207703_comment'></div>抑八十五而殁，其又何悲！</div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1207703_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永遇乐 东皋寓居</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196577")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196577_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196577'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196577'>松菊堂深，芰荷池小，长夏清暑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196577'>燕引雏还，鸠呼妇往，人静郊原趣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196577'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_196577", 196577, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>麦天</span>已过，薄衣轻扇，试起绕园徐步。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196577'>听衡宇、欣欣童稚，共说夜来初雨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196577_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196577'>苍菅径里，紫葳枝上，数点幽花垂露。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196577'>东里催锄，西邻助饷，相戒清晨去。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196577'>斜川归兴，翛然满目，回首帝乡何处。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196577_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196577'>只愁恐、轻鞭犯夜，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_196577", 196577, "Clauses/21/Comments/0")'>灞陵</span>旧路。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196577_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196599' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196599' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196599?labeling=true' target='_blank'>过涧歇 东皋寓居</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196599")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196599_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196599'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196599'>归去。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196599'>奈故人、尚作青眼相期，未许明时归去。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196599'>放怀处。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196599'>买得东皋数亩，静爱园林趣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196599'>任过客、剥啄相呼昼扃户。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196599_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196600_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196600'>凉风时动衣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196600_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196553' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196553?labeling=true' target='_blank'>凤凰台上忆吹箫<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>自金乡之济至羊山迎次膺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196553")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196553_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196553'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196553'>千里相思，况无百里，何妨暮往朝还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196553'>又正是、梅初淡伫，禽未绵蛮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196553'>陌上相逢缓辔，风细细、云日斑斑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196553'>新晴好，得意未妨，行尽青山。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196553_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196553'>应携后房小妓，来为我，盈盈对舞花间。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196553'>便拚了、松醪翠满，蜜炬红残。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196553'>谁信轻鞍射虎，清世里、曾有人闲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196553'>都休说，帘外夜久春寒。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196553_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196554' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196554' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196554?labeling=true' target='_blank'>凤凰台上忆吹箫<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196554")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196554_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196554'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196554'>才短官慵，命奇人弃，年年故里来还。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196554'>记往岁、莲塘送我，远赴荆蛮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196554'>莫道风情似旧，青镜里、绿鬓新斑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196554'>佳人怪，把盏为我，微敛眉山。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196554_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196554'>从来嗣宗高韵，独见赏，青云夐绝尘间。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196554'>谩回首、平生醉语，一梦惊残。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196554'>莫笑移花种柳，应备办、投老同闲。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_196633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洞仙歌<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>留春</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196633")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196633'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196633'>花恨月恼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196633'>更夏有凉风，冬轩雪皎。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196633'>闲事不关心，算四时皆好。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196633'>从来又说，春台登览，人意多同，常是惜、春过了。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196633'>须痛饮，莫放欢情草草。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196633_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196633'>年少。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196633'>尚忆瑶阶，得隽寻芳，骖驔东坡，适见垂鞭，酕醄南陌，又逢低帽。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196633'>莺花荡眼，功名满意，无限嬉游，荣华事、如梦杳。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196633'>伤富贵浮云，曾萦怀抱。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196633'>为春醉倒。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196633'>愿花更好。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196633'>春休老。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196633'>开口笑。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196633'>占醉乡、莫教人到。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_196633_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_474686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_474686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/474686?labeling=true' "poem_title_474686")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_474686_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_474686'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_474686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_474686'>漫肠断巫阳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_474686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_474686_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_474686'>天葩秀出无双。<div id='poem_sentence_5_474686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_474686'>倚朝晖，半如酣醉成狂。<div id='poem_sentence_6_474686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_474686'>无言自省，檀心一点偷芳。<div id='poem_sentence_7_474686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_474686'>念往事情伤。<div id='poem_sentence_8_474686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_474686'>又新艳曾说滁阳。<div id='poem_sentence_9_474686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_474686'>纵归来晚，君王殿后，别是风光。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_474686_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196559' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196559' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196559?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_2_196558_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196558'>纵教便向东山老，谁知是个中人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196558_comment'></div></div><div
