class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196682?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满庭芳<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>忆庐山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196682")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196682_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196682'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196682'>欲买庐山，山前三亩，小桥横过松间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196682'>变名吴市，谁认旧容颜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196682'>最好栖贤峡外，应自此、都隔尘寰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196682'>人稀到，壶中化国，光景更堪闲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196682_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196682'>无心，求至道，柴门闭了，饱睡甘餐。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196682'>幸儿成孙长，为扫家山。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196682'>若问他年归去，蓦地也、双桨来还。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196682_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196682'>愁难舍，清风万壑，高处正跻攀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196682_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196681' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196681?labeling=true' target='_blank'>满庭芳<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>次韵答季良</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196681")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196681_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196681'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196681'>闲说秋来，乘槎心懒，梦回三岛波间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196681'>便思黄帽，同我老山颜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196681'>上界仙人官府，何似我、萧散尘寰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196681'>云无止，流泉自急，此意本来闲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196681_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196681'>寂寥，松桂圃，陪君好语，亦可忘餐。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196681'>况琼枝玉蕊，秀满春山。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196681'>若问幽栖何意，莫道是、飞鸟知还。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196681_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196681'>无言处，孙登半岭，高韵更难攀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_196681_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>追和陶渊明归去来辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196437")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196437_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_196437'>辞长而歌短，歌有和，辞无和也。言语文章，随世随异，非拟其辞也，继其志也，作者七人矣。词曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_196437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196437'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196437'>归去来兮，吾无以归奚以归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196437'>既身不足以任责，畏首尾而心悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196437'>慕往昔之经世，嗟吾力之莫追。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196437'>彼辞位而灌园，岂吾今之独非。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196437'>雨冥冥而荷笠，榛莽莽而褰衣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196437'>我行野而视天，觉宇大而身微。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196437'>乃矜虻蚷，止驱息奔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196437'>背隍筑室，面坂植门。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196437'>三绶从褫，图书尚存。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196437'>忘瓠落之可忧，比浮海之为樽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196437'>跞太初而游意，弊无极而彫颜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196437'>反国蜗而自足，俯巢幕而亦安。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196437'>解予辔之沃濡兮，脱予辖之间关。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196437'>识鸟鸣而物华，陶阳气以流观。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196437'>悟息渊而消枝，亦墐户而俱还。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196437'>惟文字之幼工，则虽老而桓桓。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196437'>归去来兮，彼河滨之善游。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196437'>或往学而丧生，复裹粮其安求。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196437'>善陶生之达情，不与世兮同忧。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196437'>实迷途其已远，惧斯人之莫畴。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196437'>或待兔守株，或遗剑刻舟。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196437'>虽成事之不说，聚悔踰于山丘。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196437'>庶西方之至言，聊反闻而逆流。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196437'>守一静而为君，亦何往而不休。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196437'>已焉哉，一昼一夜成四时，子之叹川逝不留。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196437'>颓光不可使东之。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196437'>韩终王子乔，汗漫难与期。<div id='poem_sentence_26_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_196437'>俯寸田之荆棘，曷不旦耘而暮耔。<div id='poem_sentence_27_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_196437'>悲在堂之蟋蟀，惭不乐于唐诗。<div id='poem_sentence_28_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_196437'>悟死生之如梦，亘今古而无疑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196437'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷三。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_196437_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f2aab2b02fe0415db948afe9c83177c3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f2aab2b02fe0415db948afe9c83177c3");'><span id='f2aab2b02fe0415db948afe9c83177c3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1109')">1108-1109年</a>，56-57岁</div><div id='f2aab2b02fe0415db948afe9c83177c3' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　晁补之家居金乡东皋，提举西京崇福宫。作品：《戊子六月十三日曝书得史院赐笔感怀》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一六。）</span>《题袁耕道所收小飞来》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷二二。）</span>《金乡张氏重修园亭记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三0。）</span>《题小飞来诗后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span><div id='poem_196260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196260?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戊子六月十三日曝书得史院赐笔感怀<span class='inlineComment2'>（时监修丞相仪公也）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年6月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196260")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196260_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196260'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196260'>君王孝悌纂修意，丞相忠良典领宜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196260'>却恨身为周柱史，不令人识汉官仪。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196260'>当年请郡新进笑，今日曝书陈迹迷。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196260'>犹有院中宣赐笔，不妨林下醉题诗<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《鸡肋集》卷一六）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196260_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196260'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196260_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196110' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196110' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196110?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题袁耕道所收小飞来</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196110")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196110_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196110'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196110'>藏山常恐负而走，壶中九华安在哉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196110_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196110'>忆似冷泉亭畔见，为君题作小飞来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196110_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196110'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196110_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207621' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207621' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207621?labeling=true' target='_blank'>金乡张氏重修园亭记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年7月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207621")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207621_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207621'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207621'>济为州，治钜野，下土，草木不殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207621_comment'></div>其西北无山，东南五十里乃有山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207621_comment'></div>而金乡其东南邑，故缗城地云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207621_comment'></div>尝凿山得金，因为金山县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207621_comment'></div>凡平土浅山无金，此山乃有金，知其地气与并泽异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207621_comment'></div>凡九谷果蓏，土有宜有不宜，此咸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207621_comment'></div>若松、桧、梅、櫾，迁乎其地而不能为良者，植此皆良，又不可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207621_comment'></div>以余为儿时所闻见，其俗饶美，大家率轻作业，乐善而好士，厚子弟于学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207621_comment'></div>游客晨夜相面背于门，庖无熄烟，然不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207621_comment'></div>又好为园圃游乐事以相尚，而非为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207621_comment'></div>张氏其甲也，其先世丰人，太宗时侍御史肃，字穆之，以敢言不苟合，四十谢事，为王黄州所畏，始起家而显者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207621_comment'></div>御史子畋，字无逸，高介有父风，亦早弃事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207621_comment'></div>初，坏田作此园，佳木异卉，错置竹万竿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207621_comment'></div>出郭门而望，蓊然秀色横野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207621_comment'></div>其阳金梭岭，阴贺沟，起伏异状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207621_comment'></div>其外莽苍无际，目极可喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207621_comment'></div>无逸得此，因忘仕宦意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207621_comment'></div>而故张公安道、石公曼卿，皆与往来良厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207621_comment'></div>园有亭曰「先春」，张公客游爱之，石公为宰，每醉而忘返也，皆有诗留亭上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207621_comment'></div>两公前辈伟人杰士，不忘以诗与人也，盖六、七十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207621_comment'></div>前此，无逸子孝绰、孝基、孝孙，亦善士好客，能修其先人之业，犹及与余先大夫游，闻先大夫称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207621_comment'></div>不知园几时废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207621_comment'></div>而元符中，余南归，始自钜野迁此邑，并岭行沟上，秋稼离离，雉惊起马前，馆无遗址，桃李不复在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207621_comment'></div>独两老桧离立谷垄间，风雨摧剥，苍皮白枝，龙虎躩拿而上数十尺，道衍隰而来未见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207621_comment'></div>下马半岭，北望南武、七日诸山或断或续，屏列远陆如画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207621_comment'></div>其南数百凫雁飞集，鸣唼声回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207621_comment'></div>望白水明灭桑野间，意甚乐之，顺涂而咏，吾居不可以易此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207621_comment'></div>因买田筑室，距百步，时时至其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207621_comment'></div>扪桧坐石，至于日入，怅然惜两公之迹将泯，而恨无逸之不复见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207621_comment'></div>而其孙大方从余游，久乃语之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207621_comment'></div>大方则啾然有间，曰：「此固张氏地，请复焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207621_comment'></div>未数岁，则筑垣移植如其故，径槛旁午，草木扶疏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207621_comment'></div>且营三亭，曰「先春」，其旧名也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207621_comment'></div>曰「乐意」，曰「生香」，因曼卿之诗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207621_comment'></div>又砻三石来，言曰：其一求文以记其事，其二请书两公诗与记，俱传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207621_comment'></div>余欣然曰：「吾里俗衰，不有君子，何以使复善？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207621_comment'></div>且为近市利，日不足锄犁，腹饱则载粟入城市，买士宅，士无邑居，故吾里之为士者微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207621_comment'></div>今子独能羞而反之，不致求赢馀，既异俚俗意，而忧世家之坠，念祖父之所尝游，贤公才士之迹至此而俱熄也，慨然图复之，又欲因文以传，尤异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207621_comment'></div>余何爱不为子记之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207621_comment'></div>亦稍稍化吾里持家犹子，岂但数过子相羊乐饮无人之境，以忘吾老？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207621_comment'></div>如是而已也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207621_comment'></div>大观二年七月十八日，颍川晁补之记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1207621_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207282' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207282' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207282?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题小飞来诗后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207282")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207282_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207282'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207282'>楚山之胜者曰九华，吴峰之异者曰飞来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207282_comment'></div>往时，湖口李正臣藏怪石数十种，其一竦而九崿，武功和仲曰「是壶中九华也」，则一旦而售百金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207282_comment'></div>近时祥符袁耕道亦得其石于豫章，小而特，颍川龚喜曰：「是小飞来也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207282_comment'></div>耕道则抵掌喜而怀之曰：「是当与壶中九华俱名天壤间，虽一拳小，然吾不以百金售」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207282_comment'></div>大观戊子六月壬申，缗松菊堂题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207282_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年12月</a>　晁补之家居金乡城中，提举西京崇福宫。作品：《王勋字重民序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三五。）</span><div id='poem_1207326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王勋字重民序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207326")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207326'>进士太原王勋，文学志意在场屋前辈间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207326_comment'></div>或字曰「子功」，余改之曰「重民」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207326_comment'></div>盖言王功曰勋，而其事则民为重也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207326_comment'></div>重民曰：「请极其义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207326_comment'></div>余曰：《周官》所记，列于今学官，重民能习之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207326_comment'></div>虽然，常试以所学于孟子者，为重民言，而重民择焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207326_comment'></div>学之为王者事，一也，而古者取于王之事近，后世托于王之说远，故不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207326_comment'></div>盖孟子尝曰「保民而王」，至其言王道之始，则特在于使民养生丧死无憾之间，然而不王者未之有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207326_comment'></div>此取于王之事而近者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207326_comment'></div>王莫先于仁义，而为庄子之言者曰：「仁义，先王之蘧庐，止可以一宿」，「事之破毁，而后有舞仁义者，不能救也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207326_comment'></div>此托于王之说而远者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207326_comment'></div>夫昔之所病儒者，一师而俗异；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207326_comment'></div>今为孟子又为庄子，是二师也，夫安得不离？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207326_comment'></div>近易言，远难知，则亦无惑乎士之皆托于远以趋同，而自诬不悔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207326_comment'></div>自荀子不好孟子，又非之，然其言曰：「道不过三代，法不贰后王，过则荡，贰则不雅」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207326_comment'></div>此两君子者惟一师，故不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207326_comment'></div>而庄子而又甚焉，曰：「藐姑射之山有神人，其尘垢糠秕，犹将陶铸尧舜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207326_comment'></div>故后生簧鼓，读《论语》未半纸，而争言尧舜之上，皆洋洋满意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207326_comment'></div>夫尧舜且不足道，而王何足言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207326_comment'></div>王何足言，而民亦安有哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207326_comment'></div>以往事论之，彼卫鞅安知王？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207326_comment'></div>不知对孝公谈何等，而孝公时时睡不应，顾出而自矜大者，曰「其志弗开悟矣」，欺哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207326_comment'></div>愿重民反之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207326_comment'></div>抑夫子圣人所重民食丧祭，圣人固为王，不为霸，岂以是为土苴而先之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207326_comment'></div>故王功曰勋，民功曰庸，而要圣人之所重者言之，勋必自庸积，此余所以字重民之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207326_comment'></div>道有终始之序，故昔之学射者不学射，先学视；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207326_comment'></div>学驭者不学驭，先学趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207326_comment'></div>夫论政于不饥不寒之间，而计功于无思无为之际，可谓知所先后矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207326_comment'></div>抑重民博习彊记，其文词浩浩，非七、八月之间雨集而盈者，其必决而注之海，于从政乎何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207326_comment'></div>而士或以其所趋愈钝而笑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207326_comment'></div>余亦所趋愈钝者，然譬夫入室必自门始，不可以躁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207326_comment'></div>若夫子之墙数仞，不得其门而入，有人焉适立于巷，骤而语其中百官、仓廪、室家之美不疑，而大夸曰「如此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207326_comment'></div>匪穿窬，斯诞己，其可哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207326_comment'></div>大观二年十二月序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1207326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　晁补之家居金乡，提举西京崇福宫。作品：《送刘公权序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三五。）</span><div id='poem_1207257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘公权序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207257")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207257'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207257'>田文好客，殚邑之入以食客，日不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207257_comment'></div>然文废，客亦稍稍去，文恨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207257_comment'></div>或曰：「君不见夫趋市者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207257_comment'></div>平旦侧肩争门而入，日暮之后掉臂而不顾，非好朝而恶暮，所求物忘其中」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207257_comment'></div>余蚤为流辈所推，虽无邑入以奉客，而客从余游亦不厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207257_comment'></div>尝守三郡，所荐士数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207257_comment'></div>得罪而归，坐田里七年，客以书来或过之者才三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207257_comment'></div>所舍远城郭，陆无以同居，水无与佐刺舟，然余每诵或者语，亦无意于客也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207257_comment'></div>而开封刘君公权，无平日旧，乃惠然数过余，寒不以坐无毡而辞，饥不以麦饭葱叶菲而不臭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207257_comment'></div>田野无酒徒，刘君又饮酒温克，故余与之游如平日客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207257_comment'></div>或剧饮大欢无疵吝，或偶坐终日不相语，唯而出，亦忘吾忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207257_comment'></div>而刘君又朅然去，余为之恨恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207257_comment'></div>刘君世戚里将种，然喜从士大夫游，问其旧所与厚，往往当世知名士，或在朝廷尊显，或斥逐困畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207257_comment'></div>刘君不以富贵贫贱变交情，足以愧翟廷尉门外客百辈，其义固近时士所希得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207257_comment'></div>吾知刘君将有闻于吾人也，故于其来别，以是言赠之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207257_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　晁补之春来在城内市南营建房宅秋冬间自郊外移居。作品：《迁居安建土地祠文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《新居凿井告神文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span><div id='poem_1207753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>迁居安建土地祠文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207753")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207753'>补之改居市南，既告神以迁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207753_comment'></div>寒暑一周，畚锸无方，寝安而动吉，非神不害，何以得此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207753_comment'></div>是用择日还神之舍，将加涂塈，绘写卫从，以严事神，惟神终相之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207753_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207753_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新居凿井告神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207755")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207755'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207755'>补之相宅此地，实故民居弃壤而无井饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207755_comment'></div>民弃己取，凡以不争，然叩门户而求水，则亦病矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207755_comment'></div>吉日丁卯，位不触禁，爰具畚锸，有谒于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207755_comment'></div>神惠听之，假方仗土，俾冽而食，则岂惟其室是赖，亦用勿幕，以仁四邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207755_comment'></div>神之休如井不匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207755_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207755_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　晁补之春来在城内市南营建房宅。作品：《上梁祭土地文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《祭西宅旅瘗文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《祭戴氏地旅瘗文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span><div id='poem_1207756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上梁祭土地文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年1月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207756")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207756'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207756'>维大观二年正月壬子朔，十六日丁卯，具位晁补之谨以清酌时果之奠，祭于土地之神曰：补之自郊坰改宅邑廛，既告于神矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207756_comment'></div>以日之吉，架梁于其室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207756_comment'></div>不远之复，自其素心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207756_comment'></div>将休老此境，尚克永康，以裕其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207756_comment'></div>方久事神，惟神其祐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207756_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207756_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭西宅旅瘗文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207757")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207757'>维年月日，具位晁补之遣私从赵采芝，以楮币酒食之奠，致祭于县牛驴街东西地内无主骸骨之灵曰：补之买此邑中地，输租王府而居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207757_comment'></div>眷言尔曹，侨瘗兹久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207757_comment'></div>主至客避，则惟厥常；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207757_comment'></div>幽明不糅，亦各其愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207757_comment'></div>且处世若梦，是身非汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207757_comment'></div>蛇蝉能蜕，人岂不如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207757_comment'></div>超然去之，亦汝所乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207757_comment'></div>况方春掩骼，著在旧典；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207757_comment'></div>敞园漏泽，时惟新政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207757_comment'></div>往即爽垲，我非不恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207757_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207757_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭戴氏地旅瘗文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207759")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207759_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207759'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207759'>维年月日，具官晁补之遣白直王立，以清酌饼饵之奠，告于北坎旅瘗之灵曰：尔等或生贫贱，葬不具礼，掩坎窞间，潦集之患，固非其所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207759_comment'></div>今朝廷辟漏泽园，遍于天下，主欲用地，而请于官，以尔骸迁，又饮食送汝，为词以晓之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207759_comment'></div>高原可宅，尔永无患，亦尔之愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207759_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207759_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年4月</a>　晁补之家居金乡东皋，提举西京崇福宫。作品：《单父主簿单君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六八。）</span><div id='poem_1207712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>单父主簿单君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（大观二年四月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207712")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207712'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207712'>君讳拯，字济甫，淮阳下邳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207712_comment'></div>家故饶于财，而祖翼、考琇以乐谊好施闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207712_comment'></div>琇生四子，皆为士，而君结发游学，崭然兄弟间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207712_comment'></div>彊有力知耻，为文辞敏丽，太学诸生交誉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207712_comment'></div>尝四举礼部，不中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207712_comment'></div>同时流辈，或蚤得科名通显，独潦倒庠校而志不屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207712_comment'></div>年五十始中进士第，调登州文登、莱州胶水二主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207712_comment'></div>困穷久，阅义理多，知道以爱人为本，教民次之，故所居官辄欲行其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207712_comment'></div>尝摄令文登，民有怒其子，暮屏诸户外者，旦视，碎首而死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207712_comment'></div>其家疑邻父，执之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207712_comment'></div>邻父不能自明，且具狱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207712_comment'></div>君疑不情，夜就讯，方泣称冤，遽破械出之，捕得其杀者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207712_comment'></div>一邑欢骇，然君未始以为功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207712_comment'></div>沉于铨选者二十年，晚复调单州单父县主簿，未至，以疾卒，大观二年某月甲子也，享年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207712_comment'></div>娶同里庄氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207712_comment'></div>男许，学问有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207712_comment'></div>女二人，适进士聂纶、郭辟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207712_comment'></div>以卒之年四月甲子，葬于下邳县某乡之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207712_comment'></div>君为人岂弟尚气，遇事便发，不藏宿怨，怒故迕物，而物不忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207712_comment'></div>或戒以易言近悔，自以义当出此，不化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207712_comment'></div>其家数世不异籍，无亲疏若一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207712_comment'></div>淮阳守、龙图阁学士赵公卨欲上诸朝旌表之，君辞曰：「此在民为难，于士为常，不敢以是徼名」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207712_comment'></div>既仕不遇，欲投绂去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207712_comment'></div>即所居为东斋，呻吟论说其间，悠然自得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207712_comment'></div>国子祭酒颜公复为文以记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207712_comment'></div>初，某未冠，游下邳，君亦未壮，平居学问相好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207712_comment'></div>得罪家居，一日君过门，欢然道故，意加笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207712_comment'></div>夜踰半，忽索马去，挽留之不可，无几何而闻其卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207712_comment'></div>悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207712_comment'></div>君尤与里人陇干令聂循矩善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207712_comment'></div>聂良士，自言尝从君学，乃状其行来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207712_comment'></div>聂谓君单姓，官单州单父，为以殁与柳子厚死柳州事符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207712_comment'></div>虽戏论，亦异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207712_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_1207712'>士生欲其志之成也，家人欲其仕之荣也，交游欲其义之行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207712_comment'></div>志虽卷然亦成，仕虽屈然亦荣，义虽不试然亦行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207712_comment'></div>所得在此，所失在彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207712_comment'></div>在此而得展余喜，在彼而失匪余耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207712_comment'></div>呜呼，贤矣！</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1207712_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1108&endYear=1108')">1108年</a>　晁补之家居金乡，提举西京崇福宫。作品：《甥杜氏小五娘披剃疏词并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷七0。）</span><div id='poem_1207773' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207773' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207773?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甥杜氏小五娘披剃疏词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1108年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207773")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207773_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207773'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207773'>濮阳女子杜氏小五娘<span class='inlineComment2'>（法名，）</span>故朝散郎、集贤殿修撰、提举西京崇福宫、故真宁县君阎氏、今安平县君晁氏之孙，今宣义郎、知颍昌府阳翟县丞、故晁氏八姐、今晁氏二十一姐之女，年十八岁，其家议以从人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207773_comment'></div>念其前母以产殁，己当为妇而悲，忽自截发如头陀仪，颒粉泽屏荤，见请于亲，冀他日为比丘尼，以报生身之恩，学出世之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207773_comment'></div>其尊属衋然，伤而听之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207773_comment'></div>其婿氏怅然，恨而舍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207773_comment'></div>自岁丙子至岁戊子，十有二年，其志益坚，行益熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207773_comment'></div>而朝请郎、监西京中岳庙晁补之之妻永嘉县君杜氏，修撰公之女、而宣义君之姊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207773_comment'></div>怜其侄之意，以钱一百三十千输诸官，得祠部度牒施之，命以善月日享佛饭僧，落发受具，又以告补之曰：「子为作文赞其事，成此女子愿，且普庆忏，使杜、晁两宗往者居者向佛菩提，获大饶益」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207773_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1207773'>伏闻山河大地，尚因瞪发而生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207773_comment'></div>血肉幻身，岂是金刚之法？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207773_comment'></div>为泡为沫，为无量腥臊聚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207773_comment'></div>为苦为恼，为百一疾病缠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207773_comment'></div>为火宅已烧，为丘井将坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207773_comment'></div>昼作猖狂而不暇，夜梦怵惕而自惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207773_comment'></div>无常大鬼之所驱，有情更生而何往？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207773_comment'></div>所宜厌患出离而反欣喜，控搏乃清净。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207773_comment'></div>童女杜氏小五娘法名，贤公之孙，信士之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207773_comment'></div>初听结缡之议，便盟落发之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207773_comment'></div>至于视姑姊妹之行，譬若观雀蚊虻之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207773_comment'></div>盖戒定宿修于前世，故因缘适会于此生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207773_comment'></div>亲杜姓中，咸从本起之愿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207773_comment'></div>姑晁氏配，为营披剃之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207773_comment'></div>解紒著盘，诸天八部而皆叹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207773_comment'></div>登坛受具，大觉六师而现前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207773_comment'></div>当有无舌瘖哑人教汝读经，生盲擿埴人指汝见性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207773_comment'></div>滋长圣种，断除爱根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207773_comment'></div>用以加持晁杜两族，俱乘胜因；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207773_comment'></div>回向幽明二途，永脱苦趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207773_comment'></div>及此会中，尽未来际，助缘随喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207773_comment'></div>男子女人，證明此比丘尼，令得不退转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207773_comment'></div>同悟无生忍，曩谟佛陀耶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1207773_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1109&endYear=1109')">1109年</a>　晁补之家居金乡，得出党籍，改提举南京鸿庆宫。<br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/1207619?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白莲社图记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207619")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207619_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207619'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207619'>庐山白莲社十八贤者，始晋太元中，雁门正觉法师慧远爱此山，卜居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207619_comment'></div>而河内觉寂大师慧永先居西林，故法师所居号东林云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207619_comment'></div>法师神明英越，初从太行释道安落发，道安知其能使道流东国者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207619_comment'></div>时诸方名德闻风而至，与同修净土之社者甚众，而十八贤者，社中之杰也，曰佛驮耶舍、佛驮跋陀罗、竺道生、慧持、慧睿、昙恒、道禺、道敬、昙诜，内有士曰刘遗民、雷次宗、周续之、宗炳、张野、张诠，合十八人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207619_comment'></div>而佛驮二尊者，罽宾人，皆神僧也，馀各有异迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207619_comment'></div>又法师最善陶渊明、陆修靖，两人高蹈，不肯入社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207619_comment'></div>先是，南海渔人尝网得文殊金像，有文云「阿育王造」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207619_comment'></div>后，商人于东海得其圆光以合像，若符节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207619_comment'></div>陶侃尝取之，旋失去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207619_comment'></div>至是，法师祷之江上，出焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207619_comment'></div>永公室中尝有虎，或畏之，即驱上山，去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207619_comment'></div>恒公行，有鹿驯扰，耶舍赤髭咒水洗弟子足，使闭目，但闻风声，自龟兹一夕至姑臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207619_comment'></div>跋陀罗尝见弥勒兜率天上，得不还，果有释迦舍利三颗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207619_comment'></div>及群士等皆有异迹，见于其传，则法师可知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207619_comment'></div>初，法师送客常以虎溪为限，最厚陶潜、陆修靖，偶送两客，不觉过溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207619_comment'></div>然陶忘怀得失，晋宋间一人耳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207619_comment'></div>修靖后得道度世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207619_comment'></div>两人固非入社者，皆善法师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207619_comment'></div>而谢灵运恃才傲物，尝求入社，法师以心杂止之，灵运不恨也，为凿二池，种白莲，后名其社云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207619_comment'></div>殷仲堪之为荆州也，时入山修敬，故图中所绘陶、陆、谢、殷在十八人之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207619_comment'></div>今龙眠李公麟为此图，笔最胜，然恨其略也，故余稍附益之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207619_comment'></div>凡社中士十八人，非社中士四，从者若干，马六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207619_comment'></div>盖人物因龙眠之旧者十五，他皆新意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207619_comment'></div>菩萨像仿侯翌，云气仿吴道玄受塔天王图，松石以关仝，堂殿杂草树以周昉、郭忠恕，卧槎垂藤以李成，崖壁瘦木以许道宁，湍流、山岭、骑从、鞬服以魏贤，马以韩干，虎以包鼎，猿猴、鹿以易元吉，鹤、白鹇若鸟鼠以崔白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207619_comment'></div>余自以意，先为山石位置，向背物皆作粉本，以授画史孟仲宁，使模写润色之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207619_comment'></div>余幼慕无生法，堕世网不得出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207619_comment'></div>贬玉溪时，道庐山，爱而欲居不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207619_comment'></div>家缗城八年，时往来于怀也，至为《思山辞》十数，醉辄歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207619_comment'></div>初见李图，悠然忽如蜡屐扶杖行其中，故为此图，特尽意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207619_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题白莲社图后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207281")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207281'>《周礼》百工之事，皆圣人作，用志不分，乃凝于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207281_comment'></div>张颠观公孙大娘舞剑而草书长进，此岂笔墨蹊径间得之耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207281_comment'></div>齐鲁俗朴，工技世守，知变通者寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207281_comment'></div>而缗画史孟仲宁独善学，知余得意缋事中，惠听余言，使集吴道玄、关仝、韩干、魏贤、李成、郭忠恕、许道宁数子精笔，为白莲社图，甚似。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207281_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207739' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207739' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207739?labeling=true' target='_blank'>特进改葬祭告文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207739")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207739_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207739'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207739'>维大观三年，岁次己丑，十月壬申朔、十三日甲申，孙前泰宁军节度推官、知大名府莘县事端礼等，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，祭告于祖考特进吏部尚书晁公、祖妣河间县太君刘氏之墓曰：闻之，夫子既得合葬于防，门人后，雨甚至，曰：「尔来何迟也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207739_comment'></div>曰：「防墓崩」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207739_comment'></div>夫子不应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207739_comment'></div>三言之，乃泫然流涕，曰：「吾闻之，古不修墓」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207739_comment'></div>夫既反其极矣，岸谷变迁，何由必之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207739_comment'></div>故古不修墓者，礼也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207739_comment'></div>泫然流涕者，情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207739_comment'></div>夫礼可以不修，而情不得视其坏而不悲，是夫子许其修也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207739_comment'></div>而端礼等以祥符大墓土痹有水患，虽我祖考妣昔以礼葬，垂七十年，可已矣，而端礼等以人揆神，情不得安，将迁柩任城鱼山吉卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207739_comment'></div>且我祖考妣之子孙往者皆从葬此地，烝尝以时，不愆岁事，抑族坟亦礼也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207739_comment'></div>以人便之，知神欲之，亦情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207739_comment'></div>故端礼等以违古不修墓之训为轻，而伸泫然流涕之思为重，杂然相恕，令月吉日奉柩以东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207739_comment'></div>我祖考妣实惠听之，不震不惊，往安于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207739_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207739_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207705' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207705' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207705?labeling=true' target='_blank'>殿中侍御史赵君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（大观三年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207705")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207705_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207705'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207705'>君讳祐，字寿臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207705_comment'></div>其先赵州平棘县人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207705_comment'></div>殿中丞讳符之曾孙，太常博士讳昉之孙，而尚书都官郎中讳盛之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207705_comment'></div>家世以财雄边州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207705_comment'></div>国初，北方用师，博士悉以家财助官军逐寇，赵人赖以全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207705_comment'></div>自都官始葬磁州滏阳县，因家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207705_comment'></div>君幼警敏，不戏弄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207705_comment'></div>稍长，学通洽，中天圣五年进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207705_comment'></div>初调冀州司理，考中，囹圄屡空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207705_comment'></div>改雍丘尉，转大理丞，再知长垣、临邛二县事，用举者擢知威州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207705_comment'></div>威近蛮，苦侵剽，君下令毋先犯蛮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207705_comment'></div>蛮久感悦，至相帅拜庭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207705_comment'></div>迁殿中丞、通判相州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207705_comment'></div>相守资政殿学士张公观奇之曰：「廊庙具也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207705_comment'></div>会改守郓，即奏君通判郓州，迁太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207705_comment'></div>时贾公昌朝为御史中丞，言君方正，擢监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207705_comment'></div>弹劾不挠，仁宗眷待之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207705_comment'></div>言杨崇勋以恩旧位将相，判成德军，其子宗诲受民金，崇勋因为释民罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207705_comment'></div>事发，崇勋犹为营奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207705_comment'></div>既逮捕宗诲，崇勋又篡取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207705_comment'></div>君言：「阙庭至近，崇勋恣横如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207705_comment'></div>臣闻制使李宗易有奏报，继遣种世材就问崇勋，但卧閤延制使，入对不合卤莽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207705_comment'></div>臣请选使臣以禁近送崇勋就对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207705_comment'></div>念以其尝官枢庭，务存大体，犹望与一散秩，许令致仕」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207705_comment'></div>上深然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207705_comment'></div>保州卒叛，闭城拒守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207705_comment'></div>朝廷初遣中使招抚，继又发兵攻讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207705_comment'></div>君言：「保塞近敌境，侦逻日至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207705_comment'></div>今发兵，速破则谓我边垒不固，未下则谓我战士无勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207705_comment'></div>使遂克之，老幼鱼肉，帑廪灰烬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207705_comment'></div>可恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207705_comment'></div>又闻已遣枢密副使富弼宣抚河北，龙图阁学士欧阳脩为都转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207705_comment'></div>宜下弼、脩倍道走城下，晓谕归顺，不可淹久，启戎人窥觊之心，生逆党变诈之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207705_comment'></div>或叛兵有邀请，亦务俛从，事定自可裁剸」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207705_comment'></div>上优纳之，而郑公、文忠公卒平保州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207705_comment'></div>贾公为参知政事，君引嫌，请外官，遂以监察御史知棣州事，仍不废言事，俄迁殿中侍御史，兴利除害，州以治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207705_comment'></div>参知政事王公尧臣引为三司户部判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207705_comment'></div>恩得任子，以与其弟祀，补郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207705_comment'></div>时虏通耗朝廷，难奉使者，假君朝散大夫，守太常少卿，充接伴北朝国信使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207705_comment'></div>还，经赵，宴其族人，语曰：「终愿复为平棘人，与族人处」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207705_comment'></div>因以钱二百万为贫者营产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207705_comment'></div>既还，遣视汴口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207705_comment'></div>陛辞，上曰：「卿此行归，当峻任卿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207705_comment'></div>而君得疾汴口，既还，卒，庆历五年四月六日也，年四十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207705_comment'></div>上闻之，叹息曰：「赵祐乃止此」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207705_comment'></div>问谁后者，贾公以嗣子滋闻，而有司白君遗奏不应录子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207705_comment'></div>上曰：「与太庙斋郎」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207705_comment'></div>君平生以建明时事为己任，言多为民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207705_comment'></div>自佐郡为州，至官台省，内外如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207705_comment'></div>尝疏决刑禁河北，鞫狱陕西，既毕，皆以其道所见利疚闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207705_comment'></div>凡切于事者六：其一，庆历二年星变，又春大旱，上避殿寅畏，敕寺观为道场斋醮事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207705_comment'></div>君言：「边患未宁，民力重困，此圣虑所宜先轸者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207705_comment'></div>佛老亦化民趋善，然未闻遂以此答天谴也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207705_comment'></div>其二，河北配籴民粟至二百万石，民蓄谷尽籍，加督责，户不聊生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207705_comment'></div>君言：「陈新未续，恐谷翔贵，转致流亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207705_comment'></div>民为邦本，不可忽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1207705_comment'></div>请俟秋成，听民自入粟」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1207705_comment'></div>其三，京东水患，令民各堑田畔以走水，因其土为防，植本防上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1207705_comment'></div>君言：「民田有多寡，而堑深阔若一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1207705_comment'></div>可施之广，不可施之狭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1207705_comment'></div>请下田欲堑者从民便」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1207705_comment'></div>其四，郓州户输乾食盐钱<span class='inlineComment2'>（君言盐钱名乾食者。）</span>，但岁抄浮户，计丁配之，皆里正邻伍专增损丁数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1207705_comment'></div>又变输绢若䌷，费数倍，恐京东尽然，请悉输以钱，以当预买直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1207705_comment'></div>官入优，民费省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1207705_comment'></div>其五，陕西榷盐，较通商时，民不为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1207705_comment'></div>君言：「始改法，尽收客盐，官贸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1207705_comment'></div>已尽，则必配民辇致，或衙前督运，多破产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1207705_comment'></div>又户无高下，给食历，贫食圭撮，官不圭撮贸，为病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1207705_comment'></div>请通商如旧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1207705_comment'></div>其六，陕西令户运粮至延州、保安军，又不许飞脚赍货，就籴其地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1207705_comment'></div>君言：「陕虢以西，米斗钱五百至六百，此但输直，以五六谷价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1207705_comment'></div>臣闻沿边入粟，甚耗中都钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1207705_comment'></div>今解盐以席计犹四百万，请入粟皆偿盐，且稍润之，则远民纾，中都实」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1207705_comment'></div>事多施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1207705_comment'></div>君疏财尚义，识吴公奎于尝僚未有名时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1207705_comment'></div>吴公从制举，为空室给其资，卒大显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1207705_comment'></div>韩魏公、文潞公亦与游，皆器之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1207705_comment'></div>武功苏子美以诗豪，少所许可，与唱和盈笥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1207705_comment'></div>娶李氏，封永宁县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1207705_comment'></div>子滋，终汉州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1207705_comment'></div>二女，长适内殿崇班秦某，次适宣德郎王定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1207705_comment'></div>五孙：崇厚、崇烈、崇德、崇仁、崇卞，皆进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1207705_comment'></div>崇烈尝举礼部，后以贡士垂释褐，卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1207705_comment'></div>崇仁、崇卞皆夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1207705_comment'></div>录事君以滏阳葬，有河患，改卜下邳之新安，未及事而殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1207705_comment'></div>故崇厚、崇德刻意能干其蛊，以大观三年十月甲子，举君及永宁县君之柩合葬于新安，并举录事君以祔，成其先之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1207705_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_1207705'>惟天祚宋，削平僭乱，如舜禹升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1207705_comment'></div>逮于仁宗，休养生息，文景致平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1207705_comment'></div>其同亶时，天为生贤，硕大光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1207705_comment'></div>庶尹百工，亦罔不正，可庸可承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1207705_comment'></div>猗欤御史，崛起平棘，有直亮声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1207705_comment'></div>士欲爱君，爱民为本，本固邦宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1207705_comment'></div>尚率尔祖，毋坏尔成，则后其兴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_92_1207705_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207171' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207171' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答楷老别纸</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207171")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207171'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207171'>弟子补之黑业钝根，历劫飘零，可怜悯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207171_comment'></div>窃不自意以何因缘，年二十许时，即知归依正法，更不生疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207171_comment'></div>而业力牵缠，投身世网，饮酒食肉，作众不善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207171_comment'></div>晚虽忏悔，未有脱期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207171_comment'></div>曾礼圆通、觉海二士，尝蒙接引，自不承当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207171_comment'></div>今年五十七，发白气衰，归仗无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207171_comment'></div>仰闻和尚德名，心生欢喜，恐是宿缘，曾获亲近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207171_comment'></div>故昨睹《了了庵颂》，不觉便伸偈赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207171_comment'></div>热铁入水，作种种声，亦不自由，非敢发露见解，求大善知识剖判也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207171_comment'></div>伏蒙寄赐答偈，茫然自失，如大空中，无安脚处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207171_comment'></div>既而内省，若朽木不可雕，和尚岂肯开甘露门也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207171_comment'></div>惟愿慈悲，更加诱诲，令浮海盲龟，遇木得歇，幸甚幸甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207171_comment'></div>补之稽首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1207171_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207073' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207073' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207073?labeling=true' target='_blank'>坐进庵赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207073")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207073_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207073'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207073'>有物于此，无梁无柱，圆广六尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207073_comment'></div>非囷非窌，粟米之宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207073_comment'></div>上蒙藁秸，下履瓴甋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207073_comment'></div>涂墁晦外，中腹纯白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207073_comment'></div>平时鼠窜，俯仰不迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207073_comment'></div>主人懵学，敢谒之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207073_comment'></div>客曰：「此夫外丘阜而内穴谷者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207073_comment'></div>上荷笠而下凑辐者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207073_comment'></div>首枝撑而身纯束者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207073_comment'></div>有登降而无阼宾者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207073_comment'></div>混沌既死，窍凿乃张，牖则有目，户则有吭，橧巢营窟，太古所藏，周旋无间，病于德方，邑都莫贤，原野则良者欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207073_comment'></div>虽然，可以五人群居，宇宙有馀，不可以八口次且，孰知妇姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207073_comment'></div>彊名『坐进』，其实中虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207073_comment'></div>闻诸博识，是谓廜㢝」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207073_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>追和陶渊明归去来辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1107年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196437")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196437_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_196437'>辞长而歌短，歌有和，辞无和也。言语文章，随世随异，非拟其辞也，继其志也，作者七人矣。词曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_196437_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196437'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196437'>归去来兮，吾无以归奚以归。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196437'>既身不足以任责，畏首尾而心悲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196437'>慕往昔之经世，嗟吾力之莫追。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196437'>彼辞位而灌园，岂吾今之独非。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196437'>雨冥冥而荷笠，榛莽莽而褰衣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196437'>我行野而视天，觉宇大而身微。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196437'>乃矜虻蚷，止驱息奔。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196437'>背隍筑室，面坂植门。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196437'>三绶从褫，图书尚存。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196437'>忘瓠落之可忧，比浮海之为樽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196437'>跞太初而游意，弊无极而彫颜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196437'>反国蜗而自足，俯巢幕而亦安。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196437'>解予辔之沃濡兮，脱予辖之间关。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196437'>识鸟鸣而物华，陶阳气以流观。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196437'>悟息渊而消枝，亦墐户而俱还。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196437'>惟文字之幼工，则虽老而桓桓。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196437'>归去来兮，彼河滨之善游。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196437'>或往学而丧生，复裹粮其安求。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196437'>善陶生之达情，不与世兮同忧。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196437'>实迷途其已远，惧斯人之莫畴。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196437'>或待兔守株，或遗剑刻舟。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196437'>虽成事之不说，聚悔踰于山丘。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196437'>庶西方之至言，聊反闻而逆流。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196437'>守一静而为君，亦何往而不休。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196437'>已焉哉，一昼一夜成四时，子之叹川逝不留。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196437'>颓光不可使东之。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196437'>韩终王子乔，汗漫难与期。<div id='poem_sentence_26_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_196437'>俯寸田之荆棘，曷不旦耘而暮耔。<div id='poem_sentence_27_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_196437'>悲在堂之蟋蟀，惭不乐于唐诗。<div id='poem_sentence_28_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_196437'>悟死生之如梦，亘今古而无疑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_196437_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196437'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷三。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_196437_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_196492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196492?labeling=true' target='_blank'>感兴五首次韵和李希孝<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196492")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196492'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196492'>海鸟御羊角，飘然凌紫清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196492'>有背如泰山，未觉毛羽轻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196492'>盐阳亦群飞，日景为不明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196492'>空仓自苦饥，安得有此名。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196492'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196492_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196493' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196493' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196493?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196493_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196493'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196493'>人生须富贵，如俟河之清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196493'>草木竞荣华，春服亦已轻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196493'>桑田自足乐，未可居高明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196493'>君子顺天道，小人眷时名。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196493'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196493_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196494' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196494' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196494?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196494'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196494'>长歌遗世情，沧浪之水清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196494_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_196496_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196496'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196496'>不肯埽一室，顾欲天下清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196496_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196496'>少日又不羁，颇复乡党轻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196496_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196495_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196407' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196407' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196407?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_4_196406'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196406_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196408' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196408' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_0_196408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196408'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_196408", 196408, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>庄奴</span>不入租，报我田久荒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196408'>凌矜马到门，硉兀牛卧场。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196408'>立苗苍耳根，此策殊未长。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196408_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_196409_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196409'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196409'>家世不为农，长安有大第。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196409'>官粮弗充口，万里聊自庇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196409'>一从学聱牙，世事百色废。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196409_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196409'>卖牛姑补屋，岁晚霜雪至。<div class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196410_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196410'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196410_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196410'>苦耕又不时，狐虺日纵横。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196410_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196410_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196345?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196345'>弦歌高楼上，但恨知者寡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196345'>丈人遗世心，口语傥能借。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196345'>不然抱幽璞，终岁裹幞帕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196345'>坐令青蝇繁，暂出刑两踝。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196345'>儒冠成自误，归去无屋瓦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196345'>赖逢里中贤，筑室各萧洒。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196345'>及时秫麦贱，樽酒得同把。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196345'>安能效乾没，肩与市人亚。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196345'>居然邑里号，曾墨为<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_17_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196345'>复古志尚奇，众竞方独暇。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196345'>扪虱与人言，岂不逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_196345", 196345, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>谴讶</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196345'>崇朝<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_196345", 196345, id='poem_sentence_21_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196345'>尝闻庄生说，乃慕巨鱼化。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196345'>平居似晏子，志念能自下。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196345'>而我独迂疏，通人所讥骂。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196345'>正赖觞咏中，得意自陶写。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196345'>留连接清晤，欲起不能罢。<div id='poem_sentence_26_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_196345'>是时春雨馀，桑密鸠鸣野。<div id='poem_sentence_27_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_196345'>城隅园圃近，款段亦时跨。<div id='poem_sentence_28_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_196345'>此理岂外求，犹烦詹尹卦。<div id='poem_sentence_31_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_196345'>去年秋不在，匏瓠缘庭架。<div id='poem_sentence_34_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_196345'>低回迫荣利，妻子怜王霸。<div id='poem_sentence_35_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_196345'>横经亦彊颜，己取或人舍。<div id='poem_sentence_36_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_196345'>但虑宰我愚，松柏谈三社。<div id='poem_sentence_37_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_196345'>翛然一室内，黄卷开<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_38_196345", 196345, "Clauses/77/Comments/0")'>佳话</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_196345'>尺璧竞寸阴，宁复当论价。<div id='poem_sentence_39_196345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_196345_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196474' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196474' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196474?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谒岱祠即事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196474")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196474_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196474'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196474'>泽南三百里，极望横天云。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196474'>云端色凝黛，谛视初可分。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196474'>峥嵘介丘像，澒洞元气屯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196474'>顷刻有变化，惨澹殊明昏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196474'>天行帝出震，其位生物元。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196474'>不周偾西北，川乃东南奔。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196474'>宁知六鳌死，竟使二山沦。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196474'>不有是难倾，孰维大块根。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196474'>尝闻周官说，实惟天帝孙。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196474'>神灵所镇守，民物斯芘存。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196474'>幽明吻一理，有道惟常尊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196474'>不觉下马拜，僮奴亦<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_196474", 196474, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>蹲循</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196474'>乃知正直理，足使冥顽敦。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196474'>三王有损益，商人所尊神。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196474'>明法或不惧，夜行安得逡。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196474'>以此辅世教，庶几驱骜<span class='inlineComment2'>（光本作我）</span>民。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196474'>暮宿太平驿，不眠虑丝棼。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196474'>明朝好天色，万象开胚浑。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196474'>势横恒碣尽，支压齐鲁蹲。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196474'>五色冒日观，一握通帝阍。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196474'>恢拓下嶊嶉，青苍上氤氲。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196474'>泉石竞沮洳，烟岚互纷纶。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196474'>高举躐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_196474", 196474, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>风海</span>，深蹯跆火轮。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196474'>涛波卷堆阜，一一溟渤吞。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196474'>棋枰视井邑，匕箸藏松椿。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196474'>碧瓦峙双阙，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_196474", 196474, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>红墙</span>缭长闉。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196474'>愿瞻岩閟客，内涤邪垢魂。<div id='poem_sentence_26_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_196474'>赐臣登绝顶，一览神秀原。<div id='poem_sentence_27_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_196474'>万壑射窈窕，三坛矗嶙峋。<div id='poem_sentence_28_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_196474'>莽不睹项领，何能穷䏶跟。<div id='poem_sentence_29_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_196474'>稍稍指凫绎，依依数亭云。<div id='poem_sentence_30_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_196474'>松列大夫爵，骡识将军坟。<div id='poem_sentence_31_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_196474'>琐屑涧花丽，霏微崖药薰。<div id='poem_sentence_32_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_196474'>广大良有以，奇险安足论。<div id='poem_sentence_33_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_196474'>瑰诡有形上，颓然德弥惇。<div id='poem_sentence_34_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_196474'>得无希夷子，傲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>世逃深蓁。<div id='poem_sentence_35_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_196474'>亦有黄冠士，相对如麖麇。<div id='poem_sentence_36_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_196474'>此曹啮草木，语道良未闻。<div id='poem_sentence_37_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_196474'>解榻坐中观，洗心驰大钧。<div id='poem_sentence_38_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_196474'>形气要得一，不然随物泯。<div id='poem_sentence_39_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_196474'>是事亦姑置，幽寻聊可勤。<div id='poem_sentence_40_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_196474'>初疑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_196474", 196474, "Clauses/82/Comments/0")'>无字碑</span>，莹洁谁敢文。<div id='poem_sentence_41_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_196474'>又怪玉女井，高绝何由奫。<div id='poem_sentence_42_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_196474'>剑石危数履，女萝柔屡扪。<div id='poem_sentence_45_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_196474'>阴谷不敢视，恐落魑魅群。<div id='poem_sentence_48_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_196474'>安得遂独往，身如黄鹄翻。<div id='poem_sentence_49_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_196474'>周流遍五岳，采掇芝英繁。<div id='poem_sentence_50_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_196474'>即欲憩圆峤，或当止昆崙。<div id='poem_sentence_51_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_196474'>众真迎我语，一笑颜玉温。<div id='poem_sentence_52_196474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_196474'>是中差可乐，子胡恋尘樊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_515703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_515703'>北风动地起，云揽红日暗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_515703_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196415'>莞尔劝之休，怡然守而嫪。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196415'>翻思南迁久，祇幸北归早。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196415'>三已令奚愠，四至卿诚巧。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196415'>所欣颠木檗，莫羡姣人瞭。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196415'>同气靡间言，它人阙忠告。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196415'>贫居无酒肉，穷巷有探<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作深）</span>讨。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196415'>葵作饱蓬蓬，茗浇忧悄悄。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196415'>长闲味更永，竞进念已剿。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196415'>目鸿天苍苍，梦蝶日杲杲。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196415'>蘅皋美新雨，藜杖邈高蹈。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196415'>营斋直新径，创槛俯幽沼。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196415'>架以我园檀，茨之子官草<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：无斁月给刍也。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196415'>优游聊卒岁，邂逅可同调。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196415'>佩玉子终翔，菟裘我方老。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196415'>囊中餐玉法，枥上追风骠。<div id='poem_sentence_26_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_196415'>能知面不腼，未用心如搅。<div id='poem_sentence_27_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_196415'>平生夔契慕，晚岁瞿聃妙。<div id='poem_sentence_28_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_196415'>但欲入林深，子来应问道。<div id='poem_sentence_29_196415_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_196415'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_196264_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196264'>呼来著冠紞，野貌不改昔。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196264_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196519'>愀然对我数白发，追风逐日无由羁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196519'>三书自荐应不暇，五府交辟终何为。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196519'>邢侯胸中有王霸，不但游谈汉终贾。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196519'>岂非事君难进从古然，不然富贵终在天。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196519_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195946_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195945?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195945'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195945'>四海萍逢两弟兄，百年胶漆岁张陈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195945'>红尘陌上相逢子，华发林间偶坐身<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：属无斁。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195945'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195945_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195944' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195944' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195944?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其八 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195944'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195944'>尺五城南未足高，只今小杜更飘摇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195944'>暮烟疏雨从君胜，玉子文楸听我饶<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：属天达。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195944'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195944_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195943' class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195943_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195943'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195943'>李君禅味诗情里，解作黄金不润身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195943'>目断白衣檐酒阒，何妨聊破一垆春<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：属子宜。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195943_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195943'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195943_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195942?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195942'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195942'>城市何妨亦隐沦，贾君无意向红尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195942'>东皋瓜豆如云处，慊我幽栖不卜邻<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：属焕叔。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195942'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195942_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196025' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196025?labeling=true' target='_blank'>松菊堂读史五首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'>
