id='poem_title_196025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196025'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196025'>不作文饶将相官，野人亦挂党人间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196025_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196025'>筹边措国俱无用，空对平泉草木闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196025_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196025'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196025_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196024' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196024' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196024?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196024_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196024'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196024'>吾慕斯人不以官，会昌一梦中兴间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196024'>何须更作穷愁志，秋雨长时睡正闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196024'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196024_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196023?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196023_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196023'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196023'>明光甲挫三言内，悉怛谋亏一算间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196023'>成败关心不瞑目，我今无此只应闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196023'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196023_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196022' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196022' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196022?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196022_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196022'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196022'>平生精爽皋夔内，一世功名贝锦间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196022'>再梦令狐亦何事，可能到死未心闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196022'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196022_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196021?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196021'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196021'>当年伏地全杨李，公亦何知爱恶间。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196021'>千古论心许公近，百年归意与谁闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196021'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196021_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196002' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196002' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196002?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叔与戏云谓我穷我尝伤食从而嘲之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196002")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196002'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196002'>羊踏胸中昨夜蔬，不应扪腹怪如壶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196002'>妇家得餔犹须忍，莫索槟榔笑尔臞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196002'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196002_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_195988' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195988' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195988?labeling=true' target='_blank'>自画山水寄正受题其上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_195988")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_195988_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_195988'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_195988'>虎观它年青汗手，白头田亩未能闲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195988'>自嫌麦陇无佳思，戏作南斋百里山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195988_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195988'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195988_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207081' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207081' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207081?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宾主辩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207081")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207081_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207081'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207081'>晁子既摭陶子《归去来辞》，以名其居而记之，自以闻道历年，而为潜不足，中惭而疑，隐几去智，则方寸之地廓然其虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207081_comment'></div>若两丈夫，为主与宾，巾裾而坐庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207081_comment'></div>宾曰：「子道与吾殊，而多谓子类余，岂其然乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207081_comment'></div>凡子以躁乐吾静，隘悦吾和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207081_comment'></div>子，人之放也，而多谓与我自放者同科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207081_comment'></div>我遗夫世者已尽，子缘于物者尚多，而子宾宾焉以从我，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207081_comment'></div>主人曰：「万物聚闾，千古并涂，然求诸其间，天地异职，父子殊面，莫大且亲，而相因以判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207081_comment'></div>今宾方欲合两人为一体，则物我蜂起，不可得而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207081_comment'></div>宾不通之，则自宾之身，十指长短、两目大小、肝胆共络而楚越画界也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207081_comment'></div>况宾出千载之上，我起千载之下，别族离居，所遭异者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207081_comment'></div>而宾乃斩然为间，方且病我之浮气，独不伤宾之大同乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207081_comment'></div>宾自揣心，日化年改，壮异幼时，老乖壮日，今是昨非，前弃后拾，使宾自操，且不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207081_comment'></div>盖孔子圣人，犹六十化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207081_comment'></div>智如惠子，徒观其勤，未知其谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207081_comment'></div>宾如通之，则齐婴公扈，离立易心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207081_comment'></div>梦为鱼鸟，可与飞沉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207081_comment'></div>况我欲遵子，若是其宾宾者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207081_comment'></div>如宾之词，委心去留，乘化归尽，化乃所过，胡可以吝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207081_comment'></div>我之慕宾，亦以是近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207081_comment'></div>躁静隘和，曰情非性；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207081_comment'></div>人放自放，非故曰命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207081_comment'></div>极则俱极，进则皆进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207081_comment'></div>宾遗夫世者，虽尽而犹多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207081_comment'></div>我缘于物者，虽多而必尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207081_comment'></div>则又胡可以宾之既瘳，而傲我之方病也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207081_comment'></div>水既蜕地，气又蜕水，吾方解我之不然，而经宾之所以，则我既化矣，虽六十改，未知为数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207081_comment'></div>且物固以其近相慕，昔伯宗，人言其似杨父则怿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207081_comment'></div>桓温，婢以为类刘琨则忻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207081_comment'></div>夫杨父、刘琨徇权殒身，而夸者慕焉，恐不得邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207081_comment'></div>前舆既覆，后辙不逡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207081_comment'></div>彼皆炫智而斗力、角驱而竞奔，故彊弱斯在，而胜负可论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207081_comment'></div>今我与宾既已俱出乎忘我之境，而同塞乎累物之门，得失安在，是非奚存哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207081_comment'></div>宾独不闻鲁男子之拒托宿者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207081_comment'></div>嫠曰：『子胡不若柳下惠』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207081_comment'></div>男子曰：『柳下惠固可，吾固不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207081_comment'></div>吾将以吾之不可学柳下惠之可』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207081_comment'></div>而孔子以谓学柳下惠者多矣，然未有似于斯人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207081_comment'></div>今欲使我如宾，解组长违，我则不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207081_comment'></div>可在佚身，宾则犹我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207081_comment'></div>譬鲁男子审己，故其为柳下惠也，不以其同而以异，及其至焉一也，可不可安寄？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207081_comment'></div>宾亦奚以知我不与宾同至于葛天氏之地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207081_comment'></div>以谓何如」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207081_comment'></div>于是宾唯而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207081_comment'></div>主人送之，不离席则霍然若寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207081_comment'></div>乃书之记后。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1207081_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207626' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207626' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207626?labeling=true' target='_blank'>归来子名缗城所居记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207626")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207626_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207626'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207626'>少日读书，不升孔子之堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207626_comment'></div>自夔、咎繇而下，若巫咸、傅说，则器不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207626_comment'></div>遭时有用，庶几学郑子产、晋叔向之为人，尚恐其远，且一国佐不足用天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207626_comment'></div>事君慕汲黯、刘向，而愧二子之直且博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207626_comment'></div>顾尝好孙吴，颇通其说，用以为策，悟非己志，辄去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207626_comment'></div>独于文词，喜左丘明、《檀弓》、庄周、屈原、司马迁、相如、枚乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207626_comment'></div>若唐韩、柳氏、古乐府诗人之作，时时发于事，又拙不工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207626_comment'></div>晚得释氏外生死说，始尽屏旧习，皇皇如堂室四达无所依，方寸之地虚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207626_comment'></div>又不喜晋人，初不知道，徒窥其藩谓尽，至清言误世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207626_comment'></div>念身于古，无一可数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207626_comment'></div>读陶潜《归去来词》，觉己不似而愿师之，买田故缗城，自谓「归来子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207626_comment'></div>庐舍登览游息之地，一户一牖，皆欲致《归去来》之意，故颇摭陶词以名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207626_comment'></div>为堂，面园之草木曰「松菊」，「松菊犹存」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207626_comment'></div>为轩，达其屏使虚以来风，曰「舒啸」，「登东皋以舒啸」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207626_comment'></div>为亭，广其趾使庳以瞰池，曰「临赋」，「临清流而赋诗」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207626_comment'></div>封土为台，架屋其颠，若楼瞰百里，曰「遐观」，穿室其腹若洞，深五步，曰「流憩」，「策扶老以流憩，时矫首而遐观」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207626_comment'></div>为庵，抱阳而圆之以嬉昼，「倚南窗以寄傲」也，曰「寄傲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207626_comment'></div>为庵，负阴而方之以休夜，「鸟倦飞而知还」也，曰「倦飞」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207626_comment'></div>顾所居远山水，非柴桑比，门直通道，有长坂亘其前数十里，故渠萦之，蒲柳蓊然，鱼鸟之所聚，有丘壑意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207626_comment'></div>俯而就其深为亭，曰「窈窕」，「既窈窕以寻壑」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207626_comment'></div>跂而即其高为亭，曰「崎岖」，「亦崎岖而经丘」也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207626_comment'></div>凡因其词以名者九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207626_comment'></div>既榜而书之，日往来其间，则若渊明卧起与俱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207626_comment'></div>仰榜而味其词，则如与渊明晤语接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207626_comment'></div>踌躇自得，无往而不归来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207626_comment'></div>犹相观左右，意不自足，惧失渊明一语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207626_comment'></div>因喟然太息，自幼壮至于白首勤苦，蕲尽探圣贤之蕴，上则欲观性而复其初，次犹欲慕古人著之行事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207626_comment'></div>晚无一谐，乃徒恐迷而忘归，又欲尽屏所习，使空无有，至为一渊明惧不足，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207626_comment'></div>学道者恶夸，夸则不近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207626_comment'></div>且人才力有分，以尽为人之所为而求有功，则常不足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207626_comment'></div>以尽不为人之所为而要无事，则常有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207626_comment'></div>夫知其无可奈何而安之若命，若渊明其几矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207626_comment'></div>又陶之自叙云：「环堵萧然，不蔽风日，短褐穿结，箪瓢屡空，晏如也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207626_comment'></div>忘怀得失，以此自终，渊明诚于此有馀裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207626_comment'></div>今余居不至环堵，衣不至穿结，食不至屡空，以若所养，为渊明固易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207626_comment'></div>而余遭盛时，尝见识拔，污台省，国恩未报而决然去之，以若所歉，为渊明固难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207626_comment'></div>一以为渊明易，则是余与渊明倨欲以此自终，而予难易乘除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207626_comment'></div>一以为渊明难，则余于渊明得失亦未有辩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207626_comment'></div>或曰：「渊明亦晋人，抑知道者非耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207626_comment'></div>而顾自以为其葛天氏之民与，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207626_comment'></div>曰：「尝读释氏说，譬如动目能摇湛水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207626_comment'></div>今余与子常动，不足以观湛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207626_comment'></div>彼渊明，湛者类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207626_comment'></div>尝试与子去夫胶胶扰扰之蹊，而处阴以休影，若是者有年，喉喘宁而颠汗止，而后相与求渊明于葛天氏之国，洸然见其涂巷，乃余与子昔所尝历，而去之久者，乃今来归，而后渊明可侣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207626_comment'></div>其知道与否，可得而议也」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1207626_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207640?labeling=true' target='_blank'>八仙案铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207640")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207640'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207640'>东皋松菊堂，饮中八仙案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207640_comment'></div>八仙何必来？松菊自吾伴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207640_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1207640_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207261' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207261' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207261?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张穆之触鳞集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207261")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207261'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207261'>鲁俗当周之盛，及孔子时，文学为他国矜式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207261_comment'></div>周衰，诸侯并争，而鲁为弱国，文学亦微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207261_comment'></div>然其故俗由秦汉迄今，尚多经儒忠信之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207261_comment'></div>分裂大坏如五季，文物荡尽，而鲁儒犹往往抱经伏农野，守死善道，盖五十年而不改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207261_comment'></div>太祖皇帝起，平祸乱，尽屈良、平、信、越之策，休牛马而弗用，慨然思得诸生儒士与议太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207261_comment'></div>而鲁之学者始稍稍自奋垄亩，大裾长绅，杂出于戎马介士之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207261_comment'></div>父老见而指以喜曰：「此曹出，天下太平矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207261_comment'></div>方时厌乱，人思复常，故士贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207261_comment'></div>盖不待其名实加于上下，见其物色士类，而意已悦安之，此儒之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207261_comment'></div>金乡故隶兖，兖，鲁地，吾里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207261_comment'></div>而故张公盖金乡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207261_comment'></div>公以太平兴国三年起家进士甲科，大理评事、通判普州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207261_comment'></div>盖太祖皇帝初拔鲁群士之一人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207261_comment'></div>始补之为儿，从先君学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207261_comment'></div>先君多为补之言故里中前辈贤士长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207261_comment'></div>初闻公名，徒竦然佩先君训慕先进而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207261_comment'></div>宦学不试，白首来归，乃始与公之曾孙大方游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207261_comment'></div>大方为人质直自将，好善不欺，类可与论里仁之美者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207261_comment'></div>补之因复识先君之言，又知公之忠信流泽有后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207261_comment'></div>然去公百年，所传闻未足以知公尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207261_comment'></div>一日大方出公遗稿，曰《触鳞集》，盖公为太宗御史时所上疏议，而《触鳞》，公所自名也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207261_comment'></div>三复弥月，凛乎直谅多闻之益，如药石，如谷米，非无用而设者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207261_comment'></div>其多至数十章，皆深切当世之务，不可以尽举，始恨公不究其用云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207261_comment'></div>至其他诗文，皆清丽，有唐中叶以来才士之风，非若五季及国初文物始复，武夫粗鄙、田里朴陋者之作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207261_comment'></div>其相与切磋学问、见于酬唱者，翰林王黄州元之为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207261_comment'></div>黄州，名世士，亦吾里人，事熙陵为学士，熙陵称其独步天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207261_comment'></div>尝以直谏斥，久不召，召且大用，复谏不悔，卒复斥，竟不大用，死黄州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207261_comment'></div>黄州于一时流辈少许可，独畏公，尚以为不可及也，则公之为人可知已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207261_comment'></div>补之既以《触鳞集》归大方，大方再拜，求为集序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207261_comment'></div>补之以言为戒久，虽诺其请，未作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207261_comment'></div>而大方踰年踵门请不衰，至载石户外，因甥张宗奭以言，幸有间必书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207261_comment'></div>补之平生戏笑为文字且不吝，固吝于吾里中贤士长者，以孤大方好善追远踰年之诚心，岂先君所以教哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207261_comment'></div>故不辞而终序之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207261_comment'></div>公讳肃，字穆之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207261_comment'></div>自御史为尚书郎，知蔡州，耻言不用，未四十解绂而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207261_comment'></div>其世家、行事本末与诸子茂良，具于前进士许齐所为公墓表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207261_comment'></div>齐亦文学知名，不妄推与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207261_comment'></div>凡齐所录，不复论，论其立身许国之大节，以遗大方，俾刻石藏诸家，以为吾里后生不及见若人，传闻而慕者之劝云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1207261_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李浩字季良甫序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207322")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207322'>进士陇西李浩，资俊异，少孤，自封植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207322_comment'></div>为人刚静，气迈往不群，治《春秋》、《礼记》说，知孟轲、扬雄所传为正道而遵之，譬渠黄、山子，羁坚辔，附夷路，骎骎乎无万里矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207322_comment'></div>其文辞盖窥战国而下，其志将游历屈、宋，差池汉、唐氏之间未已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207322_comment'></div>虽然，与人俱践一涂，而人自以其名歧与为燕宋，反共憎笑之，屡穷困不化也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207322_comment'></div>而颍川晁补之独异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207322_comment'></div>浩少于补之，未尝共学也，而索其中盖异焉者寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207322_comment'></div>既与之交矣，乃缘名为义，而以季良父字之，曰：昔崔浩自以为张良，而世亦莫之与也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207322_comment'></div>乃吾季良父，岂为浩者而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207322_comment'></div>虽然，楚汉之斗，南北之分裂，两人者皆如妇人女子，而皆魁雄闳伟，智谋若神，万举而万全，故刘氏以取天下，而拓跋氏以僭中原而称帝，亦类矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207322_comment'></div>至良功成不居，其定太子，庶几乎无事之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207322_comment'></div>而浩乃区区夸石铭，构忿以杀身，欲比良，何远哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207322_comment'></div>然则浩固长于方人，而暗于料己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207322_comment'></div>其言曰：「王猛之经国，苻坚之管仲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207322_comment'></div>慕容恪之辅少主，慕容炜之霍光也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207322_comment'></div>刘裕之平逆乱，司马德宗之曹操也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207322_comment'></div>夫猛固坚之管仲，何足以班管仲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207322_comment'></div>恪固炜之霍光，何足以任霍光？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207322_comment'></div>裕固德之曹操，何足以当曹操也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207322_comment'></div>其言信矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207322_comment'></div>至浩自恕以比良，而不歉其所不足，尚以谓己稽古过之，岂不误哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207322_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207322_comment'></div>使浩得汉高祖而事之，不足当陈平为如何，而又晚节矜名，惴惴乎不能全一身，何暇处人父子危疑之间，逍遥事济而身无患如此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207322_comment'></div>然则浩固拓跋氏之良，其以良自比，犹论猛也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207322_comment'></div>乃吾季良父识路而疾驱，则将蹈轲、雄之所传，而要其宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207322_comment'></div>使幸而遭时有用，敛其有馀于为浩者以保身，益其不足于为良者以居业，则虽在良伯仲叔季之间，其谁敢不与？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207322_comment'></div>使其不幸而不偶，充其志，犹足以独善，若原宪之藜藿，可贫而不可病，其与为伯仲叔季，将在孔子弟子之列，岂特不为浩，虽良亦可不为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207322_comment'></div>季良父勉之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1207322_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207323' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207323' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207323?labeling=true' target='_blank'>袁畴字耕道序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207323")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207323_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207323'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207323'>开封袁君名畴，字耕道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207323_comment'></div>畴自名，耕道其交字之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207323_comment'></div>《记》曰：「人情者，圣王之田也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207323_comment'></div>而《传》曰：「人情甚不美，妻子具而孝衰于亲，爵禄具而忠衰于君，名誉足而信衰于交」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207323_comment'></div>夫人情之可恶如此，年运而往，每具而辄衰，圣王何取于田哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207323_comment'></div>夫以尧之水，至于方割，怀山而襄陵，非禹则土皆不粒也，然谓土实不粒，则不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207323_comment'></div>以禹所堙之馀，龙蛇虎豹始驱，似不可人，而有稷焉，教民以艺之，则粒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207323_comment'></div>山泽原衍，地有刚卤肥确不同，而斲耜揉耒，火耕而水耨，农无不可为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207323_comment'></div>人情亦有贤不肖，邪正异趣，而追琢学问，求其放心，圣王亦无不可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207323_comment'></div>盖不为不治，则如尧方割未乂之初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207323_comment'></div>为而治之，则如稷播殖之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207323_comment'></div>是乃圣王之所以取乎此者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207323_comment'></div>人情无礼则荒，故修礼，所以耕之，此学之始也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207323_comment'></div>义欲列蔽度宜，譬谷有九种，视地力，故陈义所以种之，学欲闲邪存诚，譬恶莠，恐其乱苗，故讲学所以耨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207323_comment'></div>君子仁以居体，仁譬则积而充也，故本仁所以聚之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207323_comment'></div>乐以治心，乐譬则饱而嬉也，故播乐所以安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207323_comment'></div>礼、义、仁、乐四者，人情之田具而学其中，耨欲数数者然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207323_comment'></div>此《记》之说圣王之所以田人情者，尽矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207323_comment'></div>扬子曰：「耕道而得道，猎德而得德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207323_comment'></div>夫耕道而不得道，安取于耕道？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207323_comment'></div>故君子以谓治国不以礼，犹无耜而耕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207323_comment'></div>至于安之以乐，而不达之以顺，犹食而弗肥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207323_comment'></div>此学之终也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207323_comment'></div>然则耕道其务始于礼乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207323_comment'></div>非忠信不可以学礼，非彊有力不可以行礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207323_comment'></div>譬农必朴，忠信之类也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207323_comment'></div>必勤苦，彊有力之类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207323_comment'></div>壤土之民怠，恃其地之良而弗彊也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207323_comment'></div>瘠土之民劳，忧其田之下而自力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207323_comment'></div>故瘠之获常倍于壤，而田父之尤其子，以得壤为不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207323_comment'></div>乃若耕道才良而志修，又博之以文，地与力皆美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207323_comment'></div>耕道既识此而疾驱，田己之田而食己之力，岁晚而功休，既饱而嬉，倚户以永歌，不已乐哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207323_comment'></div>而世方有舍其田而芸人之田者，亦晨夜不暇息，霜雪皲瘃，触隆曦而汗，得不偿勤，至于终年号寒而啼饥，所求于田者外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207323_comment'></div>耕道反之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207323_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「自今以始，岁其有君子，有谷诒孙子，于胥乐兮<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207323_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1207323'>交：济本、《苏门六君子文粹》作「友」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207323_comment'></div>按作「交」是，参校记〔三〕。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1207323_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207323'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_34_1207323_1'>⑴ 《鸡肋集》卷三五。又见《苏门六君子文粹》卷七○。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1207323_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1207255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送李文老序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207255")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207255'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207255'>皋陶为理，或曰其后有食木子得全于伊侯之墟者，氏转而为李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207255_comment'></div>皋陶事帝，其言为谟，非如后世刀笔吏，舍曰徽纆榜箠，则无以伸其喙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207255_comment'></div>指李为姓者，按唐宗室世系，亦皋陶后，其《五千言》与《易》合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207255_comment'></div>下至斯，事荀卿，言秦逐客非是，书异甚，小篆有益古训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207255_comment'></div>汉广与陵显，膺、固汉末有盛名，言辞抑末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207255_comment'></div>唐白、贺为歌诗奇怪，翱又通儒，学韩愈，非文士伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207255_comment'></div>然其姓蕃天下，由晋魏而来，王侯将相有大功业者尤众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207255_comment'></div>以其显也，夫人而能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207255_comment'></div>而济阴之李，亦唐来宗室后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207255_comment'></div>始余未冠，则与文老之诸父游，今舍人公、大夫公，里中贤兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207255_comment'></div>文老学问言辞有家法，非如场屋馀子，惟其所以应有司者是知，乃古学过焉而不视，愧皋陶之意者比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207255_comment'></div>自余卜缗居，凡幼与游，白首不改者十一二，且其术不利人，人所戒也，而文老独数过之，不惟不戒，又悦焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207255_comment'></div>余意文老年少气豪，轻外累，殆意同则悦，不知其他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207255_comment'></div>不然，以其诸父厚余，故文老亦慕余，其可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207255_comment'></div>抑余尝以谓，大朴必为器博，长才则数化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207255_comment'></div>譬璧盈尺，以作镇冒琥璜无不可，而工目之当琢佩珥十数，然必不毁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207255_comment'></div>千章之木，可栋可极，而匠谓之此足为枅欂百，然必不断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207255_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207255_comment'></div>知其质之弃于狭小可惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207255_comment'></div>而物有反此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207255_comment'></div>侏儒与人肩随，跂而跳，适及人肘，歉其庳也，则宁去之异涂布武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207255_comment'></div>鸢尽其力从禽，不及隼，怅其远也，则背而翔，饥坐待鼠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207255_comment'></div>非以其力不足，故画也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207255_comment'></div>然则人徒见文老以其应有司者躐先同学，取首送，抑文老自期不在佩珥、枅欂之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207255_comment'></div>盖世有贷子钱贾，为人取赢而己分少者，此拙于市，盖所谓非有府库，财非其财者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207255_comment'></div>文老其益务博学于文，如药肆，平时储百物，凡神农所名可用以活人者，阙一不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207255_comment'></div>使夫一日来市者，求玉泉、五芝、丹砂、空青，此亦在，求羊藿、豕苓、败龟、枯螾，此亦在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207255_comment'></div>要人之市我者可一二数，我之应人者如山薮不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207255_comment'></div>夫岂但躐先同学、取首送，如是而已哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207255_comment'></div>盖孟子论一乡之善士与天下之善士，其所成就者异，由其学有小大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207255_comment'></div>文老勉之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1207255_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207256' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207256' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207256?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送医李寅序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207256")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207256_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207256'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207256'>余应举时，见王荆公书一事云：妙应大师智缘诊父之脉，知其子祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207256_comment'></div>翰林王丞旨禹玉疑古无有，缘曰：「秦医和诊晋侯之脉，而知其良臣将死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207256_comment'></div>良臣之命，乃见于晋侯之脉，诊父知子，又何足怪乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207256_comment'></div>余闻其语三十七年，而未见其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207256_comment'></div>晚遇李君景阳于缗，景阳儒服而来，以医自名，能读黄帝歧伯金匮玉函之书，剖析其精义，如指诸掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207256_comment'></div>又旁出入月令、阴阳诸书，论物之方生方死，或损而益，或益而损，见微而知著，观表而得里，衮衮不可穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207256_comment'></div>余听而说之，味其言，盖有妙应之术而不自名，曰：「吾业不在是也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207256_comment'></div>昔唐韩愈铭宪宗时侍御史李虚中深于五行书，以人之始生年月日、所直日辰支干、相生胜衰死相王，斟酌推人寿夭贵贱，百不失一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207256_comment'></div>其说汪洋奥义，关节开解，星官历翁莫能与之较得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207256_comment'></div>虚中之术，盖至今犹传也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207256_comment'></div>夫播五行于四时，见于经，若有机焉，万物皆出入于此而不可逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207256_comment'></div>以其溥博而加物兼得之者，擿抉而言，犹足以知人祸福如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207256_comment'></div>今脉吾之臂，以吾腹中之五行，犹之日辰支干，亦相生胜衰死相王，又参两之，以窍藏之，变动在尺寸关部间，顾第弗深考，睨而视之，何为而不可以知吾之失得吉凶，如虚中之索于外哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207256_comment'></div>以是知景阳犹藏其学而未言也，滋可贤已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207256_comment'></div>景阳名寅，齐人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1207256_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答姚邦光秀才书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207164")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207164'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207164'>补之再拜：前日不鄙，盛服踵门，并示长书，甚善，欣怿无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207164_comment'></div>然推与非所，当增愧惧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207164_comment'></div>补之平生所患，声问过情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207164_comment'></div>伏西野来，滋厌人事，至不欲以足蹈城郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207164_comment'></div>将老，学问不日新，惟农圃之事乃益知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207164_comment'></div>今足下书词，不以是为问，而以孔子之辞孺悲，见互乡，或拒或受，意各有在者先之焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207164_comment'></div>此施于补之为不当，于足下之比事为不类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207164_comment'></div>虽意若与之商略可否，然所以望于农圃老人者过矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207164_comment'></div>伏读再过，茫然增愧赧，足下固有惑志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207164_comment'></div>昔杜温夫亦尝引孔子为说抵柳宗元，其与足下小异者，直以宗元在此位，宗元逡巡不敢答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207164_comment'></div>观足下词旨，有求益之意，非若温夫茫洋不知类者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207164_comment'></div>宗元固自奇大，犹不敢以是答温夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207164_comment'></div>补之虽文字愧宗元，然不为宗元者，其敢以不升孔子之堂而受孔子室中之馈哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207164_comment'></div>故累日不报，冀足下之知其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207164_comment'></div>足下先君博学于文，以操行称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207164_comment'></div>足下闻诗闻礼，与所以择乡就士，不顺乎非者具在，归而求之，亦不乏师矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207164_comment'></div>如补之自视，汉以来守一经，士有所师传，本末不变者，庶几为近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207164_comment'></div>平居语所厚，惟不至若陈相说许行，尽弃其学而学焉者，斯可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207164_comment'></div>老且不试，秪欲为陶渊明忘怀屏事，出悔吝之外犹恐不近，顾何以充足下望，越论孔子之诲人接物，以欺己而无耻，害足下切磋之意哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207164_comment'></div>然始闻乡人言，足下业通而行修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207164_comment'></div>既见足下，色温而意诚，知足下可进于此道，不但为时文，取科第，常情自喜，以谓志愿毕此者比也，故终愿交焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207164_comment'></div>足下亦彊学无堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207164_comment'></div>补之老矣，尚复睹吾里有足下能似其先人文学好善、干禄不回、如此其美者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207164_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「我思古人，实获我心」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207164_comment'></div>足下亦谅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207164_comment'></div>补之再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1207164_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207659' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207659' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207659?labeling=true' target='_blank'>东皋子宴坐内诵文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207659")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207659_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207659'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207659'>平居宴坐，闭目收虑，恒作是语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207659_comment'></div>汝身今者，非男非女，非孙非祖，无古无今，无来无去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207659_comment'></div>清净本然，妄生国土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207659_comment'></div>被尘染识，根乃结聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207659_comment'></div>久不可洗，如衣受渍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207659_comment'></div>妄有形骸，妄有名字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207659_comment'></div>是张是李，是男是女，汝既非此，此亦非汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207659_comment'></div>譬如蚝相，被石黏住，认石为我，千劫受苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207659_comment'></div>是义不然，吾有一喻：譬吾如空，被丁钉去住。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207659_comment'></div>是空非物，钉无著处，便得脱然，离我我所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207659_comment'></div>正恁么时，揩眼看取，一念相应，是涅槃路。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1207659_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196661' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196661' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196661?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梁州令叠韵/梁州令</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196661")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196661_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196661'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196661'>田野闲来惯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196661'>睡起初惊晓燕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196661'>樵青走挂小帘钩，南园昨夜，细雨红芳遍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196661'>平芜一带烟光浅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196661'>过尽南归雁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196661'>江云渭树俱远。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196661'>凭阑送目空肠断。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196661'>好景难常占。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196661'>过眼韶华如箭。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196661'>莫教鶗鴂送韶华，多情杨柳，为把长条绊。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196661'>清尊满酌谁为伴。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196661'>花下提壶劝。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196661'>何妨醉卧花底，愁容不上春风面。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_196661_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196690' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196690' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196690?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虞美人 羊山饯杜侍郎郡君十二姑及外弟天逵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196690")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196690_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196690'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196690'>原桑飞尽霜空杳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196690'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_196690", 196690, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>霜夜</span>愁难晓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196690'>油灯野店怯黄昏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196690'>穷途不减酒杯深。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196690'>故人心。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196690_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196690'>羊山故道行人少。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196690'>也送行人老。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196690'>一般别语重千金。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196690'>明年过我小园林。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196690_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196690'>话如今。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196690_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196669' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196669' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196669?labeling=true' target='_blank'>菩萨蛮 永嘉郡君生日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1109年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196669")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196669_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196669'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196669'>百花含蓓东风里。南园小雨朱扉启。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196669'>春色一年年。年年花共妍。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196669_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196669'>清谈招隐去。莫认如宾处。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196669'>华发好风光。林间此味长。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196669_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196669'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196669_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e4865850503343788fcb47be99d0692e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e4865850503343788fcb47be99d0692e");'><span id='e4865850503343788fcb47be99d0692e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>，58岁</div><div id='e4865850503343788fcb47be99d0692e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年4月1日</a>　晁补之以出党籍故，诣吏部候调，得起知达州。作品：《学说》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷二七。此条地点不详。）</span><div id='poem_1207312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>学说</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年4月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207312")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207312'>学不可已，惟知之，然后能好之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207312_comment'></div>《记》曰：「虽有嘉肴，弗食，不知其旨也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207312_comment'></div>虽有至道，弗学，不知其善也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207312_comment'></div>而孟子亦曰：「理义之悦我心，犹刍豢之悦我口」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207312_comment'></div>盖饮食旦旦之所须，故譬学于饮食，为最易知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207312_comment'></div>然犹曰：「人莫不饮食，鲜能知味也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207312_comment'></div>天下岂有不习而能察者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207312_comment'></div>昔野人有甘葈茎、芹萍子者，对乡豪称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207312_comment'></div>取而尝焉，蜇口而惨腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207312_comment'></div>夫口腹，人所同也，而野人至甘人之所不甘，此非未尝知甘所谓甘者，而以夫己甘谓人甘者止此哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207312_comment'></div>至于百工众技，皆学也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207312_comment'></div>下至跳剑弄丸、缘竿踏索，既为之，终身不得已，非特利所在也，习而知其味，故乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207312_comment'></div>若乃对君子称之，则如野人之甘葈茎、芹萍子，其于不足味也，不特惨蜇而后方知之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207312_comment'></div>故嘉肴，世皆知其旨，必食者而后益知其为旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207312_comment'></div>至道，世皆知其善，必学者而后益知其为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207312_comment'></div>曰闻而知其旨且善者，意之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207312_comment'></div>或曰：道之出口，淡乎其无味，而饮食，人所甘，似不类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207312_comment'></div>夫以人之所甘者，弗食犹不知其旨，而道又淡而难好，则不知者不其愈多乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207312_comment'></div>然终犹是也，病弗学耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207312_comment'></div>学而入之，安知其淡乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207312_comment'></div>大观四年四月旦日，书付侄公秉，俾以语诸小道云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207312_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='08e6a6176626408e9d046ccbd680fed8_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("08e6a6176626408e9d046ccbd680fed8");'><span id='08e6a6176626408e9d046ccbd680fed8_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>，58岁</div><div id='08e6a6176626408e9d046ccbd680fed8' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1110&endYear=1110')">1110年</a>　晁补之家居金乡，提举南京鸿庆宫。作品：《宋尚书刑部郎中知越州军州事赠特进吏部尚书南安晁公改葬记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三0。）</span><div id='poem_1207629' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207629' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207629?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋尚书刑部郎中知越州军州事赠特进吏部尚书南安晁公改葬记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1110年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207629")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207629_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207629'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207629'>赠特进、吏部尚书晁公以庆历四年九月己酉既葬于祥符大墓矣，后六十六年，实大观四年三月壬寅，改窆于任城鱼山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207629_comment'></div>先是，祥符地卑多水患，自特进公五子，伯库部公而下，杂然以为虑，而叔虞部公尤患之，议迁不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207629_comment'></div>至是，特进公子皆前没，而虞部公之子泰宁军节度推官、前知莘县事端礼，朝散郎、前通判徐州事端智相与议，必成其先志，以告群从诸孙，及库部公之孙补之等曰：「祥符水患，诸子之责犹诸孙之责也，且特进公之子库部公而下皆葬鱼山，迁鱼山宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207629_comment'></div>抑族坟墓以安神，则从以烝尝合食则类又宜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207629_comment'></div>众曰：「唯」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207629_comment'></div>于时诸孙存者，莘县为长，莘县乃走京师，告特进公墓，并举河间县太君刘氏之柩，护奉以归，启窆易椁，改禭惟美，凡资用，皆莘县力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207629_comment'></div>初，补之居蓬莱县太君丧，始学地理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207629_comment'></div>行视鱼山崦中，若虎若牛，回抱踞盼，势盘薄可喜，乃厚其贾取之，手植四松定南北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207629_comment'></div>既，命师袁才筮地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207629_comment'></div>袁徙其域，稍东才五尺而止，前卜丙室，迁库部公与夫人之柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207629_comment'></div>至是，以特进公、刘夫人宅丙室，而将以壬、甲二室迁库部公与补之考朝议公，以从特进公兆焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207629_comment'></div>既即事，又属补之记本末，而特进公氏讳爵里行事之实，已载端明殿学士李淑所撰志铭中，不复书，独记改卜，及所告祭文，并纳圹中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207629_comment'></div>若库部公诸弟子孙婚宦，则各具于铭志，皆不复出云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207629_comment'></div>曾孙朝散大夫、管勾南京鸿庆宫、飞骑尉、赐绯鱼袋补之谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1207629_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之监信州盐酒税。作品：《游信州南岩》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_196482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196482' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196482?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游信州南岩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196482")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196482_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196482'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196482'>南岩夫何为，山作天倚盖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196482'>山南豁山腹，飞顶覆其外。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196482'>初如鹏将翔，膺击群麓背。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196482'>乍似海大鱼，呀口噞而嘬。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196482'>当空横广额，架屋喉舌内。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196482'>仰窥骇凭凌，俯进愁压坠。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196482'>尝聆释氏说，仰覆各世界。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196482'>千间未可著，五亩良不隘。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196482'>清泠气射人，热恼从此溃。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196482'>崖奔木疏瘦，谷远鸟幽怪。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196482'>问僧何年居，投老四五辈。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196482'>问客何人来，官满或一再。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196482'>而予与二子，高兴偶相戒。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196482'>松舟下清江，毛发数虾蟹。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196482'>篮舆上峻岭，幢节望杉桧。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196482'>李侯勋门胄，文采山作绘。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196482'>赵君儒林孙，嫭美兰结佩。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196482'>不为城郭游，继月此于迈。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196482'>宁知老逾拙，意在精赏退。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196482'>得居溪南山，食饮与山对。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196482'>夔魈入奥穾，云雨出巾襘。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196482'>古人戒贱目，惯睹谁复贵。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196482'>顾此诚未逢，欣然与心会。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196482'>彭湖两崖蹙，泉作一线霈。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196482'>禅月古台空，灵山自明晦。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196482'>搜奇获三胜，趣懒同一慨。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196482'>但忧久聱牙，尚喜无蒂芥。<div id='poem_sentence_26_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_196482'>平生所驱使，诗酒俱好在。<div id='poem_sentence_27_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_196482'>天涯得吾侣，物外从所快。<div id='poem_sentence_28_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_196482'>便欲登赤城，一观天宇大。<div id='poem_sentence_29_196482_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_196482'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_196482_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，闰九月抵达信州任所。作品：《秋夜古风》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一0。）</span><div id='poem_196433' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196433' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196433?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秋夜古风</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196433")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196433_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196433'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196433'>瑶池始波县圃风，邓林飞叶云搅空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196433'>人间栎社几黄落，晓窗洗黛悲青铜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196433'>常嗟彭祖悔杖晚，不见王母桃花红。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196433'>安知帝怒削龙伯，舆峤已没归墟中。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196433'>楚人方复感时节，申旦不寐同秋虫。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196433'>虚堂气入枕簟肃，熟寐不复闻嗈嗈。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196433'>大言身塞不得仰，了语无异鸿毛烘。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196433'>天如旋磨人蚁却，更千万日劳何功。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196433'>汉南种柳人笑尔，江潭悽怆彫形容。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196433'>小楼遐观午夜阒，凉月不尽山无穷。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196433'>一身逆旅过万物，千古昨梦如惊蓬。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196433'>胡床收虑暂一息，杲杲已上扶桑东。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196433_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196391'>山阿若有人含睇，跂望不到霜烟昏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196391'>东西野寺通两径，上下竹篱开一园。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196391'>落身曲糵盆盎里，晨坐对花无酒温。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196391_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196390'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196390'>幽闲合出昭君村，芳洁恐是三闾魂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196390_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196125")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196125_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196125'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196125'>使君心赏在高山，栎社宁烦匠石看。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196125'>能似鼠多愁渡谷，仕如鲇钝笑缘竿<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：见《归田录》。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196125'>威仪披雾窥文豹，音韵当衢听玉鸾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196125'>曾共广陵花下醉，绨袍应叹一何寒。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196125'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196125_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵嘉父喜雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196172")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196172'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196172'>六出先春兆物华，故撩高韵发车斜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196172'>散榆天上齐飞筴，布玉畦中尽吐芽。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196172'>梁苑俊游风不极，剡溪清泛月无涯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196172'>雄豪乐事幽人咏，都属江南太守家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196172'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196172_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196166' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196166' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196166?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵信倅练定梦雪中过王侍郎</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196166")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196166'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196166'>梦觅毗耶看雨华，玉城银涧过萦斜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196166'>乍疑雾廓千峰障，未觉雷惊万谷芽。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196166'>碧落清谈元物外<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：上贰卿。）</span>，金闺高兴共天涯<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：上贰车。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196166'>寒鸡唤起新诗就，谁忆袁安正卧家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196166_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196166'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196166_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，47岁</div><div id='9f22ad43c1cf4d8e865320159f0c69fc' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之监信州盐酒税。作品：《山坡陁辞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三。此条地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_196247' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196247' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196247?labeling=true' target='_blank'>山坡陀辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196247")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196247_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196247'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196247'>山坡陀兮下属江，势崖绝兮涛波所荡如颓墙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196247'>松郁律兮其高百尺，旁枝虬骛葛蔂之。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196247'>仰不见日兮下可依，吾曳杖兮吾僮以吾之书随。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196247'>邈余望兮水中坻，颀然而长者黄冠兮羽衣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196247'>轩颐坦腹涛石箕坐兮，石亦有趾安不危，四无人兮可忘饥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196247'>仙人偓佺兮自言其居瑶之圃，一日一夕兮飞相往来不可数。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196247'>使其开口而言兮，岂惟河汉无极惊余心。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196247'>默不言兮，蹇昭氏之不鼓琴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196247'>憺将翔兮山海，与日月兮常在。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196247'>若有闻兮梦中仇池我归路，此非小有兮噫乎何以乐此而不去。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196247'>昔余游于葛天氏兮，身非陶氏犹与偕乘。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196247'>渺莽良未可兮，仆夫悲余马怀。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196247'>聊逍遥兮容与，晞余发兮兰之渚。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196247'>余论世兮千载一人犹并时，歧又有歧兮余行诘曲欲知余者希。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196247'>峨峨洋洋余方乐兮，譬余击舟于水。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196247'>鱼沉鸟扬亦不知，何必每念辄得应余若响，坐有如此兮人子期。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_196247_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196247'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷三。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_196247_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年9月</a>　晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，闰九月抵达信州任所。作品：《信州谢到任表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1207137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207137?labeling=true' target='_blank'>信州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207137")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207137_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207137'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207137'>臣补之言：先奉敕落秘阁校理，添差监处州盐酒税，寻丁母忧，服阕，奉敕添差监信州盐酒税，已于闰九月十二日到任管句讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207137_comment'></div>初免亲丧，再尘仕缀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207137_comment'></div>尝干国典，复以罪行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207137_comment'></div>夙涉江湖，祗临物局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207137_comment'></div>戴深仁而自幸，俯馀息以知危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207137_comment'></div>臣补之顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207137_comment'></div>伏念臣家世衰微，人材驽下，少不天而孤露，畏无类以僻违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207137_comment'></div>滥先朝经术之科，玷陛下文馆之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207137_comment'></div>至于积累资任，忝冒麾符，虽区区揣己分量之馀，实碌碌同时流辈之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207137_comment'></div>内则询事考言而蔑秋毫之献，外亦承流宣化而乏肤寸之闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207137_comment'></div>岂惟有悔之莫追，自以无功而应汰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207137_comment'></div>含容渥厚，昧懵颠隮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207137_comment'></div>咸股往以得嫌，旅巢焚而谁咎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207137_comment'></div>神理交谴，家祸并婴，吊影内惭，扪心外慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207137_comment'></div>当灭亡于苫块，尚收录于簪裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207137_comment'></div>又窃便安，惟深感涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207137_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇皇帝陛下道隆前烈，泽浸万方，皇穹降康，休应屡至，故简弗率，亦敷在宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207137_comment'></div>为鸟及鱼，不出天渊之内；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207137_comment'></div>息黥与劓，尚容炉锤之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207137_comment'></div>臣敢不省己愆尤，誓心忠义？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207137_comment'></div>哀荒未复，怀色养以终天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207137_comment'></div>罪垢难湔，报明恩而无日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1207137_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207137'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五五。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二八。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207137_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c3f6956e45e34bde9bb9504165d35c79_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("c3f6956e45e34bde9bb9504165d35c79");'><span id='c3f6956e45e34bde9bb9504165d35c79_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，47岁</div><div id='c3f6956e45e34bde9bb9504165d35c79' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年9月</a>　晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，闰九月抵达信州任所。作品：《进士清河张君墓志铭并序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六八。）</span><div id='poem_1207711' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207711' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207711?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进士清河张君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　元符二年九月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207711")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207711_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207711'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207711'>君张氏，讳鼎，字正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207711_comment'></div>张氏得姓远，周宣王时有张仲，春秋时有张老，两人最显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207711_comment'></div>其后杜陵人张汤，以法律取汉三公，传子安世，至纯，凡七世侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207711_comment'></div>盖班固尝言，冯商称汤与留侯同祖，而司马迁不言，又怪汉兴以来侯者百数，而未有如富平久者，意汤虽酷烈，以其推贤故有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207711_comment'></div>而余尝窃以谓：留侯岂特其才智汉无双，而辅汉救民于亡秦虎狼涂炭之中，生息二百馀年，事成乃翛然推而不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207711_comment'></div>本其处心，使世果有辟谷不死之说非妄者，如良乃当得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207711_comment'></div>而良死，仅传子不疑即绝，此不可知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207711_comment'></div>及得商所称，然后乃知汤之忮刻，虽其达贤，恐不足相补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207711_comment'></div>而富平之所以久，殆良祖以来，君子长者之风故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207711_comment'></div>迄今虽分裂微晦，然张姓遍天下，亦盛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207711_comment'></div>而君之先盖郓州须城人，自五代之乱，累世隐居，以孝称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207711_comment'></div>逮君曾祖，始徙济州钜野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207711_comment'></div>而讳宗孺者，君考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207711_comment'></div>富而好施，以壅培其子读书为士，君用勉砺有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207711_comment'></div>初，泰山孙复家居传经，声闻山东，其一时贵人贤士争师之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207711_comment'></div>后仁宗召复居太学，而君往执弟子礼，因尽得与其门人高第游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207711_comment'></div>受复《春秋》尊王说，然犹以取科名慰亲意为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207711_comment'></div>而于时翰林郑公獬、滕公甫，场屋声藉甚，亦与君厚，乃以诗赋举进士，不中第，治其业益勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207711_comment'></div>会其父病，就养者累年，因叹曰：「士遇合有命，若可以力挽取，非命也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207711_comment'></div>遂不复措意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207711_comment'></div>寻遭父丧，茹蔬摧瘠，自是益外名誉、略威仪，乡人之贤不肖、善恶皆与之齿，穷阎寒家，庆吊必在，虽涂潦不乘，曰「无以见里之老人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207711_comment'></div>家故饶于财，而奉养薄，不以饶故欲可侈，而易其所闻于儒者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207711_comment'></div>至赒人之急，则竭其力恐不逮，故食客常满堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207711_comment'></div>尝买田三百亩，以待宗党之贫无归者，使葬且养焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207711_comment'></div>岁凶，出粟数百斛食流殍，所活以千计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207711_comment'></div>为人宽厚坦夷，喜读书，乐善而好信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207711_comment'></div>乡人有争者至，就平曲直，劝譬而去，无不满意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207711_comment'></div>此其身既不偶而退行之家一二之大概也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207711_comment'></div>母房氏，有淑行，老疾危甚，君夜祷于庭，即梦得期三年，后如期亡，人以为孝诚所感云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207711_comment'></div>娶许氏，继孙氏，皆善其内事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207711_comment'></div>子一人仲原，尝以进士举礼部，讲肄有闻，工为诗，温恭乐义，致客之多，如其先人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207711_comment'></div>五女，嫁房经、薄演、高脩、房之才、程献夫，皆同郡良士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207711_comment'></div>而经以明经，献夫以进士，俱尝预计偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207711_comment'></div>诸孙男女八人：男绅、询、绩、纲、绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207711_comment'></div>女长适进士翟光弼，馀二幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207711_comment'></div>以元祐六年六月甲辰卒，年六十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207711_comment'></div>初，君考以上，皆葬钜野之比干村，而地多水，君疾且革，语仲原曰：「欲为先人改卜，今不能，以为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207711_comment'></div>汝无忘吾志，则是吾不没也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207711_comment'></div>仲原泣曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207711_comment'></div>既而卜任城县之谏议乡吕村，吉，乃迁其先柩及君与两夫人之丧祔焉，实元符二年九月某日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207711_comment'></div>仲原与余儿曹俱学相好，求铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207711_comment'></div>昔马少游常哀其兄援「慷慨有大志」，以谓士生一世，取衣食裁足，乘下泽车，御款段马，使乡里称善人，斯可矣，致求盈馀，且自苦尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207711_comment'></div>而援后遭光武，立功万里之外，光于竹帛，亦可以无憾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207711_comment'></div>而当其卧浪泊时，至念少游平生语，若不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207711_comment'></div>方余年少，意援老惫志易，不然何愧于少游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207711_comment'></div>后余宦学四方，无所成就，既未有援毫发可以厌足，加齿未若援老也，而已非元龙上床之意，从许君问舍之事，不自知与前日之虑易，然后益知少游达识，果足以愧援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1207711_comment'></div>而君亦优游耆艾，无慕于世，当《易》一爻，不出户庭无咎者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1207711_comment'></div>以是铭君，其谁曰不然！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1207711_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1207711'>士生委质功业林，匪学问意皆侈心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1207711_comment'></div>使成炟赫固莫任，况事与志常岖嵚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1207711_comment'></div>尾闾其损得蹄涔，一羽之徇捐千金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1207711_comment'></div>少犹颖脱中悔侵，念平生语安可寻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1207711_comment'></div>但自恶影忘息阴，有良里士裂冠襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1207711_comment'></div>不与一世驱骎骎，高明之室有物临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1207711_comment'></div>取裁足尔吾良箴，瓶轠于瓽惟久淫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1207711_comment'></div>澹泊可守宁适今，畏名勿取神所歆，后枝叶茂由根深。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1207711_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='83a47eacf7e5456dbc2e2b3a642e8eef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("83a47eacf7e5456dbc2e2b3a642e8eef");'><span id='83a47eacf7e5456dbc2e2b3a642e8eef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a id='poem_sentence_1_196153'>得地且从三月暖，明年应更十分开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196153'>溱傍芍药羞香骨，江里芙蓉妒艳腮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196153'>云雨鸿龙总非比，沉香亭北漫相猜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196153'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196153_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196154?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196154_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196154'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196154'>笑倚东风几百般，忽疑洛渚在江干。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196154'>玉容可得朝朝好，金盏须教一一乾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196154'>送目汉皋行已失，断魂巫峡梦将残。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196154'>七闽溪畔防偷本，四照亭边更著栏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196154'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196154_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196146?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵李秬约赏牡丹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196146'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196146'>常誇西洛青屏簇，久说南滁紫线<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>堆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196146'>任是无情还有意，不知千里为谁来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196146'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196146_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196146'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_196146_0'>⑴ 《石仓历代诗选》作锦</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_196146_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_196145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_content_196145'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196145'>寒食春光欲尽头，谁抛两两路傍毬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196145'>二乔新获吴宫怯，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_196145", 196145, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>双隗</span>初临晋帐羞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196145'>月底故应相伴语，风前各是一般愁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196145'>使君腹有诗千首，为尔情如篆印缪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196145_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196145'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196145_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196151?labeling=true'
