"poem_title_196151")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196151'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196151'>天香国色竞新奇，初过清明未觉稀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196151'>困舞尚迎风袅袅，醉妆犹弄日晖晖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196151'>飘零洛下千金价，惭愧江南百草菲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196151'>谢守多才最怜尔，百篇能伴羽觞飞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196151'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196151_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196155' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196155' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196155?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵李秬酴醾</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196155")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196155_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196155'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196155'>夭红琐碎竞春娇，后出何妨便夺标。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196155'>云鹤嬉晴来万只，玉龙惊震上千条。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196155'>蓐收晃荡风前仗，萼绿飘翩月下绡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196155'>曾向琼林亭畔见，天涯相遇一魂销。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196155'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196155_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196016' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196016?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和答曾敬之秘书见招能赋堂烹茶二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196016")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196016_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196016'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196016'>玉泉吟鼎月隳轮，姑射风标两绝尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196016_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196016'>只欠何郎窗畔雪，戎葵为我作馀春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196016_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196016'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196016_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196017' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196017' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196017?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196017_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196017'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196017'>一碗分来百越春，玉溪小暑却宜人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196017'>红尘它日同回首，能赋堂中偶坐身。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196017'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196017_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='afee8efbbe0542308e51f91600e8a6d0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("afee8efbbe0542308e51f91600e8a6d0");'><span id='afee8efbbe0542308e51f91600e8a6d0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，48岁</div><div id='afee8efbbe0542308e51f91600e8a6d0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　徽宗即位，晁补之迁签书武宁军判官，赐绯衣银鱼，寻复通判河中府。作品：《跋李遵易画鱼图》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span>《跋廖明略能赋堂记后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span>《题分甘亭记后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span><div id='poem_1207295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋李遵易画鱼图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年3月6日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207295")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207295'>鱼之丑，以千百数，且一物而极巨细之形者惟鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207295_comment'></div>天池之鲲，其大不知其几千里，毫素之窘，不能追也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207295_comment'></div>长塘之水一斛而鱼半斛，其小如针锋，毫素可追，不能工也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207295_comment'></div>则夫可追而工者，不过于九泽之所同有，九罭之所常萃，鲿、鲤、鳟、鲂，颁首莘尾之间，盖见者能识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207295_comment'></div>然世犹以谓画师喜为鬼神，而惮为狗马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207295_comment'></div>鬼神怪幻，易以罔人，而狗马与鲿鳟所常睹者，夫人而能指其失，故工此尤难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207295_comment'></div>是不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207295_comment'></div>夫鲲以海运，而针锋若灭没，世固无睹鲲首尾之目、针锋鳞之眼，则欲穷巨细之倪，至此而能者俱废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207295_comment'></div>且凡鱼亦不一状，则画之难工，又非若狗马比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207295_comment'></div>然尝试遗物以观物，物常不能廋其状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207295_comment'></div>尽得一鱼之意，则铺几尺纸，曰此天池也，此长塘也，广狭不移而皆在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207295_comment'></div>一以为鲲，则稽天之涯睹，不见其不足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207295_comment'></div>一以为针锋，则蹄涔之态具，不见其有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207295_comment'></div>大小惟意而不在形，巧拙繄神而不以手，无不能者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207295_comment'></div>而遵易亦时隐几翛然，去智以观天机之动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207295_comment'></div>蚿以多足运，风以无形远，进乎技矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207295_comment'></div>庚辰三月六日晁补之题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1207295_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207290' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207290' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207290?labeling=true' target='_blank'>跋廖明略能赋堂记后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年4月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207290")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207290_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207290'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207290'>常物之情，不知其所以然，而自相反者二：列御寇曰：「今有偕生之疾，与体偕长：志彊而气弱，故足于谋而寡于断；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207290_comment'></div>志弱而气彊，故少于虑而伤于专」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207290_comment'></div>此志与气之所禀者有馀不足，不能相易，而自相反者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207290_comment'></div>王弼曰：「陵三军者，或惧于朝廷之仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207290_comment'></div>暴威武者，或困于酒色之娱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207290_comment'></div>此志与气皆有馀，而勇敢柔于礼文，悍鄙屈于嗜欲，物或移之，而自相反者二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207290_comment'></div>《语》曰：「望之俨然，即之也温，听其言也厉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207290_comment'></div>夫俨然而能温，温而能厉，此岂常物之情自相反而然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207290_comment'></div>将君子有以反之，能庄而能同者也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207290_comment'></div>盖余同年生廖明略，学问博古，志操如雪霜，然以方北郭顺子则清而未容，故骜世患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207290_comment'></div>尝观曾敬之会稽尉廨梅花，而以宋广平事，名其堂曰「能赋」，是其久摧刚为柔，意少贬而然者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207290_comment'></div>而余亦尝论广平严毅，所谓没向千载，凛凛犹有生气者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207290_comment'></div>至于人之所同为，不害其异，而鹿门子庸何怪乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207290_comment'></div>张良、崔浩，皆昔之所谓豪杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207290_comment'></div>良宜魁梧奇伟，而貌状乃如妇人女子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207290_comment'></div>浩若不胜衣者，而胸中所怀，踰于兵甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207290_comment'></div>夫形容趣好之相反，何足以识君子之大体也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207290_comment'></div>而敬之妙年，天材俊异，文章论议过人远甚，借曰未识于事，其大者固已先立矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207290_comment'></div>以广平之铁心石肠，而当其平居，自喜不废，为清便艳发之语；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207290_comment'></div>则如敬之之疏通知方，虽平居富为清便艳发之语，至于临事感愤，余知其亦不害为铁心石肠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207290_comment'></div>而明略所以期敬之，不亦远欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207290_comment'></div>然敬之不污以干时，乃若广平之开府与！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207290_comment'></div>不若广平之遇，则敬之固自曰「有命」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207290_comment'></div>元符三年四月二十五日，南阳晁补之题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207290_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题分甘亭记后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年5月10日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207280")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207280_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207280'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207280'>赵彦脩以帝胄，妙龄秀发，不怀宴安之习，志学而慕义，与一时文人胜士交，如恐不及，故蚤有美名于流辈间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207280_comment'></div>穷山物局，僧斋旅寓，一木之美，不足道也，而二三子为之记且书焉，文辞笔墨灿然可观，惟彦脩有以得此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207280_comment'></div>呜呼，学之不可已也如此哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207280_comment'></div>元符庚辰五月十日，南阳晁补之题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1207280_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a8c7184cf96b42f681c901df4a10c2ed_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a8c7184cf96b42f681c901df4a10c2ed");'><span id='a8c7184cf96b42f681c901df4a10c2ed_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，48岁</div><div id='a8c7184cf96b42f681c901df4a10c2ed' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>徽宗即位，晁补之迁签书武宁军判官，赐绯衣银鱼，寻复通判河中府。作品：《贺皇太后称尊表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span>《贺皇太后进奉表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span>《四月朔日蚀礼部请皇帝御正殿第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span>《四月朔日蚀礼部请皇帝御正殿第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五四。）</span><div id='poem_1207096' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207096' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207096?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺皇太后称尊表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207096")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207096_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207096'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207096'>位著徽称，居天下母仪之贵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207096_comment'></div>礼严备物，昭圣人子道之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207096_comment'></div>宫闱载祗，海县胥庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207096_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中贺。）</span>恭惟皇太后殿下懿恭性得，慈俭身先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207096_comment'></div>坤极正于内朝，阴教行于四国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207096_comment'></div>用膺光命，允答常尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207096_comment'></div>汉典具修，式虔长乐之养；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207096_comment'></div>周诗足继，大显《思齐》之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207096_comment'></div>臣伏限职事在外，不获躬诣阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207096_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1207096_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207099' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207099' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207099?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺皇太后进奉表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207099")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207099_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207099'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207099'>长乐称尊，册已光于备礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207099_comment'></div>庶工率职，享莫尚于多仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207099_comment'></div>辄罄菲诚，仰干聪听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207099_comment'></div>上件物中邦羡赋，外帑宿珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207099_comment'></div>载申守郡之虔，用佐充庭之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207099_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1207099_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207119' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207119?labeling=true' target='_blank'>四月朔日蚀礼部请皇帝御正殿第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207119")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207119_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207119'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207119'>臣某言：伏奉诏命，以四月一日日蚀，避正殿、减常膳者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207119_comment'></div>占辰弗集，驰走逮于啬夫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207119_comment'></div>肆宥惟时，鞭扑空于司寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207119_comment'></div>未即路朝之正，犹推玉食之供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207119_comment'></div>凡在臣工，莫遑宁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207119_comment'></div>窃以日符天统，当循黄道之常；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207119_comment'></div>君体乾刚，故谨正阳之畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207119_comment'></div>惟圣人观象以立戒，欲王者因事而自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207119_comment'></div>亦缘久动而必差，乃有频交而屡蚀<span class='inlineComment2'>（中叙。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207119_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下中正履位，清明在躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207119_comment'></div>孝承七庙之安，仁暨万邦之往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207119_comment'></div>官惟贤而士劝善，罚当罪而民禁非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207119_comment'></div>奉以无私，要本容光而必照；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207119_comment'></div>建其有极，盖用勿忧而宜中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207119_comment'></div>固念兹而在兹，宁弗畏而入畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207119_comment'></div>繄寅恭可谓至矣，则变异何从召之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207119_comment'></div>应以至诚，居然纯曜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207119_comment'></div>祥桑不拱，方知太戊之兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207119_comment'></div>雊雉何为，益见高宗之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207119_comment'></div>宜光临于黼扆，且时御于饔飧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207119_comment'></div>茂迎至和，允答群望。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207119_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207120?labeling=true' target='_blank'>四月朔日蚀礼部请皇帝御正殿第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207120")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207120'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207120'>徒倾葵藿之诚，敢期回照；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207120_comment'></div>未竭潢污之滴，尚或可羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207120_comment'></div>矧变异之已消，尤故常之当复<span class='inlineComment2'>（中叙。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207120_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下法禹罪己，继文小心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207120_comment'></div>惟五事之罔愆，于三光而何累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207120_comment'></div>爰以朔旦，自兴重云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207120_comment'></div>不用其行，史前占于必蚀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207120_comment'></div>增修于德，人莫睹其或亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207120_comment'></div>和足致祥，顺宜获助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207120_comment'></div>而犹谦尊自牧，震虩靡宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207120_comment'></div>虽天所以爱人君，常欲制于未乱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207120_comment'></div>而王所以奉天道，故当惧于无灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207120_comment'></div>然与其戒居处饮食之安，孰若扩视听猷为之善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207120_comment'></div>岂惟过也见而更也仰，是谓应以实而不以文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207120_comment'></div>南面宅遵，达四聪于虞舜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207120_comment'></div>大庖日御，绥五福于周成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207120_comment'></div>庶或听卑，终闻诏可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207120_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207120_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='067b4636daef4504be509857a5802de5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("067b4636daef4504be509857a5802de5");'><span id='067b4636daef4504be509857a5802de5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1100')">1099-1100年</a>，47-48岁</div><div id='067b4636daef4504be509857a5802de5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>　徽宗即位，晁补之迁签书武宁军判官，赐绯衣银鱼，寻复通判河中府。作品：《雄州防御推官晁君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六八。）</span>《千秋岁》（叶舟容易）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页八三。此词本事、时间俱难考，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207704' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207704' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207704?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雄州防御推官晁君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（元符三年五月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207704")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207704_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207704'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207704'>府君晁氏，讳端中，字元升，汉大夫错之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207704_comment'></div>后家开封，又徙钜野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207704_comment'></div>尚书刑部郎中、知越州、赠吏部尚书讳宗简之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207704_comment'></div>尚书库部员外郎、通判凤翔府讳仲偃之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207704_comment'></div>库部前夫人许氏，后夫人刘氏，而府君刘夫人出也，封长寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207704_comment'></div>府君生警悟，好书，十岁能为古诗，草圣奇异，库部尤钟念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207704_comment'></div>其失怙恃也，年始十五矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207704_comment'></div>人意其幼骄，而难其骤处约也，而府君悲哀折节，如故寒生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207704_comment'></div>间关自力，竟为东方名进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207704_comment'></div>而文辞雅不追世好，故累上乃中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207704_comment'></div>初调赵州平棘尉，盗去境，民安堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207704_comment'></div>迁雄州防御推官，知颍州沈丘县事，将行而以疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207704_comment'></div>享年五十，元符三年四月庚子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207704_comment'></div>即其年五月辛酉，合祔于任城县吕村鱼山前夫人胡氏之穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207704_comment'></div>胡氏知书能诗，先府君没二十二年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207704_comment'></div>继夫人闾丘氏，淑慎宜其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207704_comment'></div>二男三女：男保之、付之，皆举进士自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207704_comment'></div>女尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207704_comment'></div>府君为人岂弟，卑以自牧，而倜傥尚义，不事小节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207704_comment'></div>文史笔墨之玩，甚于嗜欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207704_comment'></div>好酒，喜山水，尝诵李白语曰：「偶乘扁舟，一日千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207704_comment'></div>忽遇胜景，终年不移」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207704_comment'></div>人亦以为近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207704_comment'></div>与人交，倾倒无不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207704_comment'></div>仕宦作业，得少为足，类马少游之为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207704_comment'></div>诗文草隶则元和以前胜士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207704_comment'></div>江南黄庭坚尝见其所作而叹曰：「永怀而善怨，蔚然类《骚」》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207704_comment'></div>庭坚未尝以此许人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207704_comment'></div>其在平棘，守李陶作楼于洨之阳，府君赋焉，陶刻石楼上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1207704_comment'></div>后补之见之，曰：「赋虽小道，然屈、宋远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1207704_comment'></div>文词之芳润，至相如、子云而极；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1207704_comment'></div>左、张廑廑乎蕲富而更窘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1207704_comment'></div>曹植欲返其波澜而不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1207704_comment'></div>《洨阳楼》之作，有心哉，汉之上乎，若亲见子云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1207704_comment'></div>不能动人，则补之之所不能知也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1207704_comment'></div>府君，补之之季父，少长同研席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1207704_comment'></div>其铭府君，不求诸人，而补之自铭之，亦府君之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1207704_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1207704'>论世莫近于唐，而唐以文侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1207704_comment'></div>何必其大者，若郊、岛焉传矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1207704_comment'></div>目贱耳贵，蓝田之璞以为块。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1207704_comment'></div>东家尚尔，而况乃雄辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1207704_comment'></div>虎炳不玩，以远莫驯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1207704_comment'></div>山鸡镜舞，则惟近人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1207704_comment'></div>吁嗟！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1207704_comment'></div>吾季父以远没身，杂荪茝以为词兮，以慰夫离散之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1207704_comment'></div>举斯世而一人知兮，则吾不既已闻，尚遗此后昆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1207704_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196552?labeling=true' target='_blank'>千秋岁<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196552")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196552'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196552'>叶舟容易。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196552'>行尽江南地。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196552'>南雁断，无书至。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196552'>怜君羁旅处。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196552'>见我飘蓬际。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196552'>如梦寐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196552'>当年阆苑曾相对。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196552_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196552'>休说深心事。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196552'>但付狂歌醉。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196552'>那更话，孤帆起。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196552'>水精溪绕户。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196552'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_196552", 196552, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>云母</span>山相砌。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196552'>君莫去。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196552'>只堪伴我溪山里。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_196552_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，闰九月抵达信州任所。作品：《迷神引•贬玉溪对江山作》（黯黯青山红日暮）<span 九江（德化）

id='poem_sentence_0_195940'>白虹昼下昆崙顶，半入青林久不回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195940_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195940'>下洞水轮穿地底，冰崖吼怒却重来。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196056' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196056?labeling=true' target='_blank'>栖贤寺三峡桥</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196056")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196056_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196056'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196056'>绝壁秋标天外剑，深溪冬吼地中雷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196056_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196056'>上宫未信无人到，朱阁飞从顶上来。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_195957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/195957?labeling=true' target='_blank'>旧说庐山有紫芝田百亩人莫得见偶于开先栖贤林中步两日各得一枝正紫如玉戏成一首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", id='poem_sentence_0_195957'>千古芝田人不到，深林继日拾琼瑰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_195957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_195957'>从今为记晁夫子，曾到芝田百亩来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_195957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_195957'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_195957_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196067' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196067' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196067?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望香垆峰</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196067")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_196067_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196067'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196067'>危楼曲径群岩遍，蜡屐青鞋到处逢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196067_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196067'>更上五峰双剑表，香垆依旧半天中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196067_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196067'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_196067_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b46095503bd54b0fb91d0a01f47f0f82_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b46095503bd54b0fb91d0a01f47f0f82");'><span id='b46095503bd54b0fb91d0a01f47f0f82_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，47岁</div><div id='b46095503bd54b0fb91d0a01f47f0f82' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，舟行至九江，遂南下登庐山，流连不已。作品：《漫浪阁辞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_196512' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196512' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>漫浪阁辞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196512")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196512_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_196512'>南康刘羲仲壮舆，志操文义，蚤知名于士大夫。年四十矣，而学问亦苦，盖不欲一日弃其力于无用也。筑屋庐山其先人之居，自号曰漫浪翁，意以比元结，从仕与物皆不得已也。豫章黄庭坚鲁直曰：壮舆未至于翁，行己立志，不可谓漫浪者。颍川晁补之无咎以为知言。壮舆曰：请极其义。补之曰：唯。其词曰：</div><div id='poem_preface_196512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196512'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196512'>沛高皇之受嬴兮，刘别子曰楚元。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196512'>羌好诗而说义兮，敬设醴于穆生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196512'>戊始怠而穆去兮，申白笑而钳市。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196512'>富传孙而失国兮，派辟彊之支子。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196512'>爰清净而少欲兮，以身悟乎霍光。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196512'>蹇孙向之洽闻兮，至耆老而弥良。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196512'>曰众贤和于朝兮，万物和于野。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196512'>粤百世而能调兮，民胥来而凤下。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196512'>惟刘有后于楚兮，千岁发夫道原。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196512'>流其芳以益远兮，伟壮舆之不愆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196512'>原惟博而好直兮，向异世而复起。<div id='poem_sentence_10_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_196512'>舆惟进而未已兮，载向学亦不坠。<div id='poem_sentence_11_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_196512'>彼元结之信修兮，羌何为此漫浪也。<div id='poem_sentence_12_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_196512'>将履中而晦外兮，其德固天之放也。<div id='poem_sentence_13_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_196512'>惟漫浪之为言兮，匪正则之嘉名。<div id='poem_sentence_14_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_196512'>岂其惩屈之死忠兮，欲猗移以保生。<div id='poem_sentence_15_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_196512'>结当易之一爻兮，幽人履而正吉。<div id='poem_sentence_16_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_196512'>舆方壮而恶画兮，弃尔辅欲谁赖。<div id='poem_sentence_17_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_196512'>吾语子漫浪之可兮，遗物往其庶几。<div id='poem_sentence_18_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_196512'>苟畏人而群于人兮，拭唾面其犹殆。<div id='poem_sentence_19_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_196512'>朝骋望乎紫霄兮，夕归次乎左蠡。<div id='poem_sentence_20_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_196512'>五老兮在上，星子兮在下。<div id='poem_sentence_21_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_196512'>垂瀑介于高丘兮，洞深林而北靡。<div id='poem_sentence_22_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_196512'>飞梁亘于三峡兮，倏异景而殊世。<div id='poem_sentence_23_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_196512'>青松屋兮桂宇，辛夷房兮梅户。<div id='poem_sentence_24_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_196512'>兰糗兮菊粻，荪体荐兮肴若芳。<div id='poem_sentence_25_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_196512'>云驷兮霓辀，岁将晏兮谁与游。<div id='poem_sentence_26_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_196512'>烟为衣兮水为佩，君谁须兮林之际。<div id='poem_sentence_27_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_196512'>吾以漫为旌兮，建彼太虚之上也。<div id='poem_sentence_28_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_196512'>吾以浪为乘兮，周彼八荒之外也。<div id='poem_sentence_29_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_196512'>羾万里而不逢人兮，御谒我以宜止。<div id='poem_sentence_30_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_196512'>晻轰轰而旷汹汹兮，羌何以辩乎明晦。<div id='poem_sentence_31_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_196512'>弥高出于千仞兮，群凤过而北南。<div id='poem_sentence_32_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_196512'>弥幽径于雷室兮，列缺惊而后先。<div id='poem_sentence_33_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_196512'>求佺侨而不得兮，咸勃窣其在下。<div id='poem_sentence_34_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_196512'>乃山泽之臞兮，夫何足以跂而望我。<div id='poem_sentence_35_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_196512'>茫吾不知其所如兮，黔嬴告我以何舍。<div id='poem_sentence_36_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_196512'>出无阴兮入无阳，旋丹崖兮匝大荒。<div id='poem_sentence_37_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_196512'>忽临睨夫故居兮，群梯危之蜂户。<div id='poem_sentence_38_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_196512'>伛白叟之扶童兮，迎谓我以良苦。<div id='poem_sentence_39_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_196512'>返吾稼兮复吾樵，山■<span class='inlineComment2'>（山悤）</span>■<span class='inlineComment2'>（山悤）</span>兮江滔滔。<div id='poem_sentence_40_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_196512'>舆先人之善俗兮，虽百世犹未改。<div id='poem_sentence_41_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_196512'>彼鲁衰而龂龂兮，吾老稚以知耻。<div id='poem_sentence_42_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_196512'>匪礼失而求野兮，民固化于不恌。<div id='poem_sentence_43_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_196512'>舆克家而好常兮，庸谨行以毋慠。<div id='poem_sentence_44_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_196512'>怀向原之遗直兮，念尔祖而履薄。<div id='poem_sentence_45_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_196512'>陈洪范之九畴兮，叙三统与七略。<div id='poem_sentence_46_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_196512'>以为博而弗考兮，蹇无用而束阁。<div id='poem_sentence_47_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_196512'>纷舆世之多贤兮，匪曲全而好修。<div id='poem_sentence_48_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_196512'>惟仁宅与义路兮，羌可居而必由。<div id='poem_sentence_49_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_196512'>结信贤而自晦兮，忘其同物以迷世。<div id='poem_sentence_50_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_196512'>凫与波而上下兮，夫固非驹之所喜。<div id='poem_sentence_51_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_196512'>乱曰：接舆诡而悟圣兮，匪沮溺亦楚狂。<div id='poem_sentence_52_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_53_196512'>圣与言而莫顾兮，人以为知乎大方。<div id='poem_sentence_53_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_54_196512'>既不足用吾中兮，吾将从回宪之所臧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_196512_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_196512'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷三。又见《三刘家集》卷六七，《四续古文奇赏》卷一，《奇赏斋古文汇编》卷一四○。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_196512_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之服除改监信州盐酒税，六月启程南下，舟行至九江，遂南下登庐山，流连不已。作品：《尾犯•一名碧芙蓉庐山》（庐山小隐）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此词见《晁补之词编年笺注》页七七。）</span><div id='poem_196604' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196604' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196604?labeling=true' target='_blank'>尾犯 庐山一名碧芙蓉</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196604")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196604_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196604'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196604'>庐山小隐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196604'>渐年来疏懒，浸浓归兴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196604'>彩桥飞过，深溪地底，奔雷馀韵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196604'>香炉照日，望处与、青霄近。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196604'>想群仙，呼我应远，怪来须丝垂镜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196604_comment'></div></div><br /><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196604'>海上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_196604", 196604, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>云车</span>回轫。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196604'>少姑传、金母信。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196604'>森翠裾琼佩，落日初霞，纷纭相映。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196604'>谁见壶中景。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196604'>花洞里、杳然渔艇。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196604_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196604'>别是个、潇洒乾坤，世情尘土休问。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_196604_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='7515eb59616a489aaaade0c23e4c577e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7515eb59616a489aaaade0c23e4c577e");'><span id='7515eb59616a489aaaade0c23e4c577e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年</a>，48岁</div><div id='7515eb59616a489aaaade0c23e4c577e' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年7月</a>　徽宗即位，晁补之迁签书武宁军判官，赐绯衣银鱼，寻复通判河中府，未行，召为著作佐郎，七月启程北归。作品：《祭大孤山女郎文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span><div id='poem_1207745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭大孤山女郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1100年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207745")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207745'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207745'>维元符三年，岁次庚辰，七月癸酉，承议郎、武骑尉晁补之谨以丝网碧屦及酒酌时果之奠，敬祭告于大孤山女郎之神曰：补之仕不遇合，不敢忘忠，而为权臣所憎，陷以朋党，于岁己卯，窜诸灵山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207745_comment'></div>季秋扬帆，挈妇与子，旅拜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1207745", 1207745, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>神幄</span>，陈词靡他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207745_comment'></div>神赐吉占，曰归甚迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207745_comment'></div>偶读旧载，或行遇神，神与之言，为买丝屦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207745_comment'></div>客自都返，无从致之，留屦水边，遗刀石上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207745_comment'></div>发去已远，犹不悟知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207745_comment'></div>鱼跳客舟，刀在鱼腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207745_comment'></div>因发歌咏，庶神若兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207745_comment'></div>肸蚃有闻，而非梦寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207745_comment'></div>旋上干越，湍流迅奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207745_comment'></div>常所玩穿，金山革履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207745_comment'></div>前夕堕濑，旦乃觉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207745_comment'></div>去百里馀，不可求访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207745_comment'></div>而一渔𦩘，得于上流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207745_comment'></div>履不足云，神其可信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207745_comment'></div>因语室内，我言敢欺？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207745_comment'></div>为神作兹，彩絇繶纯，俟我归日，答神之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207745_comment'></div>今蒙国恩，全室还北，跪献几下，虽菲而诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207745_comment'></div>尚蕲他时，为记若赞，叙之本末，警彼聋顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207745_comment'></div>名非淫讹，灵实炟赫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207745_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1207745_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

彭泽

湖口

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1100&endYear=1100')">1100年7月</a>　徽宗即位，晁补之迁签书武宁军判官，赐绯衣银鱼，寻复通判河中府，未行，召为著作佐郎，七月启程北归。作品：《书李正臣怪石诗后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207288'>湖口李正臣，世收怪石至数十百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207288_comment'></div>初，正臣蓄一石，高五尺，而状异甚，东坡先生谪惠州，过而题之云「壶中九华」，谓其一山九峰也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207288_comment'></div>元符己卯九月，贬上饶，舣钟山寺下，寺僧言壶中九华奇怪，而正臣不来，余不暇往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207288_comment'></div>庚辰七月遇赦北归，至寺下，首问之，则为当涂郭祥正以八十千取去累月矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207288_comment'></div>然东坡先生将复过此，李氏室中崷崒森耸、殊形诡观者尚多，公一题之，皆重于九华矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1207288_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>，47岁</div><div id='b20ec140730049f8bedeed69c98a9512' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1099&endYear=1099')">1099年</a>　晁补之监信州盐酒税。作品：《鹅湖长老开堂疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷七0。）</span><div id='poem_1207774' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207774' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207774?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鹅湖长老开堂疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1099年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207774")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207774_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207774'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207774'>盖闻大空非界，认华自是迷人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207774_comment'></div>阳燄无波，守鱼真成痴鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207774_comment'></div>徒以无始，妄业有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207774_comment'></div>幻因说寂说，常别名别相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207774_comment'></div>室罗筏河，见佛影正似梦中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207774_comment'></div>毗舍俱家，入圣胞未知来处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207774_comment'></div>有病必求药，到岸不须船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207774_comment'></div>佛性在阿那边，两头双动；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207774_comment'></div>般若以何为体，大笑一场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207774_comment'></div>谈此者多，达此者寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207774_comment'></div>又恁么去也，当如何接之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207774_comment'></div>曾经黄蘖三顿来，直得困彻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207774_comment'></div>便是曹溪一滴水，更不疑他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207774_comment'></div>固知戴头觅头，就屋添屋，也要春来冰解，日出烟消。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207774_comment'></div>况鹅湖山水之名蓝，马祖子孙之遗范，虽复骨藏十世，未妨名播九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207774_comment'></div>法席比虚，缁徒犹盛，必得如龙如虎，乃堪度马度驴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207774_comment'></div>伏惟某和尚悟祖祖心、提方方印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207774_comment'></div>默时渊妙体用，推向一坑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207774_comment'></div>语则雷惊纵横，流出千偈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207774_comment'></div>彼缘已熟，此正是时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207774_comment'></div>卷舒皆欲为人，去住亦岂由我？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207774_comment'></div>今者不动一茎草，不远千里涂，直须救取猫儿，也莫输却山子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207774_comment'></div>慈悲肯顾，欢喜普同。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1207774_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
徐州（彭城）

商洛（上洛）

class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再寄定国</a><span class='authorDate'>（1101年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196126")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196126'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196126'>河南少尹古臞仙，销尽新缘窘旧缘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196126'>草字更无千载圣，谈言自有一家天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196126'>远游轻世唯何甚，少贬求容否不然。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196126'>选壮坐狂俱龃龉，社樗元自可忘年。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196126'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196126_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

新安

-----title
湖州（乌程）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='cd0a98417a1f40f6a399ff70369c4f8a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cd0a98417a1f40f6a399ff70369c4f8a");'><span id='cd0a98417a1f40f6a399ff70369c4f8a_link' style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之知湖州。作品：《苕霅行和于潜令毛国华》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一0。）</span>《和王仲甫病暑》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一一。）</span><div id='poem_196405' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196405' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196405?labeling=true' target='_blank'>苕霅行和于潜令毛国华</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196405")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196405_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196405'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196405'>苕溪清，霅溪绿，溪水湾环绕天目。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196405'>山间古邑三百家，日出隔溪闻打衙，长官长髯帽乌纱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196405'>不曾执板谒大尹，醉卧紫兰花影斜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196405'>紫兰花开为谁好，年年岁岁溪南道。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196405'>不见西陵白发人，荆江夜雪唱阳春。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196405'>阳春绝唱和者寡，客醉闻之双泪洒。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196405'>夜来魂梦海中山，缥缈云涛烟浪间。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196405'>云涛烟浪不可渡，睡觉秋风落桐树。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196405'>秦吉了，秦吉了，言语无人会。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196405_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196405'>无人会得奈君何，且向紫兰花下醉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_196405_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_196386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和王仲甫病暑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196386")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_196386_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196386'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196386'>吴邦惮暑如蜂虿，河曲还遭长日晒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196386'>蔗浆金碗赖蠲烦，内托潜阴数为败。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196386'>黄昏乍快风吹发，驱拊蚊虻坐明发。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196386'>青衫主簿气如云，茂陵无事悲消渴。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196386'>茫洋河伯何为者，两涘无因辨牛马。<div id='poem_sentence_4_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_196386'>何生狂梦涸归墟，喉舌汤汤未劳泻。<div id='poem_sentence_5_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_196386'>能来一嗽华池津，七碗清风立有神。<div id='poem_sentence_6_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_196386'>更寻齿下微妙诀，遣君体适仍魂平。<div id='poem_sentence_7_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_196386'>案头白纸如堆雪，人事纷纷日将月。<div id='poem_sentence_8_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_196386'>与君未遇尤四时，利害相磨生内热。<div id='poem_sentence_9_196386_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_196386'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_196386_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>三月，晁补之改知湖州，四月末抵达任所。作品：《湖州谢到任表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1207139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207139")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207139'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207139'>臣补之言：奉敕就差知湖州，已于四月二十九日到任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207139_comment'></div>始解蒲中，即临霅上，去股肱之要郡，得山水之名城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207139_comment'></div>除授每优，事功常歉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207139_comment'></div>愚衷内揆，感涕交挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207139_comment'></div>臣补之<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣本以寒生，起于下国，艰勤少日，既孤露以不天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207139_comment'></div>问学长年，又僻违而无类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207139_comment'></div>未足称王、裴之选，奚取铨衡？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207139_comment'></div>不能措游、夏之辞，何知笔削？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207139_comment'></div>一昨所自陈列，皆出悃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207139_comment'></div>已忧疾惫之莫胜，更觉才殚之难彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207139_comment'></div>恐陨越无以塞责，故蹲循冀于食功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207139_comment'></div>终赖察微，俾从补外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207139_comment'></div>逮今移徙，复窃便安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207139_comment'></div>然臣自惟何人，徼幸乃得若此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207139_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇皇帝陛下道光前烈，仁覆群伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207139_comment'></div>瑾瑜所贵于匿瑕，菅蒯可收而代匮，故容器使，屡及下材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207139_comment'></div>而臣以五十岁服官之时，当二千石共理之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207139_comment'></div>有心许国，盖蚤脱于冗员；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207139_comment'></div>无地输忠，但益修于常职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207139_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷圣、激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1207139_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1207139'><span class='label'>按：</span>《鸡肋集》卷五五。又见清抄一百五十卷本《圣宋名贤五百家播芳大全文粹》卷二八，乾隆《浙江通志》卷二五九。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1207139_comment'></div></div><br /></div><div href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　晁补之知湖州。作品：《赠常州感慈邦长老》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一四。）</span><div id='poem_196527' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196131' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196131?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵王正甫马陵感事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196131")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196131'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196131'>风雨关河浩荡愁，骚人憭慄对清秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196131_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196131'>追君旧事何堪听，投我新诗不易酬。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196131_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196131'>纸上安知百年后，酒中聊可一生浮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196131_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196131'>言归款段谁能约，正有疏顽马少游。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196131_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196131'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196131_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='d2f402b38bba454f8ef03d1b114b1e04_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d2f402b38bba454f8ef03d1b114b1e04");'><span id='d2f402b38bba454f8ef03d1b114b1e04_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，50岁</div><div id='d2f402b38bba454f8ef03d1b114b1e04' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　晁补之知湖州。作品：《中大夫提举南京鸿庆宫李公生祠记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三一。此条地点可疑，观其内容，应系于河中府，而其时间为九月旦日，则已离河中，姑系于此。）</span>《书毋丘震御印历纸后》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷三三。）</span><div id='poem_1207630' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207630' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207630?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中大夫提举南京鸿庆宫李公生祠记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207630")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207630'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207630'>中大夫、提举南京鸿庆宫、陇西郡开国李侯棻，少以文词及进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207630_comment'></div>所居官，官治，烨然有声于搢绅间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207630_comment'></div>公卿大臣若当涂之显人，言其才可用者以百数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207630_comment'></div>而侯于莅官，务尽其心力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207630_comment'></div>盖慕昔人奉法循理、不肯少如玉多如石者，故人不得而置亲疏，世亦不得尽其材，而侯亦超然自得于二累之上，守其操不改，外若不足，而中无愧焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207630_comment'></div>尤长于治郡，有遗爱于同、华、商、邠四州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207630_comment'></div>而蒲又侯之里也，故士以其老成为矜式，民怀其旧，以谓知吾俗而不迕吾安，其治而不忘者莫如侯，乃相与谋其子弟若邦人之乐善好谊者，为侯立生祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207630_comment'></div>会补之自尚书郎出守蒲，下车拜侯于里中，问民所疾苦，求施设之方，且诵秦穆公求黄发则无过之言以为请，而侯亦欣然倾盖俉语，与之忘年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207630_comment'></div>又因以教邦人诸生悌长而贵老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207630_comment'></div>此守之事，补之之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207630_comment'></div>或曰：以侯之才，虽官视九卿，年耋耄以康宁而食饮，犹为不遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207630_comment'></div>补之曰：士有志，遇不遇有命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207630_comment'></div>若常情言者，仕而不至将相，皆不遇也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207630_comment'></div>以义，则一官而可以行志，皆遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207630_comment'></div>龚遂、黄霸，郡守也，而尊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207630_comment'></div>鲁恭、卓茂，县令也，而贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207630_comment'></div>其同时公相位四人上者岂皆传？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207630_comment'></div>然则贵且尊，果不在爵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207630_comment'></div>遇不遇，惟其所施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207630_comment'></div>屈吾指以数往行，而吾无愧焉者，则吾之遇不既有馀矣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207630_comment'></div>尝试过侯之居，升高以望其前，则太华削成四方，矗然倚立而参天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207630_comment'></div>右则黄河出于龙门，汹乎跆蹙而鸣地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207630_comment'></div>南则首阳，危颠不毛，伯夷、叔齐之所登也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207630_comment'></div>东则王官，深谷绝迹，司空图之所藏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207630_comment'></div>因顾侯而语，想见古昔之盛，夸夺相雄，间不容息，与二三君子之遁逃一世，寂寥长往，虽势相什伯，皆忽然而过，如吹剑一吷，何有得失？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207630_comment'></div>而侯乃以少壮陈力，有政四州，老乃休此，固异于斯人者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207630_comment'></div>儿童流辈，如风中烛，而侯独白首笑傲，康宁食饮如平时，有何不足而慕夫世之役役、生趋荣而没有恨者以为愧哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207630_comment'></div>因举酒而起，为侯寿曰：「乐哉，非不遇也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1207630_comment'></div>崇宁元年九月旦日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1207630_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207284' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207284' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207284?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书毋丘震御印历纸后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年7月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207284")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207284_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207284'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207284'>臣补之尝论：古者人主之职，在论一相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207284_comment'></div>相得其人矣，至百工有司之废置，皆相之任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207284_comment'></div>舜选于众举皋陶，汤选于众举伊尹，传以谓不仁者远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207284_comment'></div>夫舜与汤，人主之师，皆论一相，以远不仁，其道旷千百世所当循而不改者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207284_comment'></div>然自昔盛世，君子多，小人少，好恶明于上，是非公于下，故未尝求贤而贤至，疾不肖不为已甚，而不肖者不待黜而革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207284_comment'></div>后世道德不同而俗隳，贤不肖陵杂而人才益微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207284_comment'></div>至五代分裂，大坏极乱，四民皆丧其业，而武夫斗士充朝廷而布州郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207284_comment'></div>当是时，圣人出，将何如以救其弊哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207284_comment'></div>恭惟太祖皇帝以神武不杀之资，应千载特起之运，以宋继周，犹舜受尧之天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207284_comment'></div>乾德三年俘孟昶，开宝四年俘刘鋹，八年俘李煜，而钱俶恐惧，请命自负其版。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207284_comment'></div>至太宗皇帝太平兴国四年，又虏刘继元而灭之，于是区宇混一，四方泰宁，父老见白袍举子，皆喜相贺曰：「此辈出，天下太平矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207284_comment'></div>而太宗皇帝以上圣继统，丁投戈讲艺之时，患人才之微，悼列位之缺，尝以淳化五年十月二日躬临便殿，自阅群士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207284_comment'></div>盖京官而上预选者，凡若干人，略去铨衡常格，而书其莅官之日与其功过于所谓历者，诏曰「使御印给付本官」，而又皆以宸翰冠其首，有「惠爱临民，奉法除奸」之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207284_comment'></div>被此选者，咸自荣耀，以为不世之遭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207284_comment'></div>而秘书省著作佐郎谯人毋丘震在选中，自筦库擢通判晋州，而震竟以清白有治绩终，亦盛矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207284_comment'></div>其后，治平之岁久，学校亦兴，天下之为士者日以多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207284_comment'></div>以臣补之为郎时计之，选于吏部者，自京官而上，盖数千人，而官州县者不预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207284_comment'></div>虽朝廷内外不患于乏才，而士之为士者愈多而益贱，岂其行己任事皆愧于昔人而然？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1207284_comment'></div>盖必有知之者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1207284_comment'></div>然则太宗皇帝所以初平祸乱，不遑暇其他，而独以选士为急务，至不以付宰相，而亲阅在廷之庶士如恐不及、如恐遗之者，岂特患人才之微、悼列位之缺而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1207284_comment'></div>而圣意若曰，因以导宰相于黜陟之公，训有司以铨衡之审，宜若是，故大臣戒，小臣劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1207284_comment'></div>当时得人称盛，而后世皆荣于为士，以迄于今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1207284_comment'></div>其选有司者，至数千人、若万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1207284_comment'></div>其盛无以复加，岂不以此哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1207284_comment'></div>呜呼，太宗皇帝之用意深矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1207284_comment'></div>夫不以其时而考之，徒曰「上必无为而用天下，至选人才，当责宰相」，而上不知太宗皇帝所以用意之深，下不究孝宣帝之综核名实，所以为汉中兴之道，是之谓不知务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1207284_comment'></div>故臣补之谨拜手稽首序其事，以归震之裔孙润州观察支使莘，使藏于家，且以告将来之未知者云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1207284_comment'></div>崇宁元年七月初八日，具位臣晁补之谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1207284_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f5a2f830b96a419bbe383982240b61b4_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f5a2f830b96a419bbe383982240b61b4");'><span id='f5a2f830b96a419bbe383982240b61b4_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，50岁</div><div id='f5a2f830b96a419bbe383982240b61b4' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　晁补之知湖州。作品：《湖州谢执政启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1207175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖州谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207175")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207175'>承流已幸，易地更优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207175_comment'></div>荷平施之每加，抚中情而屡愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207175_comment'></div>伏念补之禀生鄙滞，逢世盛明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207175_comment'></div>学术素疏，入必更文字之选；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207175_comment'></div>吏能何取，出犹当民社之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207175_comment'></div>且复数奇寡偶，孤茕未陨之馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207175_comment'></div>而幸刮垢磨光，宽大兼容之际，萧条起废，跼蹐临官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207175_comment'></div>常欲随其所遇，而必竭筋力之能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1207175_comment'></div>傥可无歉于心，而粗塞廪食之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1207175_comment'></div>而况河东股肱要害之郡，吴兴山水清远之邦，不缘丐求，继用付畀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1207175_comment'></div>未觉川涂之邈，但知舟楫之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1207175_comment'></div>自顾何人，所蒙若此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1207175_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇某官夔龙著业，丙魏扬声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1207175_comment'></div>般役众工，虽各趋而皆当；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1207175_comment'></div>医调百药，盖异用而咸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1207175_comment'></div>故此下材，尚叨器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1207175_comment'></div>受恩必报，思拥彗以无从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1207175_comment'></div>陈力不能，念乞身而未可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1207175_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='476caeaa470e496f8cd1c5ce8d260a18_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("476caeaa470e496f8cd1c5ce8d260a18");'><span id='476caeaa470e496f8cd1c5ce8d260a18_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，50岁</div><div id='476caeaa470e496f8cd1c5ce8d260a18' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>晁补之知湖州。作品：《湖州移天王祠告祭文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六一。）</span>《资政殿大学士李公行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六二。此条地点不详，姑系于此。）</span>《资政殿学士李公墓铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《鸡肋集》卷六四。此条地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1207751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>湖州移天王祠告祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207751")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207751'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207751'>维年月日，具位晁补之谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敬祭告于天王之神曰：闻之，神民异业，欲敬而不渎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207751_comment'></div>前此守居，作楼城上，虚其中以望，而寓神其西楹，为壁限之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207751_comment'></div>望者日至，而无求于神，若此渎矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1207751_comment'></div>今作堂楼左，虽庳而严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1207751_comment'></div>吉日甲子，告神以迁，正位乎其中，而以私俸饰神之像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1207751_comment'></div>凡壁间仪从海波烟云之观，复缋如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1207751_comment'></div>使非夫祈谢洁斋而来者，不以其时不敢以觌神，以为敬而不渎者在此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1207751_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1207751_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207662' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207662' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207662?labeling=true' target='_blank'>资政殿大学士李公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207662")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1207662_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207662'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207662'>崇宁元年正月己卯，资政殿大学士、右光禄大夫、知大名府、兼北京留守司事、大名府路安抚使李公薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1207662_comment'></div>讣闻，上震悼，诏辍视朝，赠金紫光禄大夫，官子若孙六人，且赙其家甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1207662_comment'></div>其孤祥、祉、祓、禠，考次事迹，以诿前史官晁补之为公行状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1207662_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1207664' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1207664' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1207664?labeling=true' target='_blank'>资政殿学士李公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_1207664")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1207664_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1207664'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1207664'>惟天生才，于世之平。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1207664'>气蒸为祥，卿云景星。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1207664'>降而在人，中和炳明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1207664'>仁宗大德，好生如天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1207664'>天为衮衮，生才与贤。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1207664'>如泉不尽，遗其后昆。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1207664'>逮于英宗，旁招洽闻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1207664'>公于是时，海运鹏骞。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1207664'>神宗稽古，出百王上。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1207664'>上以文求，公以儒往。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1207664'>国有诰令，公口出之。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1207664'>国有政事，公手裁之。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1207664'>公岂能然？曰上所知。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1207664'>至于哲宗，亦再用公。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1207664'>惟天子圣，我祖考同。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1207664'>三朝是毗，历三省闼。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1207664'>小心长虑，白首一节。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1207664'>不流于信，不踬于疑。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1207664'>皇建其极，五福是施。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1207664'>惟君舟之，柔是胡越。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1207664'>又何济之，惟公其楫。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1207664'>开是大同，至于式序。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_1207664'>天子万年，公有令誉。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1207664_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1207664'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1207664_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>时政局复变，朝廷追复绍圣，重治元祐及元符末旧臣。秋，晁补之罢湖州任。宰相蔡京籍司马光、苏轼等一百二十人罪状，谓之奸党，请御书刻石于端礼门，晁补之亦在籍。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='c183b3fadbe24e8bbf049fdbc6bef873_label'><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_196177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196177'>报国丹心千载事，对花霜鬓一番新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196177'>秦吴绝域从来恨，我已能知莫问津。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196177'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196177_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='502d85617cea4ec9bb68e5c85df6279e_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　三月，晁补之改知湖州，四月末抵达任所。作品：《次韵文潜尉福昌时壁间清暑亭诗》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_196296' class='_poem'><div "poem_title_196296")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196296'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196296'>梅福当年守此官，荆山谁见韫琅玕。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196296'>人如修竹三冬好，诗与清溪九夏寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196296'>未信簪裳妨小隐，蚤<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>时雷雨起深蟠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196296'>春风揽辔河阳县，痛饮狂歌忆旧年<span class='inlineComment2'>（《坡门酬唱集》作欢）</span>。<div 三门峡（陕县）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ec27ceeab2df4398913f01b5b58c75b0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ec27ceeab2df4398913f01b5b58c75b0");'><span id='ec27ceeab2df4398913f01b5b58c75b0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>，50岁</div><div id='ec27ceeab2df4398913f01b5b58c75b0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1102&endYear=1102')">1102年</a>　三月，晁补之改知湖州，四月末抵达任所。作品：《罢蒲乾濠道中寄府教授之道弟》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《鸡肋集》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_196213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_196213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/196213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罢蒲乾濠道中寄府教授之道弟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1102年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(27339, "北宋", "晁补之", "poem_title_196213")'>晁补之</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_196213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_196213'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_196213'>冲寒到郡待花开，花未开时却遣回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_196213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_196213'>敢意三年容我隐，只如千里访君来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_196213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_196213'>二崤毂击何为者，五老云霾安在哉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_196213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_196213'>更约劖诗猿虎谷，它年重过埽莓苔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_196213_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_196213'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_196213_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
